name: Intro
_source: s;;In the continent of Yondo, these pillars of virtue are held in high regard:;center;210;cinematic;NumLines=3
s;;This is a story of truth...{c:wait;200}{br}and all its consequences.;center;160;cinematic;NumLines=2
s;Krista;Hey, watch it! You don't gotta be so rough.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Actually, on second thought--
s;Gordon;Shut it, brat. Now, be a good girl and do as we say, got it?
s;Krista;Hm{tgm}...{c:wait;200}{c:e;Krista;Smile,NormalBlink}{tgm} Nope!|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}Forrest! I know you're out there! Help m--
s;Bandit1;This kid's a loud one, boss. What do we do?
s;Gordon;Make sure she's gagged tight and get out there!|Some Medean soldiers were spotted heading this way.|Oh, and make sure she's tied up tight too.|We don't want her escaping on us.

s;Krista;Aw, yes! Operation: Kidnapping Fantasy is going smoothly.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}Well, almost smoothly.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes,Smile}Either way, I still got kidnapped and Forrest's trying to rescue me.|It's a win in my book!;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Forrest;Kai, are you sure this is where those bandits are keeping Her Highness?
s;Kai;I'm positive, Forrest. They were pretty easy to track.
s;Trevor;Her Highness really needs better ways of entertaining herself.
s;Kai;We could keep her under lock and key or something.
s;Forrest;She'd enjoy that too much.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}No matter. We must rescue Princess Krista!
s;Gordon;Hey! You damn soldiers want your precious princess? Come get her!|No one faces Gordon of the Grash Mountains and makes it out alive!
s;Forrest;If it's a fight they want, it's a fight they'll get.|Kai! Trevor! Let's go!

name: DeathForrest
_source: s;Forrest;I apologize, Your Highness{tgm}...{tgm}|I will have to withdraw{tgm}...!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

_source: s;Masashi;N-No{tgm}...!{tgm} There was so much{tgm}...{tgm} I still{tgm}...;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: Outro
_source: s;Forrest;Thank Medea you're safe. Here, let me untie you.
s;Krista;Ow!{w} What was that pinch on the cheek for?
s;Forrest;Your Highness, you know exactly what that was for.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}You'll be given a more severe punishment when we return home.

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;If you have your men retreat and tell us what we want to know,|we'll let you go.
s;Alim;I'm under no obligation to explain myself to you.|However{tgm}...{w}{c:e;Alim;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}You there.
s;Alim;I've already said my piece.{w}{c:e;Alim;HalfCloseEyes} Traitorous scum.
s;Felicity;Just get out of our sight.
s;Alim;With pleasure.|{c:e;Alim;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}I have to report back to Lord Milo anyway.
s;Alim;It's surprising to see someone like you here.|{c:e;Alim;CloseEyes}No, perhaps "disappointing" is the word I should be using.
s;Felicity;Quiet.{w} I have no intentions of associating myself with the likes of you.
s;Alim;My, my. Someone likes to jump to conclusions.|{c:e;Alim;NormalBlink,NoSmile}I was just making observations. Nothing more.
s;Alim;At any rate, I cannot waste time with you lot. I must report back to Lord Milo.
s;Krista;Felicity, what was that all about? What's up with that guy?
s;Felicity;There's{tgm}...{tgm} a lot to cover, Your Highness.

s;Khalid;Let's regroup and figure out what to do from here, then.|{c:e;Khalid;CloseEyes}And to be honest, I don't like what they came here for.|{c:e;Khalid;HalfCloseEyes}What's up with that book? Why did they want it so bad?

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Uh, thanks?|Look, if you want something, just say it already.

s;Tora;I'm joining up with you guys.|I hate all you Humans for what you've done,|but I hate the Talons more.|{c:e;Tora;CloseEyes}Struttin' around like they think they know what all us Shifters want{tgm}...|{c:e;Tora;NormalBlink}{tgm}It seriously ticks me off!|So, I wanna knock some sense into the Talons myself.
s;Krista;Well, we'd be happy to have you, Tora.
s;Tora;Yeah, yeah.{w} Don't think this means we're friends now or anything.

name: Outro
_source: for;GreenAlive;[u for u in game.level.unit_groups.get('merchants').units if game.check_dead(u) == False]

name: Outro
_source: s;Shula;Solmaz! What the hell are you doing working with these guys?|Is this where the missing kids from the orphanage ended up?|This is all your doing?!

s;Solmaz;Oh, Shula, you have no idea what you're meddling with.|{c:e;Solmaz;NormalBlink}The lives a few Humans are just a small sacrifice for our world to be reborn.|All you're doing is getting in the way.
s;Shula;Are you hearing yourself right now?!|{c:e;Shula;CloseEyes}This is all wrong.|{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}You have to stop this! You have to--
s;Solmaz;I have no time to reason with you. More work must be done.
s;Shula;No, no, no, she's not here!
s;Shula;Kiraz must've gotten taken deeper in! We have to go now!

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Khalid, Shula, let's get the rest of the prisoners out.
s;Shula;Kiraz! Are you alright?|{c:e;Shula;CloseEyes}I'm sorry for letting you put yourself in danger like this.
s;Kiraz;Please don't worry about it, Miss Shula.|We did what we had to do and came out successful.
s;Shula;Yeah, that's true, I guess.|{c:e;Shula;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Leave it to you to see the bright sight of things.

s;Shula;Kiraz{tgm}...|{c:e;Shula;CloseEyes}{tgm}Damn it! I knew this was too dangerous!|I shouldn't have{tgm}...{tgm} Fueg, damn it{tgm}...|{c:e;Shula;HalfCloseEyes}...{tgm} I have to bring her body back. She needs to be properly buried.
s;Shula;Most of the kids ended up okay. Except for{tgm}...
s;Shula;I'm going to head back to Coral Village and give her a proper burial.|The rest of the kids are coming too.
s;Shula;Thank Fueg the kids are safe.|{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}Prince Khalid, Princess Krista, I owe you guys one.
s;Khalid;Hey, don't sweat it. I'm just glad we got here when we did.
s;Shula;I'm going to head back to Coral Village with the kiddos.
s;Shula;And once I'm done with that, I'm joining you guys.|These dastards will pay for what they did!
s;Shula;I'll arrange things with the mayor to make sure they're looked after.|And I taught the older ones everything I know about hunting and housework.
s;Shula;I trust them enough to take care of themselves even if I'm not there.
s;Shula;Besides, I gotta avenge Kiraz.|I won't let those guys get away with this!
s;Krista;As long as you've got everything sorted out on your end,|we'd be glad to have you with us, Shula.
s;Krista;Go ahead, Shula. And take it easy, alright?
s;Shula;I will. And get a good hit in on those dastards for me.|They gotta pay for going after literal children.
s;Kiraz;Miss Shula, I'm sorry, but I want to join Princess Krista's cause too!
s;Kiraz;Miss Shula, I'm sorry, but I want to join Princess Krista's cause!
s;Shula;Now hold on!|Kiraz, I appreciate the enthusiasm, but you've gone through way too much already.
s;Kiraz;I can't stand by when I know there's more bad people out there.|I don't want anyone else to suffer like we did!
s;Shula;Kiraz{tgm}...{c:e;Shula;CloseEyes}{tgm} *sigh* Alright alright.|{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}I'm allowing it if you are, Princess.
s;Krista;Yeah, I'm all for it. Welcome to the team, Kiraz!
s;Kiraz;Thank you very much, Your Highness!|I'll do my best out there!
s;Shula;Anyway, we'd better get the kids back home.|Come on, Kiraz.
s;Krista;Hey, Khalid, we'd better give the place one last sweep.|We might find something useful.
s;Khalid;Jamal{tgm}...|{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink}{tgm}He was always an annoying scumbag, but I never wanted to fight him like this.
s;Khalid;Jamal{tgm}...|{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink}{tgm}He was always an annoying scumbag, but siding with the enemy?|Just what did these guys tell him?
s;Krista;Circ's hold on people can get that strong, Khalid.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Azalea and Samegoro are proof enough.
s;Milo;Well, well. We finally meet, spawn of Medea.|I've been wanting to see who was giving Ferrach and Agrona a hard time.
s;Krista;You're another one of Circ's followers, then.
s;Milo;Me being a mere "follower" is an understatement.|{c:e;Milo;NormalBlink,Smile}The name's Milo, one of Circ's Talons.
s;Milo;We're the ones calling the shots all over Yondo.|{c:e;Milo;CloseEyes,NoSmile}Well, we WERE until Ferrach and Agrona screwed up.{w}{c:e;Milo;CloseEyes,Smile} Oh well.
s;Khalid;You're pretty smug for someone who just lost.
s;Milo;It's a small defeat in the grand scheme of things.|{c:e;Milo;CloseEyes,Smile}Man, oh man, you have NO idea how far along our plans are.
s;Krista;Just what do you mean by that?

s;Milo;I'll let you figure that out on your own.{c:e;Milo;FarWink,Smile} I can't reveal all our secrets now, can I?|{c:e;Milo;NormalBlink,Smile}Anyway, I gotta do some clean up, then I'll be out of your hair.
s;Khalid;Hey! What did you do with him?

s;Milo;I doubt his fate is that high of a priority for you.|{c:e;Milo;FarWink,Smile}Let's just never mind him for now.|{c:e;Milo;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Anyway, before I go, how about a little reward for all your hard work so far?
s;Khalid;What are you going on about?
s;Milo;Man, you Humans just wanna know EVERYTHING.|{c:e;NormalBlink,Smile}Look, it's down this way. I'll let you take a peek yourselves.
s;Khalid;This is getting annoying.|{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink}And I can only imagine what sort of "reward" is down there.
s;Krista;I don't like it either, but it might be important.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Let's head down.
s;Krista;Is that{tgm}...?{tgm} No, it can't be{tgm}...
s;Khalid;E-Ervan?! Why is he here? HOW is he here?|{c:e;Khalid;HalfCloseEyes}He's still breathing too.{w}{c:e;Khalid;CloseEyes} Was he alive this whole time? How{tgm}...?
s;Khalid;Krista, we gotta bring Ervan back to the castle.|{c:e;Khalid;Smile}This is huge! He's alive! He's actually alive!
s;Krista;Right. Yeah.{br}L-Let's get out of here.

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;No! Those bandits got a hold of the stragglers.|Come on, guys! We gotta go back!
s;Forrest;And many more to go if our assumptions are correct.
s;Krista;Ain't no problem for us!|We know Oregot like the back of our hands at this point.|Should be an easy trip.
s;Ervan;Just how often have you been to Oregot?
s;Krista;O-Onwards, everyone! We've got no time to waste!
s;Ervan;Er, General Forrest?|Is there something I should know about?
s;Forrest;Don't ask questions you're not prepared to hear the answer to, Your Highness.
s;Ervan;Judah, do you have any insight on this?
s;Judah;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} I don't know about the specifics, but I do have theories.|{c:e;Judah;NormalBlink}However, I believe it's best if I share them when you're older, Your Highness.
s;Ervan;I'm twenty-two! What are you talking about?!
if;u('Torgen').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Torgen') == True and len(game.get_units_in_party('Krista')) < 17
s;Torgen;There you guys are.|I was wondering where you went off to.
s;Bandit2;Yer teamin' up with the Medeans now?
s;Torgen;Shut up already!{c:e;Torgen;NormalBlink} I never said that!
s;Torgen;Yeah, I'm joining up with them. But I never said you guys ain't coming either.
s;Torgen;Yeah, you and the rest of the gang's coming too.|{c:e;Torgen;Smile}Now, between you n' me, I never asked the princess if you could.|But I doubt she'd say no.{br}She likes you guys too.
s;Bandit2;We won't let you or the princess down! Promise!
s;Torgen;Alright, alright.|{c:e;Torgen;NormalBlink,Smile}You guys round up the rest of the group and catch up when you can.

name: Defeat Boss Poison
condition: ((unit.nid == 'Reid' and game.check_dead('Sven') == True) or (unit.nid == 'Sven' and game.check_dead('Gunnar') == True))and unit2.nid == None

name: FightAlfonso
_source: s;Alfonso;Hand over the girl, and no one gets hurt, got it?!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightGordonTrevor
_source: s;Trevor;I{tgm}...{tgm} I can do this.|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}Don't worry, Your Highness! We're coming!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightKeisha
_source: s;Keisha;Hehehe! Oh, you're actually trying to fight back?|{c:e;Keisha;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Alright, it's your funeral!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightYuma
_source: s;Yuma;Samegoro wants you all alive,|but he never said we couldn't rough you up a bit.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAkira
_source: s;Akira;Get out of the way!|This is between us and|that annoying brat of a mercenary!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightJoshua
_source: s;Joshua;So, you're my opponent, huh?|Don't leave me hanging!{br}Give it all ya got!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightYumiJoshua
_source: s;Yumi;Oh~ Who's this lovely hunk of meat?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Yumi;Never seen you fight in the Rooms of Valor before.|Just where have you been all my life, hm~?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Joshua;Busy fighting other strong opponents.|Now, less talk and more bashing heads!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightAkiraLin
_source: s;Akira;Alright, you. The jig is up!|Just be a good girl and come quietly already.|The less you resist,|the less me and my boys will hurt ya, get it?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Lin;Ugh. Gross.|{c:e;Lin;NormalBlink}Shut up and die like the scumbag you are.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightShigeo
_source: s;Shigeo;Surrender now and maybe you'll end up surviving all this.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightShigeoKhalid
_source: s;Shigeo;Another rider here? Samegoro said nothing about this.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Khalid;Hoping to get the upper hand on Krista, huh?|I won't allow that.{br}Not on my watch!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightShigeoAltena
_source: s;Shigeo;Another rider here? Samegoro said nothing about this.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Altena;Though I know nothing of this land,|I will not turn a blind eye|on those who cannot defend themselves. Have at you!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightSumire
_source: s;Sumire;No hard feelings. I have a job to do!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAsuka
_source: s;Asuka;I will protect the emperor with my life!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightNagisa
_source: s;Nagisa;I won't let you get past me!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightSamegoroKrista
_source: s;Krista;Just like with Azalea{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}Come on, Samegoro!{br}Snap out of it!|I'm not Medea!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightSamegoroTsubaki
_source: s;Tsubaki;Father, stop! Please! I{tgm}...{tgm} I don't want to fight you!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

s;Samegoro;Tsubaki{tgm}...?{tgm} Argh, <violet>m-my</> head{tgm}...|{c:e;Samegoro;CloseEyes}{tgm}<violet>N</>-No{tgm}...!{tgm} Don't ma<violet>ke me</>{tgm}...{tgm} She's{tgm}...{tgm} She's{tgm}...!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Samegoro;<violet>Give up, child. Your father holds no power over me.</>;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightSamegoroAsuka
_source: s;Asuka;Samegoro{tgm}...|{c:e;Asuka;CloseEyes}{tgm}I hoped it would not have to come to this.|{c:e;Asuka;NormalBlink}Please forgive me, Your Majesty.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightSamegoroKai
_source: s;Kai;Is that you in there, Samegoro?|{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes}Or is it someone else?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Samegoro;<violet>How perceptive of you.|The one you call "Samegoro" is not present.</>;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAgrona
_source: s;Agrona;You wish to challenge me?|You have no idea what you are up against.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAlim
_source: s;Alim;You dare to face me?|{c:e;Alim;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Go ahead. I'll just slip right past you.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightSolmaz
_source: s;Solmaz;What the?! Who are you? Get out of here!|You're getting in the way of Lord Milo's plans!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightJamal
_source: s;Jamal;Utter fools. All of you.|You will fall to the might of the Great Circ!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightJamalKrista
_source: s;Jamal;The current circumstances may prove this decision unwise,|but I still must ask.|{c:e;Jamal;NormalBlink,Smile}Would you be willing to give me another chance?|{c:e;Jamal;CloseEyes,Smile}I understand my first impression was not the greatest.|But, I am no longer that naive boy you knew six years ago.|{c:e;Jamal;NormalBlink,Smile}Even if marriage isn't an agreeable option,|I'd be more than happy to accept you into our ranks|on behalf of the Great Circ.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

s;Krista;Uh, no thanks?|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}You're insane for thinking I'd ever accept that.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}And, uh{tgm}...{tgm} This is gonna be REALLY awkward, but{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}{tgm}Who are you again?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

s;Jamal;You don't{tgm}...?{tgm} But{tgm}...|{tgm}You wench! How dare you toy with my heart!|{c:e;Jamal;HalfCloseEyes}Rot in the dirt with your precious Prince Ervan.|The Great Circ has no need for the likes of you.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightJamalKhalid
_source: s;Khalid;Damn, Jamal, I always knew you were bad news,|but outright siding with the enemy?|The hell's wrong with you?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Jamal;Those with the Great Circ are on the right side of history.|And I'll prove that to you!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAlimKrista
_source: s;Alim;You're the one Fueg's child fancied, hm?|{c:e;Alim;CloseEyes,Smile}The poor boy had no idea what he was getting himself into.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Alim;You'll have to pry the answer out of my cold, dead hands,|child of Medea.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAlimJudah
_source: s;Judah;Stand down, or face the wrath of Fuegsol's finest!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Alim;Allow me to put you in your place, foolish Human.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAlimFelicity
_source: s;Alim;Well, this is a surprise.|Why exactly is someone like you here?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Felicity;Drop it. I don't need any judgement from you.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Alim;I'll keep my thoughts to myself, then.|{c:e;Alim;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}My actions will do the talking for me.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAlimXiang
_source: s;Xiang;Yes? You seemed so determined before you ran into me.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Alim;Y-You{tgm}...{tgm} You're strong, but can you hit me?{w} Just try!|I{tgm}...{tgm} I'm not scared of you{tgm}...!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAlimTsurugi
_source: s;Alim;Oh? Just what is someone like you doing here?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Tsurugi;!!{w} Y-You{tgm}...{tgm}{c:e;Tsurugi;HalfCloseEyes} I don't want to fight.|{c:e;Tsurugi;NormalBlink}If we talk things out, then maybe--;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Alim;How naive.|{c:e;Alim;NormalBlink}You've chosen your side and I've chosen mine.|No amount of diplomacy will change things.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightSolmazShula
_source: s;Shula;Solmaz{tgm}...{tgm} I didn't want it to be true.|{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}Don't tell me you're actually WORKING for these scumbags!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

s;Solmaz;Poor ignorant Shula.|{c:e;Solmaz;NormalBlink}This is all for bringing about a new, bright utopia.|Lord Milo said so.|We as humans never knew the paradise from so long ago.|It is time to revert this world to its former glory!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightSolmazKhalid
_source: s;Solmaz;Ah, Prince Khalid.|It is an honor to make your acquaintence.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Khalid;Wait a minute.|Weren't you helping run that orphanage in Coral Village?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

s;Solmaz;I see my reputation precedes me.|{c:e;Solmaz;NormalBlink,Smile}But yes, that's correct.|{c:e;Solmaz;NoSmile}You know, if you weren't ruining the path to utopia,|I'd be more cordial.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Khalid;"Utopia"?{w}{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink} I don't know what kind of utopia|calls for killing innocents.|This ends here!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightSolmazKrista
_source: s;Krista;I don't want to use force if I don't have to.|Release the prisoners, and we'll just pretend nothing happened.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

s;Solmaz;Ah, you're Princess Krista, aren't you?|I've heard so much about you.|{c:e;Solmaz;NormalBlink,NoSmile}You're a threat to Lord Milo's plans.|Surrendering is not an option!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAlimKhalid
_source: s;Alim;I did not expect you to return so soon.|{c:e;Alim;CloseEyes}Why do you Humans have to be so unpredictable?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Khalid;I don't know what you're doing here|or what you're going on about.|All I know is that you're outta here!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightAgronaKrista
_source: s;Agrona;You have it made it all the way here.|Perhaps we have underestimated you.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Krista;Who are you guys? Why are you doing this?|What the hell is Circ?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Agrona;Don't ask questions you're not prepared|to hear the answer to.|You may not like what you discover.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAgronaKai
_source: s;Agrona;Ah, I remember you.|I had wondered where you{br}went.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Kai;I was hoping to confront you when I had more answers.|{c:e;Kai;Smile,CloseEyes}Heh. Things are just not going my way lately.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightAgronaTsubaki
_source: s;Agrona;You have joined the fray, Tsubaki?|I'm surprised.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Tsubaki;Lady Agrona, you{tgm}...{tgm} You{tgm}...!|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}You'll pay for what you did to Father!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightTsubaki
_source: s;Tsubaki;No! I{tgm}...{tgm} I won't let you hurt Father!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightTsubakiKai
_source: s;Tsubaki;That doesn't matter right{br}now. You're back!|You must have come back to help Father.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightTsubakiRyuuji
_source: s;Ryuuji;Ha! So, little Tsubaki's taking up the front lines now?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Tsubaki;What? Wait{tgm}...{tgm} Kenji?! Is it truly you?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Ryuuji;Sure is.|Now, I don't wanna cut this short, Tsubaki,|but we gotta get to the throne room.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightTsubakiSumire
_source: s;Tsubaki;Sumire? You're alive? How?|A-And what are you--;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Sumire;I apologize, Lady Tsubaki, but we gotta get to the emperor!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightTsubakiAsuka
_source: s;Asuka;This is all to ensure your father's safety, Lady Tsubaki.|I apologize for what I have to do.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightNagisaSumire
_source: s;Nagisa;Sumire? You're alive?!|And what do you think you're doing?!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Sumire;I'm sorry, Commander. But we gotta get to the emperor!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightNagisaKai
_source: s;Kai;Shoot! What the hell are you doing here?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Nagisa;Like you have any right to be asking ME that.|You're a dead man, Kai!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightNagisaAsuka
_source: s;Nagisa;Miss Asuka? How are you alive?|And what are you doing siding with the Medeans?!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Asuka;I apologize, Nagisa. This was a necessary step to take.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightNagisaRyuuji
_source: s;Ryuuji;Heh, never imagined I'd be seeing you again,|but here we are.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Ryuuji;Really hate to do this, but we gotta get to the throne room.|Sorry, Nagisa.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightAsukaKai
_source: s;Asuka;So, the rumors were true.|{c:e;Asuka;HalfCloseEyes}You know the consequences, Kai. Are you prepared to die?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Kai;I don't mind if it's by your hands, Asuka.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Asuka;With what I've been hearing about you,|I can't tell if you're being genuine or not.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAsukaRyuuji
_source: s;Ryuuji;I thought you'd be at the emperor's side, Asuka.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Asuka;K-Kenji?! I thought{tgm}...{tgm} We all thought you were dead!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Ryuuji;Yeah, I've been gettin' that a lot lately.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink,NoSmile}I hate to do this, Asuka, but we gotta get in the castle.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Asuka;I will not let you pass.|You will not get to Emperor Samegoro!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightSumireKai
_source: s;Kai;Is that Sumire? Looks like she's asleep.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}Sorry about this, but you're in the way here.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Kai;Sumire{tgm}...{tgm} Sorry about this, but you're in the way.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Sumire;K-Kai? {tgm}...{tgm} Fine. If that's how it is, you're going down!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightSumireRyuuji
_source: s;Ryuuji;Looks like Sumire's on guard duty like always.|But why's she asleep? That isn't like her.|{c:e;Ryuuji;CloseEyes}Damn it, I'd hate to kick 'er while she's down, but{tgm}...;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Ryuuji;They still got ya on guard duty, Sumire?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Sumire;Huh? Wait, you're{tgm}...{tgm} Kenji? You're not dead!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Ryuuji;Unfortunately, this ain't time for happy reunions.|Step aside, Sumire.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Sumire;So, that's how it is{tgm}...{tgm} Fine!|If you're my enemy, I won't back down!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightYukino
condition: 'Yukino' in [unit.nid,unit2.nid] and ('Female' not in unit.tags or 'Female' not in unit2.tags)
_source: s;Yukino;I will not show mercy to the likes of you!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightYukinoKrista
_source: s;Krista;"Hair dark as night, skin white as snow"{tgm}...{tgm}|You're that ghost the mayor was talking about, aren't you?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Yukino;A "ghost"?|Is that what the mayor is calling me now?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Yukino;No matter. If you're siding with him,|then I have no choice but to cross blades with you!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightYukinoFemale
condition: check_default('Yukino','Krista') and ('Female' in unit.tags or 'Female' in unit2.tags)

name: FightSaburoAnna
_source: s;Anna;Try it, tough guy. I dare you!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightSaburoJake
_source: s;Jake;Your reign of terror ends here, Saburo!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Saburo;Let's see about that. See if you can match me!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightKeishaRyuuji
_source: s;Keisha;The mighty Wyrmfang captain graces us with his presence.|{c:e;Keisha;CloseEyes,NoSmile}It makes me sick.|{c:e;Keisha;NormalBlink}This is our turf, you brute!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Ryuuji;What do you want me to do? Apologize?|{c:e;Ryuuji;CloseEyes,Smile}Apologizing implies that I actually care.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightLockeTaiga
_source: s;Taiga;Well, well, if it isn't good ol' Locke!|I thought I recognized this ship.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Locke;Oh, you again.|{c:e;Locke;CloseEyes}Even fighting you is going to be so damn annoying.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

s;Taiga;Is that how you greet an old crewmate?{w}{c:e;Taiga;CloseEyes,Smile} Heh, whatever.|{c:e;Taiga;NormalBlink,NoSmile}You can let out all those frustrations of yours now.|Come on! No holding back!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightLocke
_source: s;Locke;Just come quietly and we won't have to resort to violence.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightShinobu
_source: s;Shinobu;Anyone who dares to stand against the Wyrmfang Pirates|faces death!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightShinobuParker
_source: s;Shinobu;We're the toughest crew of the northern seas!|Just try to take us down!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Parker;Outside of your usual pillaging grounds, aren't you?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Shinobu;What's it to you? Just shut up and surrender already!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightIrving
_source: s;Irving;Who are you? Stay out of Foliaga's affairs!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightSoldierMichael
_source: s;SoldierGreen;Michael? What in Folia's name are you doing?!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightMichael
condition: u('Michael').team == 'enemy' and check_pair('Michael',[]) and (unit.team == 'player' or unit2.team == 'player')
_source: s;Michael;W-Wait, I'm not here to hurt anyone!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightLorelei
_source: s;Lorelei;Surrender now, or feel the wrath of Her Excellency!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightZeke
_source: s;Zeke;You're gonna fight me?{br}Ain't too smart, are ya?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightTalbot
_source: s;Talbot;You may have bested the captain,|but you ain't gonna get past me!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightMasashi
condition: 'Masashi' in [unit.nid,unit2.nid] and ('Female' not in unit.tags or 'Female' not in unit2.tags)
_source: s;Masashi;You lot have no chance of defeating me!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightMasashiFemale
condition: 'Masashi' in [unit.nid,unit2.nid] and ('Female' in unit.tags or 'Female' in unit2.tags)
_source: s;Masashi;What a shame it is to have to sully the beauty|of a lovely flower such as yourself.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightHikaru
_source: s;Hikaru;Stand down. I have no interest in resorting to violence.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightTalbotRembrandt
_source: s;Rembrandt;I hear you lot are attacking innocent people|for petty revenge.|Is that true?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Talbot;Mind your own damn business! This is between us and them!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightDaphne
_source: s;Daphne;Just who do you think you are?!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightRyuujiKai
_source: s;Kai;So it IS you.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}For five years I thought you were dead.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}This is where you've been the whole time?!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightTaiga
_source: s;Taiga;Itchin' for a fight, huh?{br}Sure, I'll take you on!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightDaigo
_source: s;Daigo;Oh, you're actually tryin' to stop me?|Can't tell if you're brave or just plain stupid.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightDaigoHaruki
_source: s;Daigo;Tryin' to be the big damn hero, are ya?|Ha! Let's see you even try to get a scratch on me.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightDaigoTaichi
_source: s;Taichi;I won't let you bring any more harm to Aotani!|Surrender now, and I might consider sparing you.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Daigo;You talk a big game there, kid.|Let's see if you're not just all bark.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightVernon
_source: s;Vernon;Medean forces, you shall go no further!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightDaphneAnna
_source: s;Anna;You remember me, huh?|Then you must know what I'm here for.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Daphne;You lowly Oregotians have no right|to be on the Great Folia's soil!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightDaphneJake
_source: s;Jake;Me and Anna are gonna take back Hache Valley!|You can't stop us!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Daphne;You uncultured swine!|Go back to bandit country where you belong!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightGordonKai
_source: s;Kai;Gotta hand it to you guys,|I didn't expect you to nab the princess from Torgen.|Makes me wonder how you managed to get her|out of his hands like that.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Gordon;Heh, wouldn't you{br}like to know?|{c:e;Gordon;NoSmile}Now, enough yappin'!|You're not taking our catch!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightIrvingMichael
_source: s;Irving;Michael?!{br}What are you doing?|You dare point your lance at your commander?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Michael;I'm{tgm}...{tgm} I'm sorry, sir.|I-I refuse to be a Holy Knight if this is what it leads to!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightAlfonsoKrista
_source: s;Alfonso;Just come quietly, brat.{br}I ain't gonna hurt ya.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Krista;Bold of you to assume you're not the one getting get hurt.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightAlfonsoChell
_source: s;Alfonso;Hand over the girl, and no one gets hurt, got it?!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Chell;You're{tgm}...{tgm} No, you're not{br}one of them either.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}No matter. Your death{br}will be inevitable!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightAlfonsoSam
_source: s;Alfonso;I ain't going down{br}'til I get the girl!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;After saving Krista from the clutches of the Grash Mountain Bandits,|Forrest and the others make their way out of the nation of Oregot and back to Medeas.|With them still in bandit territory, the journey back home won't be a smooth one.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;Krista;So, I got my leg in the burrow and I'm STILL clinging onto that pie for dear life--
s;Forrest;Ugh, not this story again.|{c:e;Forrest;HalfCloseEyes}Kai, how much longer until we're on our side of the border?
s;Kai;I'd say less than a week. And once we're in Medean territory,|it will only take a day{br}to reach the castle.
s;Kai;Hold on. What's that up there?
s;Forrest;Ah, it's Chell.|I told her to come along as backup, just in case.
s;Chell;Your Highness, thank goodness you're safe.
s;Krista;Of course I'm safe.|Forrest was in charge of the rescue mission, after all.
s;Forrest;A rescue mission that was completely unnecessary.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}Can't you stay home and behave for once?
s;Chell;At any rate, on my way here,|I spotted bandits{br}just along this path.|It seems they heard of Princess Krista's escape.
s;Kai;Damn it! I heard news travelled fast amongst Oregot's bandits,|but I didn't think it would be that fast.
s;Krista;No worries.|With Chell and her thunder thighs at our side, we've got this battle down pat!
s;Chell;I could say the same to you, Your Highness.
s;Forrest;Let us not waste anymore time.|Everyone, move out!
s;Sam;More bandits this way, huh?|Doesn't matter! All of them are gonna taste axe!
s;Trevor;Pardon me, but did anyone else hear a heated, passionate bellow|further down the path?
s;Forrest;The better question is if anyone DIDN'T hear.
s;Krista;Let's go check it out, then!|We were headed down there anyway!
s;Forrest;Not again.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}Your Highness, get back here!!

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Sam, by Medea, is it really you?!|I could hardly recognize you back there.
s;Sam;Yup, it's me alright.|Never thought I'd see you again, Krista.|Especially not here.
s;Sam;Huh? Yeah, I guess I did get some muscle here and there over the years.
s;Sam;Haha! It's fine. Chell's gotten bigger too.|In all the right places, I might add.
s;Trevor;Congratulations, my good sir.|You succeeded in making Miss Chell faint on the spot.
s;Kai;Huh. Being complimented by a large, muscular man has that effect on her. Noted.
s;Sam;What? All I said was she got some muscle on her.
s;Trevor;That aside,|I ascertain that a select few of us are in the dark about certain prescenses before us.|I believe introductions are in order!
s;Sam;You could've saved your breath and started with that last thing.
s;Kai;Anyway, Forrest, mind doing introductions? Seems like we need them.

s;Forrest;Sam, these two are Kai and Trevor, Her Highness' newest retainers.|Kai is our de facto tactician with his knowledge of Yondo.|Trevor is our best mage and he has an{tgm}...{tgm} interesting way with words.
s;Forrest;Kai, Trevor, this is Sam.|He's been a friend of mine, Princess Krista, and Chell since we were young.|He disappeared one day years ago.
s;Forrest;Sam, this is Kai, Her Highness' newest retainer.|Kai is our de facto tactician with his knowledge of Yondo.
s;Forrest;Kai, this is Sam.|He's been a friend of mine, Princess Krista, and Chell since we were young.|He disappeared one day years ago.
s;Forrest;Speaking of which, could Sam and I please speak alone?
s;Kai;Sure. Sounds like you've got some catching up to do.
s;Forrest;To think this is where you have been all these years{tgm}...|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}{tgm}Sam, what have you been doing this whole time?
s;Sam;Living off the land, killing bandits, that sort of thing.|In fact, I was just heading off to a bandit fortress around here.
s;Sam;Yup. Heard that a trade ship was raided|and that the bandits' hideout is south of here.|{c:e;Sam;Smile}Wanna help? I get the feeling you wanna help.
s;Forrest;Sam, no offense, but Princess Krista needs to return home immediately.
s;Krista;Come on, Forrest. It'll be just like old times!|You, me, Sam, and Chell out adventuring and causing mischief!
s;Forrest;More like you and Sam saying "WE'RE DOING A THING",|Chell and I yelling "DO NOT DO THE THING",|and you two doing the thing anyway.
s;Krista;See? You get it!|Lead the way, Sam!
s;Forrest;Trevor, wake Chell up.|Looks like it's going to be like old times.
s;Forrest;Kai, wake Chell up.|Looks like it's going to be like old times.

name: Outro
_source: s;Anna;Back in business! Thanks for all your help.
s;Krista;No problem. Glad that you two can set up shop here again.
s;Jake;You know, we used to have more venues all over Yondo.|Ones that were more out in the open, that is.|It would be great if we could get those up and running again.
s;Anna;I agree. Say, do you mind if we join you guys?
s;Krista;I don't see why not!|Honestly, not having to worry about finding a shop while on the road is a huge help.
s;Anna;Great! And you know what, I don't think we properly introduced ourselves.|I'm Anna, and this is my boyfriend Jake.|We're just a couple of merchants trying to get by.
s;Krista;I'm Krista, Princess of Medeas. Nice to meet you guys.
s;Jake;Well, ain't this our lucky day?
s;Anna;Don't worry about it.|It's just that we might need more help from you later down the line.|{c:e;Anna;NoSmile}We've got{tgm}...{tgm} important stuff to attend to.
s;Krista;I mean, as long as it doesn't get in the way of what we're doing,|you guys can do whatever.

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;With their new companions Chell and Sam,|Krista and her retainers head southward towards the Detri bandit clan's fortress|to assist Sam in his never-ending quest to eradicate every bandit in Oregot.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;Bandit2;Well, well, well.|We got ourselves a pretty good haul today.
s;Aqua;You all can do anything you want with me. Just don't hurt my friend! Let him go!
s;Bandit2;"Anything", huh? Well, that'll be up for the higher ups to decide--
s;Bandit2;Don't try anything funny, you hear me?|I'll be back for you.
s;Semi;Aqua! Are you alright?|If that guy laid even a finger on you, I'm gonna--
s;Aqua;Don't worry, Semi.|He didn't do anything to me.

s;Semi;Good. But still, I'm gonna kill that guy when I get the chance.|{c:e;Semi;CloseEyes}I should've known bandits would've been waiting at the port.|It was stupid of me to let my guard down|just because we were gonna land in merchant territory.
s;Aqua;It's okay. Don't blame yourself.|{c:e;Aqua;Smile,CloseEyes}Thank you, Semi. If it weren't for you,|we couldn't have escaped Foliaga in the first place.
s;Semi;Save your thanks. We still need to get out of here.|Once the coast is clear,|<red>I'm gonna pick the lock to my cell and make an escape route for us.</>|Stay put until then, alright?
s;Sam;There it is. The Detri Bandit fortress.
s;Sam;Hold on, we can't just rush in.|A good amount of bandits are probably already in there.|We might get overwhelmed by their numbers.
s;Forrest;Huh, Sam being strategic. Never thought I'd see the day.
s;Sam;I've been doing this for years.|You could say I'm an expert.
s;Kai;This building looks quite old.|Do you think there are cracks in the walls we could tear down?
s;Sam;Not bad, Kai.|An alternate entrance would take them by surprise.|One more thing, too.|After "persuading" some bandits,|I learned that a couple of that ship's passengers are being kept here.
s;Kai;Let's split into two groups, then.|We'll be able to cover more ground that way.|One group will take the west side and the other will take the east.
s;Sam;That can work. I'll leave it to you guys how you want to split off.|We could have an even number of us on each side, but we don't necessarily have to.
s;Krista;Got it!|Operation: Save the Prisoners and Kill the Bandits is on!
prep;false;Prepare to Charge;<green>Guide</>;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: TalkKristaAqua
_source: s;Krista;Don't worry about a thing.|Me and my buddies are here to rescue you!
s;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas.|Who are you?
s;Aqua;I'm Aqua, a cleric from Foliaga.|{c:e;Aqua;NoSmile}And, wait, Medeas?|What are you doing all the way out here?
s;Krista;Long story short, got captured by bandits because reasons.|Yup.{w}{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile} "Reasons."
s;Krista;Anyway, once my big, burly friend gets bandit blood on his hands,|we'll get you back home safe and sound.
s;Krista;Hm{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}Either way, Semi's gonna be real happy now that you're safe too.|We'll be out of here in no time!
s;Aqua;But, please, Your Highness, my friend is here too!|He's probably trying to find a safe path for us to escape.
s;Krista;Got it! We'll go ahead and touch base with him.
s;Aqua;Thank you! You have my eternal gratitude.

name: TalkSamAqua
_source: s;Sam;Hey, I'm busting you outta here!
s;Sam;The name's Sam. How about you?
s;Aqua;I-I'm Aqua. Thank you very much, Sam!
s;Aqua;My friend should be somewhere in the fort too.|You have to help him!

name: TalkKristaSemi
_source: s;Krista;Alright, buddy. If you surrender, I'll make this quick and easy.
s;Semi;Put your damn sword down! I'm not with these guys.
s;Semi;My friend and I were taken prisoner. I'm trying to break us both out of here.
s;Krista;Huh. Well, in that case, you'd better stick with us.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}I'm Krista, princess of Medeas. My friends and I are clearing out this bandit hideout.
s;Semi;Medean royalty, huh?|{c:e;Semi;CloseEyes}Hmph. Could be worse.
s;Krista;Oh, don't worry about Aqua. We broke her out!
s;Semi;Like I said, my friend's here too.|If you're planning on saving me, you'd better do the same for her.
s;Krista;Oh, what's your name? Completely forgot to ask.

name: TalkKristaSam
_source: s;Sam;Who in their right mind says something like that--|Wait a minute. You're{tgm}...{tgm}{br}What are you doing here?!
s;Sam;Argh, forget it! We've got bandits to worry about!

name: TalkKristaFelicity
_source: s;Krista;What the--? Felicity?!|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Why am I not surprised.
s;Felicity;Viola and I are here to help!

s;Krista;You and Viola, huh? So that's how you got here so fast.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}*sigh* Guess it can't be helped.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Don't be reckless out there, alright? I don't wanna lose my favorite maid.

name: TalkChellViola
_source: s;Chell;Viola? What are you doing here?
s;Viola;Felicity said that everyone was out on an adventure!|We wanted to help.
s;Chell;Viola, it's not just an "adventure". We're investigating something really important.
s;Viola;Does that mean we can't help?
s;Chell;That's not what I mean.|You can help. Just understand that you have to take this seriously.|This will be a lot more intense than the training you do back at the castle.

name: TalkForrestSam
_source: s;Forrest;Surrender now, and you may yet live, bandit!
s;Sam;Hey, watch where you're pointing that thing!|I'm on your side here!
s;Forrest;Wait, that voice{tgm}...{tgm} It can't be{tgm}...{tgm} Sam?!
s;Sam;Hold on. Forrest? What are you doing here?
s;Forrest;I should be asking you that.
s;Sam;Look, we'll talk later. We've got bigger problems on our hands.

name: TalkForrestTrevor
_source: s;Trevor;Forrest, I must ask. Why these monthly{tgm}...{tgm} "excursions"?|This cannot be purely for Her Highness' own amusement.
s;Trevor;{tgm}...{tgm} Forrest. PLEASE do not tell me that is the actual reason--
s;Forrest;No time for idle chatter, Trevor. We have to save her!

name: TalkKaiTrevor
_source: s;Kai;So, Trevor, how's it feel to venture outside the castle for once?|Beats a stuffy ol' library, huh?

s;Trevor;Now, I would not go THAT far.|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}Although, I can admit it is nice{br}to have a break from routine.|And I am rather surprised you and Forrest invited me to come along this time.|{c:e;Trevor;HalfCloseEyes}Considering my lack of experience on the battlefield, I thought I would slow you down.
s;Kai;We all start somewhere. Forrest figured this would be a way for you to ease into things.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes,NoSmile}Though, this did not go how it usually does.
s;Kai;No need to worry about it.|Just know we usually have a smoother process with this sort of thing.

name: TalkForrestKai
_source: s;Kai;Too bad things turned out{br}this way, huh?|I know you were hoping for a quick rescue mission for Trevor's sake.

s;Forrest;He needs battle experience,{br}so this still works out.|But yes, I would have preferred if things went as expected.|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}And just what happened{br}to Torgen?|To think these bandits{br}bested him{tgm}...
s;Kai;No use dwelling{br}on it now.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}First priority is getting Her Highness back.

name: TalkChellSam
_source: s;Chell;Huh? How do you know who I am?
s;Chell;Sam? By Medea, it IS you!{br}But, why are you here?
s;Sam;Never mind that for now. We'll catch up later!

name: TalkKaiSam
_source: s;Kai;I'll ask anyway.|{c:e;Kai;NoSmile}That bandit leader mentioned someone called the "Prowling Tiger."|Know anything about that?
s;Sam;Don't know, don't care.|We've got bigger problems here!
s;Kai;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Still sounds important.|{c:e;Kai;Smile,NormalBlink}We'll just put a pin in that.

name: TalkKaiSumire
_source: s;Kai;Looks like Sumire's on guard duty.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}And she's asleep. Man{tgm}...
s;Kai;Sumire! Still on guard duty, I see.
s;Sumire;Kai! It's you! It's been so long since I last saw you.
s;Kai;Less than a year, if we're being more specific.

s;Sumire;Lady Tsubaki has been real worried about you, y'know.|First Kenji, then you{tgm}...{tgm}|But you're a smart guy. With how the emperor's been, you had to leave.|{c:e;Sumire;Smile}You're planning something, right? That's why I can't blame you for what you did.
s;Kai;Huh. You completely understand, Sumire.{br}That's a relief.
s;Sumire;The others may see you as a conniving, no-good, womanizing traitor, but not me!|I've always had faith in you.
s;Kai;What? "Conniving," sure.{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes} But "womanizing"?|Someone's spreading rumors.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}Anyway, I've got a huge favor to ask.
s;Kai;Wanna join us in taking down Samegoro?|We need all the help we can get.
s;Sumire;Sure! I'll do whatever I can to help!

name: TalkTsubakiRyuuji
_source: s;Ryuuji;Ha! So, little Tsubaki's taking up the front lines now?
s;Tsubaki;What? Wait{tgm}...{tgm} Kenji?! Is it truly you?
s;Tsubaki;Oh, Kenji{tgm}...!{c:e;Tsubaki;CloseEyes}{tgm} I knew you were still{tgm}...!{tgm} *sniff*
s;Ryuuji;Aw, c'mon. Don't start cryin' on me now.
s;Tsubaki;I-I'm sorry. I just can't believe it's really you.
s;Ryuuji;Yeah, I've been gettin' that a lot lately.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink,NoSmile}So, what's with you taking up arms with the rest of the soldiers?
s;Tsubaki;I can't let the Medeans hurt Father.|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}I will protect him! I swear it!
s;Ryuuji;Real brave of ya, Tsubaki. Truly.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NoSmile,NormalBlink}But you gotta understand that's what the Medeans are tryin' to do too.
s;Ryuuji;Looks like they've got theories on what's going on with your old man.|If we work together, we can knock him back to his senses.
s;Tsubaki;R-Really? Then, we won't have to keep fighting!|Let's do this together, Kenji!

name: TalkNagisaRyuuji
_source: s;Ryuuji;Heh, never imagined I'd be seeing you again,|but here we are.
s;Nagisa;What are you{tgm}...{tgm} Hold on. Kenji?
s;Nagisa;Kenji! How are you here?|{c:e;Nagisa;CloseEyes}I thought{tgm}...{tgm} We all thought{tgm}...!

s;Ryuuji;That I died? Yeah, I've been getting that a lot lately.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NoSmile}But hey, that's not the point here. I've joined forces with the Medeans.|Looks like they know how to bring Samegoro back to normal.
s;Ryuuji;Yup, they just need to confront him in the throne room to do it.|If you come with us, you might be able to help.
s;Nagisa;Got it! I'll let Lady Tsubaki know too!

name: TalkNagisaSumire
_source: s;Sumire;Actually, forget it. There's something I gotta report!
s;Nagisa;Sumire? With the Medeans inside the castle, I thought{tgm}...!

s;Sumire;Still alive and well here, Commander!|And that's what I gotta talk to you about.|{c:e;Sumire;NoSmile}The Medeans know what's going with the emperor.|Looks like they can bring him back to his senses.

s;Nagisa;Is that so{tgm}...|{c:e;Nagisa;NormalBlink}{tgm}Seeing that they kept you alive, perhaps they actually do want a peaceful solution.|Thank you for the report, Sumire. I'll inform Lady Tsubaki of this too.

name: TalkNagisaAsuka
_source: s;Nagisa;Miss Asuka?! How are you here?|I thought the Medeans{tgm}...

s;Asuka;I am alive and well, Nagisa.|On that note, I thought you would be with Lady Tsubaki.|{c:e;Asuka;CloseEyes}Although, that is not important right now.|{c:e;Asuka;NormalBlink}The Medeans are here, yes, but they do not mean to harm the emperor.
s;Asuka;They seek to bring him back to his senses.|If we join forces with them, we may be able to do just that.

s;Nagisa;I see{tgm}...|{c:e;Nagisa;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}Since they kept you alive, perhaps they want a peaceful solution after all.|{c:e;Nagisa;NormalBlink}I will report this development to Lady Tsubaki.

name: TalkKristaTorgen
_source: s;Torgen;Krista! I'm the one who should be saying that.|What happened after Gordon got you? Where have you been all this time?

s;Krista;Oh dear Medea, we've got so much to catch up on.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}Long story short, Forrest was the knight in shining armor he always is,|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}then we found out all of Yondo's under threat of some evil god or something.
s;Krista;Well, sorry, Torgen, but I don't think I've got the time to give the full rundown.
s;Krista;And, hey, I know this is gonna be a lot to ask, but--
s;Torgen;You want me to join you guys?
s;Krista;Y-Yeah! You're more eager to do that than I thought you'd be.

s;Torgen;In all honesty, I was thinking of giving up the bandit life anyway.|{c:e;Torgen;HalfCloseEyes}I thought you were dead, Krista.|With you gone, I didn't see the point of staying.|{c:e;Torgen;NormalBlink}At the same time, I kept hoping you'd be okay. So I stayed here waiting for you.
s;Torgen;So, I'm in! From now on, we're allies through and through.|No need for us to keep pretending we're not.
for;torgenteam;[u for u in game.level.unit_groups.get('torgen').units if game.check_alive(u) == True]

name: TalkKristaPeter
_source: s;Peter;Hello, young lady.{c:e;Peter;Smile} You don't look like a bandit.
s;Krista;And you're too polite to be one yourself.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}You out there fighting them off?
s;Peter;*sighhhh*{w}{c:e;Peter;HalfCloseEyes} Unfortunately, yes. They're disturbing the peace usual.
s;Krista;Well, you're in luck! Me and my friends are up against them too.|Wanna rough up these ruffians together?
s;Peter;Sure, just as long as they are gone.|Pardon me, I have not introduced myself. My name is Peter.|What may yours be?
s;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas. Let's do good together, Peter!

name: TalkViolaPeter
_source: s;Viola;Hi, there, mister! You doing okay?
s;Peter;*sigh* Could be better.|{c:e;Peter;NormalBlink}More importantly, what is a young lady such as yourself doing here?|You and your pegasus are obviously not from around these parts.
s;Viola;I'm with the Medean army!|We're trying to get to the capital and save the world and stuff.
s;Viola;Yeah, a bunch of bad guys are messing up everything and we're gonna stop them!
s;Peter;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} I wonder if that has anything to do with the rise in bandit raids{tgm}...|{tgm}If it does, then{tgm}...
s;Peter;I wish to join you, if you don't mind.|There has been nothing but chaos and turmoil in this area for the past year.|I want my peace and quiet back, so our goals may align.
s;Viola;That would be great, mister! My name's Viola, by the way. What's yours?
s;Peter;My name is Peter. Now, let us take care of these ruffians.

name: TalkTsubakiKai
_source: s;Tsubaki;That doesn't matter right now. You're back!|You must have come back to help Father.
s;Kai;Well, I mean, you're not wrong{tgm}...
s;Kai;I'm here fighting with the Medeans, Tsubaki.|I'm not here for you.
s;Kai;I'm not your retainer anymore. That's been established months ago.|I'm with the Medeans now.
s;Kai;With that in mind, we know how to bring Samegoro back to normal.|I know it's a lot to ask for, especially with what I just said.|But can you let us through?
s;Kai;I promise you that your father's gonna be just fine after all this.|You just have to trust me.
s;Kai;If we join forces, then things will be okay.|Stick with us and it'll be just like old times.
s;Kai;You, me, Nagisa, and Kenji. Together.
s;Tsubaki;A-And Kenji too? You mean he's{tgm}...{tgm} He's{tgm}...!|{c:e;Tsubaki;CloseEyes}{tgm}Oh, Merin, I knew he was still alive{tgm}...
s;Kai;So, what do you say, Lady Tsubaki? You in?

name: TalkTsubakiSumire
_source: s;Sumire;Lady Tsubaki?! What are you doing down here?|Oh, it doesn't matter right now.|My lady, the Medeans are here to help Emperor Samegoro.|We have to let them through!
s;Sumire;It seems like they know what's happened to him, my lady.|If we work together, maybe we can bring him back to normal!
s;Tsubaki;That is a relief to hear.
s;Tsubaki;Sumire, take me to the Medean forces' commander.|I{tgm}...{tgm} I wish to speak to them personally!

name: TalkTsubakiAsuka
_source: s;Asuka;Lady Tsubaki?! What are you--{br}{c:e;Asuka;CloseEyes}Ah, that's not important now.|{c:e;Asuka;NormalBlink}I bring urgent news.
s;Tsubaki;Miss Asuka? What happened?|How are both you and the Medeans here?|{c:e;Tsubaki;HalfCloseEyes}With them breaching the front gate, I thought{tgm}...
s;Asuka;The Medeans have done just that, yes.|However, this poses no issue to you or to your father.
s;Asuka;They seek to free your father from Lady Agrona's grasp.|If we let them through, perhaps they will be able to do just that.
s;Tsubaki;Then, we will have no need to prolong this conflict!
s;Tsubaki;Miss Asuka, please take me to the Medean forces' commander.|I{tgm}...{tgm} I wish to speak with them personally!

name: TalkTsubakiNagisa
_source: s;Nagisa;Lady Tsubaki, I have something urgent to report!
s;Nagisa;The Medeans don't mean to cause any harm.|They want to bring your father back to normal!
s;Tsubaki;Th-They do? That's great news!|Nagisa, please take me to their commander.|I wish to speak to them personally.

name: TalkTsubakiKrista
_source: s;Tsubaki;I won't let you take another step!|If you want to face my father, you'll have to go through me first!
s;Krista;Wait, your father? Then that means you're Merinas' princess!
s;Tsubaki;Th-That's right! So{tgm}...{tgm} don't underestimate me!
s;Krista;Whoa, whoa, whoa. Let's calm down here.|I know what this looks like, but we wanna help.
s;Krista;Y'see, Samegoro's probably under control of some sort of magic.|That one shogun, Agrona, she's probably the one pulling the strings here!
s;Tsubaki;So, you know of Agrona and what she may have done{tgm}...|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}{tgm}If what you say is true, then what should we do?
s;Krista;We gotta go up to the throne room and confront Samegoro.|And I'm sorry to say this, but we can't avoid a battle.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}I wish we could, but{tgm}...
s;Tsubaki;I see{tgm}...|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}{tgm}Is that truly the only way?
s;Tsubaki;If you speak truthfully, then I see we have no choice.|You may go on, but I'll come with you too.|I wish to see my father back to his old self with my own eyes!
s;Krista;Okay! I'm Krista, princess of Medeas, by the way. And you are?
s;Tsubaki;Tsubaki. Let us bring peace back to Merinas, Krista!

name: TalkKristaSumire
_source: s;Krista;Huh. Is that guard asleep right now? If I can just sneak past--
s;Sumire;You won't get past me! I won't allow it!
s;Krista;Whoa, hold on there! We're trying to help the emperor here!|Believe me!
s;Krista;The emperor is not himself. Something's controlling him!
s;Sumire;You know what's wrong with the emperor?|Then go on ahead! You gotta save him!
s;Krista;Wow, I thought there'd be a bit more resistance there.
s;Sumire;There's only so much we as his subordinates can do.|If we have you guys by our side, maybe we can help him!|Please let me join you. I wanna get the emperor back to normal!
s;Krista;Hey, I'm all for it! Welcome to the team. What's your name?
s;Sumire;I'm Sumire! Glad to meet you.
s;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas. Let's move out, Sumire!

name: TalkRyuujiSumire
_source: s;Ryuuji;Well, well, if it ain't little Sumire?|{c:e;Ryuuji;NoSmile}Wait, is she asleep?
s;Sumire;Wait a minute, that face{tgm}...|{tgm}Kenji, is that you?! I hardly recognized you.
s;Ryuuji;Good to see you too, Sumire.
s;Ryuuji;But hey, what's with taking a nap in the middle of the battlefield?|That ain't like ya at all.
s;Sumire;In all honesty, I haven't been getting much sleep lately{tgm}...|{tgm}But that's not important right now!

s;Sumire;Everyone thought you were dead, Kenji!|Seeing you like this{tgm}...{tgm} I might cry!|First it was you, then Kai{tgm}...|{tgm}Not to mention the emperor acting all weird on top of it.|You're here to bring the emperor back to his senses, aren't you?|That's why you're here!
s;Ryuuji;Now there's the Sumire I remember.
s;Ryuuji;Still got a good head on your shoulders, I see.
s;Ryuuji;That's exactly it. You wanna help? Sounds like you wanna help.
s;Sumire;You bet I do! I'm right behind you, Kenji!

name: TalkSumireAsuka
_source: s;Sumire;Miss Asuka! I got good news!
s;Asuka;Sumire? What are you doing away from your post?
s;Sumire;Kai's back! And he's got the Medeans with him!
s;Asuka;Hold on, what are you talking about?|Kai with the Medeans?
s;Sumire;Yup, turns out he's been on their side all along.|And now I'm on their side too!
s;Sumire;Kenji's alive! And he's here at the capital!
s;Sumire;Yup, turns out he's alive and working with the Medeans.|And now I'm on their side too!
s;Sumire;The Medeans are here to help us. They're not the enemy!
s;Sumire;I'm with them now, Asuka. They're gonna help bring peace to Merinas!
s;Asuka;Sumire{tgm}...{c:e;Asuka;NormalBlink}{tgm} You cannot just switch sides as you please.|There are consequences to frivolously betraying your country like this--
s;Sumire;But Miss Asuka,|even you can admit something's wrong with Emperor Samegoro, right?|You know him better than anyone!
s;Sumire;See? Come on, Miss Asuka!|We gotta fight alongside the Medeans and get the emperor back to normal!

name: TalkChellLin
_source: s;Chell;Lin! It's you! So this is where you went off to.
s;Lin;Chell?!{w}{c:e;Lin;CloseEyes} Oh, I just HAD to run into you.
s;Chell;I'm so glad you're safe. Let's--
s;Lin;You're gonna try to bring me back to Medeas, right?|That's not happening.{br}I'm a mercenary now.|{c:e;Lin;HalfCloseEyes}Which means{tgm}...
s;Lin;15,000 gold. Take it or leave it.
s;Lin;Alright. Time to get to work.
s;Chell;I don't have enough at the moment.
s;Lin;What? Too much for you? Whatever.

name: TalkLinTsurugi
_source: s;Tsurugi;Is there something wrong, Miss Lin?
s;Lin;The Medean royal army's in the area, and{tgm}...{tgm} well{tgm}...
s;Tsurugi;I see. It's not going to get in the way of my request, is it?
s;Lin;No, we should be passing through your village either way.
s;Tsurugi;Then, there's no issue! It'll be nice to be back with your sisters, I'm sure.
s;Tsurugi;Well, at the very least, I'm glad I hired you, Miss Lin.|{c:e;Tsurugi;Smile}You've been a great help thus far.

name: TalkViolaLin
_source: s;Viola;Lin!! Oh, Medea, I thought I'd never see you again!
s;Viola;Where have you been all this time?
s;Lin;Travelling the world, doing mercenary work.
s;Viola;Wow, that's amazing!|You've been working really hard, huh?
s;Lin;Yeah, I guess you could say that.
s;Viola;Oh, I've got an idea! How about you come with us?|Her Highness is on a mission to save the world!
s;Lin;Tell you what, I'll join you guys if you can pay me 8,000 gold.|Like I said, I'm a mercenary now.|You may be family, but I gotta make a living, y'know?
s;Lin;Thank you very much.|Pleasure doing business with you, oh wonderful sister of mine.
s;Viola;Ah, sorry. I don't have enough on me right now.
s;Lin;It's fine. See if you can get the money somehow, okay?

name: TalkKristaLin
_source: s;Lin;Your Highness? What are you doing in Merinas?
s;Krista;I should be asking you that.
s;Lin;If you must know, I've been doing mercenary work.
s;Krista;Wow, little Linny's making her way up in the world, huh?
s;Lin;D-Don't call me that! I'm not a child anymore!
s;Krista;Sure, sure.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}Well, since you're a professional and all now,|I wanna hire you. If you're not busy with another client, of course.
s;Lin;This isn't some ploy to get me to go back to the Pegasus Knight unit, is it?
s;Krista;Nope! Like you said, you're not a kid anymore.|So, I'm gonna treat you like the grown-up, hard-working mercenary you are.
s;Lin;In that case, the rate's 10,000 gold.|I'm with another client right now, but I don't think he'll mind the extra protection.
s;Lin;Pleasure doing business with you, Your Highness.
s;Krista;I'm expecting good things from you, Linny.
s;Lin;I told you to not call me that!
s;Krista;I would pay you, but we don't exactly have the funds right now.
s;Lin;That's disappointing.|If you scrounge up the money somehow, let me know, okay?

name: TalkKristaYukino
_source: s;Krista;"Hair dark as night, skin white as snow"{tgm}...|{tgm}You're the ghost the mayor was talking about, aren't you?
s;Krista;Look, I don't know what you're planning on doing with those girls,|but if you let them go, we won't have any trouble.
s;Yukino;"Let them go"?|What makes you think these women were OUR prisoners to begin with?
s;Krista;Wait, you're not the boss of these bandits?

s;Yukino;Not the ones you're thinking of, no.|{c:e;Yukino;CloseEyes,Smile}The mayor has taken a liking to spinning tall tales now, I see. My, my{tgm}...|{c:e;Yukino;NormalBlink,NoSmile}{tgm}You've been tricked, little one.|The true culprits are Hayato and his men.|He is the one who captured you and the rest of the girls.|The mayor has been handing the village women off to him.|In exchange, his men doesn't pillage the villagers' homes.
s;Krista;No wonder he was so enthusiastic about me getting captured.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}But wait, where do you fit into all of this?|Why'd the mayor paint YOU as the bad guy?

s;Yukino;Most likely because I've been saving those girls and keeping them safe.|{c:e;Yukino;CloseEyes}Keeping them away from Hayato and away from Shizukawa Village|was all I could do for these girls.|{c:e;Yukino;NormalBlink}As of right now, we aren't strong enough to take down Hayato once and for all.|I've taken the time to train them in the art of combat, and yet{tgm}...
s;Krista;Well, no need to worry about him anymore!|My friends and I took care of him.
s;Krista;Yup! We can go ahead and get everyone home.
s;Yukino;Now that you know the truth, I have a proposition for you.
s;Yukino;Let's join forces.|We can take down Hayato and bring Shizukawa's women back where they belong.
s;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas, by the way.|What's your name, Miss Ghost?
s;Yukino;Yukino. Let's do good work together, Your Highness.
s;Yukino;Yukino. Thank you again, Your Highness.
change_unit_desc;Yukino;A skilled swordswoman from the Shirotori mountains. Distrustful of men.
for;YukinoTeamChange;[u for u in game.level.unit_groups.get('yukino').units if game.check_alive(u) == True]

name: TalkForrestKrista
_source: s;Krista;Forrest!|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes,Smile}My hero has come to save me once again~
s;Forrest;*sigh*|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}In all seriousness, I am glad that this plan of yours actually worked, Krista.
s;Krista;It pays to get captured by bandits on purpose.
s;Forrest;That should NOT be the takeaway from this.
s;Krista;By the way, turns out our "ghost" isn't a ghost after all!
s;Forrest;We had figured as much, but then, who is she exactly?
s;Krista;Her name's Yukino and she's with us now.|Turns out we got a whole other bandit group kidnapping girls.
s;Forrest;Is that so? Well, there's only one thing to do in this situation.
s;Krista;You know it! Time to kick some bandit butt!
s;Krista;Anyway, time to save the girls and kick some bandit butt!

name: TalkKristaMichael
_source: s;Krista;Stay away from those innocent villagers!
s;Michael;W-Wait, please!|I'm guarding this house so the others don't get to it.|Please don't hurt me!

s;Michael;It's the truth! I just joined the Knights, a-and this is NOT what I signed up for.|Splitting families, imprisoning innocent people{tgm}...{tgm} This{tgm}...{tgm} This isn't a knight's duty!|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}I{tgm}...{tgm} I{tgm}...{tgm} Wahh!!{br}I want to go home!!

s;Krista;Oh man, uh. S-Sorry, I didn't mean to make you cry.|Look, if you don't wanna stick with the Knights, you can come with us.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}I'm Krista, princess of Medeas.|My friends and I are investigating the disappearances going on in Foliaga.
s;Michael;*sniffle* R-Really? I'll join you guys, then!|I want to help bring Foliaga's citizens back home where they belong.
s;Krista;That's the spirit! Now, brave knight, what's your name?
s;Michael;Um! Pardon me! My name is Michael.|I'll do my best to serve you, Your Highness.

name: TalkAquaMichael
_source: s;Michael;I-I'm doing my job! Nothing to see here!
s;Aqua;Please calm down.|I'm not on the Knights' side.
s;Aqua;I am a Folian cleric, yes. But that's not important right now.|Why are Foliaga's knights raiding their own people?

s;Michael;I{tgm}...{tgm} I don't know.|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink}I joined the Knights recently, and this is my first mission.|This goes against everything I wanted to do. I{tgm}...{tgm} I wanted to help people!
s;Aqua;If you're against the Knights, then please join us!|Princess Krista of Medeas is investigating matters now. We need all the help we can get.
s;Michael;If it means bringing innocent lives back home safe, I'll gladly join your cause!|My name is Michael. What's yours, miss?
s;Aqua;Aqua, cleric of Vergrande Monastery. Thank you for your aid, Michael.

name: TalkAquaSemi
_source: s;Aqua;Yes!{w} These kind strangers unlocked my cell.
s;Semi;Stay close, Aqua.|The danger's far from over.
s;Semi;Come on, let's get out of here.|Stay close to me.

name: TalkSamSemi
_source: s;Sam;Come on and face me like a man, bandit scum!
s;Semi;Don't point that thing at me! I'm not with these guys.|I'm trying to break me and my friend out of here.
s;Semi;It's true! My friend, Aqua, was in the cell next to mine.|I've been trying to clear a way for us to escape.
s;Sam;Oh! No need to worry about her! We already got her out.
s;Sam;Alright, alright. I believe ya.|You said Aqua was in another cell? We'll get her out!

name: Chest
_source: s;;A new Guide entry has been added.{br}<red>(Promotions)</>;;100;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound

name: Chest
_source: s;;A new Guide entry has been added.{br}<red>(Promotions)</>;;100;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound

name: Chest
_source: s;;A new Guide entry has been added.{br}<red>(Promotions)</>;;100;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound

name: Door
_source: # Set door variable to True if unlocked and False if locked #

name: Door Enemy
_source: # Set door variable to True if unlocked and False if locked #

name: Door
_source: s;Man4;I-I'm free? I knew this day would come!|It's not much, but please have this.
s;Woman1;Oh, thank you ever so much! May Merin bless you!|Please take this as a token of my gratitude.
s;Boy1;Yay! Thanks a lot! I'm outta here!|Here, you can have this. I don't really need it.

name: Door
_source: s;Girl3;Thank you so so much! I'm going home!
s;Boy1;You're saving us? Thanks a lot!
s;Girl1;W-Wah!! I was so scared!! Th-Thank you!
s;Girl2;Thanks a lot! I thought I was gonna be stuck there forever.

name: Door
_source: s;Girl1;Wah!! Thank you! I was really really scared!
s;Boy1;H-Huh? You're here to save us? Th-Thank you{tgm}...!

name: FightJorge
_source: s;Jorge;You gotta pay the toll 'round here.|If you don't got the cash, I'll gladly take your life instead!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Prisoners: saved.{br}Bandits: killed.|Mission accomplished, boys and girls. Let's go home.
s;Aqua;Wait, we can't leave yet.|My friend needs to get out of his cell!
s;Aqua;Yes, thank you! Semi, I'm so glad you're safe!
s;Semi;Aqua{tgm}...{tgm} Yeah. Glad you're okay, too.
s;Semi;Hold on! We can't leave Aqua behind.
s;Semi;Yeah. You're not hurt, are you, Aqua?
s;Krista;Good. With that out of the way{tgm}...
s;Krista;I'm gonna get the prisoners out of their cells.
s;Krista;First, we'll get you guys home, then we'll go back to ours.
s;Aqua;It's fine. We can trust them.|They saved us, after all.
s;Aqua;You see, our home country of Foliaga{tgm}...|{tgm}It's too dangerous to stay there.|{c:e;Aqua;HalfCloseEyes}Archbishop Azalea is{tgm}...{tgm} she's{tgm}...
s;Forrest;Let's discuss this elsewhere.|I'd rather not stay in a bandit fortress for much longer.
s;Sam;We can head to my place.|It's not far from here, and it's going to get dark soon.

name: Outro
_source: s;Chell;It seems the bandits are falling back.
s;Krista;Taylor? Alex? Lucy?|How'd you guys know we'd be here?
s;Chell;I informed them of your approximate location before leaving the castle.|They were to come to our aid had we not returned to the castle sooner.
s;Alex;Well, you all seem to be alright despite the circumstances.
s;Taylor;Well, that's a relief.|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,NoSmile}*yawn* I'm beat.{c:e;Taylor;HalfCloseEyes} Let's get some shut-eye.
s;Forrest;Those bandits really want to get Princess Krista back.|Let's get up early tomorrow to lower the chances of running into more of them.
s;Lucy;See ya in the morning!|Don't let the bed bugs bite!
s;Chell;Oh, it's you Sam. Yes, I'm alright.
s;Sam;Couldn't sleep either, huh? What were you doing?
s;Chell;I was trying to see if any of them were the monsters who killed my parents.
s;Sam;I figured.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}I've been hunting them. Got a few, but it's a large territory.|It's what I've been doing these years.
s;Chell;I see.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}I wish there was a way I could have known that.|{c:e;Chell;HalfCloseEyes}I thought you had died.
s;Chell;We'll talk about that some other time.|But I do have one thing to say.
s;Chell;When you locate those monsters, tell me. Take me with you.|I want to SEE them dead.
s;Chell;You better, or I'll strangle you myself.
s;Sam;Heh heh.{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink,Smile} You have my word Chell. I promise.|You would be my comrade of choice for such a mission.

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;After an evening run-in with bandits,|Krista and friends continue on their way to the Oregot-Medeas border.|Though they make way at the break of dawn, more danger awaits them on the road ahead.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;Trevor;Ah, yes!{br}Salvation!|Oh, sweet Medeas, how I've missed you so!
s;Forrest;I wouldn't start celebrating yet. Look!
s;Forrest;We have to keep moving southward!
s;Forrest;The Medean border is just ahead!
s;Jorge;Show 'em no mercy, boys!|Nab their gold and bleed 'em dry!

s;Sam;Oh no, we just HAD to run into Jorge and his flunkies.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}Jorge is out for blood. He'll try to go after us if we're in his sights.|And his underlings are no cake walk either.|His weaker men are here now, but I wouldn't be surprised if his big guys are lying in wait.|Let's get outta here before they come along.
s;Krista;In that case, I'll stay behind and make sure everyone's accounted for.|So make sure <red>you all get outta here before I do</>, okay?
prep;false;Prepare to Charge;<green>Guide</>;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;Worried for the safety of her companions,|Krista heads deep into the Medregot bandit fortress|to release them from the ruffians' clutches.;StyleNid=overworld_narration

s;Krista;Alright, we're in.|We gotta get everyone out of their cells then get out.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}I wish I was a bit more attentive{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}But no use in moping! We gotta get everyone free.
s;;Units will <red>not gain EXP, Weapon EXP, or Support Points</> for the chapter.;;140;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;You must deploy at least <red>five</> units for this chapter.;;150;hint;NumLines=2;no_sound
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;<green>Guide</>;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;Krista and friends make no delay in saving their friends from the Holy Knights' grasp.|They quickly trek to the outskirts of town and chase down the Knights.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
s;Krista;Please tell me we're not too late{tgm}...
s;Forrest;Our allies are being held in those carriages.
s;Krista;Only one thing to do, then. We gotta get them out of there!|Then we'll head back the way we came.
s;Lorelei;So, they came back for their friends, did they?{c:e;Lorelei;CloseEyes} Honorable, indeed.|{c:e;Lorelei;NormalBlink}But we won't let them have them!|Everyone, head north!
s;Lorelei;Don't let them free the prisoners!
s;PegKnight;Are those the Medeans out there?|{c:e;PegKnight;CloseEyes}They came back, huh?|{c:e;PegKnight;NormalBlink}Everyone, head north! Quickly! Don't let them free the prisoners!
s;PegKnight;Captain Lorelei, I won't let your efforts be in vain.
s;;Units will <red>not gain EXP, Weapon EXP, or Support Points</> for the chapter.;;140;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;You must deploy at least <red>six</> units for this chapter.;;140;hint;NumLines=2;no_sound
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;<green>Guide</>;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Okay, I think we're in the clear--
s;Krista;Wait, shoot! Some of us were left behind.|We gotta go back for them!
s;Trevor;Ah, yes!{br}Salvation!|Oh, sweet Medeas, how I've missed you so!
s;Semi;Is there an echo in here?
s;Aqua;I'm glad we made it unscathed.
s;Forrest;Says the one who got us in this mess in the first place.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}At any rate, we should be able to make it to castle in a few days' time.|Let's move.

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Man, we couldn't free everyone{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm}Argh, but we can't stick around forever.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Those bandits are gonna be tailing us if we don't leave now.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Guys{tgm}...{tgm} I'm sorry.
s;Krista;Alright, everyone here and accounted for? Good!|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}Let's move! Those bandits are gonna be catching up to us soon.

name: Outro
_source: s;Man2;Thank you, kind strangers. You've saved us from the Knights.|Windbrook is forever in your debt.
s;Krista;Think nothing of it.|We just happened to get into town at the right time!
s;Man2;As thanks for saving us, please take this.
s;Krista;Whoa, whoa, whoa! This is very generous of you,|but we couldn't possibly accept this.
s;Man2;Please, I insist. You have done a great service for our fair village.|It is also getting dark, so please take this along with you.
s;Krista;Thank you very much, sir.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}We'll be off, then. Stay safe!
s;Man2;May Folia grant you a safe journey!

s;Ferrach;So, Medea's ilk is involving herself in this, is she?|{c:e;Ferrach;CloseEyes}What a meddlesome brat.{w}{c:e;Ferrach;NormalBlink} No matter.|I'll just send some of the Knights their way, then inform the Archbishop of our guests.|{c:e;Ferrach;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Not that they'll actually make it to her, of course. Hahaha{tgm}...

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;Krista and friends cross the Oregot-Medeas border|and escape the hordes of bandits pursuing them.|They head back to Medeas Castle to recuperate and plan for the mission ahead.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
if;u('Anil').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Anil') == True and game.check_alive('Ecco') == True
s;;Thousands of years ago, the continent of Yondo was birthed by the five Great Beasts.|Each Great Beast created one of Yondo's five nations.;StyleNid=narration
s;;To the north lies Merinas, an archipelago nation formed by the Black Turtle Merin.;StyleNid=narration
s;;It is currently ruled by Emperor Samegoro.;StyleNid=narration
s;;To the east lies Foliaga, a heavily forested country formed by the Teal Wyrm Folia.;StyleNid=narration
s;;Archbishop Azalea is its current ruler.;StyleNid=narration
s;;To the west lies Oregot, a mountainous region formed by the White Tiger Oreg.;StyleNid=narration
s;;It has no single ruler. Rather, a council of rich merchants governs the land.;StyleNid=narration
s;;To the south lies Fuegsol, a desert nation formed by the Red Phoenix Fueg.;StyleNid=narration_top
s;;It is currently ruled by King Gerolt and Queen Leeann.;StyleNid=narration_top
s;;And finally in the center of the continent lies Medeas, a nation of grassy plains|formed by the Yellow Serpent Medea.;StyleNid=narration
s;;It is ruled by King Bryant and Queen Thalia who are, of course...;StyleNid=narration
s;Krista;But the elephant can't fit in the ice box--{tgm}{w}...{tgm} Oh.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Did I miss something important?
s;Forrest;Do you even need to ask?|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}I thought it would be appropriate to review the basics of Yondo's countries|considering what we had agreed to deal with recently.
s;Krista;That reminds me,|I'm gonna go to the guest quarters and see how Aqua and Semi are doing.|Mind putting this on hold?
s;Forrest;No, we cannot just "put this on ho--
s;Krista;Hey guys! How're you liking the castle?
