s;Forrest;You're a strong woman, Chell.|Your future children would be lucky to have a mother like you.|And you won't be alone in raising them either.|Your future husband would be there by your side.
s;Chell;I{tgm}...{tgm} Yes, you're right.|Thank you, Forrest.
s;Forrest;Chell, may I speak to you for a moment?
s;Chell;I've never seen you like this before.|What's gotten you so nervous?

s;Forrest;I just{tgm}...{tgm} Allow me to be frank with you.|I said before that your future husband would support you in raising a family.|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}When I told you that, I never imagined I would refer to myself.
s;Chell;Wait, what are you trying to say?

s;Forrest;I've considered my options, and I believe this path is best for me.|You were right. There is more to life than serving Her Highness.|Chell, you've opened my eyes to a world I have not seen before,|and I will forever be thankful for that.|Would you{tgm}...{tgm} be willing to expand my world further?
s;Chell;Absolutely! Oh, Forrest, of course I'll marry you.
s;Forrest;Chell, I{tgm}...{tgm} Please be patient with me on this.|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}This{tgm}...{tgm} This is all very new to me.
s;Chell;We're in this together. You said so yourself.|I'll support you as long as you do the same for me.

name: SupportAlexJoshua
_source: s;Joshua;You'll go down sooner or later, George!
s;Alex;Joshua's opponent is quite large and heavily armored.

s;Alex;Oh dear. That looked like it hurt, and he's already bleeding as it is.|{c:e;Alex;CloseEyes}Why did I think coming here was a good idea again?|{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink}Oh thank Medea, looks like there's an intermission.|Maybe I can check on Joshua.
s;Joshua;Who?|{c:e;Joshua;Smile}Oh, hello, Alex. Yeah, I'm alright.|Just a couple scratches.
s;Alex;Good to hear. I was concerned.|That blow looked ba--
s;Alex;This is NOT just a scratch!|{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink}You are bleeding profusely from several lacerations.|And look at all of these contusions!
s;Joshua;Eh? Sorry, I didn't understand a word you just said.
s;Alex;*sigh*|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}You have big boo-boo.{w} Big boo-boo bleed lots.
s;Joshua;Alex, I may be losing blood, but the ol' thinker can still know words good.
s;Joshua;Just patch it up to stop the bleeding.|Get some rags and cloth on there, and I'll be good to go!
s;Alex;Oh no, you don't! That would make things worse.|You are going to sit there while I wash and sanitize those wounds.|You need stitches, mister!
s;Joshua;Can't you just wrap some bandages? The next round starts in two minutes!
s;Alex;Too bad. You'll have to miss it.
s;Joshua;Why is she smiling? I don't like this...;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Joshua;Whoa, whoa, whoa! You're going to stick a needle and thread in me?|All those weird herbs and liquids were one thing, but this too?!
s;Alex;Yes, I need to stitch the wounds up.|And those herbs and liquids were for cleaning them.
s;Joshua;You're going to stick a NEEDLE in me?
s;Alex;Again, yes.|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Don't tell me you're afraid of a little needle and thread.
s;Alex;So, it's okay, then? Good to know.

name: SupportJoshuaYumi
_source: s;Yumi;Oh~ Almost got me that time~
s;Joshua;Argh, not again.|{c:e;Joshua;NormalBlink}Alright, alright, let's call it here.
s;Joshua;Honestly, Yumi, it still surprises me how nimble you are considering how you're{tgm}...|{c:e;Joshua;CloseEyes}{tgm}Well, y'know.
s;Yumi;Oh? You mean these? My boo--
s;Joshua;Yeah, yes, those! They're pretty hard to miss.
s;Joshua;And good targets. Those things are just asking to get hit.|And when they do, BAM! That's gonna do more than just sting.
s;Yumi;Assuming you can get me first.
s;Joshua;All it takes is one wrong move or one good swing, Yumi.|I can prove it to you right now! One more round! Come on!
s;Yumi;Okay, okay, big guy.{c:e;Yumi;NormalBlink,Smile}{br}Let's see what you got!
s;Yumi;You know, Joshua, I've never seen a sword as big as yours before.|Seems pretty unique.
s;Joshua;Oh, yeah, I inherited it from my father.
s;Yumi;Oh, fascinating~|{c:e;Yumi;Smile,HalfCloseEyes}Now, what about that block of iron you call a weapon?
s;Yumi;Heehee! You made that way too easy, Joshua.|{c:e;Yumi;NormalBlink,NoSmile}But, seriously, that was your father's? He must have been really strong.
s;Joshua;Strong and fast. He could cut through the air with Old Iron more easily than I can.|Sure, I can wield it, but I'm not at his level yet. Far from it.

s;Yumi;A guy like him would make a name for himself in the arena.|{c:e;Yumi;CloseEyes,NoSmile}And now that I think of it,|I never heard of anyone like your father participating in any famous tournaments|like the Rooms of Valor.
s;Joshua;That's because he focused on his mercenary work.|Stuff like arena fighting never interested him.
s;Yumi;What about you? It seems like you have a different goal in mind.
s;Joshua;I want to get up to my father's level, then surpass it if I can.|I know I have a long way to go, so I fight in arenas to seek out stronger opponents.
s;Yumi;I'd say you're plenty strong already, but I don't think that's what you want to hear.|{c:e;Yumi;Smile}So, I'll say this: keep working hard.
s;Joshua;Ha! You don't gotta tell me twice.|Speaking of which, I'm gonna get more training in. See ya, Yumi!
s;Yumi;So he's not in it for fame or money, huh?|{c:e;Yumi;Smile}You don't see that every day.

s;Yumi;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Sten's got a win-loss record of thirteen to four, so that's not too bad.|Him mainly wielding axes would make him a good candidate.|{c:e;Yumi;HalfCloseEyes}And I'd normally consider Duarte for something like this too,|but I'm pretty sure he's still recovering from that broken leg from last season.|{c:e;Yumi;CloseEyes}I'll have to double-check on that, though.|{c:e;Yumi;NormalBlink}In the meantime, maybe Matan would be a good substitute.|He's got a similar record of fifteen to three.|{c:e;Yumi;HalfCloseEyes}Wait, who was he up against for these matches again? Hm{tgm}...|{c:e;Yumi;NormalBlink}{tgm}No, there was too much of a skill disparity|between him and his opponent for most of these. Never mind.
s;Joshua;Yumi! What's got you so busy?

s;Yumi;Oh, Joshua! Perfect timing.|{c:e;Yumi;NoSmile}I was thinking about what you said the other day.|How you fought in arenas to go up against strong opponents.|{c:e;Yumi;Smile}So, I've been organizing a private tournament for you|so you can take on the toughest fighters in the area.
s;Joshua;Huh. And what's with all these numbers and stuff?
s;Yumi;I can't just pick up random guys off the street, now can I?|I gotta analyze these statistics and make sure you get the most out of this.
s;Yumi;Honestly, yeah, it is.|{c:e;Yumi;NormalBlink}Haven't you ever thought about how payouts in the arena are calculated?|This is how.
s;Joshua;Wait a minute. All that sneaking around and gathering info that you do{tgm}...
s;Yumi;Yup, it's all for this.|{c:e;Yumi;Smile,FarWink}My charm and good looks makes it a lot easier, in case you were wondering.
s;Joshua;I'm not surprised.|{c:e;Joshua;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Anyway, who do you have in mind for this tournament?
s;Yumi;Like I'd tell you!{c:e;Yumi;NormalBlink,NoSmile} I wouldn't want you to have an unfair advantage.|{c:e;Yumi;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}I mean, unless you'd be willing to "pay" me for the info.

s;Yumi;Heehee~ Just testing you.{c:e;Yumi;Smile,FarWink} And you passed.|{c:e;Yumi;NormalBlink,Smile}As a reward, I'll give you a little hint.|I'm planning on having a variety of fighters with different techniques for this tournament.|I don't plan on making this easy for you just because you're a friend.
s;Joshua;Hah! I'd be disappointed if you did.|Thanks for all this, Yumi.|You didn't have to go through all this trouble just for me.
s;Yumi;Don't mention it.|You're an interesting man, Joshua.|I wanna see just how strong you can become.
s;Joshua;Woooo!! That tournament got me fired up!|{c:e;Joshua;Smile,NormalBlink}Thanks again for organizing all that, Yumi. This was great!
s;Yumi;Glad you had fun, Joshua.|{c:e;Yumi;NoSmile}Sorry you didn't win, though.
s;Joshua;Aw, you know that doesn't matter to me. It just means that I've got more to work on.|Did you see that last guy I was up against?|He was pretty much running circles around me!
s;Yumi;Haha, yeah, that sure was something.|{c:e;Yumi;NormalBlink,Smile}Sounds like you and I need to train together more often.
s;Joshua;Seems like it. Wanna do that now?
s;Yumi;Sure! And how about we make this interesting?|You take me out to dinner if I win.
s;Yumi;Come on, Joshua! You're so close!
s;Joshua;*huff huff*|{c:e;Joshua;HalfCloseEyes}Man, Yumi, have you gotten faster since last time?|How's that even possible?
s;Yumi;Hey, like I said, you almost got me.|Looks like we've both been getting better.
s;Joshua;Heh, guess so.|{c:e;Joshua;NormalBlink,Smile}But I'm not gonna give up that easily!

name: SupportAlexEcco
_source: s;Alex;How did I end up with all these books?|I'm usually more responsible with my spending.
s;Ecco;Yoo-hoo! Alex! You out on a shopping spree too?

s;Alex;Oh, Ecco. Hi.|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}And, well, no. {tgm}...{tgm} Yes?|{c:e;Alex;CloseEyes}*sigh*{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink} I meant to only get one or two books,|and next thing I know, I have a whole bookcase worth.

s;Ecco;Oh, is that all?|{c:e;Ecco;CloseEyes,Smile}We are going to be best friends. I can feel it.|{c:e;Ecco;NormalBlink,Smile}Anyway, you need to relax.|There's nothing wrong with a little impromptu, impulsive shopping.

s;Ecco;Eh, I wouldn't worry about it. Who's going to get hurt by it?|{c:e;Ecco;Smile,NormalBlink}By the way, there's this new pastry shop that opened. You have to try it.|They have all kinds of sweets. And coffee too!
s;Ecco;Oh! And they have this new drink! A pumpkin spice latte!|{c:e;Ecco;CloseEyes,Smile}Mmm~ You gotta try it!
s;Alex;I've already spent so much. I really shouldn't.
s;Ecco;You gotta live a little, good grief! C'mon, it'll be fun.
s;Alex;Well, I suppose a little taste couldn't hurt.
s;Ecco;That's the spirit! And after this, let's go get some ice cream,|and we can complain about stupid exes.
s;Alex;I haven't even dated to begin with.

name: SupportCelesteMasashi
_source: s;Celeste;Miss Felicity said that we needed more firewood.|{c:e;Celeste;CloseEyes,Smile}So glad she asked me to do it.|{c:e;Celeste;NormalBlink,Smile}It just means more axe practice!|Okay, log, you're dead!
s;Celeste;Oh, hey there!|{c:e;Celeste;NoSmile}Wait, aren't you that arrow guy who's always talking to girls?

s;Masashi;{tgm}...{tgm} My name is Masashi, and I'm an archer, yes.|{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes}And yes, I suppose I do talk to girls a lot.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink}That is all beside the point.{w} At any rate, what are you up to?
s;Celeste;Miss Felicity needed some more firewood, so I got asked to do it.
s;Masashi;Still, wouldn't a more elegant weapon suit a young lady like yourself?
s;Celeste;And what would you suggest, mister? A sword?|Everyone uses a sword!
s;Masashi;Swords are a fine weapon.|But, no, little lady.{c:e;Masashi;Smile} I had the bow in mind.
s;Masashi;Absolutely. Truly a fine, elegant weapon that only the most gifted use.

s;Masashi;Very few possess the dexterous finesse to use one.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink,Smile}Why, just look at this army.|Most focus on martial weapons or the arcane arts,|yet only a handful have learned to wield the bow, let alone master it.
s;Masashi;So, what do you say? Would you like to learn?
s;Celeste;Sure! Just as soon as I finish chopping this wood.
s;Masashi;Don't hit that piece you just split.|With some work, that would make a great bow.|{c:e;Masashi;Smile}Could I have it? I can fashion it into one for you.
s;Masashi;And before I go, mind pulling the string on my bow?|I want an idea how strong you are.
s;Masashi;I can see that!|{c:e;Masashi;NoSmile}However, a bow and its string needs to be adjusted to its user's strength.|I need an idea of how to make this bow suitable for you.
s;Celeste;Ohhhh, well, why didn't you say so?|Lemme give it a try.
s;Celeste;Whew!{c:e;Celeste;HalfCloseEyes} Why is such a slim piece of string so hard to pull?
s;Masashi;You did better than I thought you would, though.|Thank you, Celeste.|I'll catch up with you when I finish making a bow that you can draw.

name: SupportAlexMichael
_source: s;Alex;Just call me Alex. Would you like some tea?
s;Alex;Glad you think so.|Now, what inspired you to become a knight?
s;Michael;The legends. In the stories, they always helped and defended people.|I wanted to become like that.
s;Alex;My parents were both knights, so it was only natural I would also become one.|{c:e;Alex;CloseEyes,Smile}But I, too, always enjoyed those tales of knights defending the helpless.
s;Michael;My former commander, Captain Irving, always said that war isn't like the stories.|{c:e;Michael;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}And that I should "get those fantasies out of my head."

s;Alex;I see{tgm}...{c:e;Alex;CloseEyes}{tgm} Sadly, that can be the case.|{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink,Smile}That said, I see nothing wrong with reading those stories and being inspired by them.|Many people look to songs, poetry, ballads, and tales to push them to greatness.|Some believe that such tales of bravery|help us reach heights far beyond what we would have done otherwise.
s;Michael;You have a point.{c:e;Michael;Smile} Thank you, Alex.

s;Michael;Is it alright if I come see you again?|The tea is good and it's nice having someone else who enjoys stories of knights.|{c:e;Michael;NoSmile}Foliaga's Holy Knights weren't what I thought they were,|but maybe they're not all like that?

s;Alex;Of course. I'd like that.|{c:e;Alex;NoSmile}And, trust me, Michael, what you experienced was a very unfortunate exception.|{c:e;Alex;Smile}I may be biased, but I have no doubt in my mind that Medeas' knights|live up to how a knight should conduct themselves.
s;Michael;Well, if they're anything like you, I can believe that.

name: SupportAlexMasashi
_source: s;Alex;Hmmm{tgm}...{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm} Oh, these herbs smell very nice.|You wouldn't happen to have any matcha green tea, would you?
s;Woman2;Give me a moment and I'll check.
s;Masashi;Oh! I wasn't expecting to see you here.|Alex, wasn't it? One of Princess Krista's knights.
s;Alex;Hm? Oh yes, that's me. Who are you again?
s;Masashi;I'm Masashi! You know, the shogun from Merinas.
s;Alex;Ah, right.{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes,Smile} Yes, you basically seduced your way into the army.
s;Masashi;ANYWAY, as I was trying to say,|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink}I wasn't expecting to see you here, Alex.
s;Alex;Oh, do you come here often?
s;Masashi;N-No, not particularly. I just happened to be passing through, and--
s;Woman2;He comes here nearly every day, madam.|{c:mirror;Alex}{c:e;Woman2;NormalBlink,Smile}By the way, here's your matcha leaves.
s;Alex;Thank you. Could you set those aside for now?|I'd like to keep browsing. You have an excellent selection of tea and herbs.|I don't often see such an assortment.
s;Masashi;Matcha tea?|I never would have expected a girl from Medeas to be familiar or be interested in it.

s;Alex;I like reading about different types of teas, so I knew of it, at least.|I tried it for the first time when we stopped in Gintoki City, actually. It's very good.|{c:e;Alex;NoSmile}So, why do you come here every day, Masashi?
s;Masashi;Oh, you know, just to make sure the healers and such have the herbs they need to--
s;Woman2;He comes to whisper sweet nothings to me.|{c:e;Woman2;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Something about how I "put even the beauty of the sun to shame."
s;Alex;Oh? Am I interrupting something, then?
s;Masashi;Er, well--No! Absolutely nothing!|{c:e;Masashi;Smile}But since I am here anyway, I may as well compliment such a pretty merch--
s;Alex;And I'm NOT pretty?|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Come on, Masashi. I'm standing right here.

name: SupportMasashiShula
_source: s;Masashi;Ah, hello there! Miss Shula, correct?|It's good to see another archer join our ranks.|And quite the beauteous one at that--
s;Shula;I'm stopping you right there.|{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}Two things. One: I'm not interested.|Two: Even if I was, I'm here to add manpower to this army.|Not to find a husband.
s;Masashi;Now, who said anything about that?|I just couldn't help but admire that mature air you give off.|It's most fitting for a skilled archer such as yourself.
s;Shula;Keep your eyes on the enemy and not on me, lover boy.
s;Masashi;No need to worry about where my eyes wander.{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink,Smile} I always hit my mark.|{c:e;Masashi;NearWink,Smile}Both on and off the battlefield.
s;Shula;That has to be the lamest thing you said throughout this entire conversation.
s;Masashi;But you didn't say they didn't either.
s;Shula;Look, just{tgm}...{c:e;Shula;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm} Ugh, forget it.|{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}I'm heading to the training yard.
s;Shula;Hm... Nothing yet. {c:e;Shula;CloseEyes}I know I heard something in this direction.|{c:e;Shula;HalfCloseEyes}...;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Shula;What the?! It's getting away!|{c:e;Shula;CloseEyes}My shot must've been off.|{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}Get back here, you!
s;Shula;There it is--{c:e;Shula;NoSmile}Huh? It's down already?|It couldn't have bled out that fast.;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Shula;Another arrow. And right in the head too? Who...?;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Masashi;Ah, Miss Shula, is that you?|I was wondering where that first arrow came from.
s;Masashi;I do have a name, you know.
s;Shula;How did you manage to hit its head? It's not impossible, but{tgm}...

s;Masashi;Ah, well, admittedly, I wasn't trying to aim there.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink}I was trying to land my shot around where yours was.|The deer moved at the last moment and my arrow still happened to strike true.
s;Shula;Huh. Well, you did manage to get it in the end.
s;Masashi;Indeed. Though, I must say, your shot wasn't bad either.|A little off from its vitals, but you have a good sense of where to aim.
s;Shula;I've been doing this for a while.

s;Masashi;I can tell!|{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes,Smile}I knew my intuition was right about you.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink,Smile}At any rate, you intended to bring this back to camp, correct?|Do you need any assistance?
s;Shula;Hmm{tgm}...|{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}{tgm}You know what, yeah, you can help.|We both managed to get an arrow in it, so its both our responsibility.|Let's go.
s;Masashi;Gladly.|Say, why don't we hunt together next time?|I think we could make a great team.
s;Shula;Don't push it, lover boy.|{tgm}{c:e;Shula;CloseEyes}...{c:wait;200}{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}{tgm} But, sure. I wouldn't mind the company.
s;Masashi;Great! Another one to add to the haul.|This should be enough meat to last us for a while.
s;Shula;Yeah. Let's head back to camp.
s;Masashi;Have I mentioned how impressive your archery skills are, Miss Shula?
s;Shula;Yes.{w} Many times.|{c:e;Shula;HalfCloseEyes}Get to the point.
s;Masashi;I was just wondering about your training.|{c:e;Masashi;Smile}You obviously have a lot of experience with how accurate your shots are.

s;Shula;We had some archers in Coral Village's local militia|and they taught me a few things before I practiced on my own.|I was also in charge of running the orphanage there.|I went out hunting to supply food for the kids every morning.
s;Masashi;Ah, fascinating. A very practical use of your skills.
s;Shula;Yup. I even taught some of the older kids how to shoot so that they could help too.|{c:e;Shula;Smile}It was hard work, but rewarding.
s;Shula;What about you?|A fancy noble like you probably had proper training from some esteemed tutor|or something like that.

s;Masashi;Haha! Your intuition is just as accurate as your arrows, Miss Shula.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink,Smile}Both my parents were high-ranking officials in the Merinese army.|They had assigned one of the best archers in their division to tutor me,|but I wouldn't say that is the sole reason for my skill.
s;Shula;Don't go all modest on me now.

s;Masashi;But it's true!|I had spent time training on my own outside of practicing together with my tutor.|Honestly, archery was{tgm}...{tgm} fun, for lack of a better way to describe it.|{c:Masashi;CloseEyes}It didn't matter if I wasn't an expert in it. I just wanted to keep practicing.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink,Smile}I don't think I'm as passionate about any other subject.
s;Shula;Hey, looks like the camp's just ahead.|{c:e;Shula;Smile}Pick up the pace, Masashi! The meat's not gonna skin itself.

name: SupportSamEcco
_source: s;Ecco;Man, it's getting really hard finding jobs that will pay.|Where's all the good jobs?|{c:e;Ecco;HalfCloseEyes}Babysitting a cat? Seriously?
s;Ecco;Hey, where's all the bandit jobs? Shouldn't there be more of those?
s;GuildGirl;Oh, Oreg, here he is now.
s;Sam;Guess what?! You won't believe it!
s;GuildGirl;Let me guess. You killed all the bandits, didn't you, Sam?
s;Sam;Sure did! Got any more word of bandits?
s;Ecco;He's the reason you don't have any bandit assignments, huh?
s;Ecco;That's all I need to know.
s;Sam;Oh baby! Daddy is coming for you!!|I'm gonna put you to sleep!|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes,NoSmile}Well, more like DEAD sleep.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink,Smile}BUT YOU'LL STILL BE ASLEEP!
s;Sam;Don't startle me like that! You almost gave me a heart attack.|What do you want?
s;Ecco;You've been killing a lot of bandits lately.
s;Sam;Glad you noticed!|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes,Smile}There was Pig Nose, Cut Ear, Eyeless,|Ugly Face, Ugly Face Two, Ugly Face Three--{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink,Smile}Oh, and also their six cousins--
s;Ecco;Yeah, cool, great, big guy.|{c:e;Ecco;HalfCloseEyes}There's just a teeny, tiny problem.
s;Ecco;Because of you, the rest of us mercenaries can't get any jobs!|You're getting all the money from the bandit killing and not leaving any for us.
s;Sam;No, I'm not. I'm not getting paid.
s;Sam;Wait a minute, you can get paid for this?! What for?
s;Ecco;Oh Oreg, this man{tgm}...|{c:e;Ecco;NormalBlink}{tgm}Yes, you can get paid! What do you think mercenaries do this for?|How do you maintain your equipment?
s;Sam;Oh, that's easy. I just take the bandits' weapons.|Plus, I don't use armor anyway.
s;Ecco;Well, I need to replenish my tomes!{c:e;Ecco;NormalBlink} They don't come cheap.
s;Sam;Is that what this is all about? I have plenty at my house. Follow me!
s;Sam;Here we go. One blinky blink book for you.
s;Ecco;{tgm}...{tgm} Did you seriously just call it a "blinky blink book"?
s;Sam;Oh now YOU'RE dead! You just lost your head! OOH YEAH!
s;Sam;Hey, Ecco you're a pretty good bandit-killing partner--
s;Ecco;Please, I got him just fine.
s;Ecco;Be still you filthy, foul-mouthed mongrel of a man!|May the gods have mercy on you|for I shall not do the same regarding your worthless life!
s;Sam;Man! I think I'd rather face the Great Beasts than you.|You're scary when you're mad.

s;Ecco;Yes, we cleared out the ENTIRE fort. Just us.|So, we'll be taking the one million gold reward for the leader,|plus the individual rewards for his underlings.|{c:e;Ecco;CloseEyes,Smile}And since it was just the two of us versus a whole troop,|there will be a performance bonus fee, and a life endangerment policy fee.
s;GuildGirl;*sigh*{c:e;GuildGirl;HalfCloseEyes} Yes, of course.|{c:e;GuildGirl;CloseEyes}I think I prefer it when HE was just killing bandits|and not asking for money for it.
s;Sam;Isn't that a little greedy, Ecco?
s;Ecco;You gotta know what you and your services are worth.|{c:e;Ecco;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Now, if you'll just hand over the money, ma'am,|we'll be on our way and won't be bothering you.
s;Ecco;We are going to go celebrate,|and I'm going to show you what you can do with money.

name: SupportRyuujiTsubaki
_source: s;Ryuuji;I've been doing some thinking lately, and I think we should drop formalities now.
s;Ryuuji;I'm not under your service anymore,|so I don't see any reason to keep seeing you as my liege.|You're just some little girl in my eyes now.
s;Ryuuji;So, instead of "Lady Tsubaki",|I'd say something like Tsuba or Baki would be more appropriate.

s;Tsubaki;Hold for a moment! What's with those nicknames?|A-And more importantly, you may not be my retainer anymore,|but I'm still next in line to the throne.|There should still be some level of respect.
s;Ryuuji;You know what? You have a point.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink}But, y'know, you gotta earn that respect.
s;Ryuuji;Let's see you live up to being the emperor's daughter.|Once you do that, maybe I'll see you as Lady Tsubaki again.|Until then, you're still just a little girl.

s;Tsubaki;Oh, Kenji{tgm}...|{c:e;Tsubaki;CloseEyes}{tgm}I know he's always been rough around the edges,|but being with that pirate crew made him worse!|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}Still, his brashness has always had an appeal{tgm}...
s;Tsubaki;I mean, I must speak with you this instant!
s;Ryuuji;Oh, 'sup, Baki? What did ya need?
s;Tsubaki;First of all, I will no longer tolerate that ridiculous nickname!|You must refer to me as "Lady Tsubaki" from now on.
s;Tsubaki;A-And secondly, you may not be my retainer anymore,|but you are still a citizen of Merinas.|As such, you must recognize my authority as the imperial princess.
s;Tsubaki;Yes. I will not negotiate on these terms.
s;Ryuuji;Heh. Well, you're trying at least. I'll give you that much.
s;Ryuuji;Still not enough. Gotta try harder than that, Baki.{c:e;Ryuuji;CloseEyes,Smile} See ya.

s;Tsubaki;W-Wait a moment!|{c:e;Tsubaki;CloseEyes}*sigh* That man, I swear{tgm}...|{c:e;Tsubaki;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}Still, there must be something I can do.|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}I can't let him walk over me like this any longer!

name: SupportRyuujiNagisa
_source: s;Ryuuji;I know I ain't in any position to be saying this,|but you really gotta cool it around the Medeans.

s;Ryuuji;Like it or not, we're all allies here.|On top of that, you're Tsubaki's retainer.|What you say is gonna be taken like Samegoro said it himself.|{c:e;Ryuuji;CloseEyes}Man, why do I even gotta explain this to you?{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink} You of all people should get that.
s;Nagisa;And you of all people shouldn't be lecturing me on alliances, you dirty traitor.
s;Ryuuji;Heh, on one hand, I get where you're coming from.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink}But honestly? That just shows how ignorant you are.
s;Ryuuji;Like I said, you of all people should know what I'm getting at.|You ain't a kid anymore, Nagisa.|{c:e;Ryuuji;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Or maybe you still need me to hold your hand?
s;Nagisa;Oh, shove it! Don't think you can still tease me like that.
s;Ryuuji;Except I ain't teasin'. Seriously, what's gotten into you?
s;Nagisa;You{tgm}...{tgm} You just don't get it!

name: SupportKaiJoshua
_source: s;Kai;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Fascinating.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}That hunk of iron doesn't slow him down nearly as much as one would expect.|He doesn't parry or deflect like one might with a large sword.|More like he cuts through his opponent's defenses. Interesting.
s;Joshua;Hey, you going to spar, pretty boy?|Or are you just going to stand on the sidelines all day like an idiotic bystander?
s;Joshua;You see anyone else just grinning on the sidelines not doing anything?
s;Kai;Doesn't that large sword weigh you down, though?|I would think something that massive would--
s;Joshua;Oh no you don't. You've been watching for the better part of half an hour.|Quit standing there and draw! Hyah!
s;Kai;Ngh. Nice stroke.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}You were aware that I was watching even while sparring yourself?
s;Joshua;Sure was.|{c:e;Joshua;NoSmile}First rule of survival in the arena:|always be aware of your surroundings and who occupies them.|Anyone there is a potential assassin, adversary, or ambusher.
s;Kai;So you have good situational awareness, then. You would make a good soldier or spy.|Still, this sword is a large target making it easy to avoid and block.
s;Joshua;You may have blocked my blade, but look at your own.

s;Joshua;As you noted, large target so easy to block.|But if you block near my cross guard, you are bearing the full weight of Old Iron here,|which is too much strain for the typical blade.|One more parry and you may break your sword.
s;Joshua;What you want to do is block closer to the tip.|Less weight on your blade.
s;Joshua;Let's call it for a day. Besides, you need to get your sword looked at.

s;Kai;How did he get my sword to the point of breaking like that?|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}Thank Merin it didn't actually break.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}Going to have to find more information on him.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}He mentioned the arena{tgm}...|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}{tgm}Maybe I'll see if anyone from there knows anything about the man.

name: SupportKaiSumire
_source: s;Sumire;Ah! I'm up, I'm up!|{c:e;Sumire;Smile}Oh, hey there, Kai. What's up?
s;Kai;Mind enlightening me on something?|I figured you'd probably have some insight on certain things.
s;Kai;What's with everyone thinking I'm some shameless skirt chaser?
s;Sumire;Oh, that!|There were rumors going around of a real looker of a mercenary doing{tgm}...{tgm} "side work."|And well, his description pretty much matched yours, so{tgm}...
s;Sumire;But that couldn't be right.|The Kai I know wouldn't make passes at a girl.|You're too focused on all that cool ninja stuff to even think about romance!{c:e;Sumire;Smile} Right?
s;Sumire;Oh dear Merin, why are you saying "but"? Kai, what have you been doing??|You didn't knock up some poor, innocent noblewoman|while you were off doing Merin knows what--
s;Kai;Sumire!!|{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes}Man, with how you're reacting,|I wouldn't be surprised if YOU were the reason why these rumors started cropping up.
s;Sumire;H-Hey, don't look at me!|I'm about as clueless about how all this started as you are.

s;Kai;*sigh*|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}Still, on one hand, I don't particularly care if some nobodies think that of me.|On the other hand, if word gets out to the others in the army{tgm}...|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}{tgm}Well, things will be more complicated than I'd like them to be.
s;Sumire;Agreed.|{c:e;Sumire;Smile}But hey, that only matters if any of that is actually true.|Which it isn't, right?
s;Sumire;{tgm}...{tgm} Kai, you're supposed to agree with me there.
s;Sumire;What the--Kai!|Don't avoid the question like that!!
s;Sumire;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Hmmmm{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Yeah, no. That wouldn't work at all.
s;Sumire;Do you think you'd be a good dad?
s;Sumire;I was thinking the same thing.{w}{c:e;Sumire;Smile} "Ain't nothing fatherly about Kai," I thought!
s;Kai;Am I gonna regret asking why you were thinking about this in the first place?
s;Sumire;Well, with you fooling around lately--
s;Sumire;You didn't deny it either!|As I was saying, there's a real possibility that a Kai Jr. could be out there somewhere.|Or, at least gonna be at some point.
s;Sumire;Exactly!|That poor mother is gonna be out there with no dad to take care of the kid.
s;Sumire;It's too sad, Kai! How dare you subject them to this tragedy!
s;Kai;Hey, hey, hey! Let's reel that back to reality here.|Sumire, you know me.{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes,Smile} Am I the type of guy who doesn't plan ahead?
s;Kai;See?|I've taken all the necessary precautions to make sure that doesn't happen.
s;Kai;Are you sure you want the details?
s;Kai;Exactly.{w}{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes,Smile} Besides, even that did happen, it's not my problem.
s;Kai;Nothing you're about say is gonna convince me otherwise.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}Anyway, I gotta get going. See ya later, Sumire.
s;Sumire;Man, that's way too cruel, Kai{tgm}...

name: SupportKaiSam
_source: s;Sam;Alright, you. Where's the rest of your gang?
s;Bandit1;Yer not gonna get that outta me. My lips're sealed.
s;Bandit1;I-I still ain't sayin' nuthin' to ya{tgm}...!
s;Sam;Alright, gonna have to do this the hard way.
s;Bandit1;Okay, okay{tgm}...!{tgm} The hideout's to the west{tgm}...{tgm} j-just past the ravine{tgm}...!
s;Kai;Back from another bandit-killing spree, I see.
s;Sam;Kai? How'd you know about that?

s;Kai;Caught a bit of your interrogation earlier.|{c:e;Kai;NoSmile}I must say, your methods are{tgm}...|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}{tgm}Well, they lack refinement.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}You had him in a chokehold. You could have broken his neck.
s;Sam;Please. I know my own strength.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}Would have needed more pressure than that to break it.
s;Kai;And you pulled his arm right out of the socket.
s;Sam;Oh yeah, well, that's his problem for being such a weakling.
s;Kai;Sam, where on earth did you learn such brutish interrogation tactics?
s;Sam;Mercenary work. Used to be part of a mercenary company.|We did stuff like this all the time before assaulting their camp, fort, or whatnot.
s;Kai;Fascinating.|You wouldn't happen to know of a mercenary called the Prowling Tiger, would you?
s;Sam;Nope, first I'm hearing of it.
s;Kai;I mentioned it when bandits were attacking your home.
s;Sam;My house was being broken into!|You expect me to remember a pointless question like that?
s;Kai;Honestly, yes, but that's neither here nor there.|So do you know of anyone like that?
s;Sam;No, but I was part of this one group called the Ebony Tigers.|Maybe that Prowling Tiger is one of them?
s;Kai;He's not trained to be one, but his methods are effective as a ninja's,|even if not as refined.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}He'd be a nightmare with actual training like that.;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Kai;Anyway, this was an enlightening conversation, Sam.|Talk to you later.

name: SupportKaiAsuka
_source: s;Kai;Nice to see you too, Asuka.
s;Asuka;You know very well what the consequences are for defecting, Kai.|And as much as I would like to follow through with them, I can't exactly do that.
s;Kai;Aw, you still care about me.
s;Asuka;When did you pick up that insufferable attitude?
s;Kai;It's always been there. I was just good at hiding it.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes,Smile}Now, are you gonna keep holding me like this, or should I just break free myself?
s;Kai;You couldn't have honestly believed I wouldn't know how to break out of that hold.|It was my father's technique. You know that.
s;Asuka;I suppose I underestimated you.{c:e;Asuka;NormalBlink} I assumed you'd be rusty after all this time.
s;Kai;So, what's the deal, Asuka?|I'm sure getting your hands on me wasn't the reason for your "visit".|{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Heh, unless{tgm}...
s;Kai;I mean, I know I look like my old man, but come on--
s;Kai;Hmm, not hearing you deny it.
s;Asuka;{tgm}...{c:e;Asuka;CloseEyes}{tgm} You are just trying to distract me.|I will not give in so easily.
s;Asuka;This was just a warning, Kai.|Once our time with the Medean princess is over, I will not show you mercy.|Watch yourself.
s;Kai;Man, I know I was just trying to rile her up, but{tgm}...{tgm}{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes} Hm{tgm}...|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}{tgm}That's just plain pitiful, Asuka.
s;Kai;I'm not playing around anymore, Asuka. Gonna have to try harder than that.
s;Kai;Hey, what happened to not killing me, hm?
s;Asuka;You're making me reconsider, Kai. Choose your next words carefully.
s;Kai;What's wrong?|I thought you would've missed being called by that nickname.
s;Kai;If you want me to keep going, I can.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}In fact, I'll even throw in my "services" if you feel so inclined.

s;Kai;Wouldn't be offering if I wasn't.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}He and I went through similar training. You know that.|I bet I look just like him in his prime.|{c:e;Kai;NearWink,Smile}Just a little bit of gold, and you can see for yourself, Asuka.
s;Asuka;{tgm}...{tgm} Even you can admit this is going too far, Kai.

s;Kai;Maybe. But your hesitation is giving me mixed signals.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes,Smile}Think about it. No one will know but us.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}Keeping secrets is literally what ninjas are trained to do, after all.
s;Kai;So, it is up for consideration, then?

s;Kai;Damn, so close.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}Hmm{tgm}...{tgm} but even if she did accept, would I really have it in me to follow through on it?|{tgm}{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes}...{tgm} Ugh, just thinking about pretending to be him is making me sick{tgm}...

name: SupportAquaMichael
_source: s;Aqua;And may the Great Folia bless those who walked this path on days gone by,|and through time forever passing.
s;Aqua;Oh, Michael! I didn't realize you were standing there.|If you wanted to pray alongside me, you could have asked.
s;Michael;It's okay, Aqua. I just{tgm}...{tgm}{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes} Well, uh, it's not like I didn't want to pray, but{tgm}...{tgm}|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink} I wanted to ask you something.
s;Michael;Please don't be offended,|but how can you keep worshipping the Great Folia like this?
s;Michael;I'm sorry! That was really rude, wasn't it?
s;Michael;You know what, I'll just go.{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink} Sorry!
s;Aqua;W-Wait!|{tgm}{c:e;Aqua;HalfCloseEyes}...{c:e:Aqua;CloseEyes}{tgm} Just what did the Holy Knights do to you, Michael?
s;Aqua;Oh, Michael! Did you need something?
s;Michael;I wanted to apologize for the other day.|What I said was really out of line.
s;Aqua;It's okay, really! In fact, I wanted to discuss that with you.|Let's talk this out.
s;Aqua;Your faith must have been really shaken, Michael.

s;Michael;Y-Yeah{tgm}...|{c:e;Michael;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}I just don't know what to think anymore, Aqua.|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink}The Holy Knights are supposed to carry out the Great Folia's will and protect his children.|But that wasn't happening at all!|{c:e;Michael;HalfCloseEyes}I realize not all the Knights acted like what you all saw in Windbrook,|but the fact they exist{tgm}...|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink}{tgm}Where's the faith? Where's the belief in the Great Folia's teachings?|{c:e;Michael;HalfCloseEyes}Where is the Great Folia when you need{br}him{tgm}...?
s;Michael;*sniff* I-I'm sorry, Aqua.{c:e;Michael;HalfCloseEyes} This is a lot for me to handle.
s;Aqua;There's no need to apologize. It does seem like a lot.|{c:e;Aqua;Smile}But I think this is a good thing.

s;Aqua;The fact that you're acting like this|shows how strong your faith in the Great Folia is.|You saw the wrongs around you and you didn't let yourself fall into them.|{c:e;Aqua;Smile}I think that's really admirable.
s;Michael;Aqua{tgm}...|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}{tgm}Y-Yeah, you're right.|{c:e;Michael;Smile}Thanks. I needed to hear that.{c:e;Michael;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile} But{tgm}...

s;Michael;When this is all over, will the Holy Knights go back to how they were before?|I wanna blame whoever was controlling the Archbishop for making the Knights like this,|but something tells me things aren't that simple.
s;Aqua;Even if things don't go back to normal right away,|getting the Archbishop back to her old self will be a start.
s;Michael;Agreed.|{c:e;Michael;Smile}Anyway, thanks again, Aqua. I'm feeling a lot better now.
s;Aqua;I'm glad, Michael.|And if you're worried about anything else, feel free to come talk to me.|I'm always happy to lend an ear.

name: SupportAquaLucy
_source: s;Aqua;Yes, that's me. Who are you?

s;Lucy;I'm Lucy, a healer for the Medean royal army.|{c:e;Lucy;CloseEyes,NoSmile}Well, healer in training, I mean.|{c:e;Lucy;NoSmile}My mother was the head healer for the royal army,|but since she's sick, I'm trying to fill in for her until she recovers.
s;Aqua;Oh, I see! I happen to be a cleric of Vergrande Monastery in Foliaga.
s;Lucy;That's so cool! So, we're both healers, then.|We should be friends!
s;Aqua;It would be nice to have another friend, Lucy.
s;Lucy;By the way, that's a really nice staff.|I don't think I've ever seen anything like it before.
s;Aqua;Oh, thank you. Sam let us have it on our way back from Oregot.|{c:e;Aqua;NoSmile}It feels more powerful than the staves I normally use.|It can heal others from a good distance away.
s;Lucy;That's amazing! Can I give it a try?
s;Aqua;I don't see why not. Let's go to the infirmary and try it out.
s;Woman1;Oh, Lucy! Did you need something?
s;Lucy;Hello, Miss Joan. I just wanted to try out this new staff.|Is there anyone who needs help right now?
s;Woman1;Why, Brennan here happened to come in with a sprained wrist earlier.|I'm sure he'd appreciate the assistance.
s;Lucy;Um. Wait, let me try again.
s;Woman1;Lucy, are you sure that staff works?
s;Lucy;I'm sure it does! I've seen Aqua use it all the time.
s;Man1;Ah, I feel so much better. Thank you!
s;Woman1;Thank you very much for your help, you two.
s;Lucy;You can say that again.|{c:e;Lucy;NormalBlink}Looks like we've got a mystery on our hands, Aqua.|Let's figure out what's with that staff!
s;Lucy;Aqua! I have a theory for why I can't use that staff of yours!
s;Lucy;Maybe the staff knows that I can ride a horse?
s;Lucy;Well, you know how some people can't learn certain types of magic?|Maybe staves have weird rules like that too!
s;Aqua;When you put it that way, I suppose that makes some sense?|{c:e;Aqua;CloseEyes}Not a LOT of sense, but I do see the logic.
s;Lucy;If only we knew someone who could use magic AND ride a horse{tgm}...
s;Lucy;{tgm}...{tgm} And that's why we came to you, Sir Forrest!
s;Forrest;Lucy, I understand, but you DO realize I cannot use staves anyway, correct?
s;Forrest;This more than likely doesn't prove anything, Lucy.|I'm sorry to say, but this may have just been a waste of time.
s;Aqua;Maybe the Medean Castle library has some books on it?
s;Lucy;We're gonna head over there now, Sir Forrest.|Thanks for your help!

name: SupportChellSam
_source: s;Chell;Sam, do you have a moment?
s;Chell;How did you happen to get the cabin you have?

s;Sam;Shortly after I left, I was recruited by a mercenary company.|They helped me. Gave me training.|We cleared out that cabin when it was being used as a bandit hangout.|Eventually, I left them and went solo.|I went back to that old cabin, cleaned it up a bit,|and just used it as a base of operations, so to speak.
s;Chell;Oh. It's rather large for someone all alone.
s;Sam;Yeah, a little. But there's still too many bandits.|Once Oregot is safer, I'll probably settle down with someone, but not yet.
s;Chell;You mean you don't have a girlfriend? Perhaps a pretty girl mercenary?
s;Sam;No, been too busy killing bandits.
s;Chell;Speaking of which, have you taken down the leader of that one group?
s;Sam;Still tracking him down. I got some of his captains, but not him yet.|{c:e;Sam;Smile}By the way, how's Lin doing?|She'd be part of the Pegasus Knight unit by now, right?
s;Chell;She left, Sam.{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink} She went on her own two years ago.
s;Chell;I haven't heard from her since the goodbye note she left.|{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes}I only hope she's still alive and well.
s;Chell;She said she was going to be a mercenary.
s;Sam;I{tgm}{tgm}...{tgm}{tgm} I see.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}But anyway, I'm going to go train want to come?
s;Chell;I would love to. It's been too long.
s;Chell;You know, Sam, I'm surprised you haven't found someone special by now.|{c:e;Chell;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}No grateful damsels in distress throwing themselves into your arms?
s;Sam;Haha, no. I have saved plenty of damsels before, though.|Various other travelers too.{c:e;Sam;NoSmile} Still, no one's caught my eye.|Besides{tgm}...
s;Sam;The life I'm living out in the mountains is no life for a girl.|Especially a girl that means something to me.
s;Chell;You're not wrong, and it's sweet of you to think of things like that.
s;Chell;But it's not life for a man either, Sam. Think about it.|{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes}All alone, no one to talk to, no one to share a meal with{tgm}...
s;Chell;You've done that for how many years now?
s;Chell;Eight years{tgm}...|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}{tgm}That's a long time without someone there to keep the bed warm.
s;Sam;Yeah{tgm}...{tgm}? Chell, what are you getting at?
s;Chell;My point is that I'm sure the right girl would go anywhere with you,|including into bandit-infested Oregot.|And she would help you clear it of bandits.
s;Chell;There's no supposing about it!|What you are aspiring to do--while noble and brave--is foolish.|How long until you finish? How long until you clear Oregot?
s;Sam;Never thought about it. As long as it takes, I guess.
s;Chell;And you just expect the girl to wait?
s;Sam;Well{tgm}...{c:e;Sam;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm} Never thought about that before either.
s;Chell;Please do. The right girl will want to go with you, Sam.|It's too big of a job to do by yourself.
s;Sam;Thanks, Chell. I'll think about what you said.|You shared some insight I haven't considered.
s;Sam;I'm just not sure who the right girl might be.|I know you said you'd join me, but I figured that was a given.
s;Sam;Hmm{tgm}...{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}{tgm} I'm gonna get something to eat and think it over. See you.
s;Chell;*sigh*{c:wait;200}{c:e;Chell;HalfCloseEyes} Just how dense is that man?

name: SupportChellEcco
_source: s;Chell;Oh, there you are, Ecco. I was looking for you.
s;Ecco;Hey, Chell! What can I do for you?
s;Chell;One of the soldiers in the army invited me to a walk in the public gardens.|It might be a date?{c:e;Chell;HalfCloseEyes} Maybe?|{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes}I'm not exactly sure, to be honest.
s;Ecco;Oh, you go, girl!{c:e;Ecco;CloseEyes,Smile} It's definitely a date.|{c:e;Ecco;NormalBlink,Smile}Guys tend to be straightforward about that sort of thing.
s;Chell;Really? Fascinating.|{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes,Smile}I knew my intuition about you was correct.

s;Chell;The thing is, I need some help preparing for this date.|As you can probably tell, I'm larger-framed than most women.|Most normal clothes don't fit too well, and armor isn't the most romantic attire.
s;Ecco;Haha! I see.|Well, I'm not petite, myself.{c:e;Ecco;CloseEyes,Smile} Got quite the tush, actually.|{c:e;Ecco;NormalBlink,Smile}Anyway, you want some store recommendations, I'm guessing?
s;Ecco;You definitely came to the right girl.|{c:e;Ecco;NormalBlink,Smile}Time for a shopping spree!
s;Man3;Well, hi there, Ecco!|What can I do for you today?
s;Ecco;My friend here is looking for some clothes for a date.
s;Man3;Oh, fun! What sort of look are we going for here?
s;Chell;I'd like something nice for the occasion.|Something light and comfortable, but also alluring.
s;Man3;Hm{tgm}...|{c:e;Man3;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm}I have just the thing. One sec.
s;Chell;Wh-What is that?|That would hardly cover anything!|Ecco, look at it!
s;Ecco;I think it looks kind of cute.
s;Man3;See? She knows a good outfit when she sees one.
s;Chell;Are these supposed to be the bottoms?|They're hardly leaving anything to the imagination!
s;Ecco;Oh, yeah, everyone definitely will see your butt. And your thighs too.
s;Chell;That's not supposed to be a good thing, Ecco.
s;Ecco;If you say so.|Joe, I think she wants something a little more conservative than that.
s;Man3;You got it! Be right back.
s;Ecco;Bikini armor. Duh!|{c:e;Ecco;CloseEyes,Smile}You did say you wanted something alluring.
s;Chell;Yes, but I didn't mean{tgm}...{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes}{tgm} that.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}What does he take me for?
s;Ecco;If it's any consolation, you would look mighty fine in a bikini.|You have a good form. No shame in how you look.
s;Chell;Ecco, please.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}I don't want the whole world seeing my butt{tgm}...{c:e;Chell;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm} or other things.
s;Chell;Ah, now this is more like it. Let's see here{tgm}...
s;Chell;That was fun, Ecco. You're fun to shop with.
s;Ecco;Thanks! We should do this more often.|Anyway, let's go get some pie. I'm starved!
s;Chell;Yes, let's. Now that you mention it, I'm getting hungry too.

name: SupportForrestTaylor
_source: s;Taylor;General Forrest, I admire the work ethic,|but does it look like I wanna talk about our last session?
s;Forrest;It looks like you're ready to drink yourself into a stupor.
s;Taylor;Glad we're on the same page.{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,Smile} Now, if you'll excuse me{tgm}...
s;Forrest;Ah, hold on. Perhaps I should join you.|{c:e;Forrest;HalfCloseEyes}You may need{tgm}...{tgm} supervision.
s;Taylor;I'm a big boy, General, no need to worry!|But you can still tag along if you want. The more, the merrier!|{c:e;Taylor;NoSmile}By the way, have you actually drank alcohol before?

s;Taylor;Not a problem! We'll start you off easy to figure out your tolerance.|{c:e;Taylor;NoSmile}I don't want you going out of commission tomorrow morning.|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes}I don't wanna explain to{br}Her Highness|why her most trusted knight is having the worst hangover of his life.
s;Forrest;I trust that you know what you're doing, Taylor.
s;Taylor;Of course I know what I'm doing!|Now, come on, let's head to the tavern! Drinks on me!
s;Taylor;General Forrest! Hey! You doing okay? You're looking more sour than usual.
s;Forrest;Taylor, what happened on the night we went to the tavern?
s;Taylor;Oh. Uh. Why{tgm}...{tgm} do you ask{tgm}...?

s;Forrest;The women in town were giving me strange looks the last time I went out for errands.|{c:e;Forrest;HalfCloseEyes}I can only assume something{tgm}...{tgm} unsavory happened.|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}I can hardly recall anything from that night, though. It's all a blur.
s;Taylor;It's probably best to let it stay a blur, buddy.|{c:e;Taylor;HalfCloseEyes}For your own peace of mind, I mean.
s;Forrest;Taylor, I fear my reputation is on the line here.|I need to know what happened.
s;Taylor;Don't say I didn't warn you.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink}You see{tgm}...
s;Taylor;It wasn't as bad as it sounds! Really!|{c:e;Taylor;Smile}I mean, you were definitely enjoying yourself.|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,Smile}And those ladies really liked it when you--
s;Forrest;Stop stop stop no no no I don't want to hear anymore.
s;Taylor;Would me saying I was jealous make the situation any better?
s;Forrest;*sigh* This is all too much{tgm}...
s;Taylor;Whoa, got another bouquet, General? That's the third one this week!

s;Forrest;Taylor, that tavern outing was a horrible idea.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}The women in town won't leave me be.|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}First, it was the barmaid, then the general store's shopkeeper, then the baker{tgm}...|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}{tgm}And then it just kept going! I can't take it anymore, Taylor!
s;Taylor;You're way too stressed about this.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink,Smile}Just look at how popular you're getting! You're gonna get a wife in no time.

if;get_support_rank('Krista', 'Forrest') == 'S' or get_support_rank('Kai', 'Forrest') == 'S' or get_support_rank('Chell', 'Forrest') == 'S' or get_support_rank('Alex', 'Forrest') == 'S' or get_support_rank('Marina', 'Forrest') == 'S' or get_support_rank('Reem', 'Forrest') == 'S' or get_support_rank('Torgen', 'Forrest') == 'S'
s;Forrest;First off, I already have a partner.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}Secondly, even if I didn't, this is not how I would want to meet them.
s;Forrest;First off, I'm not ready for marriage.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}Secondly, even if I were, this is not how I want to meet my future partner.
s;Forrest;Especially when they only find me attractive if I'm intoxicated.

s;Taylor;Oh, I'm sure it ain't like that! You've got a lot going for you as is.|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,Smile}You're handsome, loyal, and strong. Anyone would want a husband like that.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink,Smile}And being a flirty drunk is just the cherry on top.
s;Taylor;But seriously though, this is really good for you!
s;Forrest;How in Medea's name is this good?

s;Taylor;Lemme put it into perspective for you.|You're so dedicated to training and serving the royal family.|{c:e;Taylor;Smile}Admirable? Sure!|{c:e;Taylor;NoSmile}But that also means you don't set aside time for yourself outside the castle.
s;Taylor;You gotta let yourself live beyond your duties, General.|It's good for the soul!
s;Taylor;Let me ask you this. Wasn't that night at the tavern fun?
s;Forrest;From what little I remember, it was.
s;Taylor;Exactly! Expanding your world and experiencing new things does wonders!|And that can all start by meeting new people.

s;Taylor;I'm not saying you gotta drink 'til you pass out every night to do that.|It can be something small like striking up a conversation with the shopkeeper|next time you do errands.|{c:e;Taylor;Smile}Or flirting back the next time you get a gift from one of the girls in town.
s;Forrest;I could try your first suggestion, though.
s;Taylor;That's what I like to hear!|{c:e;Taylor;NoSmile}Anyway, you've obviously had a long day. You know what you need?
s;Forrest;If you're going to suggest alcohol, I swear to Medea--
s;Taylor;You got it! To the tavern we go!

name: SupportChellJoshua
_source: s;Joshua;Man, Chell, you're not as frail as other Pegasus riders I've seen.|You've got a good bit of bulk on ya!
s;Chell;Oh, um, thank you, Joshua.|But, what's with this all of a sudden?
s;Joshua;I was wondering if we could do a quick spar.|I wanna see just how strong you really are!
s;Joshua;Wow, nimble AND strong. Not bad at all, Chell.
s;Chell;You're not so bad yourself.|{c:e;Chell;NoSmile}I'm surprised at how easily you can swing that sword around.|Why, it looks more like a slab of metal than an actual blade.
s;Joshua;Old Iron is heavy, sure, but these muscles aren't just for show, you know.
s;Chell;Yes. Of course. Right.{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes} Ahem.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}At any rate, how did you come to wield{tgm}...{tgm} "Old Iron", was it?

s;Joshua;Took a lot of strength training to actually lift up this bad boy.|It was my father's sword at first, actually.|He said he'd only hand it down to me if I could lift it.|{c:e;Joshua;Smile}You can see how that went.
s;Chell;Oh my. Your father must have also been quite a strong man.
s;Joshua;Sure was.|{c:e;Joshua;CloseEyes,Smile}Old Iron looked so natural in his hands. He could swing it with ease.|Even more than I ever could.
s;Joshua;You alright, Chell? You look flushed.
s;Chell;Ah, yes, I'm fine, thank you.
s;Joshua;Anyway, how about you? Where did you learn to use an axe?
s;Chell;From my father, Sir Gibson. He was a good man and a good teacher.
s;Joshua;Was he your only teacher? At least when it came to axe training?
s;Joshua;That explains a lot, then.|{c:e;Joshua;Smile}When you fight, one swing flows right into the next.|It's almost like a dance.
s;Chell;Why, thank you. Father would be pleased to hear you say that.|Say, why don't we train together sometime?|We could compare our techniques up close.
s;Joshua;Sure! I don't mind at all.

name: SupportSamAnil
_source: s;Sam;*huff* *huff*|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}Anil, where are you?!|Krista needs you for something!|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}Man, not here either{tgm}...|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}{tgm}Anil!!
s;Anil;Whose bright idea was it to recruit the Prowling Tiger into this army?|{c:e;Anil;CloseEyes}Oh, Oreg, he's even bigger than the rumors say...;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Sam;Anil, we need to talk.|{c:e;Sam;HalfCloseEyes}Er. Sign. Or, uh{tgm}...|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}{tgm}Look, you know what I mean!
s;Sam;What do you mean "nope"?!|Look, I just wanna know why you've been avoiding me.
s;Anil;[There is no way I'm going to get along with the Prowling Tiger.]
s;Anil;[The Prowling Tiger!]|[The infamous mercenary who's been killing bandits up and down southern Oregot.]
s;Sam;Alright, hold it, hold it, hold it!|I have SO many questions.|First off, people have heard about me?|They have a NICKNAME for me??
s;Anil;[What did you expect?]|[You've taken out thousands of bandit camps the last five years at least!]
s;Sam;Hundreds? Maybe. But THOUSANDS?|Someone out there's exaggerating things.|And what was that about being a mercenary?|Sure, there was some mercenaries who taught me stuff, but that was it.
s;Anil;[So you at least admit to killing a mass number of bandits?]
s;Sam;Yeah, but it's not like I wanted to be famous for it.|I had my own reasons for doing what I had to do.
s;Sam;Bandits kidnapped Krista years ago.|I couldn't let that happen ever again.
s;Sam;Not just her either.|Everyone I love will not get hurt by bandits again.|{c:e;Sam;HalfCloseEyes}Not on my watch.

s;Anil;[Just be thankful you didn't make your way up north.]|[Because if you pulled the same thing there,]|[you'd have bandits out for vengeance against you too.]|{c:e;Anil;HalfCloseEyes}[And one of those bandits could've been me.]
s;Sam;Now, hold on!|{tgm}{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}...{tgm} So, he used to be a bandit, huh?
s;Sam;Anil, I got some stuff I wanna say.

s;Sam;First off, I'm not apologizing for anything I did back in Oregot.|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}I've got my reasons and I stand firm by what I've done.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}Secondly, I'm not gonna kill you.|You're doing your part in this army, so it'd be a waste.
s;Anil;[Keeping me alive because I'm useful? Really uplifting.]|{c:e;Anil;HalfCloseEyes}[Thanks.]
s;Sam;That's not what I meant.|You're here helping us save the world while all those other bandits are robbing and razing.
s;Anil;[Yeah, and you killing them never gives them a chance to take a different path.]

s;Sam;Look, I ain't gonna sit around thinking about "what ifs?"|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}The way I see it, if they die a low life, then that's how it's supposed to be.|If they go on and clean up their act, then that's how that's supposed to go too.

s;Sam;Life can go in many directions. Some good, some bad.|The thing is, you can't look at the other paths because a lot of the time,|you can't even take 'em anymore.|The best thing you can do is look forward and keep following the path you're on.
s;Anil;[Then, no regrets on your end?]|{c:e;Anil;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}[Not even any random, embarrassing memories?]
s;Sam;Nah.|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}Well, actually there was this one time I was giving Krista axe lessons and--
s;Sam;Gah! No, no, nuh-uh, I'm not telling you about that.|{c:e;Sam;HalfCloseEyes}Man, that was bad.
s;Anil;[So, even the mighty Prowling Tiger has his own hang-ups.]
s;Sam;Wipe that smug look off your face!|It's your fault you brought up that memory.

s;Anil;[Not sorry.]|{c:e;Anil;NormalBlink,NoSmile}[But, you know, I think I get what you're saying.]|[I met Ecco years ago and it's because of her I left my old gang.]|{c:e;Anil;CloseEyes}[I can't even begin to imagine what would've happened if we never met.]|{c:e;Anil;HalfCloseEyes}[And honestly, I don't want to know.]
s;Sam;Aw, forget it.{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink,Smile} No "what ifs," right?
s;Sam;Like I said, you're good to have around, Anil.|And for more than just your contributions to the army.|You're a good guy.
s;Anil;[You're not bad yourself, Mister Prowling Tiger.]

name: SupportSamAlex
_source: s;Alex;Oh, hello Sam. I didn't know you liked the library too.
s;Sam;Hello, Alex.|Yes, I usually come here after training to unwind|or sometimes prior to settling down for the night.

s;Sam;A legend about the warrior Kull, the Crimson Lion.|He became bewitched and killed his entire village, family, everyone|and has to go across the lands performing deeds of atonement.|In the end, he dies, saving the life of a single shepherd.
s;Alex;Did he manage to atone for his wrongs? He wasn't in his right mind.|He was under a spell, it sounds like. So it wasn't his fault.
s;Sam;I like to think he did, but the legend seems to imply that he did not.|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}It ends with the words "Beware the folly of Kull or suffer his same fate".
s;Alex;I see.|{c:e;Alex;Smile}I've been reading this one story,|"The Silver-Tongued Knight and the Silken-Haired Lady".

s;Alex;About love, promises made, some kept others broken.|{c:e;Alex;NoSmile,NormalBlink}The Silken-Haired Lady gets stolen from her home|and the Silver-Tongued Knight goes on a daring chase in pursuit of her captors.|{c:e;Alex;Smile}In the end, he rescues her, and the two share a kiss.
s;Sam;I see, interesting.|What other books do you like to read, Alex?
s;Sam;That's a lot of different books you've read, Alex. I might give some of them a try.
s;Alex;If you ever do, please let me know what you think of them.

s;Alex;Hmmm{tgm}...{tgm} fascinating.|{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink}While you can't judge a book by its cover,|you most certainly can tell a lot about a man by his bookshelf.|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}"Myths of the Journey", "The Adventures of Robin Took", "The Blade in the Boulder"{tgm}...|{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink}{tgm}Quite the selection. Sam is surprisingly a man of culture.|{c:e;Alex;CloseEyes}I wish Taylor had a varied taste like this.|All he has are combat manuals, books on weapon and armor upkeep{tgm}...|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}And all those cocktail recipe books{tgm}...
s;Sam;Huh, she sure has a lot of romance books.|Doesn't she read anything else?|Where's the legends of dashing knights and bold heroes?

s;Sam;Oh, here we go!|"Sir Lionheart and the Mouse".|{tgm}{c:e;Sam;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}...{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}{tgm} Come on! Not another romance book!|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}Hmm{tgm}...{tgm} A lot of books on tea and herbs.|Wow, did not know she was a tea connoisseur.|Oh? What's this? "The Bride of Florin"?|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}This better not be another romance book.|{tgm}{c:e;Sam;HalfCloseEyes}...{tgm} Interesting{tgm}...|...{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}{tgm} Fascinating.|{tgm}{c:e;Sam;HalfCloseEyes}...
s;Alex;Sam, what are you doing in my room?
s;Alex;Looks like you found something interesting.|{c:e;Alex;Smile}Oh, "The Bride of Florin"!|That's one of my favorites. It's really good.
s;Sam;I like the duel between the Dread Pirate Roberto and Azul. That was good.

s;Alex;I like when all Weyland says to Lily is "As you wish".|It's sweet and endearing when they kiss at the end.|That copy has a beautiful illustration at the end|of them holding hands and looking towards the sunset.|I always like seeing it.
s;Sam;Say, is that a new book for your collection?|Oh! "The Blade in the Boulder"!|That was my favorite book as a kid. It's a good read.
s;Alex;How did I walk out of Sam's room with this book?|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}This is embarrassing.;StyleNid=thought_bubble

s;Alex;Er, no.{c:e;Alex;CloseEyes} How to say this{tgm}...|{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink}{tgm}I was browsing your library, and this caught my eye.|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}I left, forgetting I had it in my hand.
s;Sam;Feel free to borrow it. Mind if I borrow this book?
s;Alex;Go ahead. And thank you, Sam.|Anyway, I need to go. I have a scheduled training session in a few minutes.|Until next time.
s;Sam;Quiet girl, but sweet. She's fun to talk to about books.|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}But, man, she needs to branch out a little.

s;Alex;Interesting man, but it's nice having another bookworm around to talk to.|I wish he had more books on romantic heroes and fair maidens, though.|Closest thing he had was about Sigurd and Brunhild.

name: SupportKristaForrest
_source: s;Forrest;Your Highness, are you awake?|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}*sigh* No, not even a bit. Of course.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}Your Highness, wake up!
s;Forrest;Yes. Then, it's time for lessons.
s;Krista;Maaaan. Do I gotta?|They're so boringgggg.
s;Forrest;Yes, you "gotta".|As future queen of Medeas, you must be knowledgeable in many aspects.|Not just combat, but also history, mathematics--

s;Krista;"And literature and theology to ensure a well-balanced mind, body, and spirit|befitting a proper ruler of Medeas."|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Man, I've lost count of how many times I've heard that spiel.
s;Forrest;I wonder why that might be.
s;Krista;Anyway, I'm too hungry to argue about it.|Let's head off to the dining hall.
s;Forrest;What was she mumbling about just now?|Could it be that nightmare?;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Forrest;Your Highness, it is time for--|Ah. Still asleep, as per usual.
s;Forrest;That nightmare again, is it{tgm}...?|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}{tgm}Your Highness, wake up!
s;Krista;Gah! I'm up! I'm up!|Oh, Forrest. It's just you.
s;Forrest;You were having that nightmare again.
s;Forrest;Your Highness, you shouldn't blame yourself for--
s;Krista;I don't wanna talk about it, okay?!
s;Krista;S-Sorry, I didn't mean to snap at you. I just{tgm}...
s;Forrest;It's fine.|But please understand, if you ever do wish to talk about it,|I am always willing to lend an ear.
s;Krista;Mm-hm{tgm}...{tgm} Was that you singing just now?
s;Forrest;I, erm, well{tgm}...{tgm} It's just{tgm}...{tgm} It pained me to see you in so much distress night after night.|So, I thought maybe singing a lullaby could help. If it was a bother, then--
s;Krista;Hey, slow down there!|{c:e;Krista;Smile}You have a nice voice, Forrest. It helped.
s;Krista;Oh, hey, I actually woke up on time for today's history lesson.|Let's head to the library--
s;Forrest;We can postpone the lesson until later today.|Or even make up for it on a different day.
s;Forrest;You should get your rest, Your Highness.|I'll even sing you to sleep, if you'd like.
s;Forrest;Yes. It has been a long time since you have been well-rested.|I won't let you waste that.
s;Krista;Well, if you say so.|{c:e;Krista;Smile,CloseEyes}Lemme just get settled back in here.
s;Forrest;♫ Nelupa seni tenu paleru naki ♫;bottom;FontType=iconvo;no_block;hold;no_sound;fit
s;Forrest;♫ Nelupa seni tenu paleru naki ♫;bottom;FontType=iconvo;no_block;hold;no_sound;fit
s;Forrest;{tgm}...{tgm} Your Highness? Are you still awake?
s;Forrest;Sweet dreams, Krista.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink,Smile}I hope you dream of me.
s;Krista;I've been thinking{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}When this is all over, I'm probably not gonna be the princess of Medeas anymore.
s;Forrest;As regrettable as it is, you are most likely correct.
s;Krista;Since we're on the same page about that, I wanna ask you something.
s;Krista;Knowing I can't go back home, would you still want to stay by my side?
s;Krista;Wh-Whoa, that was a sudden answer!|This is serious, Forrest. You gotta put some thought into it--
s;Krista;Wha--?|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}No way. I refuse to believe that.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}You wouldn't throw away everything just to be with me.
s;Krista;You have a life in Medeas, Forrest!
s;Krista;What are you talking about? You're a knight!|A knight under direct service to the royal family at that.|Even if I'm gone, you still have a duty to uphold--

s;Forrest;I was merely born into this position, Your Highness.|It was expected of me to uphold my duties to protect the royal family.|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}But as time passed, I realized what my own desires were.
s;Krista;What are you trying to say?
s;Forrest;My loyalties do not lay with Medeas, let alone the royal family.|They're solely with you, Krista.{br}Only you.
s;Forrest;I've never been more honest about anything in my life.

s;Krista;All I ever did was pile my problems onto you!|If you accepted that because you were my knight, I'd understand.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}But if what you're saying is true, then why?|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}I've treated you so horribly{tgm}...!|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm}I don't{tgm}...{tgm} *sniff*{br}I don't understand{tgm}...
s;Forrest;Krista, listen to me.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}Even if I wasn't born into knighthood, I'd still remain by your side.|You're everything to me.
s;Forrest;I don't want you to suffer alone.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}I will be there to protect you no matter the cost!
s;Krista;I{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm} Thank you.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}I don't know what to say{tgm}...
s;Forrest;There's no need for further words, Krista. Just{tgm}...|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}{tgm}Please forgive me for my boldness.
s;Forrest;I apologize. I've wanted to do that for so long...;bottom;fit
s;Krista;Heh, never thought I'd see you be so forward.|Here. Let's do that more properly.;bottom;fit

name: SupportKristaKai
_source: s;Kai;Excellent work, Your Highness.|Your swordsmanship has been improving steadily.
s;Krista;Thanks! You're pretty good yourself, as usual.
s;Kai;I believe we deserve a break after such a good spar.
s;Kai;Say, I've been curious about something.
s;Kai;Your sword skills are decent, but what about other weapons?|I heard that Medeans of the royal bloodline are trained to use weapons of all kinds.

s;Krista;Yeah, that's true, but{tgm}...|{tgm}When Chell's parents were still around, they taught me the sword and lance.|Then Forrest took over after they passed away.|And back when Sam was around, he tried to teach me stuff about axes.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}And don't even get me started on magic.|That went absolutely nowhere.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Even though none of those things stuck with me,|I was pretty decent with a bow back in the day.|Though, it's been a while since I've used one.
s;Kai;The bow? Who taught you archery?
s;Kai;Ah, the late prince of Fuegsol, was it?
s;Krista;Um, anyway! I gotta, uh, help Forrest with a thing!|Talk to you later!
s;Kai;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} So those rumors I heard{tgm}...|{tgm}Was there some truth to them after all?
s;Kai;So that's how arranged marriages work in the Medean royal family{tgm}...{tgm} Fascinating.
s;Krista;Got your nose in a book as per usual, Kai?
s;Kai;Ah, Your Highness. I'm surprised to see you here.|What brings you to the castle library?
s;Krista;Forrest says I gotta brush up on my history knowledge.|He caught me in a "no study" mood, so I'm not gonna bother.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}The least I can do is PRETEND to study.
s;Krista;But enough about what I'm supposed to be doing but not actually doing.|What are you up to?
s;Kai;Just doing research on something that caught my attention.
s;Krista;Hey, wait a sec. That's a book on the Medean royal family!|You should've come to me if you wanted some info.|Get it straight from the source!
s;Kai;The source who devotes no time to studying her own continent's history?
s;Krista;{tgm}...{tgm} Okay, fair.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Still, I can probably help with your research! Even if it's something small.
s;Kai;Well, since you're offering,|I'm curious about the arranged marriages within the royal family.

s;Krista;You got it! Lucky for you, I actually know a lot about this.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}I'm sure Yondo's other royal families got the whole arranged marriage thing too,|but Medeas has a whole system on how to choose the heir's partner.
s;Krista;You probably noticed when looking down the family tree,|but there's a cyclical pattern going on with the betrothed's home nation.
s;Kai;Yes, I did notice that. I assume this has to do with Medeas' public relations?
s;Krista;You got it!|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}My ancestors figured out this system so that one nation wouldn't be favored over the other|when it came time for a political marriage.
s;Kai;Interesting{tgm}...{tgm} So, according to this, your father married a priestess from Foliaga.
s;Krista;Yup! With Foliaga being the previous nation in the cycle,|that means Fuegsol would have been next in line.
s;Krista;S-Sorry, uh. Anything else you needed, Kai?
s;Kai;One last thing, if you don't mind.
s;Kai;Dumb question, but how much did Prince Ervan mean to you?
s;Krista;He was everything to me, Kai. I loved him more than anything.|And I know that he felt the same.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}I miss him so, so much.
s;Kai;I see.{c:e;Kai;Smile} Thanks for your time, Princess.|You've been a great help.
s;Krista;I'm glad.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}I should get going now. Talk to you later, Kai.

s;Kai;So, Ervan and Krista were close. That much was true.|But accusing her of murdering him?|Merely the common folk spreading outlandish rumors yet again.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}Disproving that does get a load off my mind, though.
s;Kai;C'mon, Princess! You almost got me that time!
s;Kai;There we go. Let's call it here.
s;Krista;Dear Medea, finally.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}You've been making these lessons tougher lately, Kai.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Have you been holding out on me or what?
s;Kai;Maybe, maybe not.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}I'll let you figure that out.
s;Krista;No straight answers from you, as always.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Hm{tgm}...
s;Kai;Of course I do.|Just bumped into you, Forrest, and Felicity one day|while you were shopping in the castle town's marketplace.
s;Krista;"Just bumped into us."|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}If you told me that months ago, I would've believed you.
s;Kai;What if I said that was actually the truth?
s;Krista;I'd say you're full of shit.
s;Krista;So, what's the deal, then?|Considering all that snooping you've been doing since you got here,|you're obviously trying to get info on something.
s;Kai;Alright, you got me.|{c:e;Kai;NoSmile}But if you knew I was trying to find something,|why didn't you do anything about it?
s;Krista;Call it a hunch, but I feel like something would've happened by now|if you had bad intentions behind all that research you were doing.
s;Kai;A bit too trusting, are we?

s;Krista;Maybe.{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile} You still haven't done anything yet, though.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes,Smile}We've known each other for almost a year now, Kai.|You've got an ample amount of info to blackmail me with now, don't you?|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}If you really wanted to, you could do just that.|Makes me wonder just what you're after.
s;Kai;Well, well. Guess I've underestimated you, Princess.|{c:e;Kai;NoSmile,CloseEyes}Hmm{tgm}...{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm} You know what? I'm feeling nice. I'll give you a hint.
s;Kai;No catch. You just gotta use that head of yours to figure it out, is all.
s;Krista;Alright, lay it on me, then.
s;Kai;With Ervan gone for so long, are you ready to move on?|Or is there something else on your mind?;bottom;fit
s;Kai;There you go. That's your hint. We'll talk later, Princess.

s;Krista;Wh-What the--?!|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Damn it, getting all close and personal{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}He did that on purpose to throw me off, I know it!|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}But bringing up Ervan like that, though. I wonder{tgm}...
s;Kai;So, Your Highness, what's your plan from here?
s;Krista;Dunno. After this is all over, I'm probably gonna get arrested for murdering Ervan.|Thrown in the dungeons or worse. No hero's welcome for me.
s;Kai;At least you're not completely ignorant of the punishment you'll receive.
s;Krista;How could I have been?|It's something that's always been in the back of my mind.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}But despite that{tgm}...

s;Krista;This is gonna sound silly, but I kept thinking "What if I never get caught?"|No one other than Forrest knew, so I thought I could still have my chance to become queen.|To be the leader my people needed.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}To make up for everything{tgm}...{tgm} for Ervan's sake{tgm}...
s;Krista;I know. I was being dumb.
s;Kai;Hey, I never said that.|I'm just baffled at how stupid I've been this whole time.|You've proved me wrong yet again, Princess.

s;Kai;I thought this love you showed to everyone had been all an act.|But it was genuine, wasn't it?|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}This army, your people, Ervan{tgm}...|{tgm}You've loved everyone and kept loving everyone despite everything.
s;Kai;Foolish? Maybe.|But I can't deny that it's what got us this far.
s;Krista;It's what Medea would have{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm} No.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}It's what a proper ruler should do.|That's what I believe, at least.
s;Kai;If only things were different, huh?
s;Kai;Hey, I've got a proposition for you.
s;Kai;Run away with me, Krista. Neither of us has a place in Yondo anymore.|Once this is all over, let's get outta here.|We can start a whole new life together. Just the two of us.
s;Krista;Pfft{tgm}...{tgm} Hahaha!|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}Kai, come on.|You were finally being completely honest with me, and now you pull this?|I thought you were better than that.
s;Kai;Krista, I'm being serious here.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}I want to be with you. I've fallen for you.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}How could I not have? After all this? After all we've been through?
s;Krista;I{tgm}...{tgm} Wow.|I'm sorry. This is just so sudden.
s;Krista;{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}Now would be a REALLY good time to pull the "just kidding".
s;Krista;Wait, so you're serious? Like, ACTUALLY serious?!
s;Krista;H-Hold on! I wasn't mentally prepared for this.
s;Kai;Is it really so hard to belie--
s;Krista;Okay, I think I'm good.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Still though{tgm}...{w}{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm} Can I confess something to you, Kai?

s;Krista;When Circ's Talons captured me, they put me under an illusion spell.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}They brought me back to a part of my past.|Before everything went wrong.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}The one off thing was{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm} You were there.

s;Krista;The fact you were there snapped me out of it.|I was brought back to the happiest moment in my life, and yet{tgm}...|{tgm}I couldn't imagine a world where I didn't meet you.|You're too important to me, y'know?

s;Kai;You flatter me too much, Princess.{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile} Still, that means a lot.|{c:e;Kai;NoSmile}My offer of running away together is still on the table, by the way.|{c:e;Kai;Smile}The way things are, sounds like a pretty good idea, right?
s;Krista;That does sound nice, but I wanna tie up some loose ends if I can.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}I'm sorry.
s;Kai;Don't even worry about it. I figured you'd say something like that anyway.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}I'm leaving Yondo as soon as this is all over, so find me, okay?|I'll be waiting for you.

name: SupportMichaelCeleste
_source: s;Celeste;Heyyy, Michael! Wanna go shopping together?|There's a bunch of cool shops nearby.
s;Michael;I don't know{tgm}...|{tgm}Last time we went shopping was at that fireworks store.|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}And I don't want us to clean up another huge mess.

s;Celeste;Don't worry! It's not gonna be like that this time.|I wanna hit up a gem store.|There's these gem pairs that mean "Best Friends Forever".|I want to take you with me and see if we can get them.
s;Michael;O-Oh, well, thank you. I guess I'll go, then.|But, uh, it's not going to be out in the open, is it?
s;Celeste;It's at an open-air market, so yeah, it is.|Are you worried about seeing a lot of people?|We can go to the smaller stores first if you aren't comfortable.
s;Michael;N-No, that's not it. I just don't--
# Original script by Blade of Light 12 #
s;Celeste;Is your armor too heavy for you?|You've never been particularly strong,|and I'd be upset if something were to happen to you.
s;MichaelArmorless;The armor is okay.|{c:e;MichaelArmorless;HalfCloseEyes}I'm{tgm}...{tgm} not having any trouble with it.
s;Celeste;I'm taller than you, older than you, and still physically stronger than you.;bottom;fit
s;Michael;P-Please put me down. The armor is fine.;bottom;fit
s;Celeste;Is that so? I'll have to carry you with it on to see if it is.|If I can, then that means you'll be fine.;bottom;fit
s;Celeste;Alright, I get it. Let me put you down.;bottom;fit
s;Celeste;But if it really is, could I wear it?
s;Celeste;I hope he's really fine in all that armor.|I wouldn't want him to strain himself.
# Original script by Blade of Light 12
s;Celeste;*sigh* What am I going to do?|{c:e;Celeste;HalfCloseEyes}I need to find my mother when this is all over, but how will I know if she'll be okay?
s;Celeste;Oh, Michael. Uh{tgm}...|{c:e;Celeste;Smile}{tgm}The beach is pretty nice, isn't it? Check out this pearl I found!
s;Michael;There's something wrong, isn't there? Please don't hide it.
s;Michael;I came here a while ago to get resources.|I heard you talking to yourself about your mother.|{c:e;Michael;HalfCloseEyes}It's weird seeing you so upset.
s;Celeste;You don't have to worry about me. I'm fine.|{c:e;Celeste;NormalBlink,Smile}Speaking of her, remember she said you'd be good at using lances?|Turns out she was right.

s;Michael;Huh, yeah.|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}My mother, on the other hand, was against it.|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink}She was always teaching me that I must be polite whenever I can.|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}Needless to say, she thought using weapons wasn't "polite".|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink,Smile}Still, that didn't stop her from letting us go to each other's houses.|Even if you were a little{tgm}...{tgm} energetic.
s;Celeste;Huh, really?|{c:e;Celeste;Smile}I remember you were often there for my axe training.|I even let you try giving it a couple of swings.
s;Michael;Mm-hm. It was fun.|{c:e;Michael;NoSmile}With that, I guess what I'm trying to say is that if there is anything bothering you,|you can tell me.|We're friends, after all.
s;Celeste;Hey, Michael, why don't we do some stone skipping?
