s;Celeste;No use in dwelling on something we can't control.|{c:e;Celeste;Smile}So, come on! Let's have some fun!
# Original script by Blade of Light 12 #
s;Celeste;Oh, hey, Michael. Looking for more resources again?
s;Michael;Yeah. What are you doing out here?
s;Celeste;I was just looking for my axe.|{c:e;Celeste;HalfCloseEyes}How do I lose something like that?
s;Michael;It's not the craziest thing you lost.|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink,Smile}Remember when I had to help you find your mom's shield that one winter?
s;Celeste;Haha, yeah. That took us the whole day.|{c:e;Celeste;CloseEyes,Smile}Never used THAT as a sled again.
s;Michael;Ha! I hope not.|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink,Smile}Anyway, let's see if we can find your axe.
s;Michael;Hey, does this place look familiar to you?
s;Celeste;You too?|Like the time we first met when I saved you from bullies?
s;Michael;Mm-hm.{c:e;Michael;HalfCloseEyes} They told me to go in, otherwise they'd said they do something to my mom.

s;Celeste;It was a good thing I showed up when I did, then.|{c:e;Celeste;CloseEyes,Smile}I came in, beat them senseless, and they ran away.|{c:e;Celeste;NoSmile,NormalBlink}You were crying, so we just started talking to calm you down.|I remember telling you about how the forest wasn't that scary,|and a bunch of other stuff.|And then we both said that our favorite color--
s;Michael;If you didn't do that, I'd be just an errand boy for them,|and I wouldn't have thought of joining the knights.|{c:e;Michael;Smile}I've got to thank you for that.
s;Celeste;You already have.|After that, I took you back to my house.|My mom wasn't sure how she felt about me going to the forest by myself.|But she was glad I rescued someone.
s;Michael;Well, can't really say I'd blame her. We were pretty dirty.|You also begged her to let me stay the next two days.
s;Celeste;Ah{tgm}...{tgm} I wish I could find her soon.
s;Michael;Hey, when this is all over,|we'll go find your mom and ask her if{tgm}...{tgm} if we could start dating.
s;Michael;Then you can actually reading the books I gave you.
s;Celeste;What do you mean?! I do read them.
s;Celeste;Oh! My axe!|Hey, how about I help you gather resources now?
# Original script by Blade of Light 12 #

name: SupportCelesteTaichi
_source: s;Celeste;That last battle was really intense, but it was nothing I couldn't handle!
s;Taichi;It's so dark{tgm}...|{c:e;Taichi;CloseEyes}{tgm}Whatever, not much different than what I'm used to. Just more trees.
s;Taichi;Woah! Be careful where you swing that!
s;Celeste;Sorry! Wasn't trying to hit you.
s;Taichi;Why are you swinging your axe like crazy in the dark?
s;Celeste;I gotta be prepared for anything. A bad guy could come and attack during the night.|{c:e;Celeste;Smile}It also allows my eyes to see better in the dark. Not just at night, but caves too!
s;Taichi;Sorry to say, but it seems to not be working that well since you nearly hit me.
s;Celeste;Well, I wasn't expecting to see you!|But besides that, it just means I need more practice!
s;Taichi;Shh! Lower your voice.|{c:e;Taichi;CloseEyes}Everyone all the way back at camp can probably hear you with how loud you're yelling.
s;Celeste;Ah! You're right!|Whoops, I yelled again!|Wait--
s;Celeste;Hey, I'm wayyy more mature than that. I'm seventeen!

s;Taichi;With how you're acting, you might as well be that young.|{c:e;Taichi;NormalBlink}Heck, I bet when you were actually twelve,|your mom caught you sneaking out at night because of how loud you got.

s;Taichi;Honestly, I was joking with that.|{c:e;Taichi;Smile}You're just like my brother Haruki. He'd do stuff like that all the time.|Actually, he still does.|{c:e;Taichi;CloseEyes,Smile}Heh, I guess fourteen isn't all that different from twelve.
s;Celeste;Hey, what's that supposed to mean?!|That's it! One week from today at high noon, we duel!|We'll see who's the immature one here.
s;Taichi;Well, it seems like I'm watching two kids now.
# Original Script by Blade of Light 12 #
s;Taichi;We arrived at the same time.
s;Celeste;Have anything to say before we throw axes?
s;Taichi;I think we should probably delay this because we forgot to get wood for the army.
s;Celeste;Oh, darn! How could I have forgotten!
s;Taichi;Have you been focused on this duel all week?
s;Celeste;Well, I{tgm}...{tgm} Yes.|I was super hyped for this and it{c:e;Celeste;HalfCloseEyes,Smile} miiiight have taken up a lot of my week?
s;Taichi;That's not good.{c:e;Taichi;NormalBlink} We should probably get wood now.
s;Celeste;So, how much have you been prepping for our duel?
s;Taichi;Not much, really. I was taking care of stuff around camp.|If anything, I was coming up with strategies.
s;Celeste;That's it? What about practicing with your axe?
s;Taichi;Didn't do much more practice than usual.
s;Celeste;Hmm{tgm}...|{c:e;Celeste;NormalBlink}{tgm}Alright, we can push the duel to a later time.
s;Taichi;Why? Weren't you looking forward to it?
s;Celeste;It doesn't seem fair.|Plus, we don't have enough time to warm up.|We still have more trees to chop down.|And after that, we have to carry the wood back to base.
s;Celeste;You're not a bad guy, Taichi.|When in a friendly battle, we gotta play fair.
s;Taichi;Alright, I think that's enough wood. Let's get back to base.|{c:e;Taichi;Smile}I'll be sure to practice up for that duel.
# Original Script by Blade of Light 12 #
s;Taichi;*Huff* I don't know. *Huff*|{c:e;Taichi;HalfCloseEyes}Let's just call it a draw for now.
s;Celeste;No way{tgm}...!{c:e;Celeste;CloseEyes}{tgm} *Huff*|{c:e;Celeste;NormalBlink}We gotta decide a winner!
s;Taichi;We can do another round later. I'm exhausted.|{c:e;Taichi;NormalBlink}Aren't you?
s;Taichi;So, where did you learn how to use an axe?

s;Celeste;My mom taught me.|She is--{c:e;Celeste;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile} Was--{c:e;Celeste;NormalBlink} Is! One of the Holy Knights of Foliaga.|{c:e;Celeste;Smile}She's pretty cool and taught me a lot of other things too.
s;Celeste;I-I don't know.|I haven't seen her since I fled from Florene Village.|{c:e;Celeste;NormalBlink}Did your mother also teach you how to use axes?
s;Taichi;Yeah. When I was five, both my parents started training me in axes.|My mom was a famous warrior back in the day.|She didn't just use axes, but swords too.
s;Celeste;Woah, that's cool! We both have cool moms!

s;Taichi;My dad was no slouch either. Like I said, he taught me axes too.|He was a gladiator with a long win streak under his belt.|He met my mom at the arena where they dueled each other.|The match ended in a draw, and they got married some time after that.

s;Celeste;Wow.{c:e;Celeste;HalfCloseEyes} I don't even know who my dad is.|{c:e;Celeste;CloseEyes}My mom said he left before I was born and that he had green hair and green eyes.|{tgm}...{c:e;Celeste;NormalBlink}{tgm} Hey, wait, you kept saying "was." Is your dad{tgm}...?

s;Taichi;Yeah.|{c:e;Taichi;NormalBlink}A few years after Haruki was born,|my dad started fighting in the arena again to bring more money back home.|Things were great.|My mom was still teaching me axes|and my dad told me and Haruki all about his victories in the arena.|{c:e;Taichi;HalfCloseEyes}Then{tgm}...{c:wait;200}{c:e;Taichi;CloseEyes} ...

s;Taichi;I remember that day when one of the militia men knocked on our door.|Mom didn't want me in the room when they were talking, but I heard everything.|{c:e;Taichi;CloseEyes}Some sore loser from the arena killed my dad.|{c:e;Taichi;CloseEyes}He was supposed to be home for my birthday the next day...
s;Taichi;After that, my mom retired and started becoming more protective of us.|I knew then I had to step up and take care of Haruki too.|But that meant that I had to train myself more and more.
s;Taichi;*sigh* Sorry, that was all a real downer, huh?
s;Celeste;Don't worry about it.|{c:e;Celeste;Smile}It's nice that you at least have some good memories of your dad.
s;Taichi;Yeah{tgm}...|{c:e;Taichi;NormalBlink,NoSmile}{tgm}How about your dad? Do you ever wonder about him?
s;Celeste;Sometimes.{c:e;Celeste;CloseEyes} Maybe more now because I'm worried about my mom.|{c:e;Celeste;NormalBlink}I never knew him, but if he left Mom,|then I don't think he's a good person.
s;Celeste;Aw, don't give me that look. I'll be fine.|Like I said, I never knew the guy.|{c:e;Celeste;NoSmile}If I ever met him, I wouldn't care. He'd be just some stranger.
s;Taichi;I guess you have a point.
s;Celeste;But hey, your parents are pretty cool.|Got any more stories about them?
s;Taichi;Well, there was that time when I was two and tried lifting my mom's axe.|My dad was laughing so hard and{tgm}...
# Original script by Blade of Light 12 #
s;Taichi;Nice shot. Better than the previous one.
s;Celeste;This time I had a target.
s;Taichi;Yeah, one that you could actually see.
s;Celeste;Hmph! I hit it on the mark!|{c:e;Celeste;NormalBlink}That's the important thing.
s;Taichi;How many hits can you get?
s;Taichi;Then let's test it. Five throws for each of us.
s;Celeste;Told ya I'd get more than you!
s;Taichi;You got ONE more than me.{c:e;Taichi;NormalBlink,Smile} We're closer than you think.
s;Celeste;Then we'll make a great team against the forces of evil!
s;Taichi;How about another duel?|If I win, we go on a date. If you win--
s;Celeste;Then you join me in the great mission to fight crime and the forces of evil!
s;Celeste;It would be only fair, wouldn't it? Race ya there!
s;Taichi;If we race there, we'll be too tired for the actual duel.
# Original script by Blade of Light 12 #

name: SupportKristaTrevor
_source: s;Krista;Trevor! Just the man I wanted to see.
s;Trevor;Is there something I could assist you with, Your Highness?
s;Krista;Yup! I got a huge favor to ask.|It's something that's been on my mind for literal years.
s;Krista;Could you teach me how to do magic?
s;Trevor;I{tgm}...{tgm} suppose? It is not that simple, however.|Do you have any innate magical potential to begin with?
s;Krista;See, that's the thing. My mother was a priestess from Foliaga.|So you'd think that would mean I could do magic myself.
s;Trevor;I am assuming that is not the case?
s;Krista;Not even close!|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}I can handle enchanted swords just fine, but that's as far as I can go.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}But{tgm}...
s;Krista;I wanna test a theory. I'm thinking maybe I'm just a late bloomer.|And here's where you come in with this little experiment.
s;Trevor;I will guide you through the basics of magic and see if something happens?
s;Trevor;I don't see why not. This could prove to be an enlightening experience.
s;Krista;Great! Just lemme know when you're free then we can get this rolling.
s;Trevor;I believe so. I was thinking we should start with a simple fire spell.|Fire is the easiest element to control as well as the easiest to monitor.
s;Krista;Got it! So, just gotta read from a tome and do the thing?

s;Trevor;Oh, if only it were that simple.|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Remember what I said about innate magic ability?|That applies here.|A tome does nothing if there is no energy to work with.|Think of tomes as amplifiers of one's inner magic.

s;Krista;Ah, nothing.|It's just that you reminded me of something an old friend of mine told me a long time ago.|She said something similar to that when explaining magic to me,|if not that exact thing word for word.
s;Trevor;Oh{tgm}...?{tgm} Who was this friend of yours?

s;Krista;House Valoria's daughter.|She was the one who was supposed to teach me magic in the first place.|Y'know, if magic was actually passed down to me.|It's their duty to teach the Medean royal family's heir magic stuff.
s;Krista;I hope she's doing well. It's been so long since I last saw her.
s;Trevor;I{tgm}...{tgm} I'm sure she is, Your Highness.
s;Krista;You doing okay, Trevor? You got quiet all of a sudden.
s;Trevor;Worry not. I am quite alright, Your Highness.|Although, I would like to ask something about House Valoria's heir.|If you do not mind, of course.
s;Trevor;At the time when she did try tutoring you in magic, what was she like?|What did you think of her?
s;Krista;What, got a crush on her or something?
s;Trevor;Your Highness, please! I feel nothing of the sort!

s;Krista;Haha! Sorry, just wanted to tease ya.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}But really, I liked her a lot. She was my best friend.|I didn't really have a lot of friends my age growing up.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes,Smile}Besides Prince Ervan and his brother, I mean.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,NoSmile}When everyone noticed that magic wasn't a thing for me,|House Valoria stopped sending their daughter to the castle.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}When Mother and Father told me she wouldn't be coming anymore, I couldn't stop crying.
s;Krista;It's okay. I got over it eventually.
s;Trevor;Do you still think of her?
s;Krista;Yeah, I do.|Sometimes I wonder how much things would be different if magic came naturally to me.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}She'd probably be at my side along with Forrest and everyone else.
s;Trevor;Ah, no. At any rate, shall we continue with the lesson?
s;Trevor;Yes. Here is how we shall do this{tgm}...
s;Trevor;Perhaps we should try something else?|Like you said, you may just need some time. Let us try again tomorrow--
s;Krista;Trevor, it's okay. I think we should stop here.
s;Krista;I probably wasn't born with magical abilities, so I don't think this is gonna go anywhere.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}Thanks for trying this with me, though, Trevor.
s;Krista;H-Hey, no need to look so down! It's not a big deal--
s;Trevor;Your Highness{tgm}...{c:e;Trevor;CloseEyes}{tgm} No. Krista.|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}I apologize. I have failed you years ago, and I have failed you now.
s;Krista;Huh? What are you talking about?
s;Trevor;All my life, I could not meet anyone's expectations.|My family turned its back on me. My duty as the Valoria scion was unfulfilled.|Then fate chose to bring me back to you.
s;Krista;Whoa, whoa, whoa! Slow down there!|Trevor, you can't be suggesting{tgm}...{tgm} Th-There's no way{tgm}...
s;Krista;All this time, YOU were House Valoria's daughter?!

s;Trevor;I stripped myself of that identity the moment I left home six months ago.|I thought I was done with the past. And yet, it has come back to haunt me.|For a moment, I had the hope things would turn out differently.|That I could redeem myself of at least one failure.|{c:e;Trevor;CloseEyes}I was wrong. So, so wrong.

s;Trevor;I am a fool to think anything in my life would turn out right for me!|Does Medea just want me to suffer?|To torment me with reminders of my shortcomings?|This cursed past of mine{tgm}...{tgm} why can I not leave it all behind{tgm}...?|{c:e;Trevor;CloseEyes}{tgm}It is all so agonizing! Oh, Medea, what have I done to deserve this?!
s;Krista;Are you even hearing yourself? Saying all those things{tgm}...|{tgm}That's not the Trevor I know!

s;Krista;No "buts"!|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Trevor, listen to me. You didn't fail me in the slightest.|Like I said before, I missed you and kept thinking about you.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}And here you are! You're back!|It's all I could have ever wanted.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}The only thing I wish was that I knew it was you sooner.
s;Trevor;Krista{tgm}...{tgm} I{tgm}...{tgm} I am so sorry{tgm}...

s;Krista;You don't have to apologize for anything.|It isn't your fault things didn't turn out the way people expected.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}It's nobody's fault. Sometimes life is unfair like that.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Despite all that, you chose to shape your own future.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}And I think that's amazing, Trevor. You're not a failure.|You never were.

s;Trevor;Even after all this time, you choose to be kind to me.|I do not deserve this. And yet{tgm}...{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}{tgm} I thank you.|{c:e;Trevor;Smile}If you believe in me, perhaps I can start believing in myself too.
s;Trevor;Your Highness--I mean, Krista.|{c:e;Trevor;HalfCloseEyes}I{tgm}...{tgm} I mean{tgm}...{tgm} Erm{tgm}...

s;Krista;You don't gotta be formal around me if you don't want to, Trev.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}Now that I know who you are, I think it would be nice if we could talk to each other|like we did when we were kids, y'know?
s;Trevor;Ah, yes. Of course. You have a point.
s;Krista;So go ahead and loosen up already!|You look like you're gonna collapse at any moment.
s;Trevor;Sorry, I just{tgm}...{tgm} Krista, there's something I need to say.|Something super important!

s;Trevor;Krista, I gotta be honest with you.|I{tgm}...{tgm} I've loved you for as long as I can remember.|When my family introduced me to you, I fell in love at first sight.|You were just so pretty and when I actually got to know you,|I couldn't help but fall for you more.
s;Krista;H-Huh? Trevor, this is really sudden!|What brought this on?

s;Trevor;I did a lot of thinking, and I knew I had to tell you at some point.|{c:e;Trevor;HalfCloseEyes}I knew I couldn't back then. Nothing would've ever happened between us.|You were to be engaged to a Fuegan noble. That's how things were supposed to go.|{c:e;Trevor;CloseEyes}And even then, I was a girl. You had to produce an heir down the line.
s;Trevor;Even now, I think that what I'm about to do is stupid.|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}But I have to try! If I don't, I'll never live it down.

s;Trevor;Krista, I{tgm}...{tgm} I can't see myself as a failure any longer.|This is the final thing I have failed to do: tell you how I truly felt about you.|{c:e;Trevor;CloseEyes}Accepting me, rejecting me{tgm}...{tgm} It doesn't matter to me anymore!|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}Even being by your side merely as your retainer will be enough, if it comes to that.
s;Krista;That is no way to do a proper marriage proposal.|Don't set yourself up for a rejection like that!|{c:e;Krista;Smile}Keep your head high and propose to me like you really mean it, lover boy!

s;Trevor;Ahem!|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}Krista, I've loved you for the longest time.|I've forged my own path in this life,|and I'd be overjoyed if you chose to walk this path alongside me.|So then{tgm}...{tgm} will you marry me, Krista?
s;Krista;Now THAT'S what I call a proposal.

name: SupportKristaJoshua
_source: s;Joshua;Krista! I got a proposition for ya!
s;Joshua;Y'see, I've been observing your sword techniques,|and I think I can help you get even better at handling swords.
s;Krista;Oh? What did you have in mind?
s;Joshua;So, your defenses and speed are good. Nothing wrong there.|What you DO need more of is raw strength.
s;Krista;And a big, strong, buff man like you is gonna get me all big, strong, and buff?
s;Joshua;You get it! How about we get the ball rolling now?
s;Krista;I'm down! So, what sort of training do I gotta do?
s;Joshua;No, no, no. We can't train 'til we get more muscle on ya.|{c:e;Joshua;Smile}And to do that, we gotta get some food in you to fuel them!
s;Joshua;To the dining hall, Krista! Let's go, let's go!!
s;Krista;Wait! I just had lunch!!|I can't eat anymore! WAIT!!!
s;Joshua;So, how do you feel? Feel the burn?
s;Joshua;Great! That just means you're making progress.
s;Krista;Joshua, I won't doubt your methods, but I feel like I'm literally gonna explode.|Or collapse.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Or both.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}No, yeah, definitely both.
s;Joshua;No problem. We can take a break and pick things up tomorrow--
s;Krista;Could you hold that thought?|Collapsing and exploding incoming.
s;Joshua;Yeesh, that ain't good.|Uh, let's pick things up in a few days instead?
s;Invisible;Sure. As long as you can carry me to my room.|Please?
s;Joshua;So, Krista, how do you feel about your progress so far?
s;Krista;Pretty good, actually!|You see these biceps? BAM!|And these shoulders? POW!|And this ass? OH YEAH!
s;Joshua;We never specifically worked on your ass.
s;Krista;I know. I just wanted to point it out.
s;Joshua;Seriously though, I have been seeing a lot of improvement.|{c:e;Joshua;Smile}Keep this up, and you'll be covered in muscles!
s;Joshua;And maybe you'll be able to use Old Iron one day.
s;Krista;You think so? Mind if I give it a try now?
s;Joshua;Now?{w}{c:e;Joshua;CloseEyes,Smile} Oh, sure, why not.|{c:e;Joshua;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Here, I'll lay it on the ground like this.
s;Joshua;Can't say I didn't expect that.|{c:e;Joshua;NormalBlink,Smile}Good try, though!
s;Krista;Man, you can do that so easily. I wanna do that one day.
s;Joshua;Keep bulking up and training hard, then.|It'll take time, but who knows? Maybe you will be able to pick up Old Iron.
s;Krista;Yeah! Anyway, thanks for letting me try out Old Iron.|I'll see you around!
s;Joshua;She does have a nice ass, though.{c:e;Joshua;CloseEyes} Maybe{tgm}...|{c:e;Joshua;NormalBlink}{tgm}Nah, she'd never. She's the princess of Medeas for crying out loud!

name: SupportKristaRembrandt
_source: s;Rembrandt;You may come over, Your Highness.|I just finished.
s;Krista;Sorry about that.|I didn't realize you were performing the Fading Smoke ritual.
s;Krista;Who were you paying respects to, if you don't mind me asking?
s;Rembrandt;If you would like, you may pay your respects to Prince Ervan as well.
s;Krista;I'm not sure if I{tgm}...{tgm} I mean, I just{tgm}...
s;Rembrandt;{tgm}...{tgm} Do you know the significance of this particular ritual, Your Highness?

s;Rembrandt;Each aspect of the Fading Smoke ritual represents an individual's life and death.|The bonfire itself is one's life, burning with warmth.|And the smoke that rises reflects how fleeting life is.|It rises into the air and dissipates as if it were never there.

s;Rembrandt;Though, there are signs that it had existed. Like the scent of wood smoke, for instance.|The bonfire itself also remains until it burns out.|Much like those who left us, there are still traces of them left behind.
s;Rembrandt;Even so, everything has to end eventually.|Like the bonfire, it must die out.|Eventually, you must let go.
s;Rembrandt;I will not tell you how to mourn over Prince Ervan's death, Your Highness.|However, you must remember you cannot hang onto him forever.

name: SupportYukinoMasashi
_source: s;Masashi;Greetings, I couldn't help but notice your beautiful long blue hair.|What conditioner do you use?
s;Yukino;What do I say to have him leave me alone?;;;thought_bubble
s;Yukino;First of all, that's none of your business--
s;Masashi;Oh, sorry, but where'd you learn to use a sword? I noticed it's covered?
s;Yukino;The clothes didn't give it away?
s;Masashi;N-No? It's just that I'd thought you'd be using a bow?
s;Masashi;Oh shoot, sorry. I didn't mean that.
s;Yukino;Is that so? What were you doing in that house?
s;Masashi;I-I needed to t-talk to someone.
s;Yukino;He's interesting{tgm}...|{tgm}I hope he's not as bad as he presents himself.
# Original script by Blade of Light 12 #
s;Masashi;It's taking a while to look archery resources.
s;Masashi;How have you been on this wondrous day?
s;Masashi;The water is as cool as your eyes.
s;Yukino;Do you know how to do anything else?
s;Masashi;I was looking for a spot to do archery practice.
s;Masashi;Look, I'm sorry.|I-I was gathering wood to be exact. Maybe some more hay too.
s;Yukino;Seriously, why are you like this!?
s;Yukino;Other than archery, can't you do anything other than annoy women?
s;Masashi;Wh-Wha--? I-I just{tgm}...!|{tgm}E-Emi, I didn't mean to--!
s;Yukino;What the hell is up with you?!|You have some other girl on your mind now too?!
s;Masashi;No, I'm sorry. I-I haven't s-seen her in over--
s;Yukino;Really. Then think, why haven't seen her?
s;Masashi;S-Sorry about this, and sorry for mistaking you for h-her.;bottom;fit
s;Yukino;(His face, it might just be the cold but he was looking like this earlier.)|(Sadness and fear, feelings and faces I know all too well.);bottom;fit
s;Yukino;Let's get out before we freeze.;bottom;fit
s;Yukino;I'm going to need some answers now that |I know he's not as bad as he presents himself.
s;Yukino;Certainly better than how HE was.
# Original script by Blade of Light 12 and PKLucky #

name: SupportKristaSemi
_source: s;Krista;Hey, Semi! How're you doing today?
s;Krista;So, uh, wanna hang out or something?
s;Krista;We could sit around in the courtyard.|Or maybe have some quiet time in the library?
s;Krista;Or! We could eat at the dining hall!|I heard the cooks got some really good mutton today!
s;Semi;Can't you go bother someone else?!
s;Krista;And the boy speaks! It's a miracle!|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}My offers still stand, by the way.
s;Semi;I'll use small words so you can understand.{w}{c:e;Semi;NormalBlink} No.
s;Krista;Technically, that was only one small word.
s;Semi;For the love of{tgm}...|{c:e;Semi;NormalBlink}{tgm}Why the hell do you want to spend time with me so badly?
s;Krista;Well, since we're working together and all,|I figured we could try to be friends?|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Since--let's be real--you've been hostile to me ever since we met.
s;Krista;Look, I just wanna know why.|I haven't done anything to you.
s;Semi;It doesn't matter if you did anything or not.|Just leave me alone.
s;Semi;How many times have I told you to leave me alone?
s;Krista;I can probably count how many on both hands.
s;Semi;The correct answer is too many.
s;Krista;And yet nothing has changed.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Semi, my friend-not-friend, we have reached a standstill.
s;Semi;Ugh{tgm}...{c:e;Semi;NormalBlink}{tgm} Look, if I tell you why I don't like you, will you leave me alone?
s;Krista;Can't guarantee it, but I might if the reason sounds valid.
s;Semi;Alright. Don't expect me to pull any punches here.
s;Krista;Not like you ever did with me in the first place.|Go for it. I can take it.

s;Semi;Don't say I didn't warn you.|{c:e;Semi;NormalBlink}So, I lived with my mother for most of my life here in Medeas.|We lived out in the countryside.|She was a weaver and sold the tapestries she made to keep us fed.
s;Semi;He left us before I was even born. My mother never talked about him beyond that.|{c:e;Semi;CloseEyes}My mother{tgm}...{tgm} She was all I had.

s;Semi;You heard me.|Thrown in the dungeons just because one of her tapestries depicted Medea wrong.|I know his body looked a little off,|but that shouldn't be something someone should be arrested for!

s;Semi;It doesn't matter now.|{c:e;Semi;NormalBlink}Your family took my mother away from me for such a stupid reason!|I can never forgive any of you for this.|{c:e;Semi;CloseEyes}She was all I had and now she's gone.
s;Semi;And that's it. Everything I loved was stripped from me.|And it's all your family's fault.|{c:e;Semi;HalfCloseEyes}There. Happy?
s;Krista;Semi! {tgm}{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}I'd better check out the dungeons.
s;Krista;About your mother, I talked things over with the dungeon guards.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}Long story short, your mother's a free woman.

s;Krista;Yup. They let her go.|I told them what you told me, and they let her go free.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}Unfortunately and unsurprisingly, your mother was in bad shape,|so I'm having our clerics look after her 'til she gets better.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}Once she's back on her feet, we're sending her back home.
s;Krista;Yeah, of course!|She shouldn't have been arrested in the first place.
s;Semi;Why bother going through all that trouble, though?|You did this for a complete stranger.|A complete stranger who allegedly was a criminal, no less.
s;Krista;It was the right thing to do.|And I can understand what you went through.|It's hard losing someone you love too soon.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}I know the feeling too well.

s;Krista;Unlike me, you have an opportunity to see her again.|I wouldn't want to take that away from you.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}I know this won't make up for the years she was gone,|but now you'll have something to go back to once this is all over.
s;Krista;Anyway, that's all I wanted to talk to you about.|See ya later.
s;Krista;No big deal. That's what friends are for.

name: SupportKristaTaylor
_source: s;Taylor;Your Highness! How goes the training today?
s;Krista;Just finished up. And I'm guessing you're done with doing drills?
s;Taylor;Sure am!|I was gonna head out to the tavern with the guys,|and I was wondering if you wanted to join us.
s;Krista;I'm down! I've never been to the tavern before, so this should be fun.
s;Taylor;Yo, Jimmy, a couple beers for me and Her Highness!
s;Man3;Comin' right up, Taylor--Huh, the princess is with ya?|{c:e;Man1;Smile}Why didn't ya say so? Drinks are on the house today!
s;Man3;I insist, Your Highness. Please enjoy yourself!
s;Taylor;"Please"? Wow, that's a first, Jim.
s;Man3;Shut it, Taylor.{c:e;Man1;NormalBlink} You want the beers or not?
s;Taylor;Yeah, yeah, just get to pouring 'em out already.
s;Man3;Alright, you two, beers for the both of ya.
s;Taylor;Ha! It's an acquired taste, I can admit that.|Give it a couple more gulps and see how you feel.
s;Taylor;So, Your Highness, what d'ya think?
s;Taylor;Man, she didn't even get through half of her pint and she's already like this.;;;thought_bubble
s;Taylor;Yo, Jimmy! Let the guys know I'm heading out early.|Gotta take the princess home.
s;Man3;You got it, Taylor. See y'all next time!
s;Taylor;Hey, Your Highness!|Me and the guys are gonna head to the tavern again.|Wanna come with?
s;Krista;Sure!|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}I just gotta watch how much I'm drinking this time. Haha{tgm}...
s;Taylor;I'll keep an eye on ya. Don't worry.
s;Taylor;So, Your Highness, how're you enjoying yourself?

s;Taylor;Oh, Medea, this was probably a bad idea. How much did she have this time?|{c:e;Taylor;HalfCloseEyes}Doesn't matter now, I guess.|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes}Okay, Taylor, calm down.{c:e;Taylor;HalfCloseEyes} Just gotta defuse the situation before--;;;thought_bubble
s;Krista;Y'know, we're both free tonight, so how's about we go back to yer room an'--
s;Taylor;Y-Your Highness, keep your shirt on!|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes}Alright, I really didn't want to do this, but desperate times call for desperate measures.
s;Taylor;Hey General Forrest can you please take care of the princess for me thanks bye!!
s;Forrest;Krista, you were out drinking with Taylor, correct?|Just how much did you have?
s;Forrest;I--{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}That does not answer the question.|{c:e;Forrest;HalfCloseEyes}On second thought, perhaps it does.
s;Krista;Hmm{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}{tgm} Y'know, yer hands would be good fer squeezin' my--
s;Forrest;Let's get you to bed, Your Highness.
s;Taylor;Man, what's with all these empty bottles outside Krista's room?|Hope she's doing alright.
s;Taylor;That's not good.{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink} At least the door's unlocked.;;;thought_bubble
s;Taylor;Your Highness? Hey, are you okay?
s;Krista;Taylor{tgm}...?|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm}Aw, Medea, can we talk later? I ain't feelin' too great.
s;Taylor;I can see that.{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink} And that's the exact reason why we gotta talk.
s;Taylor;Nope, not hearing it.{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink} You need an intervention.|Look at all this! Just how much have you been drinking lately, Krista?
s;Krista;I dunno? It's just a little bit{tgm}...?
s;Taylor;Drinking's fine every once in a while, but this is WAY too much.|I'm surprised you're still able to hold a conversation after all this.
s;Taylor;Here, let's get this cleaned up. Then we can talk, alright?
s;Taylor;I'm gonna try to make this quick, then you can rest up.|That okay with you, Your Highness?
s;Taylor;I know you had fun at the tavern, but then drinking beyond that?|That could lead to too much of a good thing, y'know?
s;Taylor;Sometimes we need to take the load off,|but we can't just drop everything and forget all our responsibilities.
s;Taylor;Yeah, I think I'm starting to get it now.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink}Krista? It's been a pretty rough year, I know.
s;Taylor;I can't even begin to imagine what you've been going through.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink}But drinking away your problems isn't the answer.
s;Krista;Taylor, I{tgm}...{tgm} I really miss him.
s;Krista;If things were different, I wouldn't have{tgm}...
s;Taylor;It's alright, Krista. There, there.|Just promise me you'll ease up on the drinking, okay?|And if you need to talk about Ervan, you can always come to me.

name: SupportTaylorAlex
_source: s;Alex;Ah, there you are, Taylor.|Training again, I see.
s;Alex;Yes, actually.|I have something I wish to discuss with you.
s;Alex;It seems all you do is train.|Don't you have anything else you do during your free time?
s;Taylor;Uh, I go to the tavern?
s;Taylor;Speaking of which, wanna grab a drink after I'm done with training for the day?|My treat!
s;Alex;No. I do not want a repeat of last time.
s;Taylor;Oh, come on!|I'll limit myself to three mugs of ale this time!
s;Alex;Taylor--{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink}Never mind.|We're getting off topic.|You may be physically strong, but you need to be mentally strong too.|That's why I'll lend you this.

s;Alex;Yes. Luckily for you, I picked something I think you'll enjoy: "The Trials of Sir Aaron".|{c:e;Alex;Smile}The battle scenes are quite exhilarating, and the main character is a noble, brave warrior.|Much like you, in a way.

s;Taylor;Heh. Flattery will get you nowhere, Alex.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Still, I'll give this whole "reading" thing a go.|You obviously put a lot of thought into this.|I'd hate to disappoint my best friend.
s;Alex;Thank you, Taylor.|Let me know what you think of it when you're done.
s;Taylor;Hey, Alex, about that book you lent me{tgm}...
s;Alex;Oh, you finished it?|What did you think?
s;Taylor;I'm gonna be blunt here: Terrible.
s;Alex;Really? Why do you say that?

s;Taylor;You know that part when Aaron was going one-on-one against that general?|That was the worst display of swordsmanship I've ever seen!|{tgm}{c:e;Taylor;HalfCloseEyes}...{tgm} Read.{br}Whatever.
s;Alex;I thought it was a heart-racing moment.|His sword pierced right through his armor, and he took him down in one blow!
s;Taylor;Yeah, but piercing through PLATE? That stuff's thick!|There's no way Aaron's blade could've done that.|And stuff like that keeps happening over and over through the entire book!
s;Alex;There's this thing called "suspension of disbelief", you know.
s;Taylor;Well, my disbelief is far from suspended.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink}Anyway, here.|You can have your book back.
s;Alex;Thank you.|{c:e;Alex;CloseEyes}*sigh* I suppose I will have to re-think my approach{tgm}...
s;Taylor;I don't get what the big deal is.|Why would I read about fighting when I do it all the time?|Hm? Looks like she forgot one of her books.
s;Taylor;Let's see{tgm}...{tgm} "Tryst by Moonlight".|Wonder what this is about?
s;Alex;Taylor, I seem to have misplaced one of my books.|It's called "Tryst by Moonlight". Have you seen it?
s;Taylor;Oh, yeah! You dropped it the other day.|Here you go.
s;Alex;What a relief! I thought I would never find it again.|Thank you, Taylor. This is one of my favorites.
s;Taylor;I can see why. It's pretty good!
s;Alex;Is that so? What did you think of it?

s;Taylor;The relationship between Percy and Lana is sweet, if a little tragic.|All that hardship, just for Percy to die at the end{tgm}...|{c:e;Taylor;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}Poor Lana. Gotta admit, I teared up.
s;Alex;Huh. Well, I'm glad you enjoyed it.|I would have never thought you'd be a romantic, Taylor.
s;Taylor;Me neither!|So, you got more stuff like that?
s;Alex;I do. Would you like something bittersweet again or something more lighthearted?
s;Taylor;Something lighthearted this time.|I don't feel like crying over a book again. Maybe some other time.
s;Alex;Haha! I'll see what I have, then.
s;Taylor;Oh, Alex. Here's "Passing Ships in the Night" back.
s;Alex;Ah, thank you, Taylor.|Did you like it?
s;Taylor;Yeah, not bad. Thanks for all the book recommendations, by the way.|I've been liking all of them!
s;Taylor;Speaking of which,|I stopped by the marketplace and got you something.
s;Alex;A book for me?|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}Hm{tgm}...{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink}{tgm} It has no title.
s;Taylor;I know. You gotta open it up.
s;Alex;Wait, it's a fake book?|W-With a ring inside?|Taylor, are you{tgm}...?

s;Taylor;"I bestow upon thee this ring unto thine finger."|"Like the blade clasped in my right hand and the shield in my left,"|"may this ring be a symbol of my undying oath to protect and serve you, my beloved."
s;Alex;You memorized Percy's proposal to Lana?|Just for me?
s;Taylor;Yeah. That's not too lame, is it?
s;Alex;No, not at all. It's really sweet, actually.
s;Taylor;So, what do you say, Alex?|Will you marry me?
s;Alex;Yes, of course, Taylor!|I wouldn't have it any other way.

name: SupportTaylorNagisa
_source: s;Taylor;Hey! You're Lady Tsubaki's retainer. Nagisa, right?
s;Taylor;Taylor, co-captain of the Medean royal army. Glad to meet ya!
s;Taylor;Yeesh, Her Highness was right. You're a prickly one.
s;Nagisa;Can you leave me alone? I'm busy training.

s;Taylor;I can see that! And that brings me to why I'm here.|{c:e;Taylor;NoSmile}With you being one of the newbies, I think it's a good idea to get to know each other.|Since we're working together and all.

s;Taylor;Aw, don't be like that. It'll be fun!|{c:e;Taylor;Smile,CloseEyes}The way I see it, there's two good ways to get to know a person.|{c:e;Taylor;Smile,NormalBlink}One: see them fight. Two: see 'em at the tavern.|And I've seen you fight plenty already.
s;Taylor;Oh, no, no, no. I gotta see both sides of the coin!|{c:e;Taylor;Smile}Two different situations, two different sides. Get it?
s;Nagisa;I'm not going to the tavern with you.
s;Taylor;Trust me. This'll be the perfect bonding experience.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink,Smile}Besides, you're just about done training, aren't you?|You'll want a refreshing drink after working so hard.
s;Nagisa;{tgm}...{c:e;Nagisa;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm} I suppose I'm not against it.
s;Taylor;There we go! We can get going as soon as you're ready.
s;Nagisa;An' I just don' *hic!* understand, Taylor!|Why'd they jus' *hic!* up an' leave like that, huhhhh?
s;Taylor;That's{tgm}...{tgm} a real rough story, Nagisa.
s;Taylor;Yeesh, how drunk is she? She barely had a sip and she's already like this.;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Nagisa;An' now I gotta take care of Tsu-Tsu all by m'self{tgm}...
s;Nagisa;Yeah! *hic* Who else would it be?
s;Taylor;Yeah, that sounds like a lot{tgm}...|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink}{tgm}Speaking of a lot, you definitely had more than your fill of drinks.|Let's head back.
s;Taylor;Wha--{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes}Actually, that's probably not a bad idea.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink}Alright, up and at 'em. Time to go, Nagisa.
s;Taylor;Yo! Nagisa! Hard at work again, huh?
s;Nagisa;Far from it.|{c:e;Nagisa;NormalBlink}I was thinking about our time at the tavern.|I remember some of what happened, but could you fill in some blanks?
s;Nagisa;First off, did I mention anything about Lady Tsubaki?
s;Nagisa;Not. A word. About that. To. ANYONE. Understand?
s;Taylor;You also had me carry you--
s;Taylor;Hey, you're the one who asked for it!|{c:e;Taylor;Smile}Don't worry, I was all gentlemanly about it.
s;Taylor;You also said stuff about Kai and{tgm}...{tgm} Kenji, I think? I dunno.|{c:e;Taylor;HalfCloseEyes}Honestly, you were slurring your words a lot, so it was hard to understand most of it.
s;Nagisa;Forget everything I said about those two.
s;Taylor;Now, hold on there. I did get some of what you said.|It sounded like you really missed having those two around back in Edoyama, right?
s;Taylor;At least Kai's here! Maybe you can talk things out--
s;Nagisa;As if I'd talk to a womanizing traitor like him!
s;Taylor;Huh. Wonder what she meant by that.

name: SupportTaylorMichael
_source: s;Taylor;Why don't you show me what you can do? Come at me!
s;Taylor;For your age, you're not bad.|You have good control over your lance.|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes}Your attacks are a little slow though.
s;Taylor;I'm not criticizing you, kid. Just making observations.|{e;Taylor;Smile}On the flip side, your defenses are excellent.|For most people, it would be hard to get any meaningful attacks on you.
s;Michael;Thank you, Sir Taylor!|{c:e;Michael;NoSmile}Er, Sir Taylor?
s;Taylor;What is it, kid?|And don't call me "sir" all the time. Just Taylor is fine.
s;Michael;{tgm}...{tgm} Taylor.|Why did you become a knight?
s;Taylor;Because I get to ride a fu--

s;Taylor;{tgm}...{tgm} A *fast* horse.|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,Smile}I dash around the battlefield and look damn sexy while doing it.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink,Smile}Also, I can get myself a couple shots of whiskey every night.|Speaking of which, let's go relax at the tavern!

s;Michael;Going to the tavern doesn't seem very knightly.|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink}I guess if Sir Taylor does it, it's okay.|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}Still, I don't know about this.{c:e;Michael;HalfCloseEyes} What would mom say?
s;Taylor;Come on, put your backs into it! Let's go, let's go!
s;Taylor;At ease, soldier.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink,Smile}Now, who's up for a round of drinks!?
s;Taylor;Haha, great to hear!|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink,Smile}You guys go on ahead. I'll catch up in a bit.
s;Michael;You lead your men amazingly, Sir T--{c:e;Michael;NoSmile}Uh, Taylor.|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}But{tgm}...

s;Michael;Oh, not at all!|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}It's just that with how you are in the training yard compared to how you are at the tavern{tgm}...|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink}{tgm}It's like seeing night and day.

s;Taylor;What do you expect? I can't have a stick up my a--{tgm}{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,NoSmile}...{tgm} My *side* all day.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink}And I can't be a lolly-gagger all the time either.|You gotta strike a balance with these things, Michael.
s;Michael;Er, n-nothing!|{c:e;Michael;Smile}Anyway, thanks again for letting me observe, Taylor.
s;Taylor;No problem.|Now, come on, Michael! The tavern awaits!
s;Taylor;Of course you are! Let's go!
s;Taylor;Here's to another great training session, boys!|Bottoms up!
s;Michael;I don't think I'll ever get used to this{tgm}...
s;Taylor;Michael, my friend, I think it's about time we get you the strong stuff.
s;Taylor;This is your first step to manhood!|Finish up that mug of water then we'll get you a pint of the good stuff.
s;Michael;I-I don't think that's a good idea--
s;Taylor;Hey, get some ale in my friend's mug here!
s;Taylor;You've been workin' so damn hard all this time, Mikey!|It's time you let loose!
s;Michael;How did you get this drunk that fast?
s;Woman3;One mug-full of ale coming up!

s;Michael;Oh. Okay.|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}Hm{tgm}...{c:e;Michael;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm} Maybe just a sip wouldn't hurt.|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink}As long as I keep track of how much I'm drinking, I should be fine.
s;Taylor;♫ Fill up my tankard with a pint of fresh ale~ ♫
s;Michael;♫ An' 'til th' mornin' comes, never mind what entails~ ♫
s;Taylor;♫ For when that hard whisky be sloshin' in mine cup~ ♫
s;Michael;♫ Both th' beer and the bitters will raise my soul up~! ♫
s;SoldierYellow1;Andddd they're down.|Let's take 'em home, Greg.
s;SoldierYellow2;No need to tell me twice.

name: SupportKristaAqua
_source: s;Krista;Oh, great Medea, may your golden scales carry the weight of these sins--
s;Aqua;I'm sorry, did I interrupt your prayer?|If so, I deeply apologize.
s;Krista;No worries. I was just{tgm}...{tgm} doing a daily prayer.|Nothing incredibly sacred or anything.
s;Aqua;Nonsense! Any communication with your god should be treated with respect.|Please, finish your prayer in peace. We can talk later.
s;Krista;Alright. Thanks, Aqua.|But really, you don't have anything to apologize for.

s;Aqua;I still feel bad about it.|{c:e;Aqua;CloseEyes}Hm{tgm}...|{c:e;Aqua;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm}Oh, I have an idea! Why don't we pray together from now on?|That way, I won't walk in on you praying again.
s;Krista;Hm{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}Well, I guess that's fine if you're alright with it.
s;Aqua;Perfect! The next time you wish to pray, please let me know.
s;Aqua;Are you ready to begin, Your Highness?
s;Krista;I guess so. How do you suppose we go about this?|Being from Foliaga, you worship Folia, right?
s;Aqua;Yes, that's right.|While I'm used to praying aloud with others when I was with the clergy,|I will be alright with us silently praying.
s;Krista;Okay, good.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}I mean, uh, sure.{br}Fine by me.
s;Krista;What kind of god is Folia like? Just curious.

s;Aqua;He's a benevolent god,|providing bountiful harvests and the beauties of nature to everyone in Foliaga.|He treats his followers with love and care,|and never turns his back on them no matter the circumstance.
s;Aqua;And what about Medea? What is he like?

s;Krista;Hardy, all-knowing, and protective of Yondo as a whole.|He strives for peace amongst his children and provides guidance to his followers.|My family--the royal bloodline--are descendants of him, you know.|We're expected to follow in his footsteps.|Be not only a good leader to those in Medeas, but to all of Yondo as well.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Considering everything, I wonder if I{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}S-Sorry, Aqua, I started to ramble a bit there, huh?

s;Aqua;No need to apologize, Your Highness.|It was interesting to learn about Medea,|especially when you have such a close connection to him.|{c:e;Aqua;Smile}And if you don't mind me saying,|I think you live up to be as good of a leader as Medea expects you to be.
s;Aqua;Yes.{c:e;Aqua;Smile} I'm glad we can do this together, Your Highness.|Despite us worshipping different gods, I found this to be a pleasant experience.
s;Krista;Honestly, I agree.|This wasn't as bad as I thought it would be.

s;Krista;I wasn't completely honest with you the other day, Aqua.|When you walked in on me praying,|I wasn't reciting a traditional daily prayer.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}I was asking Medea for forgiveness.
s;Krista;I've been asking for forgiveness every day for the past year for{tgm}...{tgm} Ervan.
s;Krista;I've been asking for forgiveness every day for the past year for something{tgm}...|{tgm}I'm not really proud of.
s;Aqua;Oh my{tgm}...{c:e;Aqua;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm} I'm so sorry. If I knew, I--

s;Krista;Like I said, don't worry about it.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Praying together like this, and when we talked about our gods{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm}It all really put me at ease, you know.

s;Krista;Yeah. For the past year, I always wondered if Medea would ever forgive me.|If I was deserving of his forgiveness.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}But then I thought about what you said. How Folia always puts his children first|and wants the best for them.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}All the Great Beasts are siblings,|so I'm sure Folia's and Medea's kindness must have come from somewhere, right?
s;Aqua;Absolutely.|And even if Medea doesn't find it in his heart to forgive you, I will.
s;Aqua;You've done enough to prove you deserve forgiveness.|And even then, I'd still forgive you.
s;Krista;Thanks, Aqua. I really appreciate that.

name: SupportKristaMasashi
_source: s;Masashi;Your Highness! May I have a word with you?
s;Masashi;I would like to humbly apologize for my behavior when we first met.|It was, quite frankly, a terrible first impression.

s;Masashi;I see now the error of my ways.|{c:e;Masashi;Smile}Why, your beauty is unparalleled!|You swing your blade with such grace.|The way you lead your army has such refinement.|I was completely wrong about you!
s;Krista;Dear Medea{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}Look, you don't gotta say stuff you don't mean.
s;Masashi;What? But I do mean what I said.
s;Krista;Sure, sure.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Anyway, I've got more important things to do than listen to shallow compliments.|See ya.
s;Masashi;Ah, Your Highness!|{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes}Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Perhaps words alone are not enough.|{c:e;Masashi;Smile}I shall prove to her my honesty by any means necessary!
s;Krista;Yes. Multiple somethings, actually.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}It's about all the gifts from you that were outside my chambers.
s;Masashi;Oh, is that all? Did you not like them?

s;Krista;Look, I will admit this is very flattering.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}But, dear Medea,|I can just feel Forrest staring daggers at you from across the room.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}I'm saying this because I'm honestly fearing for your life--

s;Krista;I never said that.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}I just don't want Forrest to commit murder.|So, just cool it with the gifts, alright?|I don't want to lose a valuable member of the army because he's being stupid.
s;Masashi;She said I was valuable!|{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes,Smile}Masashi, you're in now!
s;Masashi;Ah, Your Highness! I did not expect to see you at the archery range.
s;Masashi;A master of the bow yourself, I see.|You're just full of surprises, aren't you?
s;Masashi;A bullseye!|You have great aim, Your Highness, even while I'm conversing with you like this.|You have great focus--
s;Masashi;P-Pardon?|I apologize. Am I distracting you?
s;Krista;Technically, no. Just{tgm}...{tgm} Just don't talk to me while I shoot, okay?
s;Masashi;Your Highness? What's wrong? Why are you crying?
s;Krista;Masashi, I'm sorry. It's just{tgm}...|{tgm}When you started talking like that, it reminded me of Ervan{tgm}...

s;Krista;My fiancee.|{tgm}{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}...{tgm} Ex-fiancee. And former prince of Fuegsol.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}He taught me everything about the bow, and we would talk just like this during training.
s;Masashi;I see.|{tgm}{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes}...{tgm} I deeply apologize, Your Highness. I did not mean to bring up such memories.
s;Krista;It's okay. You didn't know.|If anything, I should be sorry for snapping at you earlier.
s;Masashi;Alright, let's get those tears dried, Your Highness.|And if you'd like, we can train together.|Perhaps you could give me some tips?|I'd love to hear about Fuegan archery techniques.
alert;Both particpants gained some Bow EXP!
s;Krista;So, what're your plans after this whole conflict is over?|Going back to Merinas?
s;Masashi;Yes.{w} I would imagine Emperor Samegoro will be back to his old self,|so I'm sure serving under him would be no problem.
s;Krista;Aw, no need to be so formal, Masashi.{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile} Just call me Krista.
s;Krista;I don't see why not. We're friends, right?

s;Masashi;Friends{tgm}...{w}{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes,Smile}{tgm} Yes, I suppose so.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink,Smile}I find it hard to believe we've gotten so close,|considering our rather{tgm}...{c:e;Masashi;NoSmile}{tgm} unfavorable first meeting.
s;Krista;Heh, funny how things worked out.
s;Krista;Another one on the mark. Not a bad round, Masashi.
s;Krista;You'll get used to it.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}Anyway, want me to help you get your arrows?
s;Masashi;That would be kind of you, Krista. Thank you.
s;Krista;Yup! Pretty good session today, by the way.
s;Krista;Oh, before you go, quick question.|Are you much of a reader?
s;Krista;Ever heard of "Oberon and the Silver Beast"? It's one of my favorite books.|If you want, I can lend you my copy of it.
s;Masashi;That sounds lovely, Krista.{br}Thank you.|I'll have to see if I can find something in my collection to lend to you.|It's the least I can do in return.
alert;Both particpants gained some Bow EXP!

name: SupportKristaSam
_source: s;Sam;Hey, Krista. We haven't had the chance to actually catch up on things.
s;Krista;Yeah! What happened with you all this time?|You know, besides the whole bandit-killing thing.
s;Sam;Not much beyond that.|But more importantly, what were you doing in Oregot?
s;Krista;Yup. Things.|Things that do not need any elaboration or detail whatsoever.

s;Sam;Come on, Krista. Be honest with me.|No one goes to Oregot without rhyme or reason.|Especially not in its more bandit-infested regions.|You have a lot more important stuff to deal with than that, right?
s;Sam;It can't be that hard to explain.
s;Krista;I can't believe I gotta actually say this to you.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}You remember how I got kidnapped by bandits years ago, right?
s;Krista;Y'see, the thing is that I{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm}Dear Medea, how do I even begin to phrase this?|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}After all that, I kinda{tgm}...{tgm} liked it?
s;Sam;You know what? Let's put this conversation on hold.|I need time to think.
s;Krista;And this is why I didn't wanna elaborate.
s;Sam;Alright, Krista. It's about time we discuss the elephant in the room.
s;Krista;You mean--{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Oh, dear Medea, do we have to?|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}I REALLY don't want to go any more in depth than I already have.
s;Sam;Your explanation hardly makes any sense, though.|How can you LIKE getting kidnapped? You are deliberately putting yourself in danger!
s;Krista;Yeah, but{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm} *sigh* Here we go with the word choice again.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}It{tgm}...{tgm} gets the blood pumping.
s;Krista;No, no, no, more like{tgm}...{tgm} it excites the senses?
s;Sam;Just read a good book. I can give you recommendations.
s;Krista;For the love of Medea, Sam! It riles me up like an animal in heat!|Happy now?!
s;Sam;{tgm}...{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes,NoSmile}{tgm} That{tgm}...|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}{tgm}Still doesn't make a lick of sense!
s;Krista;Nope! Not having any more "talks" with you.{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes} Been there, done that.
s;Sam;We are having this talk even if I have to tie you to a chair.
s;Krista;Wait, you're gonna WHAT?|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Agh, no, getting distracted here.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}A-Anyway, what's so important that you would tie me up to talk about it?
s;Sam;Do you even know why I left Medeas in the first place?
s;Krista;I dunno.{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes} You wanted to see what Oregot was like?
s;Sam;Krista, you're not that dumb or oblivious. Give me a real guess.
s;Krista;Fine.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Well, it was after I got captured, and Chell's parents died in the rescue.|You were out for revenge?

s;Sam;Not wrong, and not entirely right either.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}I went there to kill every last bandit to ensure you wouldn't get captured again.|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}No one's gonna get hurt by those scum again.{c:e;Sam;HalfCloseEyes} Not on my watch.
s;Krista;I{tgm}...{tgm} I see.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Vengeance seemed like an obvious answer.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}And, honestly, I thought you were mad at me too.
s;Krista;It was my fault, Sam! It was because of me that they died!|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}If I hadn't wandered off that day, they would still be alive{tgm}...

s;Sam;Krista, there are millions of "what if's".|You're not doing yourself any favors by listing all the many different ones.|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}They may be true, they may not. Something else may have happened.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}I went to try and make Oregot safer|by eliminating what makes it dangerous for everyone.|That much is guaranteed.
s;Krista;Yeah, that's true{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}I understand now. Thanks for telling me, Sam.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}That's one less weight off my mind.
s;Sam;That aside, why do you keep feigning ignorance all the time?|I know you're not like that at all.
s;Sam;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} I think I know why.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}That event back then scarred you in more ways than one,|resulting in how you portray yourself  now.
s;Sam;You're smart and caring, Krista. You notice the details. Details that elude me at times.|And you always have everyone's best interests at heart.
s;Sam;And because of that, I know you will make a good queen of Medeas someday.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}Don't forget that.

s;Krista;Sam{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm} I understand where he's coming from, but it's not that simple.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes,Smile}Still, it's nice to know he hasn't changed, even after all these years.|{tgm}{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}...{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm} Hold on, didn't he say he was gonna have me tied up through that whole interrogation?
s;Krista;Sam, wait up! You need to hold up your end of the bargain!!
s;Sam;Krista, I've got a proposal for you.
s;Krista;Huh?! Wait, stop, hold it! Put that ring away!|This is going way too fast.|Just what in Medea's name are you going on about?
s;Sam;With how often you're getting yourself in trouble,|I figured making you settle down will remedy that.
s;Krista;But marriage, Sam? Don't you think that's a bit extreme?
s;Krista;That's not what I'm trying to say.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}I do like you a lot, so I wouldn't mind marrying you.|I just don't want the whole bandit thing to be the only reason why.
s;Sam;I mean, I love you too. So, I figured that it would be okay.|{c:e;Sam;Smile}Plus, you can hold your own against a bandit horde.
s;Krista;Yeah, well, I am pretty strong and--{w}{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Wait, you what?
s;Sam;I love you, Krista.{w} I have for a while now.
s;Krista;Ah.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}You know, I always had a feeling, but I wasn't completely sure.
s;Sam;So, what do you say, Krista?
s;Krista;Yeah, I will marry you, Sam.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}I'd love having a big, strong man like you around.
s;Sam;This big, strong man will be around to have your back no matter what.
s;Krista;That's all I could ever ask for.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Well, that and{tgm}...
s;Krista;You remember a while back how you said you'd tie me up?
s;Krista;You sure did! Back when we had that "talk".
s;Krista;Well, I want it to be literal.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Meet me in my room in a bit, alright?
s;Sam;Is this what I gotta deal with now?|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}*sigh* Well, it could be a lot worse.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}I'm coming, Krista!

name: SupportKristaTorgen
_source: s;Krista;Hey, Torgen. Mind tying me up? For old-time's sake?
s;Torgen;Don't you have more important things to do?
s;Krista;I mean, yeah, but we've got a bit of downtime.
s;Krista;C'mon, it'll be fun! I look real cute wrapped up in ropes, dontcha think?
s;Krista;If you aren't, why did you keep agreeing to "kidnapping" me, hm?
s;Torgen;Because you wouldn't stop pestering me if I didn't.
s;Krista;Okay, fair.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}But! You still enjoyed it at least a little bit, didn't you?
s;Torgen;Being with the same people day in and day out can get dull, I guess.
s;Torgen;Still not gonna tie you up.
s;Krista;Oh come on! Please? For me?
s;Torgen;And there you go, pestering me again.
s;Krista;Torgen! Wanna tie me up agai--
s;Krista;Yeesh, you're sounding more grumpy than usual. What's up?
s;Torgen;Things shouldn't have gone that way.|Gordon wouldn't've gotten his grubby mitts on you if I--
s;Krista;Hey. It's okay. I'm alive, aren't I?
s;Krista;I'm not hearing it!|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Besides, if I didn't forgive you, we wouldn't be talking right now.
s;Torgen;You have a point. Still, I can't get over how scared you were when Gordon got you.|{c:e;Torgen;HalfCloseEyes}It was like when we met eight years ago.
s;Torgen;I don't want you fearing for your life like that, Krista.|I'm not fumbling like that ever again.
s;Krista;If I died that day, I{tgm}...
s;Krista;N-Nothing. It's nothing.|Anyway, sorry for bothering you. I'm just gonna go.
s;Torgen;Huh? Krista? What're you doing laying on the ground like that?
s;Torgen;... Doesn't cloud watching usually go where someone says, oh I don't know,|"Hey, that cloud looks like a bear," or something like that?;bottom;fit
s;Krista;It could. To be honest, I just watch them float by.;bottom;fit
s;Krista;I like your idea, though. Beats what I usually think about.;bottom;fit
s;Krista;Sometimes I wonder if you fell from a great height,|would the clouds be the last thing you saw?;bottom;fit
s;Torgen;If you fell on your back, maybe.|Kind of a morbid thing to think about, though.;bottom;fit
s;Torgen;... Krista, if you fell, I'd catch you.;bottom;fit
s;Torgen;Let me finish.|Whatever the reason, if it was my fault, someone else's, on accident, on purpose,|it doesn't matter.|I'll be there before you hit the ground. You can count on me.
s;Krista;On purpose too, huh{tgm}...?|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}Torgen, I{tgm}...{tgm} S-Sorry. I've been saying weird stuff this whole time.
s;Torgen;All sorts of weird stuff's been on your mind lately.|{c:e;Torgen;NormalBlink}A while back, you were sayin' something about dying when we first met.
s;Torgen;I don't know what exactly's going on in that head of yours.|All I know is that something's stressing you out, right?|Something weighing down on you so much, you just wanna stop?

s;Torgen;Being royalty's a lot of responsibility.|I can't even imagine how much is on your shoulders just from that.|{c:e;Torgen;NormalBlink}Still, I get it. Before this, I was just a bandit tryin' to scrape by.|All those years ago when you were captured, and I saw you crying in that cell,|I knew I couldn't keep living that life.|That's why I helped. Or tried to, at least.

s;Torgen;But I couldn't escape it.|I was still a bandit, and that's the only life I thought could know.|{c:e;Torgen;HalfCloseEyes}I kept holding on, hoping that things would change.|That maybe there was a chance I wouldn't have to keep living like this.|{c:e;Torgen;NormalBlink}Then you came back.
s;Krista;You were just lucky. What if you're not there to save me like I did for you?|I can't just depend on you.

s;Torgen;Then you grit your teeth and save your own damn self.|I knew I couldn't bank on us meeting again.|Let alone you whisking me away to a new way of life.|So I just kept going despite everything.
s;Krista;I'm not strong enough for that!
s;Torgen;You made it this far, right? What's one more day?|If you make it that day, then you can make it to the next, right?
s;Krista;I guess you have a point.

s;Torgen;Life's tough. It'll keep beating your ass if you let it.|{c:e;Torgen;NormalBlink}So, the best thing to do is beat its ass back!|Show it that no matter what it throws at you, you can dish out ten times worse!|{c:e;Torgen;CloseEyes}So just{tgm}...{c:e;Torgen;NormalBlink}{tgm} Just keep living on, Krista. Promise me that.
s;Krista;Hey, Torgen. After this is all over, wanna stay in Medeas with me?
s;Torgen;What are you going on about now?
s;Krista;I'm giving you a job offer! You can be one of my retainers.
s;Torgen;You can't be serious. I'm a bandit, Krista. There's no way this can work.
s;Krista;I've turned a thief and a couple of vagrants into reliable retainers.|A bandit won't be too out there for me.
s;Krista;But that's why you like me.
s;Krista;Besides, weren't you the one who said you wanted to leave the bandit life behind?
s;Torgen;Yeah, but having an out handed to me on a silver platter? Feels like cheating.
s;Krista;So what? You wanna work for the position?
s;Torgen;That would make it feel more legitimate.
s;Krista;Fine, fine. Let's see{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm}Oh, I know!|If you're still alive once this is all over, I'm making you my retainer. Deal?
s;Torgen;Wait, doesn't that mean I'll be under your service no matter what I do?|{c:e;Torgen;CloseEyes}Aw, forget it.{c:e;Torgen;NormalBlink} Deal.
s;Torgen;As long as "the end" isn't too soon.
s;Torgen;Don't even think about changing your mind about this, by the way.|Remember that you're the one who asked in the first place.
s;Krista;I won't regret it. I promise.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}If you want, you can keep me on a short leash so I don't run away.

name: SupportKaiTrevor
_source: s;Kai;Trevor, there you are.|Mind if I ask you about something?
s;Trevor;Kai, my brother in arms, you may ask me anything your heart desires.
s;Kai;Great. Just to confirm, Princess Krista hired you around six months ago?
s;Trevor;Why, yes! Only two months after your employment, if memory serves.
s;Kai;I see. With that in mind, your prowess with magic piqued my interest.
s;Trevor;You flatter me so, Kai!|{c:e;Trevor;NoSmile}But, I have a feeling that this is where the praise ends.
s;Kai;And you'd be right.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,NoSmile}You see, I've heard rumors that House Valoria's only child has gone missing.|{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes}And has been missing for around six months.
s;Kai;Being a magic prodigy yourself,|I'm sure you'd know about the most powerful mage family in Medeas, wouldn't you?

s;Trevor;Well{tgm}...{tgm} of course! Now, Kai, excuse me for being presumptuous,|but I am not the missing Valoria heir of which you speak.|For the Valoria family only had a daughter, not a son.|It would be impossible for it to be me.
s;Kai;Huh. Well, that's news to me.|Sorry about the assumptions, Trevor.|I guess I'll have to go back to the drawing board for this one.
s;Trevor;It is quite alright, my friend.|I would love to chat more, but I must get to my studies.|{c:e;Trevor;Smile}Do not get too caught up in the rumor mill, now.
s;Kai;Well, that trail has gone cold.{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes} Hm{tgm}...|{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}Why do I have this nagging feeling that there's more to this story?
s;Man3;Here's that sketch you wanted, sir.|Is that all you needed?
s;Kai;Yes, thank you. And here's your payment.|Thank you again for your assistance.

s;Kai;Now, let's see here{tgm}...{tgm} That's what the young Valoria scion looks like, hm?|Her face{tgm}...|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm}Heh, if I didn't know any better, I'd say she looks just like--
s;Trevor;Ah, Kai, my brother in arms! Fancy seeing you here.
s;Trevor;Is something the matter, Kai? You look like you have seen a ghost.
s;Kai;It's{tgm}...{tgm} It's nothing.{w}{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes} Ahem.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}As I was saying, what are you doing in town?
s;Trevor;Why, I am out doing errands for Princess Krista.|Would you care to join me?
s;Kai;Actually, I'm busy with my own stuff. Maybe some other time?
s;Trevor;So it shall be. I will not keep you any longer.|So long!
s;Kai;{tgm}...{tgm} Could Trevor actually be{tgm}...?|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}{tgm}No, I must be going crazy. There's no way{tgm}...

s;Trevor;Kai was acting really weird just now.|{c:e;Trevor;CloseEyes}Did he figure me out{tgm}...?|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}{tgm}No, of course not. Just keep doing what you're doing, Trevor.|You've kept suspicions off yourself for this long, after all.
s;Kai;With all this evidence, I am now almost one hundred percent sure about my theory.|All I need to do now is confront Trevor about it.
s;Kai;G'morning, Trevor. It's Kai.|Can we talk?
s;Kai;Sorry, did I catch you at a bad time?
s;Trevor;Nah, everything's a-okay!|I-I mean, just... uh... Gimme a sec, alright??
s;Kai;... Did he just say "a-okay"?|{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes}Yeah, something's not right here.;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Trevor;Nah, nah, it's cool! I'll be out in a jiff!
s;Kai;Did you just say "in a ji--
s;Trevor;Hi. Hello. Yes.{w}{c:e;Trevor;CloseEyes} Ahem.|{c:e;Trevor;Smile}Kai, my brother in arms, how are you on this fine morning?|Quite breezy today, isn't it?
s;Kai;{tgm}...{tgm} You're not wearing any pants.
s;Kai;*sigh*|By Merin, this was NOT how I wanted to confirm my suspicions.
s;Kai;Trevor, after you get dressed, can we talk?|We can do it in your quarters if you prefer.
s;Kai;Relax, I won't.|The thought didn't even cross my mind.
s;Trevor;Then, why bother looking into this in the first place?
s;Kai;Just wanted to satisfy my own curiosity. You know how it is.
s;Trevor;For once, I wish that wasn't the case.|{c:e;Trevor;HalfCloseEyes}There was a reason why I didn't want this coming out, y'know.
s;Kai;Trevor, I'm really sorry. I didn't mean to invade on something so private.|I didn't realize it WAS a private matter for you.
s;Kai;Do you mind if I ask you one last thing?
s;Trevor;I'm not gonna feed your curiosity more than I already have.
s;Kai;Trevor, please. I really am sorry that I hurt you.|I had no idea this was a sensitive topic for you. Please understand that.|You're my friend, and I would never intentionally cause you grief.
s;Trevor;{tgm}...{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}{tgm} What did you want to ask?
s;Kai;Why all of this hiding?|Were things in House Valoria not to your liking?

s;Trevor;Ha! "Hiding"? Kai, this is the most unconcealed I've been in my entire life.|"Heir to House Valoria" was the disguise. Not "Trevor".|"Trevor, loyal retainer to Princess Krista" has been my true self all along,|even if it took me a long time to realize it.
s;Kai;If that's how it is, then that's how it is.|You're Trevor. Always have been, always will.
s;Kai;I never actually knew you in your previous life, so I got nothing to compare to anyway.|I can imagine that it was tough for you back then, though.|Having to pretend to be someone else and all.

s;Trevor;Yes, it was a miserable existence.|But when Her Highness found me half a year ago{tgm}...{tgm} When she accepted me for who I was{tgm}...|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}{tgm}That was the happiest moment in my life. I'll never forget that.
s;Kai;You're definitely doing well now. I can tell.|And I prefer a happy Trevor over a sad one any day.
s;Trevor;Haha{tgm}...{tgm} Thank you.|That means a lot.
s;Kai;Of course. You're my friend.{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes,Smile}{br}And my brother in arms.
s;Trevor;As are you, Kai. As are you.
s;Trevor;I can't stop thinking about what happens after all{tgm}...{tgm} this.|{c:e;Trevor;HalfCloseEyes}Will we still be employed by the royal family? Her Highness might not{tgm}...
s;Kai;I dunno about you, but I'm outta here no matter what happens afterward.
s;Kai;I'm a mercenary, remember? And I'd say my job here's almost done.
s;Trevor;That is one way to put it, I suppose.
s;Kai;And even if I wasn't a mercenary,|Merinas would be hunting me down and arresting me for treason.|{c:e;Kai;Smile}I wouldn't wanna make myself an easy target, y'know?
s;Kai;Come on, don't make such a long face.|This was gonna happen eventually, Trev. You know that.
s;Trevor;Yes, but that does not make it hurt any less.|Did our time together mean nothing to you?
s;Kai;Trev, in case you haven't noticed, I don't stay attached to people.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}You're no different.
s;Trevor;But what about what you said before? We are friends, are we not?
s;Trevor;Says the man who has given me a nickname on a whim.
s;Trevor;And here I thought you were more tight-lipped.
s;Kai;I don't loosen my lips or my tongue for just anyone, you know.|{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}And you shouldn't either,{c:wait;200} Valoria.
s;Trevor;{tgm}...{tgm} Just what are you trying to say?
s;Kai;You trusted me this entire time to keep your secret.|Do you believe that to be a wise decision?
s;Trevor;You would have done something with this information by now.|Force me back to my family, inform Her Highness of my true identity{tgm}...|{tgm}And yet here we are with nothing changed.
s;Trevor;Huh? What was the point of all that?
s;Kai;Just a little test to see if you've got a good read on me after all this time.|You passed, by the way.
s;Trevor;Could you please be straightforward for once?
s;Kai;Sure I can, on one condition.
s;Kai;Just relax when it's just us.|No need to use that extensive vocabulary around me.|It's gotta be exhausting for you.
s;Kai;Good. In fact, I can make the transition easier on you, if you want.
s;Kai;I can be your first in other ways too, if you'll let me, Trev.;bottom;fit
s;Trevor;Wait wait wait stop stop stop that's going way too fast!!;bottom;fit
s;Kai;Oh? You knew what I meant by that? I guess you're not as innocent as I thought--;bottom;fit

name: TalkKristaAnil
_source: s;Krista;Hey! You're not with these guys, right?
s;Krista;Mind helping us out, then?|Things are getting pretty dicey.

name: TalkShulaKiraz
_source: s;Shula;Yeah, we ran into her before we got down here.
s;Shula;Yeah, she's alive, but she's not with us.
s;Kiraz;I hoped if she saw you,|she'd change her mind about working with these people.
s;Shula;She's long gone, Kiraz.|{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}But never mind that now! Let's get you out of here.

name: TalkKristaHaruki
_source: s;Krista;Hey, kid, get outta here! It's dangerous!
s;Haruki;No way, this is my home and I gotta protect it!
s;Krista;Great enthusiasm, but you really should leave it to the adults.
s;Haruki;Hey, I'm pretty good with a lance!|Don't underestimate me just 'cause I'm a kid.
s;Krista;Heh, a real go-getter, ain't ya?|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Alright, you can help. Just don't get in over your head, you hear?
s;Haruki;Okay!|{c:e;Haruki;NoSmile}Oh, we should let my big bro know you guys are helping too.|Our house is the one with the red roof. He should be there.
s;Krista;You mean, Taichi? He's already out there with us!
s;Haruki;Ha! I knew he couldn't just stay inside.|We won't let ya down!

name: TalkKristaAzure
_source: s;Krista;Krista, princess of Medeas, at your service.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}Y'know, when these pirates attacked us, I wasn't expecting us to rescue prisoners too.
s;Azure;When their ship stopped, I didn't expect this at all either.|How about we join forces, Your Highness?
s;Krista;Sure! We need all the help we can get.

name: TalkKristaKhalid
_source: s;Khalid;Krista! It's you! I was starting to think I'd never find you.
s;Krista;What the--Khalid?! What are you doing out here?

s;Khalid;Looking for you!|When I heard you were doing stuff in Foliaga, I had to meet up with you again.|I'd hoped to catch up with you back in Medeas,|but your parents said you were already making your way to Merinas.|{c:e;Khalid;Smile}Man, it's so good to see you again, Krista. You have no idea.
s;Khalid;{tgm}...{tgm} Krista.|{c:e;Khalid;HalfCloseEyes}I missed you, y'know? Things haven't been the same since Ervan{tgm}...{tgm} Well{tgm}...
s;Khalid;Hey, there's no need to apologize. All that matters is that we're together again.|{c:e;Khalid;Smile}We can catch up on things when you're ready.

name: TalkForrestReem
_source: s;Forrest;Reem?|Wait, if you're here, then that must mean His Highness is here as well.
s;Reem;Yes, Prince Khalid is with me, of course.|He had heard of Her Highness' exploits in Foliaga,|so he and I rushed to Medeas to meet up with her.
s;Forrest;And from there, you learned of our journey to Merinas' capital.
s;Forrest;You and Prince Khalid will be allowed to join us, Reem.|That should go without question.|Now, let us take care of these bandits.
s;Reem;W-Wait!|{c:e;Reem;HalfCloseEyes}It's been one whole year{tgm}...|{c:e;Reem;CloseEyes}{tgm}Can't that man not think about his duties just this once?

name: TalkAquaAzure
_source: s;Aqua;Azure?! What are you doing here?

s;Azure;This rowdy band of pirates raided the town my troupe and I were performing at.|{c:e;Azure;CloseEyes}They managed to escape, and{tgm}...{c:e;Azure;NormalBlink}{tgm} Well, you can see how my luck turned out.
s;Aqua;Are you alright? You're not hurt, are you?
s;Azure;Far from it, surprisingly. Apparently they want their prisoners alive and well.|For what exactly, I'm not sure.
s;Aqua;You must absolutely come with us, then!|I've been travelling alongside the princess of Medeas.
s;Azure;Oh? Sounds like there's a story behind that.
s;Aqua;We can talk more about it once we're out of danger.

name: TalkKristaMarina
_source: s;Krista;You don't look like you're with these pirates. What are you doing here?
s;Marina;I was held prisoner until just a few moments ago.|I managed to escape before they noticed.
s;Krista;Are you okay? If you want, you can come along with us!|{c:e;Krista;Smile}I'm Krista, princess of Medeas, by the way.
s;Marina;The princess of Medeas herself, hm? Isn't this a pleasant surprise!|My name is Marina. A pleasure to meet you, Your Highness.|Now, let us take care of these ruffians, shall we?

name: TalkForrestMarina
_source: s;Marina;My, my, what's a handsome thing like you doing all the way out here?
s;Marina;It seems my luck is finally turning around.|Perhaps being captured by these brutes was a good thing if I ran into someone like you.
s;Forrest;With all due respect, madam, aren't there more pressing matters at hand?
s;Marina;You think I don't know that?|{c:e;Marina;NormalBlink,Smile}I'll be staying by your side, if you don't mind, sir knight.|I believe I can trust you to ensure my safety?
s;Forrest;Again, with all due respect, this is not something you can authorize.
s;Marina;And here I thought I found a noble knight who could protect me from these pirates.|I guess I was wrong.
s;Marina;So you WILL let me come along with you, then. Marvelous!|Please, lead the way.
s;Forrest;{tgm}...{tgm} *sigh*|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}My name is Forrest, by the way. And yours, miss?
s;Marina;Marina. Thank you for your aid, Sir Forrest.

name: TalkRembrandtMarina
_source: s;Marina;Well, isn't this a pleasant surprise? Rembrandt, wasn't it?
s;Rembrandt;Yes. And you're{tgm}...{tgm} Miss Marina, correct?
s;Marina;How sweet of you to remember.|{c:e;Marina;Smile,CloseEyes}If anything, I'm more surprised you remember little ol' me.

s;Rembrandt;Well, I{tgm}...{c:e;Rembrandt;CloseEyes}{tgm} Ahem.|{c:e;Rembrandt;NormalBlink}We can discuss more of that later. More importantly, are you alright?|I doubt you're on this pirate ship out of your own free will.
s;Marina;And you'd be right.|The brutes raided town and ran off with whoever they could get their hands on.
s;Rembrandt;How horrible. But worry not, Miss Marina. You're in safe hands now.|Just come along with us and you'll be fine.
s;Rembrandt;I've been recruited into the Medean princess's army. It's{tgm}...{tgm} a long story.
s;Marina;And you'll tell it to me once this is all over, won't you?|Perhaps over a drink or two?

name: TalkSemiAzure
_source: s;Semi;Hey, you're not one of those pirates, right? Let me help--
s;Azure;Oh, Folia, you cannot be serious right now.
s;Semi;Shut it! I'm not happy knowing it's YOU on this ship either.
s;Azure;Of course she would be.|{c:e;Azure;HalfCloseEyes}Whether I should be thankful or worried is debatable.
s;Semi;She was for a while, but we had to send her back to {e:'Medeas Castle' if '{v:AquaDeathTime}' == 'Medeas' else 'the monastery.'}.
s;Azure;What?! Is she hurt? Is it serious?
s;Semi;Calm down, will ya? It was just her leg that broke.|Give her enough time and she'll be fine.
s;Azure;"Just" her leg?!|{c:e;Azure;CloseEyes}To think I had even the slightest amount of trust in you to keep her safe{tgm}...
s;Semi;Oh, like you could've done any better?
s;Semi;Look, we can sit here and argue all day|or we can actually do something about these pirates.

name: TalkKristaRyuuji
_source: s;Krista;Hold on, there's something I gotta ask you first.
s;Ryuuji;Ha! Haven't heard that one before.|Fine, go ahead. I'm listening.
s;Krista;Do you know a guy named Kai?|Mercenary? White hair? Really good with a sword?
s;Ryuuji;White hair, huh{tgm}...?{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink}{tgm} I might know him. Why?
s;Krista;He's with us! And sounds like he knows who you are too.
s;Krista;That's what he says.|I dunno what's going on between you two, but could you talk to him?|Sounds like he was desperate to know if you are who he thinks you are.
s;Ryuuji;Don't look so happy.|If I don't like what Kai has to say, we'll get back to raiding your ship.

name: TalkKaiRyuuji
_source: s;Ryuuji;What?! How do you know my--
s;Ryuuji;Kai? What are you doing here?
s;Kai;I should be asking you that.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}For five years, I thought you were dead.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}What the hell are you doing with pirates of all people?!
s;Ryuuji;Look, I'll call off the raid, then we can talk.|{c:e;Ryuuji;CloseEyes}I have a lot of explaining to do, I know.

name: TalkFelicityMasashi
_source: s;Felicity;{tgm}...{tgm} Not to be rude,|but I believe this is the part where you attempt to pelt me with arrows?
s;Masashi;What? Why would I even consider doing that?|It would be a waste to tarnish the beauty of a lovely woman such as yourself.
s;Felicity;I hope you like an axe to the face.
s;Felicity;I hope you like dark magic to the face.
s;Felicity;Give me one good reason why I shouldn't.
s;Masashi;There, see? My bow and arrows on the ground.
s;Felicity;Ugh.|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink}At any rate, since you so kindly surrendered,|I'll have Her Highness decide what to do with you.
s;Masashi;The Medean princess herself? This is my lucky day!

name: TalkKristaMasashi
_source: s;Krista;Alright, I really hate to do this, but you gotta go down!
s;Masashi;Hmph, let's see about that.|{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes,Smile}Oh, how I would hate to see the look on your princess' face|when she sees her loyal soldiers fall by my hand.
