s;Masashi;What's the matter? Nerves getting to you?|{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes,Smile}To think that the Medean princess has such cowardly forces amongst her ranks{tgm}...|{tgm}How laughable!
s;Krista;Yeah, sorry to burst your bubble there, but it's true.
s;Masashi;There's no way that can be true!|How can a noblewoman such as yourself be so{tgm}...{tgm} So{tgm}...!
s;Krista;You'd better be careful with your next words there.
s;Krista;I have a bow and I'm not afraid to use it.
s;Krista;I have a sword and I'm not afraid to use it.
s;Masashi;So uncouth! So unrefined! How dare you call yourself royalty?!|Why, no man with any self-respect would ever consider marrying--
s;Krista;Get up.|We're taking you prisoner, then we'll decide what to do with you from there.
s;Krista;I could easily change my mind.

name: TalkYukinoMasashi
_source: s;Yukino;Raise your bow. I see no reason to strike an unprepared adversary.
s;Masashi;Wha{tgm}...{tgm} Er, s-sorry, I{tgm}...{w}{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes} Ahem.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink,Smile}I was{tgm}...{tgm} just taken aback by your beauty.
s;Yukino;Stop. You're one of "those" types, aren't you?
s;Masashi;Ah! Wait, please! That's not what I--|I only meant--{c:e;Masashi;HalfCloseEyes}I-I{tgm}...
s;Yukino;Consider yourself lucky that we need you for information.|Otherwise, I wouldn't have let you live.
s;Masashi;Do I dare ask what happens after the{tgm}...{tgm} interrogation?
s;Yukino;That's up to the Medean princess.|But if she does choose to spare you,|I have one request--No, DEMAND to make out of you.
s;Masashi;Could we decide on no attempts at courtship instead?|I'd like to at least get to know you mo--
s;Yukino;Do you honestly believe you are in any position to negotiate that?

name: TalkKristaEcco
_source: s;Ecco;Yes, you. Looks like you and your friends need a hand.
s;Krista;If you're willing to help, be my guest.
s;Ecco;Perfect! My friend Anil and I will assist in any way we can.|{c:e;Ecco;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Just promise you'll give us proper compensation later.

name: SpawnEccoAnil
_source: s;Ecco;Pretty good job today, wouldn't you say, Anil?
s;Ecco;Wouldn't it be great if we got hired again?|Maybe by someone rich? Maybe even royalty?|{c:e;Ecco;CloseEyes,Smile}Ahh, a girl can dream.
s;Anil;*points eastward*|[Stay focused, Ecco.]|[There's something going on over there.]
s;Ecco;Oh, looks like those guys need help!|Come on, Anil. Let's go!

name: SpawnFelicityViola
_source: s;Viola;We'd better stop here for the night.|It's getting way too dark for me to see.
s;Felicity;No worries. Now, then{tgm}...|{tgm}If Her Highness and the others weren't at Windbrook when we got there,|then that means they're probably around here still on their way to Lake Lunaris.
s;Felicity;Yeah, sounds like trouble.|And where trouble is, Princess Krista's gonna be there.|Let's go, Viola!

name: SpawnTaylorAlexLucy
_source: s;Taylor;According to Chell's message, Her Highness and the rest should be around here.|But all I see are a bunch of bandits!|What do you think, Alex?
s;Alex;Yes, it is strange. However, we should still investigate.|There is a chance that they're here.
s;Lucy;Come on, let's go!!{br}They might be in danger.

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;Krista and her party escape from the Detri bandit fortress|with their new friends, Aqua and Semi, in tow.|They make way to Sam's place to rest for the evening.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;Krista;I get it now.|Foliaga's leader, Archbishop Azalea, is acting shady.|And you guys fled because things were getting dangerous.

s;Semi;Foliaga's citizens are disappearing. It started with just prisoners.|{c:e;Semi;CloseEyes}Next thing everyone knew, the common folk started to go.|{c:e;Semi;NormalBlink}Then it was members of the church.|There's no way Azalea would ignore something like that. Something's up.
s;Forrest;If you were actually staying awake during your history lessons,|you would have had some idea who these two were talking about, Your Highness.
s;Krista;I blame that on lessons being too early in the morning.
s;Sam;I see you guys are settling in nicely.
s;Aqua;Why, yes.|Thank you for your hospitality.
s;Sam;No problem.|Oh, you guys probably need more weapons, right?|I got a lot of stuff from the bandit hideouts I've raided.|So, here!
s;Forrest;Just how many bandit hideouts have you raided?
s;Sam;I dunno.|Lost count after the first twenty.
s;Sam;Now, where is that old thing{tgm}...?
s;Krista;Well, I'm ready to turn in for the night.{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink} Wake me up if something happens.
s;Beli;We've got 'em surrounded, boys! Get 'em!|And keep the Prowling Tiger alive. I want to deal with him myself!|Got the torches ready?|We'll take this battle into the dead of night if we have to!
s;Beli;You idiot!|{c:e;Beli;CloseEyes}Fine, new plan.{c:e;Beli;NormalBlink} We take them down before nightfall.
s;Beli;We retreat.|Can't do anything if we can't see anything.
s;Krista;I didn't even close my eyes yet.
s;Kai;Bandits are surrounding the premises.|We need to act now!
s;Sam;Let's go! Taking down their boss will get them to panic and retreat.|<red>And don't let too many of them get inside.</>|I need a house to come back to once this is all over!
prep;false;Prepare to Charge;<green>Guide</>;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp
prep;false;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: FightAlfonso
_source: s;Beli;How did you get through my men?|Dammit, I'll take care of you myself!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAlfonsoSam
_source: s;Sam;What are you going on{br}about?|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}Not like I even care right{br}now.|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink}You guys wrecked my cabin!{br}I'm taking you down!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: WinTurnCount
_source: s;Krista;Alright, guys, we've got the thief cornered!|Don't let him get away!

name: WinTurnCount
_source: s;SoldierPurple;We came here as fast as we could!|Come on, men! Get those pirates outta here!

name: Visit
_source: s;Man1;Hey, I don't know what you're all doing out there,|but you don't wanna stick around for too long.|Not with the Knights around.|It's gonna get dark soon, so take this and get out of here!
s;Woman1;The Holy Knights are known to don heavy armor.|Weapons like this Hammer should get through it easily. Please take it.
s;Woman2;You were outside standing guard? I thank you for your kindness.
s;Woman2;What happened to that Knight outside the door?|Did you take care of him?|Thank you very much.
s;Woman2;What is happening outside? It doesn't sound good.
s;Woman2;Please take this. It may help you.
s;Man2;The Holy Knights{tgm}...{tgm} They weren't always like this.|They protected everyone and only arrested criminals.|What could have changed?
s;Woman1;Excuse me, sorry to bother you.|I found this on the ground the other day.|Could you please return it to its owner?
s;Woman3;You must flee now, sir! I'll be fine, so please{tgm}...
s;Damien;Of course. Stay safe, madam.|And thank you again for your hospitality.
s;Damien;Ah, pardon me.|Hm? Oh, yes, I'll be fine going out on my own.|I only request that this young lady remains unharmed.|Now, if you'll excuse me{tgm}...
s;Woman3;That man is strange,{br}but kind.|{c:e;Woman3;NormalBlink}Oh, yes, I'm fine. I'll make sure to lock up tight.|Thank you for checking up on me.
s;Woman3;Oh, he dropped this.|It's just a Vulnerary, so maybe he won't miss it.|Here, you take it. You probably need it more than I do.
s;Man3;Are you here to drive the Knights off?|I see! Please take this with you, then.{br}It may help.|It may not be a weapon, but it can make you stronger.
s;;A new Guide entry has been added.{br}<red>(Secret Shops)</>;;100;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound

name: Visit
_source: s;Krista;Huh?! N-No, stop! Let go of me! NO!!

name: Visit
_source: s;Haruki;Taichi, guess what?|The people the mayor was talking about are no joke.|And I'm helping them out!
s;Taichi;What? You shouldn't have gotten in their way--
s;Haruki;But I'm not!|{c:e;Haruki;NoSmile}Come on, Taichi. You wanna help too, don't you?
s;Haruki;And what about everyone else?|If you get out there, you can save everyone and Ma!
s;Taichi;But{tgm}...|{c:e;Taichi;CloseEyes}{tgm}Alright, alright. I'm coming too.|{c:e;Taichi;NormalBlink}But you better promise me you won't die out there.
s;Taichi;Huh? Haruki's with you guys? If that's the case, I want in too!
s;Taichi;Ohh{tgm}...{tgm} Haruki, you idiot!|That does it. I'm going out there too!
s;Taichi;I'm not letting him off easy, running off like that.
s;Man1;Pirates were always a problem here,|but it seems their raids have gotten worse for the past few months.|Oh, Emperor Samegoro, what are you doing{tgm}...?

s;Woman2;Y'know, I've been hearing things through the grapevine about the emperor.|Now, I'm not saying that new shogun he appointed has been causing trouble, but{tgm}...|{tgm}Her showin' up outta the blue|and the emperor draftin' our men to the capital?|It can't be a coincidence!

s;Man3;I don't know what has gotten into Daigo and his men. They seem more{tgm}...{tgm} organized?|They actually plan out their raids now and get us when we least expect it.|I sure hope the other villages in Aotani will be alright.

name: Visit
_source: s;OldWoman1;What are pirates like them doing all the way out here?|Please, young one, help us! Take this too. It may help.
s;Tsurugi;Oh, you're back! I was wondering when you'd--
s;Tsurugi;A-Ah, sorry, I thought you were someone else.|{c:e;Tsurugi;CloseEyes}This is getting really worrying{tgm}...|{c:e;Tsurugi;NormalBlink}{tgm}I gotta go! Sorry!
s;Man2;Go away, you scoundrel!|You lot are unwelcome here! Leave!!
s;;A new Guide entry has been added.{br}<red>(Secret Shops)</>;;100;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound

name: Visit
_source: s;Man5;What's that? You're on the run from the Holy Knights?|No one can catch a break these days, huh?|Hey, you didn't hear this from me,|but there's a chance the Knights are gonna try to close the inner town gates on you.|Take this Door Key with you to open them.

s;Woman3;Have you seen the fights at the local arena?|There's this one swordsman there who's very strong.|He came here from some far-off land and has been undefeated ever since.|{c:e;Woman3;CloseEyes}Ah{tgm}...{tgm} he's so muscular and handsome and{tgm}...
s;Woman3;Wait, it's you! Oh my{tgm}...|{tgm}P-Please forget I said anything!!|Just take this, please! I'm a big fan!!
s;Woman3;S-Sorry, I've said too much.|I apologize for rambling like that{tgm}...|{tgm}Please just take this and forget I said anything.
s;Man1;You seem strong. Have you tried fighting at the arena?|It's a great way to make money! As long as you don't die, that is.|If you've got money to spare, you should give it a try. Good luck!
s;OldWoman1;I may not look it, but I was one of the best Knights Foliaga had, you know.|My age has gotten to me, so you can have this.|I have no need for it anymore.
s;Marina;Hi, Jake. Hope you didn't worry about me too much.
s;Jake;Well, I sure did!|You could've gotten real hurt. Or worse!
s;Marina;I'm here now in once piece, aren't I? And guess what?|I met some kind people who will take care of the Knights.
s;Marina;Mm-hmm. I'm going to help them out too.
s;Jake;You don't say?|If that's the case, don't push yourself too hard, alright?
s;Marina;Of course. You take care now, Jake.|I'll see you around?

s;Jake;Man, I sure hope Miss Marina's alright{tgm}...|{tgm}I'd hate for something bad to happen.|{c:e;Jake;NormalBlink}She's the best barmaid I know! Quite the performer too.|{c:e;Jake;Smile,CloseEyes}The way she dances is so{tgm}...
s;Jake;Wh-What's that look for? I'm not interested in her like that!|I'm in a loving, committed relationship already, thank you very much!!

name: Visit
_source: s;OldMan1;You there, young one!|Are you here to do away with Shigeo and his men?|Then take this! It may be small,|but some protection is better than none at all.
s;Altena;These other wyvern riders{tgm}...{tgm} It would be best if I waited to depart.|I would not want to be mistaken as a member of their group.
s;Sam;Whoa! You're that wyvern rider I saw!
s;Sam;You're not with these bandits, right?
s;Sam;Great! Hey, wanna join forces?|I get the feeling you don't wanna be lumped together with these chumps.
s;Altena;I{tgm}...{tgm} That is exactly why I'm staying put.
s;Sam;Well, you don't have to be a sitting duck anymore.|Fight with us, and there'll be no question you're with the good guys!|Let's go!
s;Sam;Oh! What was your name again?
s;Sam;Altena! Name's Sam. Okay, NOW let's go!
s;Altena;I will wait here until things have calmed down.
s;{unit};Hm? Wasn't someone here just now?
s;Woman2;This is terrible! Please, won't you help us?|Take this with you. It was my father's, but he's no longer with us.|I'm sure you could get more use out of it than I would.

s;OldWoman1;Oh, these old bones aren't what they used to be{tgm}...|{tgm}Why, if I were twenty years younger,|I'd be out there shooting down those darn wyvern riders myself!|Here, kiddo, you can take this old bow of mine for yourself.|Goodness knows I won't be able to draw back its string like I used to.

s;Man3;Wyverns aren't all that common around these parts.|You usually see them more in southern Merinas.|{c:e;{unit};HalfCloseEyes}I've read that most wyverns are descendants of Folia,|so you see more of them as you get closer to there.|{c:e;Man3;CloseEyes}With them being cold-blooded,|a good chunk of them migrated to Fuegsol and stayed there ever since!|{c:mirror;{unit}}{c:move_portrait;{unit};OffscreenLeft}And because of their change in environment,|Folian wyverns and Fuegan wyverns differ biologically. For example{tgm}...

s;Damien;Oh, hello. Did you need something?|Wait a moment, aren't you part of the group that took down Azalea in Foliaga?|{c:e;Damien;CloseEyes}I see. How intriguing.|{c:e;Damien;NormalBlink}Pay me no mind. However, I feel this won't be the last time we meet.|If you have no further business here,{br}then could you please leave?|I am quite busy brewing this Elixir, so--

s;Damien;{tgm}.....{tgm} Well, I WAS busy with that.{c:e;Damien;CloseEyes}{br}*sigh...*|{c:e;Damien;NormalBlink}Here, take it. It's a less potent version of an Elixir, so a Vulnerary.|{c:e;Damien;CloseEyes}Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to start the whole process over again.

s;Woman1;Call me a superstitious old crone,|but a bunch of wyverns out north like this is nothing but trouble!|You've been keeping up with your history lessons, haven't you?|Then I'm sure you know how Dragon Shifters were captured|and used as mounts during{br}The War of Divides.|It's a bad omen, I tell you.{c:e;Woman1;CloseEyes} Nothing good will come of this, no sir.

name: Visit
_source: s;Man2;Hm? Stay indoors?|Yes, that was what I was plan to do to begin with.|{c:e;Man2;CloseEyes}Though, this does make me uneasy.|{c:e;Man2;NormalBlink}It feels as if there is so much instability in the world at the moment.|What, with the increased raids across the nation.|Not here in Edoyama, however.{c:e;Man2;CloseEyes} Ah, how strange indeed{tgm}...
s;Girl1;Oh, can we go outside again?|Not yet? Aw{tgm}...{tgm} Okay.|Hey, since you're here, do you want this pretty rock I found?|Here you go!
s;Man1;Psst. Hey, you. I know what you guys are trying to do.|I've been hearing things. Take this with ya.|Don't ask where I got it from.
s;Woman3;I was just out shopping when the imperial army came|and told us to stay indoors.|They said the Medeans were coming, but beyond that, nothing else.|I hope this ends soon{tgm}...

s;Man3;The world has certainly gone to the dogs.|{c:e;Man3;NormalBlink}I wouldn't say another War of Divides is gonna start. That's too extreme.|But still,|it's concerning how much the emperor doesn't seem to care about what's going on outside of Edoyama.|My daughter and her family's out in the boonies, darn it!|While I have a cushy life here, they're out there suffering!|{c:e;Man3;CloseEyes}I just want it all to end.

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Steel Sword,Iron Blade,Steel Lance,Javelin,Steel Axe,Hand Axe,Steel Bow;armory

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Killing Edge,Steel Blade,Killer Lance,Killer Axe,Killer Bow;armory

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;After defending the village of Windbrook from Foliaga's Holy Knights,|Krista and friends make their way towards Lake Lunaris|to prepare for the rest of their journey to Foliaga's capital.|The sun begins to set, so the party makes camp in the forest for the evening.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
if;u('Michael').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Michael') == True and u('Ecco').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Ecco') == True
s;Krista;So, the Archbishop's using the Holy Knights to kidnap people, huh?|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Just how many of them are there?
s;Aqua;Foliaga has many Knights overseeing different regions of the nation.|It would be difficult to find a settlement|that doesn't have at least a Knight or two stationed there.
s;Forrest;Perhaps we should re-think our approach, then.|It would be unwise to keep fighting off the Holy Knights left and right.

s;Kai;Still, we can't be trekking through woods forever. That'll take up too much time.|Not to mention we need to stock up on supplies whenever we can.|Let's stick with the original plan for now.|The Knights will more than likely not know about what happened in Windbrook yet.|As long as we keep our heads low, we shouldn't arouse suspiscion.
s;Krista;Sounds good to me. Let's turn in for the night.|We've gotta keep our energy up.
s;SoldierGreen;General Adler, sir! We have located the Medean force's camp.
s;Adler;Good work, men. Surround their camp and prepare to ambush them.|Report back here once they have been terminated.
s;Krista;Forrest, I swear by Medea, if you're gonna say we're under attack, I will scream.
s;Krista;MEDEA.{c:wait;200} DAMN IT.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Wake everyone up. I dunno who's out there, but let's make this quick.
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;Despite knowing the dangers, Krista and friends continue onwards towards Lake Lunaris|to stock up on supplies as they venture further into Foliaga.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
if;u('Ecco').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Ecco') == True and game.check_alive('Viola') == True
s;Krista;Wow, it's really pretty here! And look at that lake!|I would love to sightsee for a bit.
s;Forrest;We can't stay here for too long.|We need to gather supplies and leave as soon as possible.|Who knows if the Knights stationed here already know about us.
s;Krista;Mannnn{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm} But, yeah. You're right.|I'd hate to run into the Knights again.
s;Krista;Everyone, let's split up and grab everything we need!|And once we're done, we'll meet back here and get moving.
s;Forrest;Everyone is accounted for, Your Highness.
s;Krista;You've got to be kidding me.
s;Lorelei;Princess of Medeas!|By order of Archbishop Azalea, you are to surrender at once!
s;Krista;The town's northern gate is just up ahead.|Let's get outta here, guys!
s;Jake;Thanks for the drink, Miss Marina.
s;Marina;Of course, Jake!{c:e;Marina;FarWink,Smile} Stay safe when you leave town again, you hear?
s;Marina;Say, do you hear all that commotion outside?
s;Jake;Oh man, do you think it's the Holy Knights again?
s;Marina;I wouldn't be surprised.|{c:e;Marina;CloseEyes}Ugh, I'm sick and tired of this!|{c:e;Marina;NormalBlink}I'm going out there and giving those Knights a piece of my mind!
s;Jake;What!? Miss Marina, wait!|It's too dangerous!
s;Marina;Oh my{tgm}...{tgm} There's a lot more of them than I thought there would be.
s;Marina;Hm? Who are those people over there? Are they fighting off the Knights?|Maybe they can help!
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;<green>Guide</>;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;Agreeing to help Anna and Jake,|Krista and friends travel deep within the former village of Hache Valley|to ambush the Holy Knights stationed there.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
s;Krista;Here? In the middle of nowhere?
s;Jake;It didn't used to be like this.|It was a humble village before the Holy Knights raided it.|Now it's nothing more than a military base.
s;Krista;Woah{tgm}...{tgm} That all happened a year ago?

s;Jake;Mhmm. A real dang shame.|{c:e;Jake;CloseEyes}I just hope the villagers are okay.|We don't really know where they ran off to.|{c:e;Jake;HalfCloseEyes}If the Knights didn't capture them, that is.
s;Anna;That's why we're doing this.|Not only will we have a place to sell our wares again,|but Hache Valley's citizens will have a home to return to as well.
s;Krista;Me and my friends will do our best to help!
s;Anna;So, here's the plan: we'll seize each of the forts in the valley.
s;Anna;Once we claim the forts, there's no doubt in my mind the Knights will turn tail.|Let's do this!
s;SoldierGreen;Captain Daphne! We have an emergency!|Intruders are approaching from the south!
s;Daphne;What?! Who dares to set foot here?
s;SoldierGreen;The Medean princess and two merchants, Captain.
s;Daphne;Two merchants, you say? So, they came back{tgm}...|{c:e;Daphne;NormalBlink}{tgm}Defend the forts! We cannot let them take this base!
s;Krista;Looks like they've got some big guys defending the forts.|Be careful, everyone!
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;With their new companions Anna and Jake at their side,|Krista and friends continue onwards and arrive in Mossgrove.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;;With her companions rescued from the clutches of the Holy Knights,|Krista continues onward and arrives in Mossgrove.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;;After eluding the Holy Knights once again,|Krista and friends continue onwards and arrive in Mossgrove.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;;Dealing with the Seagrave Pirates once and for all,|Krista and friends continue onwards and arrive in Mossgrove.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
if;game.check_alive('Anil') == True and u('Anil').team == 'player' and u('Jake').team == 'player'
s;Kai;Alright, Mossgrove is just ahead.|With the Holy Knights hunting us down,|we should figure out how to get in without getting caught.
s;Krista;I say we make sure Aqua gets in town safely first.|She's key to getting us to Oakenfaire, after all.|Of course, if that's okay with you, Aqua.
s;Aqua;I can do that, Your Highness.|I'll do my best!
s;Semi;Let me go in with her.|If one of the Knights recognizes her, I'll be there to get her out just in case.|Otherwise, I'll report back when Aqua finds a way in.
s;Krista;Good idea. Be careful, you two!
s;Kai;Let's hope they make it back alright.
s;Krista;Think a few of us can sneak into the city and try to do one last shopping trip?|I got a feeling we won't be able to get more stuff once we reach the capital.
s;Kai;It's risky, but you have a point.|Let's try not to draw attention to ourselves while we're there.
s;Semi;A couple of Knights were also willing to help us find a better route to the capital.
s;Krista;Nice! Time to move out, everyone!|Semi, lead the way.
s;Aqua;Thank you, Your Highness.{c:e;Aqua;NoSmile} Now that we're here{tgm}...
s;Aqua;There are many exits to Foliaga's other major cities.|The one to Oakenfaire specifically is{tgm}...
s;Krista;That's quite a way's away.{br}Let's be careful, guys.
s;Vernon;How did the Medeans know about this tunnel?|Oh, it doesn't matter now.
s;Vernon;Just as we suspected, the Medeans are using the tunnels to reach Her Excellency.
s;Vernon;I shall not let them get past me!|For Her Excellency! For Foliaga!
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;Rising out of Foliaga's tunnels, Krista and friends finally arrive in Oakenfaire.|They pass through the entrance hall of its monestary|and enter the courtyard where danger lurks and awaits their arrival.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
s;Krista;Now that we're here, let's figure out where the Grand Temple of Folia is.
s;Semi;It couldn't possibly be that big important building over there.
s;Krista;Good eye! As long as one off us secures the entrance, we can get inside.|Let's move out!
s;Celeste;Finally made it. Those Knights won't know what's coming to them!|{c:e;Celeste;Smile}Don't worry, Michael. Celeste's here to save you from those nasty Knights!
s;Celeste;Oh, no! There's Knights under mind-control magic here too?|Let's see{tgm}...{tgm} there's gotta be something here that's acting as the magic's source{tgm}...|{tgm}There!
s;Celeste;<red>Just gotta destroy those gems on those walls!</>|{c:e;Celeste;CloseEyes}Oh, Michael{tgm}...{tgm} I hope I'm not too late.
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;Securing a path to the Grand Temple of Folia,|Krista and friends push forward and prepare to confront the Archbishop.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
s;Krista;Y'know, I expected a lot of things in terms of the temple's architecture,|but I definitely wasn't expecting this.
s;Aqua;Folia presides over the forests,|so it's only natural his main temple integrates itself with them.
s;Kai;It may be difficult to navigate through here because of that.|Keep your sense of direction, everyone.
s;SoldierGreen;Your Excellency! Lord Ferrach!|The Medean forces have breached the temple!
s;Ferrach;Protect the inner chamber. No harm must come to Her Excellency.
s;Ferrach;Medea and his allies, Lord Folia.
s;Ferrach;Yes, yes. You remember him, don't you?|{c:e;Ferrach;HalfCloseEyes}That ungrateful little whelp who did nothing but betray you?
s;Ferrach;Show him no mercy, milord. Do it for Father.
s;Krista;Figures they wouldn't make this easy for us.|Come on, everyone! To the Archbishop!
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;Leaving Archbishop Azalea in the care of her most trusted clergymen,|Krista and friends return to Medeas to prepare for their new mission:|Saving Yondo from the dark forces that threaten it.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags and not in game.level.unit_groups.get('Circ').units]
if;game.check_alive('Chell') == True and game.check_alive('Sam') == True and {v:ChellSamBase} == 1
if;u('Marina').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Marina') == True and game.check_alive('Alex') == True
s;Soromir;Ferrach has been out longer than anticipated.|{c:e;Soromir;HalfCloseEyes}Could Medea's accursed spawn really have bested him?
s;Agrona;We must have faith in him, Lady Soromir.|He is no weak man.
s;Milo;Like you would ever speak ill of him in the first place.
s;Ferrach;Sorry, love. Didn't mean to cause any worry.|{c:e;Ferrach;NoSmile}And I apologize for my tardiness, Lady Soromir.|There were{tgm}...{tgm} complications.
s;Ferrach;Motherfucker took my staff.{c:e;Ferrach;CloseEyes} Can't have shit in Yondo.
s;Ferrach;We may have underestimated Medea's ilk.|She's freed Folia's child from his influence.
s;Soromir;A disappointing outcome, but not a completely unexpected one either.
s;Soromir;If things did not happen the way they did one year ago,|perhaps our plans could have actually aligned.
s;Agrona;If SOMEONE put more thought into his targets,|we wouldn't be in this situation in the first place.
s;Milo;Hey, hey, hey!|How was I supposed to know that was gonna happen to Fueg's kid?!
s;Soromir;You three return to your posts and await further instructions.
s;Soromir;What is the spawn of Medea's next course of action?
s;Ferrach;She and her allies are returning to Medeas to plan their next move.|Shall I keep an eye on them for you, my lady?
s;Soromir;Yes. Report back with your findings.

s;Soromir;Medea{tgm}...{tgm} Do you not see what you've wraught?|Countless milennia of suffering by your hand just to come to this?|{c:e;Soromir;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Your reign shall end soon. Just you wait.
s;Krista;Mother! Father! You won't believe this. There was--
s;Thalia;Political turmoil in Foliaga in which you let yourself get involved.|Yes, we were aware of that.
s;Bryant;Your mother and I were to take care of the situation ourselves,|but you had already run off before we could.

s;Bryant;Krista, we know that it is the Medean royal family's duty|to uphold peace amongst Yondo's nations.|And I am glad you take that to heart.|However, you cannot just insert yourself into another nation's internal conflicts.|Especially not without consulting us first.
s;Thalia;You are still young and learning how to be a proper ruler, Krista.|Although Archbishop Azalea has been subdued,|there are things beyond that that we'll need to assist Foliaga with.
s;Krista;But it's not just Foliaga. The other nations need help too!
s;Bryant;And we are aware of that as well.|These are trying times, Krista.|We must plan ahead for each nation's future.
s;Forrest;May I speak on Her Highness' behalf, Your Majesty?
s;Forrest;I would like to make a proposition.
s;Forrest;You and Queen Thalia will have your hands full assisting Foliaga, correct?

s;Forrest;Then, I implore you to let Her Highness take care of the other conflicts in Yondo.|If you take the time to lend aid to Foliaga,|Princess Krista may already have stabalized another nation's condition.|Stablize it enough for you to step in and lend aid to them, even.
s;Thalia;This would allow us to send more resources to Foliaga.|And it would give us more time to thouroughly plan how to aid the rest of the continent.
s;Bryant;Those are good points.|I shall allow this then, Sir Forrest.
s;Bryant;Krista, before you decide on what to do next,|I advise you to invite your cousin Parker to your strategy meeting.|He is currently visiting the castle.
s;Bryant;Yes. He is currently in the guest chambers--
s;Thalia;It's a good thing that was the last thing you had to tell her, dear.
s;Forrest;I shall go after her, Your Majesty.
s;Bryant;Before you do, there is one more thing.
s;Bryant;Thank you for protecting Krista all this time. Keep up the good work.
s;Forrest;There is no need for thanks. I am only upholding my duties.
s;Parker;Back from your{tgm}...{tgm}{br}"bandit outing," I see.
s;Krista;U-Uh, yeah{tgm}...!{tgm}{br}Sure am! Haha{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm}Immediately changing subjects!|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Who's the kid?
s;Parker;My apprentice. I have taken him on recently.
s;Krista;Nice to meet you, Cole. So, what's Parker been teaching you?
s;Krista;Oh, nice!|With Parker as your teacher, you're gonna be the best mage in the world!
s;Parker;With introductions out of the way, you had other business with me, right?|Something pertaining to what just happened in Foliaga?
s;Krista;Heh, nothing gets past you, huh?|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,NoSmile}But yeah, I'm gonna get a strategy meeting going to decide what to do from here.|Mind sitting in and give your input?
s;Parker;I do not mind at all.

s;Krista;Alright, everyone. With Archbishop Azalea down, we've learned a few things.|First off, she didn't act of her own accord. She was being influenced by someone.|Secondly, that someone can use some pretty powerful magic.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}And thirdly, well{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm} I'm gonna let Kai take over here.|He's got more insight on this next part than I do.

s;Kai;Thank you, Your Highness.|{c:e;Kai;NoSmile}For context on this next point,|Princess Krista found a strange marking on the Archbishop's neck.|While I do not know what this mark symbolizes, I have seen it before.
s;Kai;Yes. The same mark was on Emperor Samegoro's body.
s;Parker;The emperor of Merinas{tgm}...{tgm} That's concerning.|{c:e;Parker;NormalBlink}If what you're saying is true,|then Samegoro is most likely under the same thrall as Azalea was.
s;Forrest;How would you know about this mark on the emperor's body, Kai?
s;Kai;I served the emperor for a time.|{c:e;Kai;Smile,CloseEyes}With me being a mercenary from Merinas,|is it any surprise that the emperor would choose to hire me sometimes?
s;Forrest;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} I suppose that makes sense.
s;Kai;So, yes, I have seen the mark on the emperor's body while under his service.|I{tgm}...{tgm} can't say for sure if his behavior changed recently.|However, I would not be surprised if it has.
s;Forrest;Was there anyone else under his service marked as well?
s;Kai;From what I've observed, no. It was just him.
s;Krista;Well, that settles it! We've got a lead, so I say we head to Merinas first.
s;Kai;H-Hold on. We should consider our other options first.
s;Parker;Kai is right.|We must consider how much at risk Fuegsol and Oregot are as well.
s;Krista;Yeah, I guess you guys have a point.
s;Forrest;I believe Merinas would still be our best option right now.
s;Forrest;If we think about this logically,|then it should be obvious why Merinas should be our next destination.
s;;<red>Tactics Logic</red> is a segment where Krista will need to come to logical conclusions on how to continue the story.;;150;hint;no_sound
s;;You will be presented with three choices. Choose the <red>most logical answer</> of the three!;StyleNid=hint;no_sound
s;;Answering all questions correctly will give a <red>boost in all stats</> for the chapter!;StyleNid=hint;no_sound
s;;That's it for the tutorial. Let's get started!;;130;hint;NumLines=2;no_sound
s;Forrest;We know both Emperor Samegoro and Archbishop Azalea|were marked by that strange symbol.|Now, what do both the Emperor and the Archbishop have in common?;bottom
choice;ch11_1;What did they have in common?;They are the same gender.,They are the sole rulers of their nations.,They are the same age.
if;v('ch11_1') == 'They are the sole rulers of their nations.'
s;Krista;They rule over their respective countries on their own.;bottom
s;Forrest;We do not know that for sure.;bottom
if;v('ch11_1') != 'They are the sole rulers of their nations.'
s;Forrest;What I was getting at was that they are the sole rulers of their respective countries.;bottom

s;Forrest;With that being said, Oregot has an entire council,|and both King Gerolt and Queen Leeann are ruling Fuegsol together.|And we know that no one other than the emperor and the archbishop were marked.|What can we conclude from this?;bottom
choice;ch11_2;If they were the only ones marked...?;Marks only affect the person they are on.,The marks can spread to other people.,The other rulers will not be affected.
if;v('ch11_2') == 'Marks only affect the person they are on.'
s;Krista;That the marks can only influence the person they were put on.;bottom
elif;v('ch11_2') == 'The marks can spread to other people.'
s;Forrest;We have already established that they can't.;bottom
s;Forrest;While that could be true, we do not know that for sure.;bottom
if;v('ch11_2') != 'Marks only affect the person they are on.'
s;Forrest;The conclusion I came to was that only one person can be marked at a time.;bottom

s;Forrest;And if that's the case,|a marked person among those who aren't will give no advantages to our adversaries.|The mark's influence will not be effective|if there is someone there to keep the marked person in check.;bottom
s;Krista;That means both Oregot and Fuegsol are probably safe for now.|If one of the rulers there get marked,|the other rulers will make sure they don't try to hurt anyone.;bottom
s;Forrest;I see that you understand now. Nicely done, Your Highness.;bottom

s;Kai;So, Merinas is the best choice for now, is it?|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}Well, it can't be helped.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}Just like with our journey to Foliaga,|we'll be heading to Merinas' capital, Edoyama.
s;Parker;We should start making preparations, then.
s;Parker;Are you saying you DON'T want my help?
s;Krista;No, not at all! I just thought you'd be busy with your own things.
s;Parker;I have my advisors to take care of things while I'm gone.|On top of that, Cole needs some practical experience with using magic.|This would be a good opportunity for him too.
s;Krista;Well, if you're cool with it, I'm cool with it.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}Glad to have you guys with us, Parker!
s;Ferrach;Well, well. Looks like they're heading your way, love.|We won't allow ourselves to be at a disadvantage. Not this time.;bottom;fit
s;Krista;Here we are at Port Gildress, everyone!|Mother and Father are letting us use one of their ships to get to Merinas.
s;BanditFemale1;Just come quietly and no one gets hurt.

s;Shinobu;Grab every villager you can! Don't leave a single one behind!|{c:e;Shinobu;CloseEyes,Smile}Heh, Ryuuji's gonna regret not having me an' these guys on the crew anymore.|If he ain't gonna rake in easy money like this, it's his loss.
s;Parker;Those flags{tgm}...{tgm} Why are the Wyrmfang Pirates here?
s;Parker;They're the most infamous pirate crew of Merinas.|But they only keep their raids to Merinas' islands.|To see them here is unusual.
s;Krista;It doesn't matter if it's weird or not.|We've gotta help the townsfolk!
s;;In this chapter, the green units will <red>escape</> to the yellow-roofed houses.;;130;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=3
s;;Player units will be <red>unable</> to visit them.;;120;hint;NumLines=2;no_sound
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;Supplied with a seaworthy vessel, Krista and crew sail towards Merinas.|Although, with the Wyrmfang Pirates ready to intercept them,|the journey there won't be as smooth as they may think.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
s;Krista;Like I said, smooth sailing.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}As long as we don't have any delays, we should be in Edoyama in no time!
s;Forrest;There are ships approaching us.|A concerning amount of them.
s;Parker;It's the Wyrmfang Pirates again.|It seems we haven't dealt with the last of their crew.
s;Ryuuji;Your ship shall go no further.|Hand over all your valuables, and we will spare your lives.
s;Taiga;Yeah, you heard the captain. Hand over the gold!|'Cause if ya don't, we ain't gonna let you go that easy!
s;Krista;Can things go right for us just for once?
s;Kai;Could that be{tgm}...?{tgm} No, it's impossible. But{tgm}...
s;Kai;The captain{tgm}...{tgm} I think I know him.
s;Kai;I can't say for sure, but he looks like someone I know.
s;Kai;Your Highness, let me talk to him.{w} Please.|Hell, you can even tell him that you know me. I don't care.
s;Kai;Your Highness, please talk to the captain on my behalf.
s;Kai;I need to know if it's actually him.
s;Krista;Sure thing, Kai.|If it's him, do you think you can talk him out of raiding our ship?
s;Kai;I hope to Merin I can.
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;With the threat of the Wyrmfang Pirates now gone,|Krista and friends continue onwards towards Edoyama.|The party decides to make a pit stop at a small island just off the coast of Medeas.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
if;game.check_alive('Lucy') == True and u('Rembrandt').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Rembrandt') == True
s;Krista;Oh, there's an island over there!
s;Kai;That should be Isle Aotani.|Home to a few villages nestled in its central mountains.
s;Forrest;We should stop here to rest and restock on supplies.
s;Kai;Thankfully, its largest village, Aotani Village, is right on the coast.|It's the perfect pit stop for travellers like us who are just passing through.
s;OldMan1;Welcome to Aotani Village, dear travelers.|What brings you here?
s;Krista;Long story short, we've got business at the capital, and we needed a place to stop.
s;OldMan1;I humbly thank you for choosing to stay in our fair village.|Please make yourselves at home.
s;Forrest;Before we do, sir, I do have one question.
s;Forrest;Have you heard anything strange going on with the empror lately?
s;OldMan1;Strange? Hm{tgm}...{tgm} It's small, but there is one thing.

s;OldMan1;As you may have observed,|Aotani Village is a common stop for those travelling between Medeas and Merinas.|Thus, our local militia has always been in top form keeping our borders safe.|However, starting around a year ago,|the emperor has ordered half of the militia to be drafted at the capital.
s;Forrest;That's concerning.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}You need protection for your borders|even if the neighboring country is on friendly terms with your own.|It's a matter of basic security.
s;OldMan1;Precisely, young one.|I'm sure a leader such as Emperor Samegoro understands such a fundamental concept.|So him giving out this order is unusual.
s;Krista;And you said this started a year ago?
s;Krista;Hmm{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm}Well, thanks for the info, sir. This was very helpful.
s;OldMan1;I am happy to be of service.|With all this in mind, could I ask a favor from all of you?

s;OldMan1;With our militia low on numbers,|would you be able to look after our farmlands on the outskirts of town?|It would only be for today.|Things have been quiet recently,|but the area has been susceptible to pirate attacks in the past.|I can see that you are all capable fighters,|but I also understand if this will be inconvenient.
s;Krista;I don't see a problem with it.|We've dealt with bandits and pirates plenty of times, so no need to worry.|We'll be on the look out.

s;OldMan1;I humbly thank you for your kindness,{br}young one.|If there is trouble, I'll be sure to send in what forces we do have for assistance.|Just know that it will take them time to come due to distance.|I'll also arrange things with the villagers|to see if we can properly accommodate you all during your stay.
s;Krista;Thank you very much, sir. We really appreciate it.
s;Forrest;Archbishop Azalea and Emperor Samegoro exhibiting strange behavior|for one whole year{tgm}...
s;Kai;And Prince Ervan's death was a year ago too, was it not?
s;Krista;It's fine.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Kai has a point. It could be connected.
s;Krista;Either way, it's been a long day.|Let's discuss this once we get settled.

s;Daigo;Quiet, peaceful, and not a soldier in sight.{c:e;Daigo;HalfCloseEyes,Smile} Just like usual. Perfect.|{c:e;Daigo;NormalBlink,Smile}Let's go, boys!|The emperor's gonna pay a pretty penny for every villager, so keep 'em alive!
s;Krista;Just happened to be a day when the village gets raided, huh?|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Alright guys, you know the drill.|Protect the villagers and their homes!
s;Taichi;Ma! What's going on out there?
s;Woman1;Pirates are attacking the village!|Taichi, Haruki, we have to stay inside no matter what.
s;Haruki;No way, I'm not gonna sit around and do nothing.|I'm going out there!
s;Haruki;We can't just let those pirates do whatever they want.|I'm going and you can't stop me!
s;Taichi;Ma, no! Don't go out there too!
s;Taichi;I'll stay here and protect you. I promise.
s;Taichi;Dang it, Haruki{tgm}...{tgm} Don't be stupid out there.;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Haruki;If Taichi's not gonna do anything, I will.
s;Haruki;Just try to get past me, you dumb pirates! I can take you all on!
s;;In this chapter, visiting houses will <red>not</> keep enemy units from interacting with them.;StyleNid=hint;no_sound

prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;Krista and friends prevent the pirate Daigo and his crew's raid on Aotani Village|and continue their journey towards Edoyama.|A heavy fog rolls in on the open sea. And with it, a new threat.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;Krista;Despite all the pirates and bandits, I'd say this trip's been pretty easygoing.
s;Forrest;I would rather not have to deal with those ruffians, but you do have a point.
s;Kai;It's been TOO easy, in my opinion.|Knowing Samegoro, he would've sent his forces after us by now.
s;Forrest;Do you think it has something to do with the the spell the emperor is under?
s;Kai;I have my theories, but nothing concrete yet.|All I can say is to proceed with caution.
s;Krista;Man, look at all that fog{tgm}...
s;Forrest;I suggest we stay put until it clears.
s;Felicity;Multiple ships are approaching us. Stay alert, Your Highness.
s;Keisha;Well, would you look at that. It's a royal Medean ship!|This must be the one the emperor's shogun was talking about, huh, Locke?
s;Locke;It most likely is, Keisha. However, we must proceed with caution.|Don't forget this may be the Medean princess's army.|They were able to subdue Foliaga's archbishop.

s;Keisha;Yeah, but if we take 'em down, we'll be rich and famous!|Think about it, Locke. The emperor has the biggest bounty on their heads.|Once we capture them and bring them to the capital,|we'll be known as the biggest, baddest crew of the northern seas!
s;Locke;That all would be nice{tgm}...|{c:e;Locke;NormalBlink}{tgm}Just don't get in over your head, Keisha.
s;BanditFemale2;Hey, you! I'm gonna see what's going on.|Now, be a good prisoner and don't try anything funny, you hear me?
s;Azure;Oh, I wouldn't dream of it.
s;Marina;It's not as if I can do anything in the first place.
s;Azure;She's finally gone. Perhaps I can find a way to escape in peace.
s;Azure;She left her key behind. How convenient. Now, then{tgm}...
s;Azure;There we go! Time to make my leave.
s;Marina;Good. She's gone. Maybe now I can find a way out of here.
s;Marina;Oh, my. Now isn't that unfortunate for her. She left her key behind.
s;Marina;I'm sure she won't mind if I borrow it for a little while.
s;Marina;Good. Time to get out of here.
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;Krista's vessel hits a storm and is sent off course across Merinas's seas.|Now shipwrecked, our heroes attempt to regain their bearings and plan their next move.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
s;Forrest;Ugh{tgm}...{tgm} Your Highness, can we please not do this bit right now?
s;Krista;Haha! I knew you'd respond to my lame joke!|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}Are you alright?
s;Forrest;{tgm}...|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}{tgm}Medea, I'm ready to go. Take me to the other side.
s;Krista;Oh, don't give me that!|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Come on, up and at 'em! We need to find the others!
s;Forrest;Don't rush me, Krista.|{c:e;Forrest;HalfCloseEyes}It may be news to you, but we just got shipwrecked not too long ago.
s;Krista;And that's why we need to act fast! Let's go!
s;Kai;A bit scuffed here and there, but we all survived.
s;Felicity;This was nothing. I've dealt with worse.
s;Parker;Unfortunately, our ship wasn't so lucky.
s;Krista;So you're saying all that driftwood ISN'T a natural occurence?
s;Parker;Thankfully, the ship is salvagable.|It would just need some work to get it afloat again.
s;Felicity;There seems to be enough supplies that drifted ashore to do the repairs.
s;Krista;Oh, nice! Let's gather everything up and get to work!
s;Yuma;These must be the Medeans that shogun has been talking about.|{c:e;Yuma;Smile}And would you look at that. They're completely shipwrecked!|This'll be an easy job.
s;Yuma;Everyone, come out! We've got a bounty to collect!
s;Krista;What the--?!|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Oh, Medea, you've gotta be kidding me.
s;Parker;We have to salvage as much of our supplies as we can.|If those ruffians destroy everything we have, we may be stranded here.
s;Krista;Got it. Let's gather up everything and get them all to one area.

s;Rembrandt;Finally made it. Now, are there any survivors from the wreck{tgm}...?|{c:e;Rembrandt;CloseEyes}{tgm}Good. It seems like there are.|{c:e;Rembrandt;NormalBlink}But those bandits will give them trouble if I don't do something.|I must get to them quickly!
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;With their ship's repairs completed, Krista and friends set sail again.|They renavigate themselves back on track and sail towards Edoyama once more.|They make a pit stop at the affluent Gintoki Island|where they may finally catch a break for once.;StyleNid=overworld_narration

s;;With the Scourge Sisters apprehended,|Krista and crew continue to sail northward to Edoyama.|They make a pit stop at the affluent Gintoki Island|where they may finally catch a break for once.;StyleNid=overworld_narration

if;game.check_alive('Lucy') == True and game.check_alive('Cole') == True and u('Michael').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Michael') == True and u('Celeste').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Celeste') == True and u('Haruki').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Haruki') == True

s;Krista;This has gotta be the liveliest town we've been in so far.

s;Kai;Well, Gintoki City is the most populated settlement in Merinas.|Other than Edoyama, of course.|{c:e;Kai;NoSmile}However, it is more lively than usual.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}Considering the time of year, then it must mean--
s;Yumi;My, my, aren't you a burly bunch!
s;Yumi;Welcome to Gintoki City! Y'all here for the Fortitude Festival, I assume?

s;Yumi;Yes, the Fortitude Festival!|Every year, the biggest, toughest fighters across the world gather in Gintoki|to show off their strength.|The biggest event is the Rooms of Valor tournament held at the local arena.|Twenty-six of the strongest fighters go head-to-head in one-and-one battles.|Cash prizes go out to the winners too!
s;Krista;Oh, sounds fun! We're totally in, right guys?
s;Forrest;Your Highness, we shouldn't waste our time on such diversions.
s;Yumi;Aw, don't be such a party pooper!|The tournament would really be a spectacle if a handsome knight like you participated.
s;Krista;She has a point. You are pretty handsome.
s;Kai;You are easy on the eyes, can't deny that.

s;Forrest;M-My appearance aside!|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}Considering we are spending the night here,|I suppose participating in this festival won't be a bad idea.|More money would mean a bigger budget to work with for the rest of our journey.
s;Krista;In other words, we're definitely in!
s;Yumi;Great! See y'all at the arena!
s;Forrest;Dear Medea, what have we gotten ourselves into?
s;Krista;Oh, relax!|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}After all we've gone through lately, I think we deserve a breather.|Let's give Gintoki City a good show!
s;Kai;Don't forget to strut your stuff, Forrest.
s;;Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the 53rd annual Fortitude Festival!;bottom;hold;no_block
s;;Twenty-six fighters from all over the continent have come to show their might!;bottom;hold;no_block
s;;This year's Rooms of Valor tournament is one you don't wanna miss!;bottom;hold;no_block
s;;We've got a bunch of new faces this year.{br}Will they come out on top?;bottom;hold;no_block
s;;Alright, all fighters are now in position.{br}Let's begin!;bottom;hold;no_block
s;Yumi;Alright, everyone! Let's have a nice clean fight.|And don't forget to have fun with it, okay~?
s;;For this chapter, the following conditions will be in place:;;110;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;You will <red>earn money</> based on the level difference between your unit and their opponent.;StyleNid=hint;no_sound
s;;Units will <red>not be able to access the convoy</> during the battle.;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;Any units that fall <red>will revive</> at the end of the chapter.;;110;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;If you have <red>less than 13 units</> to deploy, <red>generic NPC units</> will spawn on any empty deployment spaces.;center;180;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;At sunrise, Krista and crew board their ship and set sail once again.|After a few day's time at sea, they drop anchor on the Ikezora Isles to rest.|Despite their brief moment of respite, danger never ceased to follow our heroes.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
s;Krista;So, Kai, that one village is just down the road from here, right?
s;Kai;Yup, Ikezora Village. It's the only place for miles.|And not many people pass through there|since it's smack dab in the middle of this mountain range.
s;Krista;So that means less of a chance to deal with bandits and pirates!|Let's keep going.
s;Forrest;I wouldn't have your hopes up, Your Highness.|Look!
s;Krista;I really don't wanna fight our way through just to get to the village,|but looks like we're gonna have to.
s;Kai;That just might be easier than you think, Princess.|Looks like the thugs got their attention on something else.
s;Lin;N-No{tgm}...{tgm} We're completely surrounded. Damn it!
s;Bandit3;Just give up the goods, and we'll let ya go.|{c:e;Bandit3;Smile}Hell, it's better than the alternative. LOADS better.
s;Tsurugi;But, Miss Lin, what about you?
s;Lin;Ikezora Village is just ahead. Just go! I'll fend them off!
s;Lin;You stupid bandits wanna hurt my client?|You gotta go through me first!
s;Tsurugi;There's too many of them out here. She can't take them all on at once!|{c:e;Tsurugi;CloseEyes}Someone{tgm}...{tgm} Help{tgm}...!
s;Krista;Huh? Wait, up in the sky! Isn't that{tgm}...?
s;Forrest;Lin was one of the royal army's Pegasus Knights.|She vanished without a trace years ago.
s;Krista;Is this where she's been all this time?|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Oh, never mind! We gotta help her!
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;With the path to Ikezora Village clear, Krista and friends take a well-deserved rest|and plan their approach as they proceed closer to Edoyama.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
if;u('Lin').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Lin') == True and game.check_alive('Chell') == True and game.check_alive('Viola') == True
if;(game.check_dead('Chell') == True or game.check_dead('Viola') == True) and u('Lin').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Lin') == True
s;Krista;Things are more dicey than we thought.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Emperor Samegoro's in too deep with the enemy.
s;Felicity;Indeed. He enlisted the aid of brigands and pirates, after all.|With the number of ruffians we've faced,|we may as well be facing off against the Merinese army itself.
s;Forrest;If we could get one step ahead of them,|we wouldn't keep getting slowed down by enemy forces.
s;Kai;While not an ideal way of going about things, I do have an idea.

s;Kai;We'll head for Fort Daijima.|It's a military outpost on a large island east of Edoyama.|We can get info on the Emperor's forces, weak points in his castle's defenses,|and maybe even get some clues about who's pulling his strings.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}But{tgm}...
s;Kai;With it being the closest outpost to the castle, it's also gonna be the most fortified.|While it's gonna be the best source of info, we gotta be careful about our approach.
s;Kai;We approach it from an unexpected angle, of course.|{c:e;Kai;NoSmile}Instead of dropping anchor onto the island directly from its east side,|we'll approach it from the northern shore.
s;Felicity;I see. There's no other settlements towards the north,|so why would they expect any ships coming from that direction?
s;Kai;Exactly.|{c:e;Kai;NoSmile}This would mean we'd add another day or so to our estimated time of arrival to Edoyama.
s;Forrest;A sacrifice we must be willing to make in order to get the upperhand.
s;Krista;Yeah, agreed. We'll set sail tomorrow!
s;Krista;So, everyone have a good rest?
s;Forrest;It seems so, Your Highness.|We will set sail once we've done any last minute preparations.
s;Shigeo;Yes, just as reported, the Medean forces are right in Ikezora Village.|Wailing Zephyrs! Move out and capture them!
s;Krista;It's a bunch of wyvern riders like Felicity said.|And a bunch of other bandits too!|Come on, everyone, let's take 'em down and get outta here!
s;Krista;Aw, shoot! We gotta fend them off. Let's go, everyone!

s;Khalid;Yeesh, what's with all these bandits here?|I know that Merinas has been having an issue with them,|but this is way more than I expected.|They're just gonna make looking for Krista harder than it should.
s;Reem;Your Highness, look! There's a Medean royal ship docked at that port.
s;Khalid;Good eye, Reem! That means we finally caught up to her.|How's about we get these bandits outta her hair?
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;Agreeing to help the travelling merchants Anna and Jake,|Krista and friends set sail and prepare to confront the troublesome pirate crew.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
s;Anna;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} It's been too quiet out here.
s;Jake;Yeah, real suspicious.|We'd have the Riptide Pirates all over our ships by now.
s;Krista;Maybe they got scared when they saw a royal Medean vessel coming this way.
s;Anna;That's a nice thought, but that doesn't exactly solve the problem.|{c:e;Anna;NormalBlink,Smile}We need to get rid of those guys so everyone can use this sea route safely.
s;Krista;Yeah, good point.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}Why don't we just drop anchor here, then?|We can just let them come to us!
s;Anna;Whoa there! Are you sure that's a good idea?
s;Krista;Anna, you've got a more than capable crew at your disposal here.|We can take on whatever comes at us no problem!

s;Saburo;So it was a Medean ship that I saw. And those merchants are here too.|{c:e;Saburo;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}You two ain't too smart, comin' here again.|{c:e;Saburo;CloseEyes,NoSmile}If you ain't gonna hand over your goods, me an' the boys got no choice.
s;Jake;That does it. Those guys are gonna pay!|{c:e;Jake;NormalBlink}Let's get 'em, Your Highness!
s;Anna;Your Highness,|we have to make sure damage to our merchandise is kept to a minimum.|<red>If all our crates get busted, there's no point in continuing here.</>
s;Jake;I took the time to get some ballistae mounted on our ships too!
s;Jake;I made them super easy to operate, so anyone can use them!|And we've got enchanted ammo for any magic casters on board.|You just gotta walk up to them and <red>Use</> them.
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;With the Riptide Pirates eradicated,|Krista and her new companions Anna and Jake set sail towards Shizukawa Isle|to prepare their ambush on the enemy's stronghold.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;;With the Wailing Zephyrs out of the way,|Krista and friends set sail towards Shizukawa Isle|to prepare their ambush on the enemy stronghold.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;femaleUnits;[u for u in game.level.units if u.generic == True and 'Tile' not in u.tags and u.team == 'enemy_1' or u.team == 'other']
s;Krista;Well, the inn's just ahead! Let's get checked in and rest up.

s;OldMan2;Greetings travelers. I am the mayor of Shizukawa Village.|Under normal circumstances, I would give a warmer welcome.|I apologize for what I'm about to say,|but I would advise taking respite elsewhere.
s;OldMan2;You see, the women of our village are being stolen away in the night.|Witnesses say that a ghost is responsible.
s;OldMan2;That is what the men in town have claimed.
s;Krista;No offense, sir, but ghosts don't exist.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}But that doesn't mean the problem doesn't either.|What did this "ghost" look like?
s;OldMan2;She had hair as dark as night and skin as white as snow.|It's also said that she has underlings that come with her to assist in the abductions.
s;Krista;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} She does sound ghost-like.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}And to be honest, it just sounds like a local bandit group causing trouble.
s;Krista;And that gives me a great idea!
s;Forrest;Your Highness, don't you dare say--
s;Krista;Tonight, I'm gonna let myself get kidnapped by this so-called ghost!

s;Krista;Forrest, think about it!|If that ghost and her flunkies are going after women,|that makes me an easy target, right?|I can infiltrate and take them down from the inside.|Then you and the rest of the group can come in for back up!
s;Forrest;I realize that. However, does the bait have to be you specifically?
s;Krista;Obviously! I have a talent for purposefully getting kidnapped, after all.
s;Forrest;That isn't something to be proud of.
s;OldMan2;That is very brave of you, young lady.|Why, I applaud your courage! Please proceed with your plan.|Anything to return our citizens home.
s;OldMan2;I thank you again for your assistance.|May I please ask your name, young lady?
s;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas. Nice to meet you!
s;OldMan2;The{tgm}...{tgm} princess of Medeas, you say?|Ahem, yes, thank you again, Your Highness.
s;Krista;It's pretty dark out now.|Wonder when that ghost is gonna show up?
s;Bandit2;Alright, you. Come quietly and I won't have to hurt you.
s;Krista;I expected a woman, but I can improvise.{w}{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes,Smile} Ahem.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Oh no, whatever shall I do~?|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes,Smile}Take me away, big guy.
s;Bandit2;{tgm}...{w}{c:e;Bandit2;CloseEyes}{tgm} You are WAY too happy about this.
s;Forrest;Her Highness is in the enemies' clutches. Time to move!|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}Krista{tgm}...{tgm} Don't get in over your head.
s;Bandit2;Now, all of you just sit quietly and don't cause a ruckus.|I'm gonna let the boss know about our haul.
s;Woman3;This is terrible! What are they going to do with us?
s;Krista;Hey, don't sweat it.|I can get us outta here before they have a chance to do anything.
s;Woman3;What? How? Those thugs tied us up so tightly.
s;Krista;Meh, I've had tighter. Give me a sec.
s;Woman3;That was amazing! How did you do that?

s;Krista;Just had to tense my muscles up and position my wrists in a certain way|while they were tying my hands together.|Makes it easier to slip out later on.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}Anyway, I'll get you untied too in a sec.|I need to steal that guy's key so we can get everyone out.|He'll be coming back to check on us, I'm sure.|Just act natural when he does, alright?
s;Bandit2;Looks like the boss is gonna ship you all off to Edoyama first thing in the morning.|Enjoy whatever time you've got left, girls. Ha ha ha!
s;Krista;Aw, that's too bad.|I was hoping to have a fun night with ya, you handsome stud.
s;Bandit2;What are you going on about?
s;Krista;You tied me up real nice and tight, y'know.|What else can those hands do, hm?
s;Bandit2;Oh, wouldn't you like to know?
s;Krista;Besides, it'll be the last night I get to see you, right?|Grant a girl her last wish, won't ya?
s;Bandit2;Well, when you put it that way{tgm}...
s;Bandit2;Lemme unlock your cell, then we can--
s;Krista;Told you I could.|Anyway, I'll get you untied, then we can all get outta here.
s;Hayato;And who's fault is that, huh? After them, you idiot!
s;BanditFemale3;Alright, Hayato and his men are probably heading back from their raid by now.|Just gotta--
s;BanditFemale3;Wait, Hanako? What are you doing here?!
s;Woman3;Kotomi?! I thought you were gone forever!|Where have you been this whole time?
s;BanditFemale3;You remember Yukino, right?|Follow me! She'll keep you safe!
s;Yukino;Girls, over here! To the base!
s;BanditFemale3;Go on, Hanako! I'm gonna help the others.
s;Forrest;Damn it, where did they go?!
s;Felicity;Calm yourself, Forrest.|From what I can tell, there are forts across these rivers here.|The enemy must be close by.

s;Kai;We gotta keep our eyes peeled for Her Highness and the rest of the women, then.|We'll find her, Forrest. Don't worry.|{c:e;Kai;Smile}Like Her Highness said, she's got a knack for this.|I bet she got herself and the rest of the girls free by now.
s;Felicity;Speaking of the girls, we should help them come back to the village as well.
change_unit_desc;Yukino;Leader of the Ebony Wildflowers.{br}Emotionless and focused.
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;After saving Shizukawa Village's women, Krista and crew set off for Fort Daijima.|They drop anchor north of its island and prepare for their assault.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;Felicity;The shore is mostly empty, Your Highness.|There's only a handful of soldiers stationed there.
s;Krista;In other words, time to strike!|Let's go, everyone!

s;Masashi;At this point, why should I even ask?|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink}Emperor Samegoro said to be on the look out for Medean forces,|but they have not shown their faces even once!|They could be heading straight for the capital for all we know.|{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes}If Lady Agrona were not here,|perhaps the emperor would appoint me to a more substantial assignment.
s;Hikaru;You must stay vigilant, milord. You never know when your luck may turn around.
s;Masashi;A-Ah, Lady Agrona!|{c:e;Masashi;Smile}What a{tgm}...{tgm} pleasure it is for you to grace us with your prescence.
s;Agrona;If you would refrain from speaking for one moment, I bear urgent news.
s;Agrona;As I was trying to say, be cautious.|They may infiltrate the fort from any angle.|And do not forget they are to be captured and taken to Emperor Samegoro alive.|Understood?
s;Agrona;What is it now, Lord Masashi?
s;Masashi;Just for clarification,|the one leading their forces is the Medean princess herself, correct?
s;Masashi;No, no! I only posed the question as confirmation. Nothing more.
s;Masashi;Ahem.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink,Smile}You can trust me, Lady Agrona.|The Medean forces shall be subdued post-haste!
s;Agrona;Let us hope you do just that.
s;Hikaru;{tgm}...{tgm} Milord, I know that look.
s;Masashi;Hikaru, my most trusted retainer, I have no idea what you're talking about.

s;Hikaru;First off, I'm your ONLY retainer.|{c:e;Hikaru;NormalBlink}Secondly, I don't think the gravity of the situation is getting through to you.|Don't you understand, milord?|This could be your chance of proving yourself worthy|of becoming the emperor's most trusted shogun again.|{c:e;Hikaru;CloseEyes}And you would throw that away just for some woman!
s;Masashi;She's not just "some woman", Hikaru. She's Medeas' princess!
s;Masashi;A woman of her status must be as beautiful as the cherry blossoms|that bloom at the dawn of every spring.|Ah, to catch even a glimpse of her lovely visage--;bottom;fit
s;Hikaru;You haven't even seen her face and you're already daydreaming of your wedding day{tgm}...|{c:e;Hikaru;NormalBlink}{tgm}We have a mission, milord. We must not fail.
s;Masashi;I suppose you are right.|{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes}*sigh* War can be so cruel sometimes{tgm}...
s;Hikaru;At any rate, milord, I suggest we send our forces out to each side of the island.|Seeing as the enemy is coming, we should prepare for that.
s;Masashi;An excellent idea, Hikaru. Let us prepare for battle!|{c:e;Masashi;NoSmile}Everyone, move out!
s;Krista;Hey, what gives?!|How did they assemble their forces that quickly?
s;Forrest;They must have seen us approach.
s;Felicity;Did we miscalculate from where to perform our reconnaisance?
s;Krista;Nah, that can't be it. Our ship was too far away from shore.|They'd have to have the best spyglasses to even know we were here.
s;Kai;Either way, we'd better have our own forces get a move on.|The sooner we get our hands on the leader, the sooner we can get info out of him.
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;With the shogun Masashi no longer a threat, Krista and friends sail onwards to Edoyama|and prepare to take on Emperor Samegoro.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
if;game.check_alive('Yukino') == True and u('Yukino').team == 'player' and u('Hikaru').team == 'player'
s;KristaFlashback;Oh? What is it? What is it?
s;Ervan;Yeah. But the text is so faded... I can barely make out anything else.;bottom;fit
s;Krista;What about this? I think it says... "Circ"?;bottom;fit
s;Ervan;Hm... Yeah, I think so too.;bottom;fit
s;ErvanFlashback;It's getting late, and I have to return to Fuegsol tomorrow.|{c:e;ErvanFlashback;NormalBlink}Do you mind if I take this with me?
s;KristaFlashback;Go ahead. Let me know if you find anything interesting, okay?
s;ErvanFlashback;Of course.{c:e;ErvanFlashback;NoSmile} Let's head off to bed, then.
s;KristaFlashback;Yup! Good night, Ervan. Sleep well.
s;Krista;Was it true all along, then?|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Oh, dear Medea{tgm}...{tgm} I{tgm}...{tgm} I{tgm}...!
s;Felicity;Are you alright? You seem troubled.
s;Felicity;Is it about what Masashi said? Is that bothering you?
s;Krista;I{tgm}...{tgm} No, not necessarily.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}It's just a lot to take in. That's all.
s;Felicity;About Circ{tgm}...{tgm} Just please be careful.
s;Felicity;At any rate, we should be arriving in Edoyama soon.|We'd best prepare ourselves for the battle ahead.
s;Krista;So, we can pretty much assume Samegoro's expecting us, right?
s;Forrest;With that in mind, we need a safe way to scout out the area near the castle.|That way, we know how heavily guarded it is.

s;Krista;The obvious answer is to send Kai there, right? He's from Merinas, after all.|No one would be suspicious if someone like him was wandering the capital's streets.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}Honestly, I'm surprised you didn't propose that, Kai.|Seems like something you'd bring up right away.

s;Masashi;Well, if Kai here isn't willing take the lead, I will!|For all the emperor and Agrona know, I bested you all back in Fort Daijima.|I can stroll into the capital, pretend I won, and no one would be the wiser.
s;Khalid;I can do some recon from the skies.|That way, we can get a full picture of the battlefield.
s;Krista;Sounds good to me! Just be careful out there.
s;Masashi;There are many soldiers stationed all around the castle.|Thankfully, it seems the civilians are in their homes.
s;Krista;Khalid! So, how's it looking out there?
s;Khalid;There's a bunch of soldiers parked on all sides of the castle.|No civilians in sight too, so no need to worry there.
s;Khalid;And looks like there's a moat surrounding the front gate too.
s;Kai;There's a way to lower its bridges. I'll point it out once we get there.

s;Krista;Got it!|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes,NoSmile}And at least neither Samegoro or Agrona are interested in unecessary bloodshed.|What with no civilians on the streets.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}They're expecting us, so we might as well just force our way through the front!|No need to do anything sneaky.
s;Khalid;Exactly what I was thinking.|Lead the way, Krista! I'm right behind you!
s;Krista;There's a lot of them out here{tgm}...{tgm} But it's nothing we've never faced before!|Come on, everyone! To Merinas Castle!
s;Kai;Before we move out, Your Highness, look at those pillars up ahead.
s;Kai;They each have a hidden mechanism that lowers the bridges I was talking about.|<red>Anyone who knows how to lockpick can activate them</> no problem.
s;Asuka;The Medeans are approaching! Everyone, stand your guard.|Do not let them through the front gate!
s;Sumire;Huh, the fight's starting? But{tgm}...{tgm} *yawn*|All that standing around waiting tuckered me out{tgm}...|{tgm}Maybe one little nap wouldn't hurt{tgm}...
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;Bursting through the front lines and past the front gate,|Krista and friends charge onward into Merinas Castle and prepare to ascend to its top floor|where Emperor Samegoro awaits.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
s;Kai;Looks like this floor's filled to the brim with soldiers already.|The floors above it probably aren't any different.
s;Forrest;We must move swiftly but also remain cautious moving ahead, Your Highness.
s;Tsubaki;Mm-hm. I{tgm}...{tgm} I can do this.

s;SoldierPurple;Commander Nagisa?! What are you and Lady Tsubaki doing here?|I'm in no position to issue orders, Commander,|but you must take the princess back to her room at once.|The Medeans somehow managed to infiltrate the castle!
s;Nagisa;We know. We're here to fight.
s;SoldierPurple;"We"? C-Commander, you can't possibly be suggesting--
s;Nagisa;I am. Lady Tsubaki is more than capable of fending for herself.|She's not a little girl anymore.
s;SoldierPurple;This is absurd!|We're just going to let the princess put herself in peril?
s;Tsubaki;I will help from the rear as to not put myself at risk.|I promise you I will go nowhere near the front lines.
s;SoldierPurple;I{tgm}...{tgm} Understood.|We shall not let harm come your way, my lady!
s;Woman1;Oh dear{tgm}...{tgm} There seems to be a ruckus up above.
s;Girl1;This is scary. I wanna go home!!
s;Man4;Maybe this'll be a chance for us to escape? Possibly?|With the soldiers gettin' distracted n' all{tgm}...
s;Boy1;You said that the other day, mister.
s;Man4;W-Well, if I keep sayin' it, it'll come true!|{c:e;Man4;HalfCloseEyes}R-Right?
s;;Opening the prisoners' cells will reward you with the items they have in their inventories.;StyleNid=hint;no_sound
s;;The prisoners will immediately leave the map after freeing them.;;130;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;No other rewards will be given for freeing the prisoners.;;120;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;Ascending the castle, Krista and friends proceed to the throne room and prepare for|their confrontation with Emperor Samegoro.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
s;SoldierPurple;Lady Agrona! Emperor Samegoro! The Medeans have reached the throne room!
s;Agrona;So, they made it through our defenses{tgm}...|{c:e;Agrona;NormalBlink}{tgm}Get into position and raise the bridges! Do not let them near the emperor!
s;Agrona;Lady Merin, Medea and his forces are closing in.
s;Samegoro;<violet>Medea{tgm}...{c:e;Samegoro;CloseEyes}{tgm} My dear brother{tgm}...{tgm} Why did it have to come to this?</>
s;Agrona;It is regrettable, but this is for the good of Yondo, my lady.|Medea has ruled for too long.
s;Samegoro;<violet>Yes, you are right.|{c:e;Samegoro;CloseEyes}Father{tgm}...{tgm} Forgive me for what I'm about to do.</>
s;Krista;Yeesh, there's so much water here. How are we gonna get to Samegoro?

s;Tsubaki;There are bridges connect each part of the throne room|which are <red>activated by stepping on those pressure plates on the floor</>.|They were installed by our court mages for security purposes.
s;Tsubaki;Each pressure plate activates a bridge.|The one near the throne itself <red>activates all the bridges</>.
s;Krista;Got it! Anyone who can fly or swim can get across the water pretty easy too.|Let's go, guys!
s;Ryuuji;Hey, Your Highness! The crew's here for back up.
s;Pirate1;Get in there, crew! For Captain Ryuuji!!
s;Pirate1;We're here on Captain Ryuuji's orders! Let's bust some heads!
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
if;u('Tsubaki').team == 'player' and u('Ryuuji').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Ryuuji') == True and u('Nagisa').team == 'player'
if;u('Marina').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Marina') == True and game.check_alive('Alex') == True and v('LunarisVergrande') == 'Lake Lunaris'
s;Forrest;Krista, it's alright. That was just a dream.
s;Forrest;Please take your time. I will--
s;Krista;Any more info on Circ yet?
s;Krista;I said, "Any more info on Circ yet?"
s;Krista;*sigh* There has to be something{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}I'm gonna--
s;Forrest;!!{w} Krista, please, you have been overworking yourself.;bottom;fit
s;Forrest;I know we can find out more about Ervan's circumstances this way, but you must rest.;bottom;fit
s;Krista;And keep having those nightmares?|Not a chance.;bottom;fit
s;Forrest;They have been getting worse, haven't they?;bottom;fit
s;Krista;Y-Yeah, but...|Forrest, just let me do this. Please.;bottom;fit
s;Forrest;I believe he's at the training yard. Why?
s;Krista;I gotta ask him some things.
s;Krista;Yeah. You got a minute? I need to ask you something.
s;Krista;Has anything been done with his stuff?
s;Krista;I'm just thinking that maybe he knew something.|I lent him a book before he passed, so maybe{tgm}...
s;Khalid;Got it, got it.|{c:e;Khalid;CloseEyes}But nah, his room's been left untouched.|{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink}Mother and Father couldn't bear to do anything with it yet, y'know?
s;Krista;That's understandable.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}In that case, we should plan for a visit to Fuegsol Castle.|We might be able to make headway with getting a lead about Circ.
s;Khalid;Sounds good to me! Want me to spread the word?
s;Krista;That would be great, Khalid. Thanks.
s;Ferrach;There's the woman of the hour!
s;Agrona;Please, dear. There's no need for the shallow compliments. I know I failed.|{c:e;Agrona;HalfCloseEyes}I apologize for my performance in Merinas, Lady Soromir.
s;Soromir;All that matters now is slowing the Medeans' progress.|For where we are in our plan, what you've done is enough, Agrona.
s;Milo;So, that just leaves me and Vanguard, huh?
s;Soromir;Indeed.|Vanguard, what is the status in Oregot?
s;Vanguard;Approximately eighty percent of the bandit population is still compliant, my lady.|There is enough funding from Oreg's child and his faction|to maintain the current level of control.

s;Milo;Managed to get a couple more nobles and other notable leaders on our side.|{c:e;Milo;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Speaking of which,{br}how's our "friend" doing?|{c:e;Milo;NormalBlink,Smile}Ready to work his ass yet?
s;Soromir;He will need a few more days.|However, when final preparations have been made,|I trust that you will take care of him, Milo?
s;Milo;Oh, yeah. I've been looking forward to this.
s;Soromir;Remember: there is no further room for error, Milo.
