s;Milo;Man, no faith in me at all after one little mistake.|{c:e;Milo;NormalBlink,Smile}Trust me, Lady Soromir. I know exactly how to handle this.|{c:e;Milo;CloseEyes,Smile}Hell, if it all works out, we'll be one step ahead of Medea's kid.|{c:e;Milo;FarWink,Smile}I can guarantee it.
s;Milo;No need to tell me twice.
s;Khalid;Welcome to Fuegsol Castle, everyone!|Wipe your shoes at the door, and keep a single file line at all times!
s;Krista;Okay, you dork, just lead the way.
s;SoldierRed1;Welcome back, Your Highness.|I thought you would be with the Medeans for longer.
s;Khalid;Yeah, we're on official business today.
s;SoldierRed1;It is good to see you as well, Princess Krista.|How have you been faring?
s;SoldierRed1;Good to hear!|I'm sure the king and queen would be delighted to see you again.
s;Khalid;You don't gotta be so shy around these guys, Krista.
s;Khalid;Hey, don't worry.|{c:e;Khalid;Smile}It's been a rough year. They understand.
s;SoldierRed2;And greetings to you as well, Princess Krista.|Please make yourself at home.
s;Khalid;They miss you as much, if not more than I did.|{c:e;Khalid;CloseEyes,Smile}They'll end up talking your ear off once you step into the throne room.
s;Gerolt;Oh, Khalid, what a surprise! I didn't expect you to come back so soon.

s;Leeann;And Krista! It's such a pleasure to see you again.|Why, if I knew you were coming, we would have had a room prepared for you.|{c:e;Leeann;CloseEyes,Smile}Oh, I would have had the chefs prepare a fine feast,|and the maids could have prepared the baths for you and--
s;Krista;I-It's fine, Your Majesty.|Khalid and I just had something small to take care of here.
s;Khalid;We were wondering if we could get something from Ervan's room.
s;Gerolt;Was there something of his that you needed?
s;Krista;Not exactly. There was a book I lent to him.|I was hoping to get it back.
s;Gerolt;Is that all? You don't need permission to grab something that was yours to begin with!
s;Leeann;On that note, this is something of Ervan's that we wished to give to you.
s;Leeann;Seeing as Gohar is without his rider now, and you were the closest to Ervan{tgm}...|{c:e;Leeann;NormalBlink}{tgm}I'm sure you know what I'm getting at.
s;Krista;Whoa, whoa! I mean no disrespect, but are you sure about this?|I don't have a lot of experience riding a mount.

s;Gerolt;We're absolutely sure. Ervan taught you how to ride too back in the day, right?|That's not something you can easily forget.|And I'm sure Gohar misses flying about with someone.|Might as well let that rider be someone he trusts.
s;Krista;Well, when you put it that way, I'll accept this. Thank you.
s;Khalid;Why don't we hit the stables first, then?|Get you and Gohar reunited and all that.
s;Khalid;There he is. Looks like he's taking a nap.|{c:e;Khalid;Smile}Go on. Be gentle.
s;Khalid;Alright, you big lug, you can get off her now.
s;Krista;I'll come back later, okay, Gohar?|We've got important stuff to do.
s;Judah;So, you decide to show your face around here again.
s;Judah;I believe it is my business, Your Highness. It's about Ervan, correct?|{c:e;Judah;HalfCloseEyes}Why else would she be here?
s;Khalid;Get off her back about it, already!|She had nothing to do with what happened to him.
s;Judah;Easy for you to say when you know nothing.
s;Khalid;You don't know what you're talking about either!
s;Krista;Stop it! Both of you!|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Khalid, let's just go.
s;Krista;It's fine, Khalid. You know Judah's always been like that.
s;Khalid;Yeah, but it feels like it's gotten worse ever since Ervan died.
s;Krista;He cares about him a lot. He just has a{tgm}...{tgm} unique way of showing it.
s;Khalid;You're way too forgiving, Krista. Seriously.

s;Khalid;I'm not saying it's a bad thing.|I just don't want him to walk all over you like that.|{c:e;Khalid;CloseEyes}I don't care if he was Ervan's retainer.|He has no right to treat you like garbage.
s;Krista;Khalid, you don't have to worry about it. Really.
s;Krista;Anyway, let's turn in for the night.|We can talk figure out a more solid plan in the morning.
s;Krista;Yeah, sounds like trouble. Let's go!
s;SoldierRed1;I{tgm}...{tgm} I don't know! There must have been spies in our midst.|I'm sorry, Your Highness. If we were more careful{tgm}...
s;Khalid;No use in cursing the past. We have to defend the castle now!
s;Krista;We gotta get to the throne room!
s;Khalid;No need to tell me twice.
s;Gerolt;The enemy hasn't reached us yet, but it seems like it's only a matter of time.
s;Krista;We'll drive them out of here. No matter what it takes!
s;Khalid;By the way, Krista.|There's torches all around the main hall we can light up.
s;Khalid;Just gotta stand in front of them and <red>Activate</> 'em!|One more thing, too. The torches <red>only last for a little while,</>|so they gotta be re-lit to keep seeing things.

s;Alim;Heh, with the book in my hands now, our mission is done here.|{c:e;Alim;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}But taking the castle too wouldn't be that bad either.|{c:e;Alim;CloseEyes,Smile}Lord Milo entrusting me with this ring AND getting "him" on our side?|All that made this mission a breeze.|{c:e;Alim;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}The other Talons underestimate your brilliance, milord.|{c:e;Alim;NoSmile,NormalBlink}But enough musing.|It would be best to slip out of here while I still can.
s;Alim;<red>I'll also have to put out any torches to keep myself out of sight.</>|Don't want to let the Medeans get an easy shot on me.
s;;Doors in this chapter can be locked <red>and</> unlocked by <red>Thieves</>, <red>Rogues</>, <red>Ninjas</>, and <red>Assassins</>.;;165;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;They may also be locked and unlocked by using a <red>Door Key</> or an <red>Unlock</> staff.;;160;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;Uses of Door Keys and Unlock staves will be <red>consumed</> each time a door is locked or unlocked.;;170;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;After the assault on Fuegsol Castle, Krista and friends strategize their next move.|However, the looming threat of Circ and its forces plagues our heroes.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags]
s;Krista;Can you guys glean anything from this?|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}It's still as worn as I remember. I can't make anything out.
s;Khalid;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} There's bits and pieces about Circ, I think.|{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink}Something about "death" in here too? Probably?
s;Kai;The symbols here match those marks we've been seeing.{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes} So, maybe{tgm}...
s;Felicity;Pardon me, but would you mind if I take a closer look?
s;Krista;Sure, Felicity.|You've got the best eyes out of all of us, so maybe you can get more out of this.
s;Felicity;From what I can gather from its passages, as worn as they may be,|this book contains rituals and prayers dedicated to Circ.
s;Felicity;These prayers celebrate the cycle of life and death.|{c:e;Felicity;HalfCloseEyes}But the rituals{tgm}...{tgm} they{tgm}...
s;Felicity;Here. These diagrams should speak for themselves.
s;Krista;I{tgm}...{tgm} I think I understand what's going on here.
s;Felicity;So, Your Highness, what conclusions have you drawn?;bottom

s;Krista;Let's start off simple. What exactly is Circ?|We know that he was one of the Great Beasts, but what does he preside over?|Foliaga oversees the forests and vegetation. Fueg, the deserts and fire.|Merin, the seas and water in general.{br}Oreg, the mountains and earth.|And Medea, the plains and winds.;bottom
s;Krista;Sure, life and death are sort of associated with time,|but I don't think that's exactly it.;bottom;;thought_bubble
s;Krista;Those prayers did mention life, but I don't think that's quite it.|There's something else that has more evidence supporting it.;bottom;;thought_bubble
s;Krista;I believe that he presides over death.|The prayers in that book make it pretty obvious.;bottom
s;Felicity;I can agree with that. However, they also relate to life, do they not?;bottom

s;Krista;True. But there's more to it than just the prayers.|This book also has some interesting diagrams and pictograms in it.|I think one of these things points to Circ's main domain to be death.;bottom
choice;Ch24Question2;What proves Circ to mainly oversee death?;Depiction of his body.,The rituals themselves.,Diagrams of human cadavers.;;vertical;center

s;Krista;That... makes no sense. At all.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Why did I even consider that as an option?|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}It's obviously gotta be those body diagrams.;bottom;;thought_bubble

s;Krista;To be fair, sacrifices for appeasing gods has always been a concept.|I wouldn't say it's a strong piece of evidence for proving Circ's link with death.|It's gotta be those human cadaver diagrams.;bottom;;thought_bubble

s;Krista;Like you said, Felicity, the diagrams speak for themselves.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Showing the inside of the human body in this much detail{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}The only way someone would be able to record this is by dissection of a corpse.|With all that in mind, I'm starting to understand what our enemy is trying to do.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}A god of death, diagrams of bodies, and civilians imprisoned for no good reason{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}I think I see it now. This is what the enemy is scheming!;bottom
choice;Ch24Question3;What is the enemy planning?;Offer up civilians to Circ.,Convert the civilians into Circ worshippers.,Use the civilians as test subjects.;;vertical;center
elif;v('_last_choice') == 'Convert the civilians into Circ worshippers.'
s;Krista;A plausible theory, but with everything we've learned so far...;bottom;;thought_bubble
elif;v('_last_choice') == 'Use the civilians as test subjects.'
s;Krista;Human experimentation might be on the table.|But there might be more evidence for a different theory here.;bottom;;thought_bubble
s;Krista;Those civilians are gonna be used as offerings to Circ.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}And with so many people detained{tgm}...{tgm} Well, that has me worried.;bottom
s;Felicity;Human sacrifice, hm?|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink}A bit gruesome, wouldn't you say, Your Highness?;bottom
s;Krista;Yeah, but you see where I'm coming from, right?|Why else would they need that many prisoners?;bottom
s;Felicity;Yes, you do have a point.|{c:e;Felicity;CloseEyes}And I fear that you{tgm}...{tgm} might be correct.|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink}Although, I do have one question.;bottom
s;Felicity;What did the enemy want with the book?;bottom
s;Krista;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} That IS a good question.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}I think there's only one logical conclusion here.|Considering everything we know, I think this is why they needed it.;bottom
choice;Ch24Question4;Why does the enemy need the book?;Instructions for the ritual.,For its prayers.,They didn't need it.;;vertical;center
s;Krista;As followers of Circ, would they need to refer back to any prayers?|Seems unlikely.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Then that means...;bottom;;thought_bubble

s;Krista;They seem to know how this ritual works already.|Why else would they imprison so many people if not to perform it?|They wouldn't need this as a reference if they know what they're doing.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Then that means...;bottom;;thought_bubble

s;Krista;The thing is, they DIDN'T need it at all.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Whatever ritual they're trying to perform, they know how to do it.|They're rounding up innocent lives in droves.|They wouldn't do that without SOME idea of what to do with them.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Because of that, they must be followers of Circ themselves.|That means they're familiar enough with Circ to know what he is|and any prayers addressing him.;bottom

s;Krista;They may not need it, but you know who does?{w}{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes} Us.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}We're the ones in the dark about Circ, after all.|They were trying to block us off from key info about their plans.;bottom
s;Felicity;In other words, they were trying to slow us down.;bottom
s;Krista;No need to tell me twice.;bottom

s;Krista;Felicity, could you transcribe what's in that book?|It's a lot to go through, so just the stuff we covered should be fine for now.|But if you find any other good info, note it down and let me know.
s;Krista;Then for our next course of action,|we should focus on finding where the enemy is keeping prisoners and set them free.
s;Kai;Since Foliaga and Merinas have been freed of their influence,|we should focus our efforts on Fuegsol and Oregot.

s;Khalid;I'll deploy some scouts to search for prison camps here in Fuegsol.|Once we figure out which one's their biggest,|we can head straight there and take it down.|We can get smaller squads out to any other prison camps that are found.
s;Kai;Once we're done with that, we can start making preparations for Oregot.
s;Krista;Sounds good! We'll just keep doing what we can until then.

s;SoldierRed1;Your Highness! Princess Krista!|My squad has gotten a lead on a suspected prison camp|west of the castle in the Coral Desert.|A villager there has more info on the matter.|She will be meeting us in town to discuss more details.
s;Khalid;Good work. Let's gather everyone up and move out!
s;SoldierRed1;Your Highness, this is Shula. She's the villager I was talking about.
s;Shula;It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Your Highness.
s;Khalid;Same here, Miss Shula.|{c:e;Khalid;NoSmile}So, what's the word on that prison camp?

s;Shula;It's just north of here.|Villagers started to disappear around a few months ago,|including kids from the orphanage.|No one could figure out where they ended up until recently.|{c:e;Shula;HalfCloseEyes}To track them down, we had to resort to an, admittedly, risky plan.
s;Khalid;Are they alright?|Depending on how long they've been in that prison, there's a chance--

s;Shula;She's fine. Using herself as bait{br}was her idea.|And I've implemented a way to communicate with her despite the distance.|Still, she may be unharmed now, but things won't stay that way forever.
s;Shula;The camp is just over there.
s;Krista;So, about the{tgm}...{tgm} "informant."|What's she been doing on the inside?

s;Shula;Keeping me updated on the status of the prisoners there.|{c:e;Shula;HalfCloseEyes}It shouldn't be surprising, but some of them were taken deeper into the prison.|{c:e;Shula;CloseEyes}And never came out.
s;Khalid;Damn it! If we just knew sooner{tgm}...
s;Krista;We'll just have to save who we can.|And depending on how big this prison is, it might end up being a lot of people.|Let's hurry!

s;Shula;Kiraz{tgm}...{tgm} I don't doubt what you saw,|but was it really Solmaz who was in there with the enemy?|{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}No, I can't think about that now.{br}We have a mission.|Besides, I have to bring Kiraz her tome as promised. Then she can help from the inside.
s;Shula;Ah, yes, Your Highness. I'm fine. Let's make haste.
s;;The prisoners will immediately leave the map after freeing them and will reward the unit that freed them some EXP.;;200;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;No other rewards will be given for freeing the prisoners.;;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;Clearing a way into the enemy prison, Krista and friends head further inside.|A heavy atmosphere weighs down on our heroes as they venture down into its depths.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
for;EnemyGender;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_enemy_units() if unit.generic == True and 'NoVariant' not in unit.tags and not in game.level.unit_groups.get('copy').units]
s;Solmaz;Lord Milo, I've come to report--
s;Solmaz;Y-Yes, milord. Forgive me for my incompetance.
s;Milo;No sweat. Join up with Lady Soromir's forces.
s;Solmaz;Lady Soromir? What about{br}Lord Vanguard?|Won't the Medeans go to Oregot if they seize this fort?
s;Milo;What, you don't got faith in me and Jamal?
s;Solmaz;Ah, you're right.{br}I apologize.|{c:e;Solmaz;NormalBlink}I shall see myself to Lady Soromir's side, then.
s;Milo;I'll be leaving the fort to you now.|I've got my own preparations to take care of.
s;Jamal;Yes, Lord Milo. I will not fail.

s;Jamal;To think the truth of this world has been buried for so long{tgm}...|{tgm}Now is the time to bring it to light.|{c:e;Jamal;CloseEyes}My dear Krista, I know Lord Milo said that you oppose us.|But I'm sure if you listen to reason, you'll see the error of our ways as Humans.|{c:e;Jamal;NormalBlink}I'll make sure of it.
s;Khalid;Not just that, but there's this eerie atmosphere too.|{c:e;Khalid;HalfCloseEyes}I dunno what it is, but it's making my hair stand on end.
s;Shula;We have no time to lose. Kiraz must be somewhere here.|We have to get her out!
s;Kiraz;Miss Shula, where are you?|{c:e;Kiraz;CloseEyes}Maybe this was a bad idea{tgm}...
s;Kiraz;Wait, I can feel something. Is that{tgm}...?|{c:e;Kiraz;Smile}{tgm}Yeah! She's here!|Once she's close enough, she can get my tome over to me. Then I can really help out!
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;Venturing deeper into the prison hidden in Coral Desert,|Krista and friends find Ervan deep within it.|Many questions fill our heroes' minds as they trek back to Fuegsol Castle|with the previously presumed dead prince in tow.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;Milo;Warm welcome as usual.|{c:e;Milo;NoSmile}Anyway, Medea's kid is probably gonna be heading your way.
s;Vanguard;I assumed as much considering you're here.|I had hoped that you wouldn't have to bear this news.
s;Vanguard;You succeeding would have been preferable. That is all.
s;Milo;Anyway, Vanny, I've got intel that might interest you.
s;Milo;A subordinate of mine reported that there's a Shifter within their ranks.
s;Milo;Don't get too sentimental on me here.|They're still an enemy.
s;Milo;Yup.{c:e;Milo;Smile} Anyway, I'm gonna touch base with Soromir and the rest.|{c:e;Milo;NearWink,Smile}Catch you later!
s;Vanguard;This goes against my initial purpose.|But if I must turn my blade on their kind, then so be it.
s;Krista;This can't actually be Ervan, can it?{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes} But...;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Ervan;I can still see out of that eye, thankfully.;bottom;fit
s;KristaFlashback;You can tell me. It can't be that bad.
s;ErvanFlashback;Alright, just promise you won't laugh.
s;ErvanFlashback;I was in the garden one day, and I climbed up one of the fig trees.|{c:e;ErvanFlashback;HalfCloseEyes}Or tried to, at least.|{c:e;ErvanFlashback;CloseEyes}I slipped and, well{tgm}...
s;KristaFlashback;Aw, that's it? I thought it would've been worse.
s;ErvanFlashback;W-Worse? What do you mean worse?
s;KristaFlashback;I was expecting something like{tgm}...{tgm} you slipping in the public baths|and accidentally pulling down someone's pants while trying to steady yourself.
s;ErvanFlashback;I don't know what I was expecting, but it was NOT that.
s;KristaFlashback;Despite how you got it, I think that scar makes you look cool, Ervan.
s;KristaFlashback;Yeah! I think you should show it off more.|{c:e;KristaFlashback;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}You'll have this attractive, rugged war-hero aura about you.
s;KristaFlashback;And if you start getting some muscles too{tgm}...{tgm} Oh yeah{tgm}...
s;ErvanFlashback;Alright, alright.|{c:e;ErvanFlashback;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Though, I wouldn't mind hearing more of how you'd see me as a "rugged war-hero."

s;Krista;It really is him. This is proof enough.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}But how? I know what I saw that day.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}There's no way... He couldn't have...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Wait a sec. If he was with Circ's followers, then there's a chance they marked him.;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Krista;Let's see... Nothing on his neck.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Maybe on his chest or something?;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Ervan;Ah, did you cut your hair recently?|{c:e;Ervan;Smile}You still look cute.
s;Khalid;Krista, is everything okay? I heard you yell and{tgm}...{w}{c:music_clear}{c:m;Girl of the Plains}{tgm} Uh.
s;Krista;I-It's not what it looks like!
s;Khalid;Heh, I know that you haven't seen him in a year, but at least lock the door first.
s;Krista;It's not like that, I swear!
s;Ervan;Haha,{c:e;Ervan;NormalBlink,Smile} no need to tease her like that, Khalid.|{c:e;Ervan;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Besides, I know I didn't mind the extra attention.
s;Khalid;Oh, yeah.{c:e;Khalid;FarWink,Smile} I'm sure Krista took REAL good care of you.
s;Ervan;I'm not feeling all there right now,|{c:e;Ervan;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}but I'm sure if she stayed a little longer{tgm}...

s;Khalid;Alright, alright. Let's give her a break.|Besides, you gotta rest up more.|Krista and I got some important business to attend to.|We'll get you caught up after we get the nurses to look after you.
s;Khalid;And put your shirt back on.|{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink,Smile}We don't want anyone to get the wrong idea, right?
s;Ervan;I dunno. Seems like my state of undress says enough.
s;Krista;Ugh, you two are terrible.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Let's just go, Khalid.{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink} And, uh. See you later, Ervan.
s;Krista;That was{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm} nice.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}For a minute there, it was like nothing happened, y'know?
s;Krista;And it's like he doesn't even remember dying.
s;Khalid;Yeah, it's weird.|Do you think those Circ guys did something to mess with his head?
s;Krista;Maybe. It's hard to say.|Let's head to the war room and see what the others think.
s;Forrest;His Highness shows no signs of remembering his death, hm{tgm}...?
s;Parker;And you are sure he wasn't marked either?

s;Kai;I don't like this. Not one bit.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}Prince Ervan being alive raises too many questions.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}What actually happened when he died? What do Circ's forces want with him?|{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes}Can his amnesia be taken at face value?

s;Khalid;I really don't wanna doubt him, but you have a point.|{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink}At the same time, what are we supposed to do?|With how things are going, we gotta head into Oregot next.|{c:e;Khalid;HalfCloseEyes}We can't just leave him here. What if something happens while we're gone?
s;Kai;True, but I don't like the idea of taking him with us either.|He could secretly feed info to the enemy right under our noses.
s;Krista;What if we keep an eye on him for a bit before we start heading to Oregot?|I know time is of the essence,|but that little bit of prep might help in the long run.
s;Forrest;This could work, but it would depend on the current state of Oregot.|If Circ's forces are showing any signs of seizing the country,|then we cannot waste any time.

s;Parker;I have sent scouts to the capital city of Orobas some time ago.|According to them, the unrest within the Oregotian Council has not escalated.|I believe we can afford to delay our campaign, but not for too long.
s;Krista;Alright, let's give ourselves a week, then.|In that time, we'll keep an eye on Ervan|and see if there's anything suspicious with him going on.|Then, it's off to Orobas!
s;Khalid;Nothing weird going on with him from what I can tell.|Won't hurt to still keep checking up on him, though.
s;Krista;It's alright.{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes} And sorry for dragging you with us.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}You need your rest, but we also need to keep an eye on you.
s;Ervan;I understand. I'll try my best to not be a burden.|When I feel recovered enough, I'll do my part on the battlefield too.
s;Krista;Just don't push yourself too hard.
s;Krista;Okay, everyone. Time to move out!
s;Bandit3;Boss, we've got trouble! The Medean army's heading this way!

s;Reid;What?!|We got told by that big clanker they wouldn't be here 'til at least another week.|{c:e;Reid;CloseEyes}Argh, whatever. We'll work around this.|{c:e;Reid;NormalBlink}Sound the alarm! Get everyone out there!
s;Krista;Aw yeah, good ol' Oregot.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}Pretty nostalgic, huh, Forrest?
s;Forrest;Right down to the horde of bandits heading straight for us.

s;Krista;With how Circ's Talons have been putting the Holy Knights and pirates under their command,|we shouldn't be that surprised they'd be here.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}Not that it'll be a tough job for us.{br}Just another Oregot adventure!

s;Forrest;That's one way to put it.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}However, we can't waste time fighting them off.|We have to get to Orobas as soon as possible.|The best course of action is to move forward past the opposition.
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;With Samegoro subdued,|Krista and friends head back to Medeas castle and plan their next move.|During their journey back, one question loomed in the back of Krista's mind:|Who or what is Circ?;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;Krista;*yawn*|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Man, what time is it?|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}And where's Forrest? He would've tried to wake me up by now.|Maybe he's in the library. I'll go check.
s;;<red>Move</> with the <red>arrow keys or control stick</>.;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=2;no_sound
s;;<red>Interact</> with the environment with the <red>CONFIRM</> button/key.;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=3;no_sound

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;Deciding to take caution, Krista and friends make their way to Vergrande Monastery|with Aqua and Semi taking the lead.|Though the Holy Knights are temporarily thrown off their tracks,|a new threat awaitens the party.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;Iris;Do my eyes deceive me? No, it truly is!|Aqua! Semi! Thank Great Folia the both of you are unharmed.
s;Semi;Hello, Lady Iris. Sorry 'bout worrying you.

s;Iris;I prayed to the Great Folia every night for your safety.|I am overjoyed to see my prayers be answered.|{c:e;Iris;NormalBlink}I feared that the Holy Knights may have found you.|{c:e;Iris;CloseEyes}Oh, but enough of that.{c:e;Iris;NormalBlink} Who are your friends?

s;Aqua;Lady Iris, allow me to introduce you to Her Highness,|Princess Krista of Medeas, and her friends.|They are responsible for keeping us safe on our journey back here.|And they have been investigating what has happened to the people of Foliaga.
s;Krista;It's a pleasure to meet you, Lady Iris.
s;Iris;The pleasure is mine, Your Highness.|You have my eternal gratitude for ensuring Aqua's and Semi's safety.
s;Krista;Aw, it was nothing.|Just happened to be at the right place at the right time.
s;Iris;Please, make yourselves at home. I'm sure the journey here has made you weary.
s;Zeke;This monestary's ours for the taking, boys!|Grab all the gold and women you can get your hands on!|Show no mercy!
s;Priest1;Lady Iris! We have an emergency!
s;Iris;What!? Defend the east and west wings.|I shall take up arms here at the entrance hall.
s;Iris;I thank you for your aid, Your Highness.
s;Priest1;We've come to assist you here too, Lady Iris.
s;Iris;Excellent. Do not let those pirates near this holy place!
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;After defending Vergrande Temple from the Seagrave Pirates,|Krista and friends continue onwards to Mossgrove.|Little do they know that they have not seen the last of this persistent pirate crew.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;Krista;So, Kai, how much longer 'til we reach Mossgrove?
s;Kai;We just need to keep heading in this direction,|and we'll be in Mossgrove in a day's time.
s;Krista;Nice! Let's keep up the pace, guys!
s;Talbot;You ain't gonna go any farther!
s;Talbot;You'll pay for killin' the captain!
s;Talbot;I'm gonna finish what the captain started!
s;Krista;More of that pirate crew from earlier, huh? No problem!|Come on, everyone! Let's take 'em down!
s;Rembrandt;Pleasure doing business with you, sir.
s;Jake;Aw, no need to be so formal! Just call me Jake.
s;Rembrandt;Alright. Well, thank you again, Jake.|I shall take my leave.
s;Rembrandt;Pirates? Here? And those people to the west{tgm}...|{tgm}Just what is going on?
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Outro
_source: s;Soromir;Well? Go on, then.{w} Kill me.|Be rid of the evil that plagues your precious land.
s;Krista;I can't do that.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Yondo needs to know the truth.|It'll be tough for everyone to take at first, but everyone needs to know.
s;Soromir;So now you decide to fight for the truth?

s;Krista;It's what Ervan wanted to begin with.{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes} And I rejected that truth.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}It's what led to this mess in the first place.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Things need to be set straight.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}You, the Talons, the Shifters{tgm}...{tgm} You all suffered for so long.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}If we work together, we can end it and start over.
s;Soromir;Hmph. Foolish girl.|{c:e;Soromir;HalfCloseEyes}It won't be that simple.

s;Krista;I know that.|But the least we can do is take things one step at a time.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}I was always taught to walk in Medea's footsteps.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}But knowing what I know now, I've got to walk my own path.{w} The path towards truth.|Yondo as a whole needs take that path too.|And we can take that first step by working together.{w} Humans and Shifters.
s;Thalia;Please, there must be some mistake!|{c:e;Thalia;NormalBlink}There's no way{tgm}...{tgm} You couldn't have{tgm}...!
s;Krista;Mother, Father, I{tgm}...{tgm} I'm sorry.|But it's true.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}I killed Ervan. And I'm prepared to take any punishment for this crime.

lvar;CharacterEpitaphs;{'Krista':'Krista, Exiled Princess','Forrest':'Forrest, Devoted Knight','Kai':'Kai, Ninja on the Run','Trevor':'Trevor, Verbose Mage','Chell':'Chell, Motherly Flier','Sam':'Sam, Prowling Tiger','Aqua':'Aqua, Kind Priestess','Semi':'Semi, Reformed Thief','Taylor':'Taylor, Hearty Fighter','Alex':'Alex, Curious Mind','Lucy':'Lucy, Healing Light','Ecco':'Ecco, All That Glitters','Anil':'Anil, Silent Sniper','Michael':'Michael, True Holy Knight','Felicity':'Felicity, Playful Maid','Viola':'Viola, Head in the Clouds','Marina':'Marina, Moon Maiden','Joshua':'Joshua, Hulking Gladiator','Azure':'Azure, Graceful Step','Rembrandt':'Rembrandt, Desert Wanderer','Anna':'Anna, Expert in Arms','Jake':'Jake, Keen Eye','Xiang':'Xiang, Draconic Oracle','Celeste':'Celeste, Righteous Warrior','Parker':'Parker, Guiding Star','Cole':'Cole, Ignited Flame','Ryuuji':'Ryuuji, Dragon Claw','Taiga':'Taiga, Tiger Fang','Haruki':'Haruki, Spearheading Youth','Taichi':'Taichi, Hometown Hero','Yumi':'Yumi, Bouncy Promoter','Lin':'Lin, Soaring Mercenary','Tsurugi':'Tsurugi, Sentimental Soul','Khalid':'Khalid, Fiery Prince','Reem':'Reem, Passionate Heart','Yukino':'Yukino, Gentle as Snow','Masashi':'Masashi, Shot Through the Heart','Hikaru':'Hikaru, Pious Advisor','Sumire':'Sumire, Restful Shield','Asuka':"Asuka, Emperor's Shadow",'Nagisa':'Nagisa, Restless Tide','Tsubaki':'Tsubaki, Budding Camellia','Judah':'Judah, Man of Duty','Shula':'Shula, Blazing Arrow','Kiraz':'Kiraz, Wings of Fate','Torgen':'Torgen, Heart of Gold','Peter':'Peter, Peaceful Hermit','Santiago':'Santiago, Iron Grip','Tora':'Tora, Prideful Tiger','Estoc':'Estoc, Sword and Shield','Roman':'Roman, Zealous Protector','Ella':'Ella, Pushy Motivator','Bryant':'Bryant, ','Thalia':'Thalia, ','Damien':'Damien, Clumsy Alchemist','Matthew':'Matthew, Faithful Spy','Altena':'Altena, Luminous Rider','Gregor':'Gregor, Swell Sword','Ervan':'Ervan, In Mortis, Veritas'}
ending;Kai;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Kai']};Supported the army from the sidelines until the end.

paired_ending;Kai;Trevor;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Kai']};{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Trevor']};Though hesitant at first, Kai eventually let Trevor travel alongside him since his love for the young man was too strong.{br}No one knows where the pair ended up.
paired_ending;Kai;Ryuuji;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Kai']};{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Ryuuji']};Kai joined the Wyrmfang Pirates and, together with Ryuuji, terrorized Merinas' seas together.

paired_ending;Kai;Tsurugi;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Kai']};{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Tsurugi']};After the conflict, Kai went on the run, avoiding arrest by Merinese authorities. He and Tsurugi crossed paths during their travels. With some gentle convincing from Tsurugi, Kai became his hired bodyguard.
ending;Kai;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Kai']};Kai wandered the lands, evading arrest for his treason against Merinas.{br}No one knows where he ended up.
ending;Trevor;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Trevor']};Trevor, now under service of Parker, serves his new employer with unwavering loyalty. Although, he misses his days being by Krista's side.
ending;Chell;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Chell']};Chell stayed behind in Medeas Castle to recover from her wounds.
ending;Chell;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Chell']};Chell continued to lead the Medean Pegasus Knights. Her leadership and kindness were an inspiration to her subordinates.
ending;Sam;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Sam']};Sam stayed behind in Medeas Castle to recover from his wounds.
ending;Sam;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Sam']};Sam returned to Oregot to continue his quest in culling all its bandits. His reputation brought fear to the hearts of the local ruffians.
ending;Aqua;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Aqua']};Aqua stayed behind in Vergrande Monastery to recover from her wounds.
ending;Aqua;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Aqua']};Aqua stayed behind in Medeas Castle to recover from her wounds.
ending;Aqua;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Aqua']};Aqua returned to Vergrande Monestary to assist in rebuilding Foliaga after the fall of the archbishop.
ending;Semi;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Semi']};Semi stayed behind in Vergrande Monastery to recover from his wounds.
ending;Semi;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Semi']};Semi stayed behind in Medeas Castle to recover from his wounds.
ending;Semi;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Semi']};Semi returned to Vergrande Monestary determined to help those who suffered after the fall of the archbishop.
ending;Taylor;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Taylor']};Taylor stayed behind in Medeas Castle to recover from his wounds.
ending;Taylor;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Taylor']};Taylor continued to lead the Medean royal army with great pride. His tavern outings with his men continued as well.
ending;Alex;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Alex']};Alex stayed behind in Medeas Castle to recover from her wounds.

ending;Alex;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Alex']};Alex led the Medean royal army with her head held high for a brighter future. In her free time, she studied more about Circ in hopes of achieving a better understanding of Yondo's forgotten past.
ending;Lucy;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Lucy']};Lucy stayed behind in Medeas Castle to recover from her wounds.

ending;Lucy;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Lucy']};Lucy continued her training alongside the Medean royal army's medical division to deepen her understanding of the healing arts. She still hopes to one day find a cure for her ailing mother.

paired_ending;Ecco;Anil;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Ecco']};{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Anil']};Ecco and Anil returned to Oregot and continued their mercenary work together.{br}The two of them raised a child together which helped curb Ecco's spending habits.{br}At least to some degree.

ending;Ecco;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Ecco']};Ecco returned to Oregot and continued doing mercenary work. She often flaunted the fact that "she helped save the world" which made her services highly sought after. She lived a life of luxury from all that she earned.

paired_ending;Michael;Celeste;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Michael']};{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Celeste']};Michael resumed his Holy Knight training in Oakenfaire, and Celeste went on a journey to find her mother. After a few years, the two succeeded in both their goals and settled back in Florene Village together as a couple.

ending;Michael;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Michael']};Michael returned to Oakenfaire to resume his training as a Holy Knight. After a few years, he came back to Florene Village as their dedicated knight. He was celebrated as a local hero for years to come.
ending;Felicity;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Felicity']};Felicity supported the army from the sidelines until the end.
ending;Anna;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Anna']};Anna supported the army from the sidelines until the end.

paired_ending;Anna;Jake;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Anna']};{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Jake']};Anna and Jake returned to their positions on the Oregotian Council and pulled the country back up to its former glory. Both political matters and their newborn child kept them busy for years to come.

ending;Anna;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Anna']};Anna returned to her position on the Oregotian Council and pulled the country back up to its former glory. Despite this, rumors say that her secret shops are still in business to this day.
ending;Jake;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Jake']};Jake supported the army from the sidelines until the end.

ending;Jake;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Jake']};Jake returned to his position on the Oregotian Council and pulled the country back up to its former glory. Despite this, rumors say that his secret shops are still in business to this day.

ending;Celeste;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Celeste']};After the conflict, Celeste set out on a journey to find her mother. Along the way, she helped those in need. After years of searching, she and her mother were reunited and lived in peace in Florene Village.

ending;Matthew;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Matthew']};Matthew travelled across Yondo searching for leads on how to return home. As time went on, sightings of him became more scarce until he seemed to disappear without a trace.
ending;Parker;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Parker']};Parker supported the army from the sidelines until the end.
ending;Khalid;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Khalid']};Khalid supported the army from the sidelines until the end.
ending;Tsubaki;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Tsubaki']};Tsubaki supported the army from the sidelines until the end.
ending;Judah;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Judah']};Judah supported the army from the sidelines until the end.
ending;Shula;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Shula']};Shula stayed behind in Coral Village to recover from her wounds.
ending;Damien;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Damien']};Damien supported the army from the sidelines until the end.

ending;Damien;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Damien']};Though Shifters could live without fear once more, Damien chose to continue living his life in isolation. He continued to perfect his alchemical skills, though his dexterity still left a lot to be desired.

if;get_support_rank('Forrest', 'Kai') == 'A+' and (get_support_rank('Krista','Kai') != 'A+' get_support_rank('Krista','Trevor') != 'S' or get_support_rank('Krista','Sam') != 'S' or get_support_rank('Krista','Felicity') != 'S' or get_support_rank('Krista','Joshua') != 'S' or get_support_rank('Krista','Xiang') != 'S' or get_support_rank('Krista','Parker') != 'A+' or get_support_rank('Krista','Khalid') != 'A+' or get_support_rank('Krista','Masashi') != 'S' or get_support_rank('Krista','Hikaru') != 'S' or get_support_rank('Krista','Torgen') != 'A+' or get_support_rank('Krista','Matthew') != 'S')

paired_ending;Forrest;Torgen;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Forrest']};{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Torgen']};Rumors have circulated that despite Krista no longer being present at the castle, a certain Griffon rider could be seen visiting a certain general's chambers each month on quiet evenings.

elif;get_support_rank('Krista','Kai') != 'A+' get_support_rank('Krista','Trevor') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Sam') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Felicity') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Joshua') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Xiang') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Parker') != 'A+' and get_support_rank('Krista','Khalid') != 'A+' and get_support_rank('Krista','Masashi') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Hikaru') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Torgen') != 'A+' and get_support_rank('Krista','Matthew') != 'S'
ending;Forrest;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Forrest']};Forrest joined Krista in her exile and stayed by her side until the end of his days. The two of them raised a son together.

ending;Forrest;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Forrest']};Forrest stayed under the service of the Medean royal family for the rest of his days. His heart felt hollow without Krista by his side. This emptiness weighed heavily both on himself and those around him.

paired_ending;Krista;Forrest;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Krista']};{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Forrest']};Forrest joined Krista in her exile and settled in the countryside of the island of Valona. There, the two wed and raised a son together.

paired_ending;Krista;Kai;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Krista']};{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Kai']};After Krista's exile, Kai escaped to Valona to evade Merinese authorities and to fulfill his promise to her. The two settled in the island's countryside and raised a son together.

elif;get_support_rank('Forrest', 'Kai') == 'A+' and get_support_rank('Krista','Trevor') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Sam') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Felicity') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Joshua') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Xiang') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Parker') != 'A+' and get_support_rank('Krista','Khalid') != 'A+' and get_support_rank('Krista','Masashi') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Hikaru') != 'S' and get_support_rank('Krista','Torgen') != 'A+' and get_support_rank('Krista','Matthew') != 'S'

paired_ending;Forrest;Kai;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Forrest']};{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Kai']};Upon Forrest's insistence, the two of them followed Krista to Valona where she was exiled. The three of them peacefully lived together in the countryside.

ending;Krista;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Krista']};Krista was exiled to the island of Valona for her crimes. Deciding that Yondo was no longer home for them, Forrest and Kai followed her. The three of them lived the rest of their lives in peace and raised a son together.
elif;get_support_rank('Forrest','Chell') == 'S' or get_support_rank('Forrest','Alex') == 'S' or get_support_rank('Forrest','Marina') == 'S' or get_support_rank('Forrest','Reem') == 'S'

ending;Krista;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Krista']};Krista was exiled to the island of Valona for her crimes. She lived her life in peace and married a local village man there. The two of them raised a son together.
# Krista unpaired, Forrest unpaired, and BSFE Girl event seen

paired_ending;Krista;BSFE;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Krista']};B., Common Commoner;Krista snuck back into Medeas territory to fulfill her promise to a certain woman in{br}Port Gildress. The two of them lived the rest of their lives in Valona and raised a son together.

ending;Krista;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Krista']};Krista was exiled to the island of Valona for her crimes. Together with Forrest, she lived peacefully in the countryside. The two of them raised a son together.
# Ervan's ending (if Krista dealt the final blow on him)

ending;Ervan;{e:v('CharacterEpitaphs')['Ervan']};Knowing that the truth had set his beloved Krista free, Ervan was no longer filled with hatred. Hope for a new, reborn Yondo comforted him in his dying moments.

name: Outro
_source: s;Aqua;The enemy just now{tgm}...{tgm} Their armor, their banners{tgm}...{tgm} They were all{tgm}...
s;Forrest;The Holy Knights. They knew who we were too.

s;Kai;But that's impossible. How would they hear about us so fast?{w}{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes} Damn it!|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}If those guys know to target us, the rest of the Knights will go after us too.|At this rate, we'll have to skip out on going to Lake Lunaris entirely.
s;Krista;We're getting low on supplies, though. We need to hit up a town soon.

s;Aqua;We can go to my monestary, Vergrande Monastery.|It's small, so the Knights will have a harder time getting to it|since it doesn't have a secret passageway.|I'm sure if Semi and I talk to the high priestess, she'll be willing to help us.|{c:e;Aqua;NoSmile}The only downside is that it will take longer to get to Mossgrove|from there compared to going to Lunaris first.
s;Kai;Both options pose some benefits.|Your Highness, I'll leave the final decision to you.
choice;LunarisVergrande;Where will you go?;Lake Lunaris,Vergrande Monastery
s;Krista;Let's head to Lake Lunaris.|We might run into the Knights there,|but we need to get to Oakenfaire as fast as we can.
s;Krista;Let's head to Vergrande Monastery.|As much as I wanna make a break for Oakenfaire,|we won't last long if we don't stock up.
s;Aqua;Semi and I will lead the way, then.
s;Forrest;Understood. Let's rest up and continue onwards at the break of dawn.

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Nice, the fog cleared! Let's keep sailing, everyone!
s;Kai;Hold on, Your Highness. I have questions for these two.
s;Kai;I just need to confirm something.
s;Keisha;Hey, just what do you think you're doing?!
s;Kai;Pretty interesting bottle you got here.
s;Keisha;What's it to you, pretty boy?
s;Kai;This poison's pretty rare, y'know.|So rare that there's only one group of people who know how to make it.
s;Kai;Oh, so you DO know all about that, huh?|Well, that means our conversation is over.
s;Kai;Let's go, Princess. We're done here.
s;Krista;Kai, what was that all about? And what's so important about that bottle?
s;Kai;This bottle is the key to everything.|Knowing that this was in their possession,|I'm starting to get a good idea of what's going on.
s;Kai;Just give me time, Princess.|I want to be absolutely sure about this before I say anything more.
s;Krista;Well, you haven't steered us wrong before. I'll leave it to you, Kai.|I'm sure we'll get more answers the closer we get to Edoyama.
s;Kai;You took the words right out of my mouth.
s;Krista;Wh-Whoa, we've got a huge storm coming in! Let's get outta--

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Alright, looks like everything's in place.
s;Parker;Let's take care of the rest of these bandits. Then we can start repairing the ship.
s;Parker;Let's get started with the repairs, then.
s;Forrest;Your Highness, while sorting through our supplies,|we found other valuables mixed in with them.
s;Krista;Hey, not bad! Good find, Forrest.
s;Krista;Well, boys and girls, it took a bit,|but the ship's finally good and ready.|Let's get outta here!

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Looks like they're retreating! Good work, guys!
s;Iris;Your Highness, I thank you for protecting our humble monastery.
s;Krista;No problem, Lady Iris. It's the least we could do.
s;Iris;I pray that you all have a safe journey to the capital.|May Folia's grace be upon you.
for;GreenAlive;[u for u in game.level.unit_groups.get('Other').units if game.check_dead(u) == False]
s;Priest1;On behalf of Vergrande Monastery, please accept this.
s;Krista;That's very kind of all of you, but are you sure it's okay?
s;Priest1;These gifts are bestowed upon you by the request of Lady Iris.|Please take them.
s;Krista;Well, if that's the case, then please send the high priestess our thanks.{c:e;Krista;Smile} Stay safe!
s;Zeke;Argh, I can't believe those puny priests and clerics outdid us!
s;Talbot;Don't look so down, Cap'n! I got an idea.
s;Talbot;Looks like those soldiers that were helpin' 'em out are goin' thataway.|If we kill 'em, we can come back here and do all the pillagin' we want!
s;Bandit3;Wow, that's a good idea, Talbot!
s;Zeke;Shut it, you! Who asked you to speak?!|Still, not a bad idea.|I'll stay here and leave the rest to you.
s;Bandit3;Talbot, th-they killed the captain! Wh-What do we do now?
s;Talbot;Quit your blubberin' already! I already got a plan.
s;Talbot;See those soldiers from earlier over yonder?|We go after 'em, kill 'em, then come back here and do all the pillagin' we want!
s;Bandit3;Wow, that's a great idea! You're so smart, Talbot!
s;Talbot;Yeah, yeah. Now, quit yer yakkin' and get movin'!|We're burnin' daylight here!

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Alright, is everyone here--{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Wait, what's going on over there?
s;Krista;Oh no! They've got the stragglers! We have get them back!

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;We made it out of there, I think. But{tgm}...

s;Krista;Everyone else{tgm}...{tgm} They're{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm}No, we have to keep going or they're gonna catch up to the rest of us.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}I'm sorry, guys! We'll come back for you! I swear!

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Nice, they're retreating!|Let's get outta here before more of them come along.
s;Khalid;Krista! We finally caught up to you!
s;Krista;Khalid?! What are you and Reem doing here?
s;Khalid;Krista! I finally caught up to you!
s;Krista;Khalid?! What are you doing here?
s;Khalid;Reem and I heard about what you did in Foliaga, so we came rushing over to help out.
s;Reem;By the time we made it to Medeas Castle, you had already left for Merinas, Your Highness.

s;Khalid;By the time we made it to Medeas Castle, you were already heading for Merinas.|{c:e;Khalid;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}Reem would've loved to see you and Forrest again,|but she{tgm}...{tgm} didn't make it.
s;Khalid;{tgm}...{tgm} Hey, we can catch up on things later.|{c:e;Khalid;Smile}Besides, we gotta get a move on, right? The world needs saving, yeah?
s;Krista;Oh, you're that merchant from before!|Look, I'd love to hear you out, but my friends and I REALLY gotta go.
s;Krista;Hey, sorry, but me and my friends REALLY gotta go.
s;Jake;Just a moment is all I need. Please!

s;Jake;Thank you so much!|{c:e;Jake;NoSmile}See, my girlfriend Anna and I are travelling merchants.|We used to be able to use this particular sea route to trade goods.|Then, a year ago, the whole route's become a pirate-infested pit!|{c:e;Jake;CloseEyes}Please, you gotta help us get rid of them!|{c:e;Jake;NormalBlink}Anna and I will even make it worth your while.|We can join up with you guys and give y'all access to our rarest wares.|What d'ya say?
s;Krista;We're in, Jake.|Getting rid of those pirates will make travelling the seas a lot easier anyway.
s;Jake;Thanks a lot! Here, I can navigate y'all to the route.
s;Krista;Sorry, but like I said, we're in a huge hurry here.|We don't have time to get sidetracked.
s;Jake;I understand{tgm}...|{c:e;Jake;NormalBlink}{tgm}You hurry along, then! Don't let me keep you hanging!

name: Outro
_source: s;Forrest;Let's not stay put for too long, though.|Kai, you've got the map. Lead the way!
s;Kai;No need to tell me twice.{br}To Mossgrove, everyone!
s;Krista;Hey, you're that merchant from before!
s;Jake;The name's Jake. Mind if I ask you a favor?
s;Jake;You see, me and my girlfriend Anna have been running into trouble with the Knights.
s;Jake;Point is, we've been able to set up shop all over Yondo back in the day.|It seems like ever since a year ago, everyone's been getting on our case.|And now we gotta sell our stuff in secret.

s;Jake;I don't know what's gotten into everyone,|but all I know is Anna and I want our livelihoods back!|If we can knock some sense into Foliaga's Holy Knights,|I think it would be a good start. So, what do you say?
s;Krista;You know what? Any enemy of the Knights is a friend of ours at this point.|We'll help you out, Jake.
s;Jake;Thanks a million! I can't tell you how much this means to me.
s;Krista;Sorry, Jake, but we've got our own problems to deal with.|You're gonna have to find someone else.
s;Jake;Oh man{tgm}...{tgm} Alright.|{c:e;Jake;NormalBlink}Thanks for hearing me out, though.|At least promise me and Anna your patronage in the future!

name: Secret
_source: s;Anna;Hey, you found the Gold Card!{br}You can go ahead and keep that.|Jake and I didn't actually lose it.|It's just a promotional thing for our shop.|We've got shops all over Yondo, so feel free to stop by when you can!|Just keep a sharp eye out. We gotta sell our stuff in secret.|Anyway{tgm}...

name: Secret
_source: s;Anna;Well, aren't you a bold one, knocking down the wall like that?|{c:e;Anna;NormalBlink}But anyway, congrats on getting a Gold Card!|You can go ahead and keep that.{br}Jake and I didn't actually lose it.|It's just a promotional thing for our shop.|We've got shops all over Yondo, so feel free to stop by when you can!|Just keep a sharp eye out. We gotta sell our stuff in secret.|Anyway{tgm}...

name: Secret
_source: s;Jake;Well, would you look at that. You have the Gold Card!|Go ahead and keep that. Anna and I didn't lose it.|It's a promotional gimmick for our shop. It was Anna's idea!|{c:e;Jake;NoSmile}Speaking of Anna, did you happen to run into her on the way here?|I think she said she was gonna set up shop in the woods someplace.|Anyway, wanna see what I've got in stock?
s;Marina;Yes, I am. I met some kind people who will take care of the Knights.
s;Marina;And look at what they happened to have.
s;Jake;Oh, the Gold Card! Feel free to buy anything you want, Miss Marina.
s;Jake;Well would you look at that. You have the Gold Card!|{c:e;Jake;NoSmile}Oh, you've met Anna before? Then you already know what that's all about.|{c:e;Jake;Smile}Here's what I got in stock!

name: Secret
_source: s;Jake;Well, would you look at that. You have the Gold Card!|Go ahead and keep that. Anna and I didn't lose it.|It's a promotional gimmick for our shop. It was Anna's idea!|Anyway, wanna see what I've got in stock?

name: Secret
_source: s;Anna;Hey, you found the Gold Card!{br}You can go ahead and keep that.|Jake and I didn't actually lose it.|It's just a promotional thing for our shop.|We've got shops all over Yondo, so feel free to stop by when you can!|Just keep a sharp eye out. We gotta sell our stuff in secret.|Anyway{tgm}...

name: Secret
_source: s;Anna;Hey, you found the Gold Card!{br}You can go ahead and keep that.|Jake and I didn't actually lose it.|It's just a promotional thing for our shop.|We've got shops all over Yondo, so feel free to stop by when you can!|Just keep a sharp eye out. We gotta sell our stuff in secret.|Anyway{tgm}...

name: Secret
_source: s;Jake;Well, would you look at that. You have the Gold Card!|Go ahead and keep that. Anna and I didn't lose it.|It's a promotional gimmick for our shop. It was Anna's idea!|{c:e;Jake;NoSmile}Speaking of Anna, did you happen to run into her on the way here?|I think she said she was gonna set up shop in the woods someplace.|Anyway, wanna see what I've got in stock?
s;Jake;Well would you look at that. You have the Gold Card!|{c:e;Jake;NoSmile}Oh, you've met Anna before? Then you already know what that's all about.|{c:e;Jake;Smile}Here's what I got in stock!

name: BaseConvo_Shirtless
_source: s;Sam;Ohhhh, you're talking about how I don't have a shirt.|I guess I should put one on since I'm back at the castle and all that.
s;Chell;No, it's fine!|{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes}I mean, yes, that would be proper, but{tgm}...
s;Sam;Well, if you're okay with it, I'll keep being shirtless!

name: BaseConvo_Importance of a Feather
_source: s;Tsurugi;Mister Kai! May I speak to you for a moment?
s;Tsurugi;I have something to give you. Here!
s;Kai;A Speedwing? What for?|{c:e;Kai;Smile,CloseEyes}Not trying to say I'm slow, are you?
s;Tsurugi;Oh, goodness, no!{br}Far from it!|It's just that I wanted to thank you for{tgm}...{c:e;Tsurugi;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm} Erm.
s;Kai;For what? Can't really think of anything I did for you.|We've only just met, after all.
s;Tsurugi;I mean, I just{tgm}...|{c:e;Tsurugi;CloseEyes}{tgm}Oh, I knew this wasn't a good idea.
s;Tsurugi;Never mind! You can keep the Speedwing! Sorry!!
s;Kai;Tsurugi{tgm}...?|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}{tgm}HAVE we met before?|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}I probably would've remembered someone like him.

name: BaseConvo_Looming Danger
_source: s;Felicity;Ah, Lord Parker.|How goes the preparations for the rest of the journey?
s;Parker;I'm afraid we may have more pressing matters, Felicity.|{c:e;Parker;NormalBlink}Look up at the sky.
s;Parker;Precisely. It is unusual to see wild wyverns this far north.|{c:e;Parker;CloseEyes}Wyvern RIDERS, on the other hand{tgm}...
s;Felicity;Anticipating the worst, I take it?
s;Parker;It's only natural, wouldn't you agree?
s;Felicity;Oh, I wasn't objecting at all, if that's what you mean.|It pays to be cautious. Especially now, with what we've discovered.

s;Parker;I'm glad you think so.|{c:e;Parker;NoSmile}On that note, would you mind taking these weapons to Krista?|I believe it would be helpful to have these onhand.|And please inform her of our observations, if you would as well.|There are other things I would like to attend to in the meantime.

name: BaseConvo_New Formation
_source: s;Viola;I'm so happy we found you, Lin! We missed you so much.
s;Lin;Yeah, yeah.|{c:e;Lin;NormalBlink}Remember, I'm with you all as a mercenary first and foremost.|This just another job for me.
s;Viola;B-But we have so much catching up to do.
s;Chell;{tgm}...|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}{tgm}No, Lin's right. She made this decision, so we should respect that.
s;Lin;!!|{c:e;Lin;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Y-Yeah! That's right!{c:e;Lin;CloseEyes,Smile} I have bigger priorities now.
s;Chell;With that said, seeing how we're working together now,|I think it would be best if we reviewed a certain battle formation.
s;Viola;Oh! You mean the Triangle Attack?
s;Chell;Yes, exactly. Are you in, Lin?
s;Lin;Well, I guess it wouldn't hurt to practice it a bit.
s;Viola;Yes! We haven't done this in years! Let's do it!
s;Chell;Alright, I think we've got the hang of it.
s;Viola;That was awesome! I can't wait to do it again for real!

name: BaseConvo_Resolve to Fight
_source: s;Lin;You wanted to see me, Your Highness?
s;Krista;Lin{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm} Yeah. You're gonna wanna sit down for this.
s;Krista;I'm sorry.|I know you just rejoined us, but I needed to tell you right away.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}I didn't want the shock to come later down the line.
s;Krista;If you need time to mourn, I understand.|You don't have to fight with us if--
s;Lin;I'm tired of everyone dying.|{c:e;Lin;CloseEyes}First, mother and father{tgm}...
s;Lin;Now them too?|{c:e;Lin;HalfCloseEyes}I{tgm}...{tgm} I hated Chell. At least, I thought I did.|{c:e;Lin;CloseEyes}A-And Viola{tgm}...{tgm} It's too soon{tgm}...
s;Lin;Now Viola too?{c:e;Lin;CloseEyes} It's too soon{tgm}...
s;Lin;Now Chell too?|{c:e;Lin;HalfCloseEyes}I{tgm}...{tgm} I hated her. At least, I thought I did. But now{tgm}...
s;Lin;Krista, please! Put me on the front lines!|No one else is dying on my watch. I swear!
s;Krista;Lin, this is a lot, I know.|But you have to calm down--
s;Lin;"Calm down"?! You have no idea what I'm going through!
s;Krista;Like hell I don't!|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Ervan's dead, Lin! Dead!|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Don't you dare tell me I don't know what it's like losing someone!
s;Lin;W-Wait, Prince Ervan is{tgm}...?|{c:e;Lin;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}Krista, I{tgm}...{c:e;Lin;CloseEyes}{tgm} I'm sorry.|I didn't realize{tgm}...
s;Krista;{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm}*sigh* Yeah, you're right.|You wouldn't have known.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Sorry for blowing up like that.
s;Krista;About a year ago. A year after you left.
s;Krista;Again, if you need time, I won't blame you.|I just need you to have a clear head here.
s;Lin;I'll work hard in my sisters' place.
s;Lin;I'll work hard in my sister's place.
s;Krista;I trust that you will, Lin.

name: BaseConvo_Pray for Safety
_source: s;Aqua;I'm alright. Thank you for asking.|{c:e;Aqua;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}Though, I am worried about everyone back in Vergrande Monastery.
s;Semi;I'm sure they're fine.|The clergymen there are good with magic, so they can defend themselves well enough.|Once this is all over, wanna see if we can pay them a visit?
s;Aqua;That's a good idea!|I'm sure everyone is wondering where we went.|{c:e;Aqua;NoSmile}For now, I'll pray for their safety. Would you care to join me?

name: BaseConvo_Moonlight
_source: s;Kai;You know why they call this place Lake Lunaris?
s;Kai;Every night, the moonlight reflects off the surface of the lake.|I've heard it's a beautiful sight.
s;Kai;It would probably be romantic coming out here one night.
s;Forrest;Kai, you're going somewhere with this. So, out with it already.
s;Kai;I'm not going anywhere with it, really. Just making observations.|{c:e;Kai;Smile,CloseEyes}Speaking of which, Her Highness at least thought the lake was pretty.
s;Kai;There what is? Like I said, I'm just making observations.
s;Kai;Forrest, my friend, I have no idea what you're talking about.|Do you think I'm insinuating something?
s;Forrest;{tgm}...{tgm} I feel like this is a trap.
s;Kai;Would it make you feel better|if I said you being in love with the princess is basically an open secret?
s;Kai;Thanks for the enlightening conversation, Forrest.{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile} See ya!
s;Forrest;Open secret{tgm}...?{tgm} No, he must be joking.|{tgm}{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}...{tgm} Right?

name: BaseConvo_Swimsuits
_source: s;Forrest;This may just be me being ignorant of Merinas' cultural practices,|but why is everyone in the water in their undergarments?
s;Kai;Yup, they're a common sight in Merinas. Especially in its coastal towns.|They don't soak up water easily|and they keep you covered up when you're out for a swim.
s;Kai;We could buy one for Her Highness.
s;Forrest;Wh-Why? I wasn't thinking about Princess Krista in a swimsuit.
s;Forrest;N-No. We shouldn't be wasting our funds on such things.
s;Kai;Suit yourself.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes,Smile}But you know, a swimsuit would really show off her legs--
s;Forrest;We are ending the conversation here!

name: BaseConvo_Hand Holding
_source: s;Felicity;Phew, finally out of there.|{c:e;Felicity;HalfCloseEyes}Why did we have to stop in a large city like this?|Couldn't we have gone somewhere else?
s;Krista;I figured you'd be out here.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}Are you doing okay?
s;Felicity;I am quite fine, thank you.
s;Krista;Aw, don't give me that! You're trembling like a leaf.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}The crowds are making you nervous, huh?
s;Krista;I know you don't like being around a ton of people, but there's a festival going on!|It's supposed to be fun!
s;Krista;And you don't have to be alone either. We can check things out together!
s;Felicity;Are you sure it's alright? I wouldn't want to bring down the mood.
s;Krista;If I wasn't okay with it, I wouldn't be offering.
s;Krista;Here. We can even hold hands like we usually do.

name: BaseConvo_Justice Squad
_source: s;Celeste;Everyone here? Good!|Let the very first Justice Squad meeting commence!
s;Michael;Um, Celeste, I have a question.
s;Celeste;Ah yes, Michael, second-in-command. You may speak!
s;Michael;What{tgm}...{tgm} is all this about?|You explained absolutely nothing when you gathered all us up like this.
s;Celeste;I'm glad you asked! I'm sure you're all familiar with the Sacred Five?
s;Cole;The five legendary heroes who led the charge during the War of Divides?

s;Celeste;Exactly!|{c:e;Celeste;CloseEyes,NoSmile}With Yondo in danger and the five of us together like this{tgm}...|{c:e;Celeste;NormalBlink}{tgm}I believe it's time for the Sacred Five to make their comeback!
s;Michael;You do realize that each of the Sacred Five came from each of Yondo's five countries?|And that none of us are from Fuegsol or Oregot?
s;Cole;I actually don't know. I'm adopted.
s;Celeste;Aw, never mind.{br}Doesn't matter anyway.|I believe each of us are one-to-one matches to the Sacred Five!|{c:e;Celeste;CloseEyes}For example{tgm}...
s;Celeste;As the healer, you are Zinnia, the devoted cleric to Folia!|{c:e;Celeste;Smile}From now on, you'll be referred to as "Justice Green"!
s;Michael;Despite Lucy not being from Foliaga?
s;Celeste;You're Haldor, Oregot's stalwart warrior!|You shall be{br}"Justice White"!
s;Celeste;You're Rohit, the brains of the group from Fuegsol!|You shall be{br}"Justice Red"!
s;Michael;Wasn't he a burly wyvern knight, though?
s;Celeste;You're Izumi, the refined spearfighter of Merinas!|You will be{br}"Justice Black"!
s;Celeste;I'm Aurea! The charismatic leader of the Sacred Five from Medeas!|You can refer to me as{br}"Justice Yellow"!
s;Michael;I don't know where to begin with this one.|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink}Aurea was a swordswoman of finesse and grace, Celeste. Which you are no--
s;Lucy;I don't think the accuracy of it all matters, Michael.
s;Lucy;Um, I mean,{br}Justice White.|{c:e;Lucy;Smile}This sounds like fun either way!
s;Cole;I agree as well, but what do we do from here exactly?
s;Celeste;A very good question, Justice Red!|We gotta do what any good world-saving team does.
s;Lucy;Figure out what the enemy is planning?
s;Celeste;All very good suggestions, but no.|{c:e;Celeste;Smile}What we need is a super cool team pose!
s;Michael;Celeste, that is the last thing we need--
s;Celeste;And I've got the perfect idea for the formation!|So, I'll go here. Justice Green and Justice Red will--
s;Celeste;We are the Justice Squad! Also known as...;bottom;fit
s;Michael;I didn't sign up for this...;bottom;fit

name: BaseConvo_A Strong Drink
_source: s;Taylor;Hey! Joshua! Sam!|Want to go see what the taverns of Merinas have to offer in drinks?
s;Sam;Hey, why not? Yeah, I'm down.
s;Taylor;Hey, bartender! Three drinks for three thirsty men.
s;Man3;There's wine, ale, scotch, beer, whiskey, mead{tgm}...{tgm} Also sake.
s;Taylor;Never had sake before. Give me a mug full.
s;Sam;Yeah, you have no idea of how strong it is.
s;Taylor;It'll be fine! I've had strong stuff before.
s;Man3;It's your mug of sake, sir.
s;Taylor;I said a MUG. This can hardly be called a cup.
s;Man3;My apologies, young man, but it is very strong.|Most only have a swallow or two.
s;Taylor;I've had strong liquor before. Get me a MUG.|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes}In fact, make it a pint.
s;Taylor;Like I said, it'll be fine! What could go wrong?|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,Smile}How strong could it be, really?
s;Taylor;Now THIS is more like it.

s;Taylor;You two know *hic* Alex, right? Lemme tell y'all 'bout her.|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,NoSmile}*Glug-glug!*|{c:e;Taylor;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Alex{tgm}...{tgm}{w}{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,Smile} Alex is a woman.
s;Taylor;Nahhh, not a woman{tgm}...{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,Smile}{tgm} A WOW-man.|She's got *hic* HUGE boobs.|*Glug-glug*
s;Joshua;And we need to know this because?
s;Taylor;Don' interrupt me while I'm drinkin'

s;Taylor;She's got serious honkers! A real set of BADONKERS!{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,NoSmile} *Gulp-gulp!*|{c:e;Taylor;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Packin' some dobo{tgm}....|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes,NoSmile}{tgm}Dobo{tgm}...{tgm} honkeros{tgm}....|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm}DOBOHONKEROS!
s;Sam;Sorry about that, bartender.|Thanks for the drinks, and I'm sorry about{tgm}...{tgm} him.
s;Man3;Thank you for taking care of him.|Here, have some sake on the house. It's fine in small doses.|{c:e;Man3;CloseEyes}VERY small.
s;Joshua;I got him Sam. Let's go back with the others.

name: BaseConvo_Roused Suspicions
_source: s;OldMan2;Tell Hayato to be wary of them.|They seem like capable fighters.
s;Bandit2;Yeah, I'll let 'im know.|And you said this girl's from Medea?
s;Kai;Thought the mayor was suspicious too, Forrest?
s;Kai;Any idea who he's talking to?
s;Forrest;No, but I do have theories.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}We must proceed with caution, Kai.|Things aren't what they seem here.

name: BaseConvo_Anxieties
_source: s;Trevor;Oh, Lord Parker.|In all truth, no. That ghost{tgm}...

s;Trevor;Er{tgm}...{tgm} Yes. That is precisely it.|{c:e;Trevor;CloseEyes}Knowing the ghost captures women is{tgm}...{tgm} concerning.|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}How would a ghost be able to tell the difference|between a man and a woman in the middle of the night?|They were human once, yes? They must still have their human-level perceptions.
s;Parker;Perhaps it's a supernatural ability?|They might be able to just tell.
s;Trevor;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Terrifying indeed{tgm}...|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}{tgm}As fascinating this conversation is, Lord Parker, I must{tgm}...{tgm} er.|Make preparations for tonight. So long!
s;Parker;Hm. Poor boy must have a fear of ghosts.

name: BaseConvo_Reconsider
_source: s;Khalid;Krista, just what the hell are you thinking?!
s;Khalid;Putting yourself in danger like this{tgm}...|{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink}{tgm}There are better ways to help these people, you know.
s;Krista;Come on, don't look at me like that.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}You're really making me reconsider the plan here.

s;Khalid;And you should! Krista, are you listening to yourself?|You wouldn't do something like this! You{tgm}...|{c:e;Khalid;HalfCloseEyes}...{c:e;Khalid;CloseEyes}{tgm} *sigh*|{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink}Look. I just{tgm}...{w}{tgm} I don't want to lose you too, y'know?
s;Krista;Khalid{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm} I get it.{w} Really.|But you have to trust me on this.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}I'll come back alive.|I promise.

name: BaseConvo_Do Not Explain
_source: s;Viola;I wish we could've stayed at the inn with everyone else.
s;Chell;I know, Viola, but we have to stay outside the village|so that we can come in for back up later tonight.
s;Felicity;I'm sure we'll have proper sleeping arrangements after this.
s;Viola;I hope so.|{c:e;Viola;NormalBlink}Y'know, I've been thinking about this for a while now{tgm}...
s;Viola;Her Highness has been getting captured by bandits a lot lately, hasn't she?|It's kinda weird.
s;Viola;I just don't get it!|{c:e;Viola;NormalBlink}It's not like she actually has FUN getting kidnapped, right?

name: BaseConvo_Trust in a Leader
_source: s;Krista;Our army is just getting bigger and bigger, huh, Forrest?
s;Krista;It's nice having all these people join us. But it's kinda{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm} Scary.
s;Krista;Everyone is putting their trust in me, and I dunno if I deserve it.
s;Forrest;You've been working hard to get this far, and everyone can see that, Your Highness.|You are more than deserving of their trust.
s;Krista;But the only reason I'm working so hard is to make up for{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}Well, you know.

s;Krista;I don't know how long I can keep this up.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Everyone's gonna see me for what I really am eventually. And the thing is{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}I'm scared of what's gonna happen when they do.|I don't want to lose what we built up.
s;Forrest;Your Highness, you have nothing to fear.|If you can't bring yourself to have faith in your own righteousness,|then believe in me who can do it for you.
s;Forrest;You haven't changed at all, Krista. You're still that loving person I've always known.|And the others can see that too.{br}I know they do.
s;Krista;I{tgm}...{tgm} Thank you, Forrest.|{c:e;Krista;Smile,NormalBlink}I'll{tgm}...{tgm} I'll keep trying my best. For everyone!

name: BaseConvo_One's Faith
_source: s;Ecco;Hey, kid. Mind if I join you?
s;Michael;Um, I'm Michael, by the way.
s;Ecco;So, you used to be one of the Holy Knights, huh?

s;Michael;Yeah{tgm}...{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink}{tgm} I just wanted to help people.|The Knights in Florene Village weren't like this. They protected us!|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}And they were so kind and strong{tgm}...{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink}{tgm} I wanted to be like that too.
s;Ecco;Better to figure that out sooner rather than later.
s;Michael;B-But even so, not all the Knights can be like this, right?|There's gotta be more of them who still fight for what's right.|For what the Great Folia would want.
s;Ecco;Hate to break it to you, Michael, but faith in the gods is overrated.
s;Michael;H-Huh?! But, you're a monk, aren't you?|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}Hearing you of all people say something like that{tgm}...

s;Ecco;I've been out of the monk life for a long time.|I've been out there living the mercenary life instead.|{c:e;Ecco;Smile}And I much prefer how things are now.|Being a mercenary gives actual practical benefits.|Money. World experience. Stuff like that.
s;Michael;That may work for you, but the Great Folia has provided so much for his people.|I can't turn away from him that easily.
s;Ecco;Oh, Michael{tgm}...|{c:e;Ecco;NormalBlink}{tgm}Well, you're still just a kid. You'll figure it out eventually.|I'll give you some advice, though.
s;Ecco;When no one's there beside you, not even the gods, you've still got one thing to rely on.|{c:e;Ecco;NormalBlink,Smile}Yourself.
s;Ecco;You're a good kid, Michael. I can tell. But don't rely on Folia for everything.|{c:e;Ecco;Smile}Keep your head up.|You can be the Knight that Foliaga needs if you've got faith in yourself.
s;Michael;Th-Thank you, Miss Ecco. I'll keep that in mind.
s;Ecco;And here, take this with you too. I don't need it anymore.|You'll probably get more out of it than me.

name: BaseConvo_Training Together
_source: s;Chell;Oh, Sam, keeping up with your training, I see.
s;Sam;Huh? Oh, hey Chell!|*huff* You gonna *huff* train up too?
s;Chell;Oh Medea his chest is glistening with sweat!|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}And his biceps are tense and flexed...;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Chell;Um! Nothing! Nothing at all!{c:wait;200}{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes} Ahem.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}Anyway, yes, I was planning on practicing my axe techniques.
s;Sam;Say, how about we practice together?|It's been years since I saw what you can do up close.
s;Chell;That sounds like a wonderful idea, Sam. Let's begin!
s;Sam;That was great, Chell! You really have gotten big!
s;Chell;Sam, what do you mean by{tgm}...
s;Chell;You know what? Never mind. I don't think I want to know.
s;Sam;What? Was it something I said?

name: BaseConvo_Sharing Tents
_source: s;Forrest;Your Highness, there is something I wish to discuss with you.
s;Forrest;Concerning tents and sleeping arrangements, there is a bit of a dilemma.
s;Forrest;That is partially the issue, yes.|However, it is more who is sharing tents that is the overall problem.
s;Krista;Yeah, I guess that makes sense.|Adding more people to the group can cause problems like that.

s;Forrest;I have taken note of groups we should not be concerned with.|Ecco and Anil have their own tent and share it.|Taylor, Alex, and Lucy have no problem sharing one together.|Aqua and Semi will share a tent, I'm sure.|And Kai and I will still share a tent.
s;Forrest;As for Chell and Sam, they shared a tent during our return trip from Oregot,|so I'm sure that this arrangement will not change.
s;Krista;Then that just leaves me, Trevor, and Michael.
s;Krista;Well, with Michael being such a nervous wreck,|I doubt he'd be comfortable sharing a tent with a girl.

s;Krista;But with Trevor's preference for having a tent to himself{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm} Hm{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}Yeah, I can see why you're having trouble, Forrest.|But, y'know, I'd be okay with sleeping outside--

s;Krista;I figured you'd say that.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}In that case, I'll see if Trevor will be okay if he and I share a tent.|We've known each other for half a year now, so maybe he'll be comfortable enough with me.
s;Krista;{tgm}...{tgm} Forrest, if you're so concerned about THAT happening,|maybe Kai and I should trade places--
s;Krista;H-Huh?? But that would solve the problem, wouldn't it?|Besides, I can trust you to not try to--

s;Forrest;That's not{tgm}...!{tgm} I mean, it's just that being with you{tgm}...|{c:e;Forrest;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}To be that close{tgm}...|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}{tgm}Ahem.|{c:e;Forrest;HalfCloseEyes}I apologize, Your Highness. Your initial idea is fine. My concerns are trivial.
s;Forrest;I shall inform Trevor of the sleeping arrangements, then.
s;Krista;Would he really try to{tgm}...?|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}No way. That's ridiculous! He'd never do that with me.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}He has so many reasons not to.

name: BaseConvo_Bargaining
_source: s;Man1;Greetings! May I interest you lovely ladies in some fine jewelry?|I only carry the best. And at cheap prices too!
s;Viola;Ecco, look at that ring! The red gem on it is so shiny.
s;Ecco;Hm{tgm}...{w}{c:e;Ecco;NormalBlink}{tgm} Hold on, lemme take a better look at it.
s;Ecco;I see{tgm}...|{c:e;Ecco;NormalBlink}{tgm}Just how much are you charging for this, buddy?
s;Ecco;800? For this cheap old thing? Please.|{c:e;Ecco;CloseEyes}You'd be lucky if I'd be willing to pay 200 for this piece of junk.
s;Man1;Why you{tgm}...{tgm} Alright, fine. 400 gold it is.
s;Ecco;Here you go, sir. Pleasure doing business with you.
s;Ecco;Just a bit of bargaining, Viola. No harm done.|{c:e;Ecco;Smile,NormalBlink}Besides, it was his own fault for undercharging it to begin with.
s;Viola;You mean that ring is usually worth more?
s;Ecco;Yup. I don't think the old geezer realized it, but this is an Energy Ring.|{c:e;Ecco;Smile}They're worth WAY more than just 800 gold.
s;Viola;Wow, you knew what kind of ring it was right away?|You're so smart, Ecco!
s;Ecco;What can I say? I've got an eye for these things.

name: BaseConvo_Teach a Man to Fish
_source: s;Taylor;Hey, Felicity! Whatcha up to there?

s;Taylor;You're real focused on the fish there.|Wait, are you trying to catch one? You don't even have a rod!|{c:e;Taylor;CloseEyes}I may be good at fishing myself, but even I don't have that confidence.
s;Felicity;Watch and maybe you'll learn a thing or two.
s;Taylor;Whoa, that's a big one! Nice job, Felicity.
s;Felicity;This will make for an excellent meal for the army.
s;Taylor;Hm{tgm}...{w}{c:e;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm} Wait, I've got an even better idea for it.
s;Felicity;{tgm}...{tgm} I have a bad feeling about this.

name: BaseConvo_Pure Hydration
_source: s;Trevor;Aqua, considering you have the most knowledge on Foliaga's Holy Knights,|is there anything you would recommend that we should purchase to combat them?

s;Aqua;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Let's see{tgm}...|{c:e;Aqua;NormalBlink}{tgm}Weapons that could pierce through heavy armor is a good start|since there are many armored soldiers within their ranks.|Something that could protect us from magic would be essential as well,|since they have many powerful mages too.
s;Trevor;I do recall Sam giving us a vial of something when we were in Oregot.
s;Aqua;Yes, Pure Water! That's exactly what I was talking about.
s;Aqua;Speaking of which, that stall over there has some. Let's go!
s;Trevor;So, how DOES one use it, exactly? Do you drink it, or--
s;Aqua;Please don't drink the Pure Water.{w}{c:e;Aqua;HalfCloseEyes} Trust me.|{c:e;Aqua;CloseEyes}I've tried.

name: BaseConvo_Gated Community
_source: s;Semi;You'll pop a blood vessel if you keep thinking that hard.
s;Krista;Oh, hey, Semi! Quick question for ya.
s;Krista;Mind looking at this gate here? I just wanna know if you can lockpick it.
s;Semi;Yeah, I can give it a look.
s;Semi;{tgm}...|{c:e;Semi;NormalBlink}{tgm}The lock's simple enough, so it'll be an easy job.
s;Semi;What got you so interested in this gate anyway?
s;Krista;I just wanna be on the lookout for things that might get in the way of us leaving town.|If the Knights spot us, they might lock us in.
s;Semi;Huh. Pretty observant. I guess you're not as dumb as I thought you were.

name: BaseConvo_Family Reunion
_source: s;Aqua;Azure! My dear brother, you're here too?|I thought you were still travelling the world with your troupe.

s;Azure;I was, but I wanted to stop by the monestary to see how you were doing.|{c:e;Azure;CloseEyes}When I heard from Lady Iris that you were not here, I feared the worst.|{c:e;Azure;NormalBlink}So, I stayed behind to wait for your return.
s;Aqua;I'm sorry for worrying you, but as you can see, I'm alright.|More importantly, have you heard what's been going on in Foliaga?
