s;Azure;Yes, I have. In fact, that's what had me worried.|{c:e;Azure;CloseEyes}The thought of you captured by the Knights{tgm}...|{tgm}I hoped and prayed that was not the case.
s;Aqua;I see{tgm}...|{c:e;Aqua;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm}Well, Princess Krista of Medeas is investigating things right now.|Semi and I have been assisting her.
s;Azure;You don't say? Do you think she would not mind if I helped as well?
s;Aqua;I'm sure she would be more than happy to have you on board!|Having a dancer with us is sure to be a great benefit.
s;Azure;Excellent. I will do my best.

name: BaseConvo_A Unique Blade
_source: s;Forrest;Pardon me, Lady Iris. May I ask a favor of you?
s;Forrest;Her Highness' sword has gotten a lot of use,|so I was wondering if you know of anyone who could repair it.|It's one of a kind, so we cannot just get a replacement for it.
s;Iris;We have our own smith who tends to our Knights' weaponry.|We shall take care of it right away.
s;Forrest;That is a relief! I thank you.
s;Iris;And there we are. Good as new.
s;Forrest;Thank you again, Lady Iris.|I'm sure Princess Krista will be overjoyed to see her sword in such good condition.
for;PartyMembers;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_player_units() if get_item(unit,'RoyalSword')]

name: SupportFelicityJoshua
_source: s;Felicity;Joshua, what is the meaning of this?
s;Joshua;Oh, these swords aren't mine. Well, except Old Iron here.|I offered to clean everyone's swords.
s;Felicity;That is NOT what I was referring to, Joshua.
s;Felicity;Look around you!|Her Highness has been very gracious in granting you a private chamber,|and you let it get like this!|The state of this room is appalling!
s;Joshua;What do you mean? There's no dust or rats or anything.
s;Felicity;Oh sweet Medea! Where are your boots? Here on the nightstand?|Where's your armor? Hung up? No! It's thrown on the reading table.
s;Joshua;You mean I can't temporarily put them there?
s;Felicity;Of course not! Where did you grow up?|{c:e;Felicity;CloseEyes}Don't answer that. I don't want to know.
s;Joshua;Soooo{tgm}...{tgm} you want armor and clothes in the closet instead?
s;Felicity;Yes, it would make my job easier.
s;Felicity;Wait, isn't that Princess Krista's sword?
s;Joshua;Yes, it's seen some heavy use.|I offered to sharpen it and clean it up. A few knicks in it too.|A little light for my liking, but it's a good blade. Well balanced.
s;Felicity;You are something else.|Your room is worse than a rat's nest, but you keep your weapons and armor well-maintained.
s;Joshua;If you don't maintain your weapons, they'll fail you when you need them most.
s;Felicity;All of that is well and good,|but could you please maintain your chambers better?
s;Felicity;Thank you!|{c:e;Felicity;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Oh, next time you want to sneak out to the tavern,|I can get you out without Forrest knowing.{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink,Smile} Bye!
s;Joshua;That woman is something else. Reminds me of one of my aunts.

s;Joshua;Alright, just a little grime off the blade here, anddddd{tgm}...{w}{tgm} {c:e;Joshua;NormalBlink,Smile}Done!|{c:e;Joshua;NoSmile}Can't say I remember anyone using this axe before.|I wonder who it belongs to?
s;Felicity;Ah, there you are, Joshua. Have you seen my--
s;Felicity;Aha! I had a feeling my axe was with you.
s;Joshua;Wait, you're saying this is yours?|I never expected you to know how to use martial weapons. Especially not axes.
s;Joshua;I figured you'd prefer to be on the sidelines.|Provide support from a distance with that magic-y stuff you do.
s;Felicity;You aren't wrong, per se.|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink,Smile}I do not put myself in the line of fire if I can help it.|But having a Plan B can be useful just in case something goes wrong.
s;Joshua;Makes sense to me. Still, if you miss, it'll be costly.|Re-orienting yourself after a whiff takes time.
s;Felicity;Oh, I'm well-aware. But you know I can be light on my feet.
s;Joshua;Yeah, but you can't depend on that all the time.
s;Felicity;Well, if you think that, how about a quick spar?|I'll show you that my reflexes are more reliable than you think.|I'll help you sneak over to the tavern again if you win.
s;Joshua;Hah! Sure thing, Felicity. Let's go!
s;Felicity;Joshua, can't you move quietly?|The idea was to sneak through the servants' halls. That means NO noise.
s;Joshua;I'm trying Felicity, but these halls are a little small and narrow.
s;Felicity;That's because we don't hire lumbering, mountain men as maids.
s;Maid1;Oh, am I in your way, Miss Felicity?
s;Joshua;You okay? Stubbed your toe or something?
s;Felicity;No, I am NOT okay, Joshua!|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink}You did see her, right?
s;Felicity;She will think I'm sneaking a secret lover into or from my quarters!|That floozy hypocrite!
s;Joshua;So? Who cares? I don't see how what she thinks matters.|It's not going to affect your standing with the princess or her parents.
s;Felicity;It's the principle, Joshua!|I don't want unneeded attention or people talking about me.|{c:e;Felicity;HalfCloseEyes}Staring at me{tgm}...
s;Joshua;Fuck 'em. Who gives a shit?|It's not her damn place to back-talk someone as hard-working as you.
s;Felicity;At least someone realizes I work hard around here.
s;Joshua;You clearly work your ass off.|If she gives you hell, tell her to fuck off. Tell her where she can take her bitch ass.
s;Felicity;Hee-hee. You sure you're not related to Her Highness?
s;Felicity;Anyway, here's the back door. Have fun at the tavern.
s;Joshua;Why don't you come too this time? I think you need to unwind a little.
s;Joshua;You really want to deal with the other servants now?
s;Felicity;You know what, alright.|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink,Smile}It's been a millennia since I've taken it easy.
s;Joshua;Huh, wonder what that was about?
s;Felicity;What are you waiting for, Joshua? Come on!

name: SupportFelicityViola
_source: s;Viola;Hey, Felicity, mind clearing up something for me?
s;Viola;I'm trying to do the math in my head, and well{tgm}...|{c:e;Viola;NormalBlink}{tgm}Her Highness hired you seven years ago, right?
s;Felicity;Oh, Viola, don't you know it's rude to ask a lady her age?|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Besides, I stopped keeping track a long time ago.

s;Viola;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Well, you look like you're around my age,|so that would mean you would've still been a teenager when you met Princess Krista.|{c:e;Viola;NormalBlink}But that's not right! You look just like you did seven years ago.
s;Felicity;You can say I aged quite gracefully, then.
s;Felicity;As entertaining as this conversation is, Viola, I must return to my chores.|If you'll excuse me{tgm}...

s;Viola;Ah, wait!|{tgm}...{tgm} And she's gone.|{c:e;Viola;CloseEyes}Either I'm bad at math or Felicity's hiding something.|{tgm}{c:e;Viola;HalfCloseEyes}...{tgm} I should probably review my textbooks.
s;Viola;Your age! I now know why my calculations were off.
s;Viola;I've been going about it all wrong. You're just older than you look!
s;Viola;That's totally it, right?|You're probably like forty or fifty and just look really young for your age!
s;Felicity;Oh! Um, yes.|You got it right, Viola!{c:e;Felicity;HalfCloseEyes,Smile} Haha{tgm}...
s;Viola;No need to be embarrassed about it! My mother was like that too.|You look really good for fifty!
s;Felicity;Wh-Why thank you, Viola. I, er, appreciate you saying so.
s;Viola;Of course!|Oh, and don't worry. I won't tell anyone.|{c:e;Viola;FarWink,Smile}A lady's gotta have her secrets, after all.
s;Felicity;I am glad you understand, Viola.
s;Viola;Anyway, I'm gonna head to the library. I gotta brush up on my math!|See ya!

s;Felicity;Phew, that was close.|{c:e;Felicity;HalfCloseEyes}I wonder if she'll figure things out{tgm}...{w}{c:e;Felicity;CloseEyes}{tgm} Maybe.|{c:e;Felicity;HalfCloseEyes,Smile} It may take a while though.

name: BaseConvo_Living The Dream
_source: s;Ecco;Anil, my friend, we totally hit the jackpot this time.
s;Ecco;Just think of how much gold we're gonna get!|{c:e;Ecco;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Do you think it would be too forward to ask our kind benefactor for our pay soon?
s;Anil;[We just met her, so yes, of course it's too soon.]
s;Ecco;*sigh* I had a feeling you'd say that.|{c:e;Ecco;NormalBlink}Honestly, Anil, you gotta live a little.|This is the opportunity of a lifetime!
s;Anil;[Unlike you, I'm enjoying things in moderation.]|[Besides, I'd rather finish the job first.]
s;Ecco;You're too honorable for your own good, you know that?

name: BaseConvo_A Maids Duty
_source: s;Felicity;Your Majesties, I have something to report.
s;Thalia;Please let this be good news, Felicity.
s;Felicity;I apologize, but I'm afraid Her Highness will be leaving the castle again.|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink}This time to Oakenfaire in Foliaga.
s;Thalia;She had only just returned home!|What business does she have at Foliaga's capital?
s;Felicity;She had found two refugees from there in Oregot.|It seems Her Highness has agreed to help them investigate certain political matters.
s;Thalia;Then, those rumors about the Archbishop were true{tgm}...

s;Bryant;It's a delicate situation.|We had hoped to look into things ourselves when the time was right.|{c:e;Bryant;CloseEyes}Knowing Krista, she will go on this mission of hers|even if we try to persuade her not to.
s;Thalia;She certainly takes after you in that regard.

s;Bryant;For better or for worse.|{c:e;Bryant;NormalBlink}Regardless, this is much different from her usual escapades to Oregot.|We cannot let her do as she pleases.|Felicity, can we trust you to keep an eye on her?
s;Felicity;I had anticipated this, so I already started packing supplies for the journey.|I also convinced Viola to accompany me on this venture.
s;Bryant;Haha! Your intuition always astounds me, Felicity.|We'll leave this to you, then.
s;Thalia;I pray that Krista does not face any danger on her journey.|However, it would ease my worries if you gave her this to aid her.

name: BaseConvo_A Mothers Love
_source: s;Lucy;Good! Miss Alex and I planted some ginger a while back.|It should be ready to harvest next year.
s;Woman1;How lovely.|Do you plan on making more tea with that?
s;Woman1;The tea you made last time was wonderful,|but a batch made with ginger you grew yourself will be more special.
s;Woman1;I'm glad Miss Alex has been teaching you so many things, Lucy.|{c:e;Woman1;NoSmile}To tell you the truth, I have been worried about you.

s;Woman1;I know it's natural for a mother to worry about her child,|but when you insisted on being part of the royal army's medical division in my place,|I couldn't help but wonder if it would've been too much for you.
s;Woman1;Seeing you happy and healthy eases my worries, Lucy.|And it's good to see you working hard, but don't go overboard.
s;Woman1;Good. Keep doing your best, Lucy.

name: BaseConvo_Romantic Recommendation
_source: s;Marina;Oh, Alex, I was looking for you. May I ask you for a favor?
s;Marina;Being a reader yourself, I was wondering if you have some book recommendations.|I just finished this one, and I was wondering if you knew of anything similar to it.
s;Alex;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} "Heavenly Desires"?{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink} I've never heard of this one.
s;Marina;You can go ahead and borrow my copy of it, then.|You don't need to finish it, but it's quite a read.
s;Alex;Alright. I'll see what I can do.
s;Marina;Thank you again, Alex. I'll see you later.

s;Alex;Let's see here. "Chapter One: Taking the Plunge."|{tgm}{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}...{c:wait;200}{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink}{tgm} Oh. {tgm}{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}.....{c:wait;200}{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink}{tgm} Oh my.|{tgm}{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}.......{c:wait;200}{c:e;Alex;NormalBlink}{tgm} Oh, it went THERE already?|{c:e;Alex;CloseEyes}I haven't even finished the first chapter yet.
s;Marina;Hello again, Alex.|Not to put you in a rush, but do you have any book recommendations yet?|I've recently had this urge to give "Heavenly Desires" another read.
s;Marina;So, what did you think of it?
s;Alex;It was{tgm}...{tgm} a book.|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}It WAS interesting, but does it really need all{tgm}...{tgm} THAT in it?
s;Marina;What do you--|{c:e;Marina;CloseEyes}Ohh{tgm}...{c:e;Marina;CloseEyes,Smile}{tgm} Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Probably not.|{c:e;Marina;NormalBlink,Smile}Though, I still do enjoy it.

s;Alex;It was certainly more intense than anything I've read myself.|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}And{tgm}...{tgm} the euphemisms.{c:e;Alex;CloseEyes} Oh, Medea, the euphemisms.|{c:e;Alex;HalfCloseEyes}Why call those parts of a woman "nether lips" and "nip nops"?|Who talks like that?
s;Marina;No one to my knowledge, though I get a giggle out of it.
s;Alex;I don't mean to criticize it so much.|It wasn't bad per se, but like I said, it progressed faster than what I'm used to.|I haven't read anything of this intensity before.
s;Marina;I'll admit that book is intense and not something I would have recommended|if you have not read something like this before.
s;Alex;Some of the intimate moments between the main couple were nice,|but I do prefer a slower progression.|{c:e;Alex;CloseEyes,Smile}Really let it brew and steep in first.
s;Marina;Ahhh, more into slow, methodical romances, I see.|I can let you read another one of my favorites, if you'd like.|There are a few I have that I think would be better for you.
s;Alex;I would not mind that at all.
s;Marina;Here we are, my personal book collection.|One I would recommend to you is "Roses and Strawberry Wine".|It's a more intense romance novel, but you're not diving into the deep end.
s;Alex;I'll give it a try. Thank you, Marina
s;Alex;Oh, and since I'm borrowing a book of yours, why don't you take this?
s;Alex;Yes, it's a sweet romance about a noble who falls in love with a lowly farm girl.|I like it a lot.
s;Marina;I'll give it a try. Thank you, Alex.
s;Alex;Of course. Until next time, Marina.

name: BaseConvo_A Miracle
_source: s;Asuka;Lady Tsubaki, I have an important matter to discuss with you.
s;Asuka;On behalf of Emperor Samegoro, I entrust you with this relic.|I'm sure you know the significance of it.
s;Kai;I nabbed this before we left Merinas Castle a while back.|You know what to do with it.
s;Tsubaki;Are you sure about this, Miss Asuka? This is a hefty responsibility to bear.
s;Asuka;I wouldn't bring it to your attention if I thought you weren't ready for it.|It was your father's wish for you to inherit this staff when the time came.
if;len([unit.nid for unit in game.get_all_units_in_party('Krista') if game.check_dead(unit.nid) == True]) > 0
s;Asuka;Lives have been lost during this conflict, Lady Tsubaki.|It could provide an opportunity to bring back those who perished.
s;Asuka;While we are fortunate to not have lost anyone during this conflict,|we must be prepared if things take an unfortunate turn.
s;Kai;Not important.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}As I was saying, you know the significance of the Amaterasu.
if;len([unit.nid for unit in game.get_all_units_in_party('Krista') if game.check_dead(unit.nid) == True]) > 0
s;Kai;We've lost a good number of people.|This can bring them back.
s;Kai;No lives have been lost so far,|so having this is a good fallback plan.
s;Tsubaki;I was just thinking{tgm}...{tgm} was the Amaterasu truly born of the Great Merin's power?|{c:e;Tsubaki;CloseEyes}Knowing what we know about Circ, do you think{tgm}...?
s;Asuka;That it is actually Circ's power that the staff is drawing from?|{c:e;Asuka;NormalBlink}It is certainly possible.
s;Kai;Yeah, I was thinking that too.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}How it's probably Circ's power and not Merin's.

s;Asuka;Lady Tsubaki, it is ultimately up to you if you wish to use the staff.|While I understand your uneasiness,|one must use whatever methods necessary to gain an advantage.|That is the way of war, my lady.

s;Kai;Assuming it is Circ's power, why does it matter?|We can't be debating moral dilemmas like this when there's a literal war going on, Tsubaki.|You gotta be pragmatic with your tactics in order to come out on top.
s;Tsubaki;I{tgm}...{tgm} I understand.|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}I'll accept this, then.|Both the Amaterasu and the responsibility that comes with it.

name: BaseConvo_Take the Load Off
_source: s;Taylor;Ah, finally back home.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink,Smile}You know what this calls for, Alex?|A nice drink to celebrate another successful mission!
s;Alex;Please tell me you're referring to a nice cup of tea this time.
s;Taylor;I mean, if the weather were a little colder, sure.|{c:e;Taylor;NormalBlink,Smile}But nah. I'm talking about a nice pint of beer for the both of us!
s;Alex;Well, at least it's not anything TOO strong.
s;Taylor;Of course not! We just got back to the castle.|Unless you want something stronger to take the load off.
s;Taylor;Alright, lemme just get these poured out.
s;Taylor;A toast to a successful rescue mission. Cheers!

name: BaseConvo_One Year Ago
_source: s;Krista;Azalea, Samegoro, and Ervan{tgm}...{tgm} Why them?
s;Forrest;Has anything similar happened in Oregot?

s;Parker;The Oregotian Council is in chaos. Their leadership has completely fractured.|Two of their leaders have vanished without a trace,|leaving only three of them left to rule.|{c:e;Parker;CloseEyes}There are rumors of someone pulling strings from behind the scenes,|but I cannot say that with one-hundred percent certainty.
s;Krista;And this all happened a year ago too?
s;Krista;Damn it! What the hell is going on?
s;Kai;Why hasn't Medeas been targeted yet?
s;Kai;From an outside perspective, one could draw some conclusions.
s;Parker;Hold on, General Forrest.|Now, Kai, I understand your logic. However, there is one thing that doesn't add up.

s;Parker;The late Prince Ervan was not the ruler of Fuegsol at the time.|Even when he was alive, he was engaged to Princess Krista.|He would have ruled Medeas alongside her.|{c:e;Parker;CloseEyes}Since that is the case, King Gerolt, Queen Leeann,|or even his brother Khalid would have been more logical targets.
s;Parker;Once Prince Ervan got married,|Prince Khalid would have been next in line to the throne.
s;Forrest;An anomaly that could be key to solving this mystery.|We need to figure out what it can tell us.
s;Kai;Hm{tgm}...{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}{tgm} Alright, fair point.|Leave no stone unturned and all that.
s;Krista;I have a feeling we'll have more answers once we reach Edoyama.|Keep your eyes and ears open as we move forward, everyone.
if;game.check_alive('Forrest') == True or game.check_alive('Kai') == True or game.check_alive('Parker') == True
if;game.check_dead('Forrest') == True or game.check_dead('Kai') == True or game.check_dead('Parker') == True

name: BaseConvo_Retirement
_source: s;Rembrandt;This village is so small and peaceful.|Perhaps when this is all over, I should retire here.
s;Lucy;Oh, hello, Mister Rembrandt! What are you up to?
s;Rembrandt;Just enjoying the peace and quiet. Care to join me?
s;Lucy;Sure!|{c:e;Lucy;CloseEyes,Smile}The air feels so fresh and clean here. There's a nice breeze too.
s;Rembrandt;This village being nestled in the mountains most likely has something to do with it.
s;Lucy;Medeas has nothing like this. It's plains as far as the eye can see.|{c:e;Lucy;Smile}Maybe I should take my mother here one day.
s;Lucy;My mother isn't feeling well, so I think a change of scenery would help.
s;Rembrandt;Perhaps.|{c:e;Rembrandt;Smile}Either way, I'm sure she would appreciate it, Lucy.
s;Lucy;Oh, by the way, I found this pretty feather on the ground earlier.|You can have it if you want, Mister Rembrandt.
s;Rembrandt;I'll take it. Thank you, Lucy.
s;Lucy;I'm gonna get going. See you later!

name: BaseConvo_Prep Work
_source: s;Kai;No need to be coy, Felicity. I know you're there.
s;Kai;Look on the bright side. I didn't notice you as quickly this time.
s;Felicity;Don't try flattering me.|We both know you were feigning ignorance.
s;Kai;Okay, okay. Fair.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Anyway, did you need something?
s;Felicity;Just curious about what you're up to.
s;Kai;If you must know, I'm making preparations for our journey to Merinas.|Considering how we had to take down the Archbishop,|I figured we may need to confront Emperor Samegoro too.
s;Kai;From what I remember of his forces, he has a good number of ninjas serving him.
s;Kai;They'll more than likely wield weapons laced with poison, so I'm stocking up on Antitoxins.
s;Felicity;Not a bad idea.|{c:e;Felicity;NoSmile}Any other information on the emperor's forces, Kai?|{c:e;Felicity;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}You did work for him for a time, after all.
s;Kai;{tgm}...{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}{tgm} No. That's all.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}Well, I'm done here. If you'll excuse me{tgm}...

name: BaseConvo_Target Practice
_source: s;Forrest;I will leave you to it, then.
s;Forrest;Are you sure? I do not wish to distract--
s;Forrest;You're shooting as well as you did a year ago.
s;Forrest;If only you were this dedicated with your history lessons.
s;Forrest;{tgm}...{tgm} Prince Ervan taught you well.
s;Forrest;I remember the two of you conversing like this during archery lessons.
s;Forrest;Was that part of the training regimen?
s;Krista;Heh.{c:wait;200}{c:e;Krista;Smile,HalfCloseEyes} Oh, Medea, he was such a dork{tgm}...
s;ErvanFlashback;What was that one book you were reading again?
s;ErvanFlashback;Ah, isn't that one about the village boy who befriends a beast who|lived in an underground cavern?
s;KristaFlashback;Pretty good. Could lend it to you later.
s;ErvanFlashback;I'd appreciate that.|Mind telling me more about it?
s;KristaFlashback;You're just gonna complain that I spoiled the whole thing for you|when you actually start reading it.
s;ErvanFlashback;Okay, you have a point.|{c:e;ErvanFlashback;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Anything interesting happen lately?
s;ErvanFlashback;Heh. Don't try to butter me up now.
s;ErvanFlashback;Hmm{tgm}...{tgm} I suppose I'll let you off easy with that answer this time.
s;KristaFlashback;Why do you like hearing me talk about basically nothing, anyway?
s;ErvanFlashback;If you can keep focused on your target even with distractions,|you'll get better at archery.|{c:e;ErvanFlashback;CloseEyes,Smile}At least, that's my theory.
s;ErvanFlashback;I like hearing your lovely voice.
s;Krista;I{tgm}...{tgm} I miss him, Forrest.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Why{tgm}...{tgm} did things have to turn out like this{tgm}...?

name: BaseConvo_Teacher and Student
_source: s;Parker;We're going to leave Medeas soon, Cole. Do you have your things ready?

s;Parker;This will be unlike the training I had you undergo for the past few months.|There will be people out there who will intend to harm you,|and you must make sure you defend yourself.|No holding back. Understand?
s;Parker;I do not mean to scare you, Cole, but that is the reality of the situation.|You have been doing well with your studies,|and I believe this is something you can handle.

s;Parker;Of course. If I did not think that,|I would not have had you accompany me in the first place.|{c:e;Parker;CloseEyes}While I would prefer you to continue your studies in theoretical magic applications,|there may not be another opportunity to put your knowledge into practice.|{c:e;Parker;NormalBlink}And as I said before, you are capable of taking on this task.|{c:e;Parker;Smile}You can do this, Cole. I believe in you.

name: BaseConvo_Nimble Fingers
_source: s;Krista;Wait, what did you call me?|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes,Smile}Actually, I could get used to that.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Shoot, no, I'm getting distracted here.
s;Matthew;I can undo pesky locks and take little things that people won't miss.|All qualities of nimble fingers, no?
s;Krista;Yeah, but I thought you meant{tgm}...
s;Krista;That you were, y'know, good with your hands!
s;Matthew;Doesn't that mean the same thing?
s;Krista;No, not like that! I mean like{tgm}...
s;Matthew;Heh, maybe I don't need to rush back to Ostia after all.

name: BaseConvo_Other Parts
_source: s;Sam;Uh, Chell?|Why are you stretching like that in front of a mirror?
s;Chell;Sam!|You should know a man should knock before entering a lady's chambers.
s;Chell;Especially when he never wears a shirt.;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Chell;That is beside the point.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}But anyway, I am posing.
s;Sam;Why? Is there a bodybuilding contest coming up?
s;Chell;Bodybuilding? No, that's not it.|Do you remember when we reunited in Oregot?
s;Sam;Sure do! Uncanny how all of you were there.
s;Chell;"Uncanny" is certainly a way to put it.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}At any rate, do you remember what you said about me?|That I had gotten bigger too?
s;Chell;You said the same thing when we were training the other day.|{c:e;Chell;HalfCloseEyes}By "bigger" did you mean{tgm}...
s;Sam;What's wrong? I don't get why you're so confused.
s;Sam;I was talking about your muscles! You've clearly been training hard all these years.|You look strong.
s;Chell;Then, you weren't talking about my{tgm}...{tgm} other parts?
s;Sam;No.{w} Wait, other parts?|What is that supposed to mean?
s;Chell;Never mind.|{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes,Smile}That does make me feel better, though.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink,Smile}Anyway, I'm heading to the training yard now if you wish to join me!
s;Sam;"Other parts"? What did she mean by that?|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}What other parts does she have?|{c:e;Sam;NormalBlink,Smile}Her muscles look great though. I think I'll join her.

name: DeathNonConditional_Poison
condition: (unit.get_field('DeathQuote') or (unit.get_field('DeathQuoteCh15') and game.level.nid == '15')) and unit2.nid is None

name: FightAdler
_source: s;Adler;Medean forces, stand down!|Your presence is unwelcome here!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAdlerKrista
_source: s;Krista;Wait, how do you know who I am?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Adler;It matters not. Your journey ends here!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: Arena
_source: # Get the NIDs and positions of all units on the map and store them into variables. This will be used to put the units back after the arena battle.
# Changes terrain to Arena terrain. Add an Arena layer to the tilemap in the Tilemap editor to chapters with an arena.
# Adds a dummy unit so that chapters with a Rout objective don't trigger their win condition after winning an arena battle
# Find tier of class of player unit to determine enemy's tier
# Randomly choose the enemy's class from the pool. Add the tag ArenaIgnore to any classes that won't show up in the arena.
lvar;ArenaEnemyKlassList;[klass.nid for klass in DB.classes if 'ArenaIgnore' not in klass.tags and klass.tier == v('EnemyTier')]
# Calculate level range for enemy and pick level at random
# Calculate arena wager based on enemy level
# Equip enemy with weapon. Determines what weapons are available to equip based on WEXP defined in the Class Editor.
for;LoadItem;[w for w in DB.classes.get(u('{created_unit}').klass).wexp_gain if DB.classes.get(u('{created_unit}').klass).wexp_gain[w].usable == True]
# Randomly choose which weapon to equip.
#Moves the unit away from the player unit so they can retaliate if equipped with a bow.
s;;What! You don't have any money! Get out of here!;top_right;160;noir
# Get name of class to display on table
choice;ArenaChoice;Would you like to wager {var:ArenaWager} gold?;Yes,No;backable
s;;Good luck. Don't get yourself killed.|Fight 'til defeat or press B to yield.;top_right;160;noir
s;;So you won, eh? Here's your prize. {e:2*v('ArenaWager')} gold.;top_right;160;noir
s;;What are you wasting my time for?;top_right;160;noir
s;;What! You don't have a weapon! Get out of here!;top_right;160;noir
# Clean up after a round at the arena.

name: Arena
_source: # Get the NIDs and positions of all units on the map and store them into variables. This will be used to put the units back after the arena battle.
# Changes terrain to Arena terrain. Add an Arena layer to the tilemap in the Tilemap editor to chapters with an arena.
# Calculate level range for enemy and pick level at random
# Calculate arena wager based on enemy level
s;;What! You don't have any money! Get out of here!;top_right;160;noir
# Get name of class to display on table
choice;ArenaChoice;Would you like to wager {var:ArenaWager} gold?;Yes,No;backable
s;;Good luck. Don't get yourself killed.|Fight 'til defeat or press B to yield.;top_right;160;noir
s;Joshua;Up for a rematch, huh? Alright, show me what you got!

s;Joshua;Hey, you're my opponent this round?|Let's make this interesting, then!|See, I hit pretty hard, so most people go down easy if they're up against me.|If you survive for one round, I'll say that you won. Sound like a plan?|{c:e;Joshua;Smile}Great! Let's go!
s;;So you won, eh? Here's your prize. {e:2*v('ArenaWager')} gold.;top_right;160;noir
s;Joshua;Not bad. I like you!|{c:e;Joshua;NoSmile}What's that? You need people to join your army?|{c:e;Joshua;Smile}If there's more people like you in it, then count me in!
s;;What are you wasting my time for?;top_right;160;noir
s;;What! You don't have a weapon! Get out of here!;top_right;160;noir
# Clean up after a round at the arena.

name: KristaMarinaTalk
_source: s;Marina;Are you here to fight the Knights?
s;Krista;Uh, kinda?|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}More like we're trying to get away from them right now.|But ultimately, yeah, we're on opposing sides.
s;Marina;Please let me help you, then!|The Holy Knights have been nothing but trouble for the past year.|I want Foliaga to know peace again.
s;Krista;Well, who am I to turn down a helping hand?|Welcome aboard, Miss{tgm}...{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}{tgm} uh{tgm}...
s;Marina;Marina. I'll do my best for you!

name: ForrestMarinaTalk
_source: s;Marina;Are you here to fight the Knights?
s;Forrest;"Fight" would not be the term I would use at the moment.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}But, yes, they are against us.
s;Marina;Please let me help you, then!|The Holy Knights have been nothing but trouble for the past year.|I want Foliaga to know peace again.
s;Forrest;No disrespect, madam,|but you do not appear to have any combat experience.
s;Marina;That may be true, but I am a dancer.|My dances have magical properties that can help you all.
s;Forrest;Is that so? If that's the case, you may come along.|On the condition that you do not put yourself in unnecessary danger.
s;Marina;That should go without saying, sir knight.
s;Forrest;I only wished to give you a fair warning.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink,NoSmile}From here on out, I will not be held accountable for your actions.|Now, may I ask for your name?
s;Forrest;Forrest. Now, keep my words in mind, Miss Marina.

name: TalkKristaRembrandt
_source: s;Rembrandt;You there! Young lady! Do you need assistance?
s;Krista;With the pirates? Yeah, some help would be very much appreciated.
s;Rembrandt;You hardly ever see a pirate crew take their assault to shore like this.|Did you do something to provoke them?
s;Krista;To be fair, they're the ones who started it.|They were trying to raid a local monestary, so we stopped them.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Needless to say, they weren't too happy about that.
s;Rembrandt;How petty. Though, that's how ruffians of any kind tend to be.|It's decided. I'll help you. Who might you be?
s;Krista;Krista, princess of Medeas. And you?
s;Rembrandt;Rembrandt, former soldier of Fuegsol's royal army.
s;Krista;"Former" soldier? Aw man, now I feel bad for dragging you to the battlefield.
s;Rembrandt;Worry not, Your Highness. Though I prefer to settle things peacefully,|there are times blades are needed to quell a conflict.

name: TalkKristaRembrandt
_source: s;Rembrandt;Excuse me, young lady. Are you alright?
s;Krista;Could be better, could be worse. Who are you?

s;Rembrandt;My name is Rembrandt.|I just happened to be passing through this area and saw your wrecked vessel in the distance.|Knowing that there were survivors from the wreck is a relief.|{c:e;Rembrandt;CloseEyes}But these bandits aren't making things easy for you.
s;Krista;Yeah, we've got our hands full.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}I know this is a lot to ask for since we just met and all,|but mind giving us a hand here?
s;Rembrandt;That's exactly what I came here for.|This is no trouble at all.

name: TalkMarinaRembrandt
_source: s;Marina;Well, isn't this a pleasant surprise?|Mister Rembrandt, wasn't it?
s;Rembrandt;Yes. And you're{tgm}...{tgm} Miss Marina, correct?
s;Marina;How sweet of you to remember.|{c:e;Marina;Smile,CloseEyes}If anything, I'm more surprised you remember little ol' me.
s;Rembrandt;Well, I{tgm}...{w}{c:e;Rembrandt;CloseEyes}{tgm} Ahem.|{c:e;Rembrandt;NormalBlink}We can discuss more of that later.|It seems you and your friends are having trouble with these bandits.
s;Marina;And you'd be right.|The brutes suddenly attacked us right after we got shipwrecked!
s;Rembrandt;How horrible. But worry not, Miss Marina. I'm here to help.
s;Marina;Thank you, Mister Rembrandt.|It truly is wonderful to be reunited with you.

name: Outro
_source: s;Ferrach;So, you think you've won? Far from it!|This is only the beginning, spawn of Medea. You are only delaying the inevitable.
s;Krista;Dammit, quit it with the cryptic stuff! Just what are you--
s;Krista;Green hair and golden robes{tgm}...{tgm} It's you!
s;Ferrach;I see my reputation precedes me.
s;Ferrach;Ask and you shall receive, spawn of Medea.
s;Krista;Who are you?! Stay away from the Archbishop!
s;Ferrach;Ask and you shall receive, spawn of Medea.
s;Krista;Hey! We're not through with you!!
s;Aqua;Your Highness, we must tend to the Archbishop.
s;Aqua;Your Highness, we must tend to the Archbishop.
s;Krista;Why do you keep calling me "Medea"?|I'm just his descendant, so why--
s;Krista;Huh? "Medea"?|Your Excellency, snap out of it! I'm not--
s;Aqua;What a relief{tgm}...{tgm} She is still breathing, at least.|As long as her wounds are taken care of, she should be--
s;KristaFlashback;So, Ervan, what's this super cool thing you wanted to show me?|Another ancient artifact or something?
s;ErvanFlashback;Why, yes it is.|It's a pendant that's allegedly at least one thousand years old.|The merchant at the marketplace said it's supposed to be a good luck charm.
s;KristaFlashback;You better not have been duped.
s;ErvanFlashback;I have a good feeling about its legitimacy.|Most modern holy symbols and the like are mainly made of metals or alloys.|And as you can see, this pendant seems to be mostly from stone.
s;KristaFlashback;Oooohhh. Yeah, I see what you mean.|So, what's this symbol, then? I don't recognize it at all.
s;ErvanFlashback;I'm not sure. That's why I bought it in the first place.|In fact, it's one of the main reasons why I came to Medeas today.|I'm hoping the castle library may have some books on it.
s;KristaFlashback;That, and you wanted to see your lovely fiancee, right?
s;ErvanFlashback;You know I don't need an excuse to do that.
s;KristaFlashback;But no seriously, mind if I tag along with the whole research thing?
s;ErvanFlashback;Do you even need to ask?|I was under the assumption you would help anyway.

s;Krista;We didn't find anything that day,|so he ended up doing research on his own later on.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Ervan... Just what did you find?|If you were still here, could you have done something?|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}Could WE have--;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Krista;She's alive, yeah. But she isn't looking too good.
s;Priest1;I shall fetch the clerics to tend to her immediately.|However, what happens now?
s;Priest1;Foliaga has been in turmoil for an entire year.|Even if Her Excellency makes a full recovery,|it doesn't mean the nation itself will follow.

s;Kai;Ensure the Archbishop sees to a speedy recovery.|You clergymen are in a position to rule temporarily, I'm sure.|Take care of her duties in her stead|and assist her in bringing Foliaga back on its feet.
s;Priest1;Understood. I thank you for your wisdom, kind sir.
s;Kai;Of course. You seemed preoccupied with your own thoughts.
s;Kai;At any rate, we should return to the castle immediately.
s;Kai;Not only has Foliaga been on a downward spiral for the past year,|but so has Yondo as a whole.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}The more time passes, the worse things get.
s;Kai;We need to plan our next move before it's too late.
s;Krista;Felicity! Come on! We gotta go!

name: Outro
_source: s;Kai;Mind giving us some space, Princess?
s;Ryuuji;Look, I know I've been gone for a while--
s;Kai;"Gone"?! You were captured by pirates, and now you're suddenly their captain?|What the hell!?
s;Ryuuji;Will you calm down already?|{c:e;Ryuuji;CloseEyes,Smile}Damn, five whole years and you're still an impatient brat.
s;Ryuuji;Long story short, the old captain liked me enough to let me live.|Then he let me take over the crew.

s;Kai;How can you be so nonchalant about this?|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}I thought I lost you.|For so long, I wondered what I'd do without you.|And now you're here in front of me again.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}I wasn't prepared to have you see me like this.
s;Ryuuji;Speaking of which, why are you with Medean royalty?|What happened to--
s;Kai;Things are getting bad, so I had to do some investigating.
s;Ryuuji;Fine, fine. We can talk more about that later.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink}So, where are you all headed?
s;Kai;Edoyama. We need to get there as soon as we can.
s;Ryuuji;I'd be careful if I were you. I've been hearing things about the emperor.
s;Ryuuji;Now hold on. I don't operate like that anymore, Kai.
s;Kai;Anything I can do to make you spill?
s;Ryuuji;Let me make an offer.|If you tell me what you've been doing the past five years,|I'll tell you everything I know and my crew will be at your disposal.

s;Ryuuji;This info's for your ears only.|{c:e;Ryuuji;CloseEyes}With how everything's been lately, I can't trust them royal types, y'know?|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink}So no word of this goes to your new boss, alright?
s;Kai;What makes you think I won't just relay this information to her anyway?
s;Ryuuji;Don't play dumb with me, ya brat.|I know how that head of yours works.
s;Kai;Fair enough.{c:e;Kai;Smile,NormalBlink} You've got yourself a deal, Kenji.
s;Krista;So, I finally got the mango, and that goose was STILL honking its neck off--
s;Taiga;Hahaha!! Man, you're a riot, Krista!
s;Kai;Your Highness, we're good now. The Wyrmfang Pirates agreed to help us.
s;Krista;We got a whole pirate crew on our side?! That's so cool!
s;Taiga;We're working together now? Nice!|You better tell me more of that story, then, Krista.
s;Krista;Sure, sure. We've got all the time in the world!
s;Krista;Let's keep going, everyone! Onwards to Edoyama!
s;Krista;Sorry, Kai. That didn't work out the way I intended.
s;Kai;It's{tgm}...{tgm} It's fine. I was probably wrong about him anyway.
s;Krista;Not much we can do about it.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}We just gotta keep moving.

name: SouthGateWarning
_source: s;Lorelei;They're escaping! Prepare to close the gates!
s;Krista;Let's get on the other side of those gates before they close!

name: NorthGateWarning
_source: s;Lorelei;They're approaching the northern gate!|Prepare to close the uptown gates!
s;Krista;You know the drill, guys. Move!

name: PrepMarketTutorial
_source: s;Jake;Oh hey, since we're here, you can buy stuff from us when you <red>Prepare</> for battle.|Just let us know when you have to manage your <red>Items</>.|We'll set up a <red>Market</> for you guys to shop through.|Pretty convenient having a couple of merchants around, huh?
s;Anna;And don't worry. Even if we get hurt real bad out there,|you can always depend on us to supply you with merchandise.

name: Seize
_source: s;Anna;One fort seized! Keep it up, everyone!
s;Daphne;They took one of the forts!|Soldiers, reclaim it before they seize any more!
s;Jake;Got another one! Just a few more to go!

name: DevilAxe
_source: s;Sam;Alright, this should make a good vantage point--
s;Sam;Oh no! I dropped my axe!
s;Chell;If I fly over the lake, I should make it to the farther forts in no time.
s;Chell;My axe! It fell into the lake!
s;Taylor;Alright, the fort by the lake is in sight.|Just gotta go around and--
s;Taylor;Aw no! I dropped my axe in the lake!
s;LakeSpirit;Greetings, young one. I am the guardian spirit of this lake.|Did you drop the axe in my right hand, or the one in my left?
s;Sam;The one in your right, of course!|The one in your left hand looks a little strange{tgm}...
s;Chell;The one in your left hand looks nothing like mine.|So, the one in your right.
s;Taylor;It's the one in your right!
s;LakeSpirit;For your honesty, you may take both axes.
s;Sam;Oh, it's alright. I'll just take my own axe--
s;Taylor;That's really nice of you. Thanks!
s;Sam;And she's gone.|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}This axe is giving me a bad feeling{tgm}...
s;Chell;Looking closer at this axe, I'm not sure if I really want it.|I feel a bad energy from it{tgm}...
s;Taylor;Hmm{tgm}...{tgm} This axe is a little{tgm}...|{c:e;Taylor;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}Yeah, I dunno if I want this anymore.

name: Event
_source: s;Matthew;Lucky, is that you?! Man, am I glad to see you.|It's good to see a familiar face around here.
s;Krista;Whoa, hold on there! Who are you? I have no idea who you are.
s;Matthew;What do you mean? It's me, Matthew! Remember?
s;Krista;S-Sorry. I think you got me mixed up with someone else.

s;Matthew;But{tgm}...{c:e;Matthew;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm} Hmm{tgm}...|{c:e;Matthew;CloseEyes}{tgm}Ah, sorry. It's just that you look like someone I knew.|{c:e;Matthew;NormalBlink}Hey, mind if I stick with you, though?|I have no idea where I am, and I need to go back home.
s;Matthew;I can make it worth your while.|{c:e;Matthew;Smile,HalfCloseEyes}I have{tgm}...{tgm} nimble fingers.
s;Krista;"Nimble fingers", you say?|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}Alright, you're in. Follow my lead!
s;Matthew;Ha! Too easy.|{c:e;Matthew;NormalBlink,Smile}She may not be her, but she sure acts like her.

name: ReinforceWarning
_source: s;Krista;I think I hear footsteps coming from the basement.|We'd better wrap things up soon.

name: SpawnXiang
_source: s;Xiang;Medea's kin{tgm}...{tgm} I feel her approaching.{br}Just as was foretold.|I shall clear a path for her.

name: TalkKristaXiang
_source: s;Xiang;Daughter of Medea{tgm}...{tgm} you finally arrive.
s;Krista;Uh, I know Medea's an ancestor of mine and all,|but that's a bit much, don't you think?|More importantly, who are you?
s;Xiang;I am Xiang. I foresaw your arrival, daughter of Medea.
s;Krista;Nice to meet you.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}Now, let's drop the whole "daughter of Medea" thing, okay?|You can call me "Your Highness", "Princess Krista"{tgm}...|{tgm}Even just "Krista" is fine.

name: TalkFelicityXiang
_source: s;Xiang;You have a certain power within you.
s;Xiang;You are with Medea's kin, yes?
s;Felicity;You mean Princess Krista? Why do you want to know?
s;Xiang;I foresaw her arrival to this place.|Though, you being with her is curious.|Considering what you are--
s;Felicity;Hey, hey, hey, keep your mouth shut about that.|Look, if you have business with Her Highness,|I'll let you tag along as long as you don't tell anyone about what you know about me.

name: GameOver_Poison
condition: game.check_dead('Krista') and game.level.nid != '15' and unit2.nid is None

name: GameOver
condition: game.check_dead('1') and game.check_dead('2') and game.check_dead('3') and game.check_dead('4') and game.check_dead('5') and game.check_dead('6') and game.check_dead('7') and game.check_dead('8') and game.check_dead('9')

name: GameOver
condition: game.check_dead('Forrest') == True or game.check_dead('Trevor') == True or game.check_dead('Kai') == True

name: Outro
_source: s;Aqua;I believe so. Though it's just its entrance hall, it's quite beautiful.
s;Semi;We're not here for sightseeing, remember?|Let's figure out how to get into the temple.
s;Ferrach;You fools! How did you let the Medeans get past our defenses?
s;SoldierGreenFemale;H-Have mercy! There was nothing we could do!
s;Ferrach;Because of you, the Medean forces are now at the capital.|What do you have to say for yourselves?! If I had half a mind, I'd--
s;Azalea;The both of you are dismissed. You may return to your posts.|Do not fail us again.
s;SoldierGreenFemale;We will not let you down!
s;Azalea;Ferrach, I respect your wisdom and have found you to be a competent advisor|for the past year. However, things have gone too far.
s;Ferrach;Too far? Whatever could you mean?

s;Azalea;It's one thing to punish ne'er-do-wells and heretics for their sins.|But to think that those with blackened hearts are within our entire clergy{tgm}...|{tgm}That's unthinkable!|{c:e;Azalea;CloseEyes}The Holy Knights, the bishops and clerics of Folia{tgm}...|{tgm}They have all vowed to serve the Great Folia with the utmost piety.|None of them would even consider turning their backs on him.|{c:e;Azalea;NormalBlink}We must release the prisoners we have and pray to the Great Folia for his forgivness.
s;Ferrach;Is that what you truly think?
s;Ferrach;As you were saying, Your Excellency?|{c:e;Ferrach;CloseEyes}Or should I say{tgm}...{w}{c:e;Ferrach;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}{tgm} Lord Folia?
s;Ferrach;Go on and rest, milord. It has been such a long day for you, hasn't it?
s;Ferrach;Do not worry about a thing, milord.|Your humble servant Ferrach shall take care of everything from here.
if;{v:knightHelp} == True and game.check_alive('s1') == True and game.check_alive('s2') == True
s;Matthew;Sorry, but I don't think I will.
s;SoldierGreenFemale;I-I've got a lance and I'm not afraid to use it!

s;Matthew;Relax, I'm not here to hurt anyone.|Wrong place, wrong time is all.|{c:e;Matthew;Smile}And your friend here's just knocked out.|Get out of here and take care of him, alright?|We can just pretend none of this happened.
s;SoldierGreenFemale;Fine, whatever! Not a word of this to anybody!
s;Matthew;What a strange place{tgm}...{tgm} It's nothing like Ostia. Not at all.|I'll just keep snooping around here. I'm sure I'll find something of use.

name: Outro
_source: s;Forrest;We must proceed with caution. A powerful enemy awaits us.
s;Krista;Look alive, guys! The end's in sight!
s;SoldierGreen;You there! Are you the ones responsible for destroying the Charm Stones?
s;Krista;The weird red orb things? Yup, that was us!
s;Priest1;We must humbly thank you for freeing us from their spell.|Those of us who were cursed had no ill will towards your group, princess of Medeas.
s;Krista;Yeah, we had a feeling that was the case. Are you guys doing alright?
s;SoldierGreen;Still feeling a bit light-headed, but nothing a good night's rest can't fix.
s;SoldierGreen;I'm just glad all of us are back to our normal selves.
s;SoldierGreen;I'm just glad most of us are back to our normal selves.
s;Priest1;We shall tend to the others and make sure they are well.
s;Priest1;As a token of our appreciation, please take this with you.
s;Krista;That's very kind of you, but you guys probably need that more than we do.
s;SoldierGreen;Don't even worry about it. Just take it!
s;Priest1;Good luck on your mission, Your Highness.|Please bring Her Excellency back to her senses!

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Alright, Port Gildress is safe and sound!|Onto the ship, everyone!
s;Kai;Hmm{tgm}...{tgm} Now why would that pirate girl have{tgm}...?
s;Krista;Kai, come on! We gotta go!
s;Man2;Your Highness, we of Port Gildress must humbly thank you for your assistance.
s;Krista;No need for thanks. We just did what we had to.
s;Man2;Please take this as a token of our appreciation.
s;Krista;Wh-Whoa there! Are you sure?|Especially with those pirates--
s;Man2;It's the least we can do, Your Highness.|Port Gildress will be back to its former glory in due time.|Please do not worry about us.
s;Krista;Huh? Oh, you're that woman from earlier.
s;BSFE;Yes. I wanted to thank you for saving me.|Please take this as a token of my gratitude.
s;Krista;This is really kind of you, but you don't gotta do that--

s;BSFE;I insist, Your Highness! I am truly grateful for what you've done.|{c:e;BSFE;NoSmile}And, um{tgm}...{tgm} Please come back to visit Port Gildress again soon.|I would--I mean, everyone here would love to see you again.
s;Krista;Sure thing! What's your name, by the way?
s;Forrest;Your Highness! We have to go!
s;Krista;Sorry to cut this short, but we gotta set sail.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}I'll come back as soon as I can. Promise.|{c:e;Krista;FarWink,Smile}Then I can catch your name, Miss B.
s;BSFE;O-Okay! Bye, Your Highness! Stay safe!
s;Krista;Onwards to Merinas!{c:e;Krista;Smile} It'll be smooth sailing from here.|{tgm}{c:e;Krista;Smile,HalfCloseEyes}...{tgm} Get it?{br}"Smooth sailing"?
s;Krista;Come on, no need to be *crabby* about it.|Because, y'know, we're out at sea and--
s;Parker;One more terrible pun out of you, and I'm throwing you overboard.
s;Krista;Oh, come on! That one was good!!
s;Taiga;Still bummed about Shinobu leaving, Cap?
s;Ryuuji;"Bummed," no. More annoyed, if anything.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink}That kid's way in over her head. Defecting like that was stupid of her.
s;Taiga;Aw, good riddance! We don't need crewmates like her to keep us afloat.|{c:e;Taiga;NormalBlink,Smile}Our good ol' Captain Ryuuji is all we need!
s;Ryuuji;No need to flatter me like that, Taiga.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink,Smile}Still, thanks.
s;Watt;Captain! A royal Medean's ship's approaching!
s;Ryuuji;Is that so? A nice big haul's sailing right up our doorstep.|Let's pay them a visit.
s;Ryuuji;Sail onwards, crew! We've got a ship to raid!

name: BaseConvo_Touch Base
_source: s;Kai;If you don't mind, Lady Iris,|would it be possible to get your perspective on what's been going on in Foliaga?|It may help us with our investigation.

s;Iris;Yes, of course.|I'm sure you are aware that many of Foliaga's citizens are vanishing.|Though most people believe it merely to be rumors, the Holy Knights are truly to blame.|But even more so, the Archbishop is the one commanding them.
s;Krista;Yeah, we figured out all that on our own the hard way.
s;Kai;Anything you can disclose about the Archbishop herself?|Has she exhibited behavior like this in the past?

s;Iris;This is beyond unusual for her.|She treats her people with the utmost kindness and respect.|She would never do something like this under normal circumstances.|{c:e;Iris;NormalBlink}Something changed one year ago.|That is approximately when people started to disappear.
s;Krista;N-No. It's nothing. Carry on, Lady Iris.
s;Iris;Now that I think of it, there was something{tgm}...|{c:e;Iris;CloseEyes}{tgm}Or rather, someone different in the Archbishop's presence.
s;Iris;When I would go to the Grand Temple of Folia in the capital,|I would catch a glimpse of someone at her side.|A young man whom I've never seen before.|He had green hair and wore golden robes.
s;Iris;Yes, actually.|{c:e;Iris;CloseEyes}There is an unusual energy about him. I cannot place what it could be.|{c:e;Iris;NormalBlink}I assume he may have an aptitude for magic.
s;Kai;Sounds like we've got a lead.|{c:e;Kai;NoSmile}Anything else noticable about him, Lady Iris?
s;Iris;I apologize, but that is all I know.
s;Kai;That's alright. You've been a great help.
s;Krista;Yeah! We'll keep an eye out for our mystery man.

name: BaseConvo_Stained Glass
_source: s;Viola;Oh, Felicity! Looking at the pretty windows?
s;Felicity;Ah, Viola. Yes, I suppose you can say that.
s;Viola;They're really beautiful. Is this what Folia's supposed to look like?
s;Felicity;Ah, no. It's nothing.|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink,Smile}At any rate, it would be wise to touch base with Her Highness, would it not?|I'm sure she's curious about how you've been doing.
s;Felicity;Your sister is most likely wondering how you're faring as well.
s;Viola;Oh, good idea! See ya later, Felicity!
s;Felicity;If things remained the same{tgm}...{tgm} we'd have no need for things such as these{tgm}...

name: BanditTag
_source: for;banditUnits;[u for u in game.level.units if u.generic == True and 'Tile' not in u.tags and u.team in ['enemy','enemy2','enemy_1','enemy2_1']]

name: FightPeony
_source: s;Peony;This is your last chance!|Surrender now, or I will show no mercy!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightPeonyCeleste
_source: s;Celeste;You Knights have done nothing|but make my friends and family miserable! This ends here!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Peony;How dare you speak of the Holy Knights that way?|I will make you eat those words!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: TalkKristaCeleste
_source: s;Krista;Hey, you! You don't look like you're one of the Knights.
s;Celeste;I'm not. My name's Celeste. I'm here looking for my friend Michael.|He joined the Knights recently and I'm worried about him.
s;Krista;He wanted to help us and fought well until the end.|I wouldn't have asked for a better knight.
s;Krista;Y'know, you can join us too. We're trying to take down the Knights.
s;Krista;Michael, huh? I don't think we ran into any Knights with that name.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}But anyway, we're trying to take down the Knights too.
s;Krista;Bad stuff's going down, and I have a feeling that's why you're against them too.
s;Celeste;Exactly! I'd love to join forces with you all. For Foliaga's sake!
s;Celeste;And to honor Michael's memory too.
s;Celeste;Oh, one more thing! Some of the Knights are under some sort of mind control magic.|If we get rid of those red gems on the walls, those Knights will fight on our side.
s;Krista;Hey, that's actually pretty useful!|Let's break 'em when we see 'em!

name: TalkMichaelCeleste
_source: s;Celeste;Michael! I'm so glad I found you!|Those Knights didn't try to brainwash you, did they?
s;Michael;Brainwash? Wait{tgm}...{tgm} is that what's going on here?

s;Celeste;Yeah, I saw it with my own two eyes back home.|Everyone who was against the Archbishop got mind controlled.|{c:e;Celeste;HalfCloseEyes}The Knights back in Florene Village{tgm}...{tgm} they{tgm}...|{c:e;Celeste;CloseEyes}{tgm}And Mom{tgm}...{tgm}I {tgm}...{tgm} I don't know if she's okay{tgm}...
s;Celeste;And that's why I'm here. To save you!|Last I checked, you were still undergoing your training,|so I came all the way to the capital to bust you outta here!
s;Celeste;So they DID get you too!
s;Michael;Wh-What?! No!|I was about to say I'm working with the princess of Medeas to sort out this mess.
s;Celeste;Woah, really? I should get in on this too!|Think that'll be okay?
s;Michael;W-Well, she seems to be okay with anyone joining.|I'd probably ask her permission first--
s;Celeste;I'm sure it'll be fine! She'll onboard anyone. You said so yourself!|Anyway, I'm gonna beat up some Knights and crack some gems!

s;Michael;Please, for the love of Folia, don't cause too much trouble{tgm}...|{c:e;Michael;NormalBlink}{tgm}And what was that last thing about cracking gems? Does Celeste know something?|{c:e;Michael;CloseEyes}Hm{tgm}...{tgm} I should probably let the others know about this.

name: FightFerrach
_source: s;Ferrach;You dare to face me?|{c:e;Ferrach;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}You must have a death wish.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightFerrachKrista
_source: s;Ferrach;So, spawn of Medea, you finally arrive.|{c:e;Ferrach;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}How was the journey here? Not too much trouble, was it?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Krista;Hmph, wouldn't you like to know.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}Just who are you anyway?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

s;Ferrach;Normally, I am one for formalities.|However, I find them to be unnecessary here.|{c:e;Ferrach;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}My master harbors no respect for Medea's ilk. Nor do I.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightFerrachForrest
_source: s;Ferrach;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} My, my. This is certainly a surprise.;;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Ferrach;That does not matter at the moment, does it?|In fact, I'd say YOUR identity is much more interesting.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

s;Ferrach;If only you knew just what you were.|You of all people serving Medea's ilk{tgm}...|{c:e;Ferrach;CloseEyes,Smile}{tgm}Hah! Oh, the irony of it all{tgm}...;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightFerrachFelicity
_source: s;Ferrach;Your power{tgm}...|{c:e;Ferrach;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}{tgm}How laughable!|To think someone like you would be allied with Medea's kin.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Felicity;You{tgm}...|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink}{tgm}Just what is going on here? Why are you doing this?|Why now of all times?;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Ferrach;You have no business knowing that.|After all, you have chosen your side.|{c:e;Ferrach;HalfCloseEyes}My master has no patience for traitors.;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: FightAzaleaKrista
_source: s;Krista;Hey, snap out of it! I don't wanna fight you.|And I know you don't want this either!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Krista;Sorry about this{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}But this is for your own good!;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: MusicChange
_source: # No music hints for Fog of War maps! #

name: OutroKaiDeath
_source: s;Kai;Could be better.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}Argh{tgm}...{tgm} This wound's pretty deep. I can't work like this.
s;Krista;We gotta get you back to the castle right away.|I can have the clerics tend to you--
s;Kai;And leave you without a tactician? No way.
s;Kai;I'll be taking it easy on the sidelines, Princess.|Don't worry about me, alright?{br}I can still walk, y'know.|Can't fight probably, but that's not the only reason I'm here, right?

name: OutroSemiDeath
condition: u('Semi') and game.check_dead('Semi') == True and (game.level.nid in ['3', '4', '5', '6', '8'] or game.level.nid == '7a' or game.level.nid == '7b' or game.level.nid == '7bb' or game.level.nid == '7x')
_source: s;Krista;Hey, take it easy!|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Man, your hand looks real bad, Semi{tgm}...
s;Krista;We'd better leave you here at the monestary until you recover--
s;Krista;We'd better take you back to Vergrande Monestary to recover--
s;Krista;We'd better take you back to the castle to recover--

s;Semi;Screw that.{br}I can still help.|{c:e;Semi;CloseEyes}Besides, I promised Aqua I would do whatever it takes to bring peace to Foliaga.|{c:e;Semi;NormalBlink}I'm not giving up just because of a broken hand.
s;Krista;Semi{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;Smile}{tgm}Alright! Just don't push yourself too hard.

name: OutroForrestDeath
_source: s;Krista;Forrest! Oh dear Medea, are you okay?!
s;Forrest;I'm sorry, Your Highness. I was too careless.
s;Krista;Dammit, quit it with the formalities already.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}I was really worried.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}I{tgm}...{tgm} I thought you were gonna die out there.
s;Krista;We are getting you back to the castle right this instant.
s;Forrest;No! I refuse to leave your side.
s;Krista;You are in no condition to fight. I won't allow you to keep going like this.
s;Krista;No "buts". This is an order, Forrest.

s;Forrest;Krista, please!|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}Let me stay.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}I won't participate in battle. I can promise you that.|I{tgm}...{tgm} I need to know that YOU'RE safe.|{c:e;Forrest;CloseEyes}Please.

s;Krista;Forrest{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm}Okay, okay.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}But I swear, if I catch even a glimpse of you raising a weapon,|you're getting your ass sent back to Medeas. Understood?

name: OutroFelicityDeath
condition: u('Felicity') and game.check_dead('Felicity') == True and game.level.nid != '15'
_source: s;Krista;Oh Medea, don't joke around like that!|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}You really could've died back there.
s;Felicity;If it's any consolation, the wounds aren't that serious.|I don't think I'll still be able to fight alongside you, though.
s;Krista;It can't be helped.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}*sigh* I knew I should've left you at the castle when I had the chance.
s;Felicity;You know I'd still follow you, though.
s;Krista;Yeah, I know.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,NoSmile}It's for that reason I'm letting you still travel with us.|Just take it easy, okay?

name: OutroSamDeath
_source: s;Krista;I knew it! I knew you got hurt!
s;Krista;I swear to Medea, if you were planning on heading to the fortress like that--
s;Sam;I have a job to do, Krista.
s;Krista;I don't care! I'm not letting you get more hurt than you are now.
s;Sam;I'm not backing out of this.
s;Sam;I won't fight, okay? But do you think you guys can step in for me?|Once we're done, we can head straight back to Medeas.
s;Krista;Oh Medea, Sam, you're okay!|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}I{tgm}...{tgm} I thought you were{tgm}...
s;Sam;Hey, don't worry. I'm fine.|{c:e;Sam;CloseEyes}But with my arm like this, I don't think I'll be swinging my axe for a while.
s;Krista;We gotta get you back to the castle as soon as we can.
s;Sam;Fine by me. We gotta get you guys out of Oregot safely first.

name: OutroChellDeath
_source: s;Chell;Ah, Your Highness{tgm}...|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}{tgm}I'm alright, but my arm{tgm}...{tgm} It's{tgm}...
s;Krista;Hey, take it easy.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}We gotta get back to the castle fast.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}You just stay on the sidelines 'til then, alright?
s;Chell;Of course, Your Highness.|We must make sure we make a safe return home!

name: OutroKhalidDeath
condition: u('Khalid') and game.check_dead('Khalid') == True and u('Khalid').team == 'player'
_source: s;Khalid;Hey, it's okay. I'M okay. See? I'm here.
s;Khalid;Come on, let's dry those tears now.|Won't do any good for the army's morale if they see you like this, y'know?
s;Krista;Khalid, are you sure you're alright?
s;Khalid;It's gonna take more than this to bring me down, Krista.|{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink,Smile}I'm still as big and strong as ever! See--
s;Krista;*sigh*|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}Okay, Mister Tough Guy,{br}I get it.|Just make sure you take it easy, alright?
s;Khalid;Will do, Krista. Don't have too much fun out there without me.

name: OutroTsubakiDeath
condition: u('Tsubaki') and game.check_dead('Tsubaki') == True and u('Tsubaki').team == 'player'
_source: s;Tsubaki;Ah, Krista, I'm so sorry. I{tgm}...
s;Krista;There's no need to apologize, Tsubaki. How are you holding up?
s;Tsubaki;There's a sharp pain whenever I move my arm,|and I feel a bit lightheaded.
s;Krista;Say no more. We'll have the clerics tend to you when we can--
s;Tsubaki;W-Wait! I still wish to join you.
s;Tsubaki;I wish to help you bring peace back to Yondo.|I intend to follow through on this even if it means staying on the sidelines.
s;Tsubaki;Thank you, Krista. I won't let you down!

name: OutroAquaDeath
condition: u('Aqua') and game.check_dead('Aqua') == True and (game.level.nid in ['3', '4', '5', '6', '8', '9'] or game.level.nid == '7a' or game.level.nid == '7b' or game.level.nid == '7bb' or game.level.nid == '7x')
_source: s;Krista;Whoa, don't get up so suddenly!|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}This ain't good{tgm}...
s;Krista;Let's take you back to Vergrande Monestary.
s;Krista;Let's take you back to the castle.
s;Krista;It'll be hard for you to keep up with your leg banged up like that.

s;Aqua;I thank you for your concern, Your Highness. But I refuse to stay behind!|{c:e;Aqua;CloseEyes}I promised Semi I would not give up on bringing peace to Foliaga{tgm}...|{c:e;Aqua;NormalBlink}{tgm}So, please let me stay! I beg you!
s;Krista;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Okay, but please don't overexert yourself.|I'll see if Forrest can let you ride with him on his horse.
s;Aqua;I am truly grateful, Your Highness.

name: Heroism
condition: unit2.nid == 'Taichi' and ('Bandit' in unit.tags or 'Dark' in unit.tags) and has_skill('Taichi', 'Heroism_Proc') == False

name: Outro
_source: s;OldMan1;Thank you all for your aid, kind travellers.|I don't know what could have happened without you.
s;OldMan1;Please take this as a token of our appreciation.
s;Krista;Heh, think I'd be used to this by now.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,NoSmile}As much as we appreciate your kindness, sir, are you sure this is okay?

s;OldMan1;Of course. It is the least we can do.|I was the one who asked for your help in the first place.|It is only natural that I reward you for your efforts on behalf of all of Aotani Village.|Please stay safe on your journey to Edoyama.
s;Krista;Thanks a lot. You guys stay safe too!

s;Agrona;Medea's child is already within Merinas territory.|{c:e;Agrona;CloseEyes}I will have to exert more force to impede their progress for good.|{c:e;Agrona;NormalBlink}That one pirate crew should be in the vicinity. I'm sure they will do.

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;That was a lot of fun!
s;Krista;Aw, you don't have to be so stiff about it!|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}You definitely enjoyed it more than you're letting on.
s;Krista;There we go! Told you this was a good idea.
s;Yumi;You guys did an amazing job there! The crowd was absolutely loving it!
s;Krista;Aw, thanks! I'm glad everyone was having a good time.
s;Yumi;With that said, mind if I join you guys?|I wanna see you all in action more.
s;Forrest;I'm sorry, miss, but I would have to advise against that.|We are currently on our way to Edoyama and--
s;Yumi;You're doing something about the emperor, right?
s;Forrest;What? How do you know about that?

s;Yumi;I've been hearing things. Let's just put it that way.|{c:e;Yumi;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Besides, things around here have gotten worse ever since the emperor{tgm}...|{tgm}Well, I don't know EXACTLY what's wrong with him, but something changed!|And I wanna put a stop to it.
s;Krista;Well, I'm all for more help. You can join us!
s;Joshua;Hey! I just wanted to say great job! And I heard you guys are recruiting?|I want in!
s;Forrest;Do you even know what we're recruiting people for?
s;Joshua;Nope! And I don't care.|You guys are strong and that's all that matters.|If I hang around you all, that means I can go up against tough opponents, right?
s;Krista;Hey, the more, the merrier! You can join us too.
s;Krista;Anyway, it's been a long day. Let's all rest up and set sail again tomorrow.
s;Sam;Aw, yeah! That tournament really got my blood pumping!|Hm? What's that flying overhead?
s;Sam;Woah! That's one strong-looking wyvern.|Its rider isn't that bad looking either...|Seems like she's heading north too. Maybe we'll run into her?;bottom;fit

name: Outro
_source: s;Kai;Remember that vial of poison those other pirates had a while back?
s;Kai;I didn't wanna say too much in front of the enemy,|but that poison they had was created by the emperor's ninjas.
s;Kai;And you've noticed how the other bandit groups and pirate crews we've faced|have been lacing their weapons with that poison too, right?
s;Parker;That dark influence that was on the Archbishop|has already gotten its grasp on Samegoro.
s;Kai;And a tight one, at that.|Considering he's supplying them with his private arsenal and all.
s;Krista;This is like the situation in Foliaga.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}We gotta get to Edoyama as soon as possible!|If this keeps going, who knows what's gonna happen?
s;Parker;Let us rest in Ikezora Village for the time being.|We can discuss a strategy once we've settled in.
s;Tsurugi;Pleasure doing business with you, Miss Lin.|{c:e;Tsurugi;NoSmile}But you know{tgm}...
s;Tsurugi;I think I'll be sticking you and the Medeans!
s;Tsurugi;Let's just say I also happen to know someone in this army.|{c:e;Tsurugi;NormalBlink,Smile}So, I'm going to travel alongside you, just not as a client anymore.
s;Lin;Are you sure? We might run into more bandits and such.|I wouldn't want to put you under unnecessary danger.
s;Lin;If that's what you want, I won't stop you, Mister Tsurugi.
s;Samegoro;Agrona. How fares the resistance against the Medean forces?
s;Agrona;Not well, Your Majesty.|They continue to advance to the capital with no signs of slowing.
s;Samegoro;I see.|{c:e;Samegoro;NormalBlink}Send our most powerful forces against them.|They cannot under any circumstance reach the capital.
s;Samegoro;Ah, Tsubaki. Is something troubling you?
s;Tsubaki;About the Medeans{tgm}...{tgm} I{tgm}...|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}{tgm}I think we should reason with them, Father!|If we talk things out, then maybe--
s;Samegoro;Tsubaki, I will not repeat myself.|It is is not up for discussion.

s;Samegoro;The Medeans are concerning themselves with something that|is not theirs to trifle with.|Their penchant for meddling has gone back for thousands of years, Tsubaki.|The time to put an end to it is now!
s;Nagisa;Let's just drop it, Lady Tsubaki.

s;Tsubaki;Oh, Nagisa, why can't Father listen to reason?|He's more open than this.|{c:eTsubaki;NormalBlink}On top of that, there must be a good reason the Medeans subdued Folia's archbishop.|Medeas has always stood for peace in Yondo, so why go to these lengths?

s;Nagisa;That damn woman has poisoned the emperor's mind, Lady Tsubaki.|It's even more evident now than ever before.|{c:e;Nagisa;CloseEyes}As for the Medeans, who knows.|{c:e;Nagisa;NormalBlink}I'm sure there's more to this than it seems.
s;Tsubaki;If Kenji and Kai were here, I'm sure they'd know what to--
s;Nagisa;Forget them!|{c:e;Nagisa;CloseEyes}Kenji's dead and Kai is a dirty traitor.
s;Tsubaki;That can't be true!|{c:e;Tsubaki;CloseEyes}Kenji might still be out there. And Kai{tgm}...{tgm} He{tgm}...{tgm} He wouldn't{tgm}...!

s;Nagisa;Lady Tsubaki{tgm}...|{c:e;Nagisa;CloseEyes}{tgm}*sigh*|{c:e;Nagisa;NormalBlink}I was really hoping we wouldn't have to resort to this,|but we have no choice.|It's time we take matters into our own hands.
s;Nagisa;If the emperor won't give us permission to face the Medeans,|we'll do it no matter what he says.|It'll take some sneaking and prepping, but if we're careful, we can pull it off.

name: Outro
_source: s;Anna;Thanks for all your help, Your Highness.|We couldn't have done this without you.
s;Krista;Don't sweat it!|I'm just glad those pirates won't be a problem anymore.

s;Jake;About that{tgm}...|{c:e;Jake;NormalBlink}{tgm}To tell you the truth, Anna and I are the only merchants using this route|ever since Emperor Samegoro started acting weird a year ago.|{c:e;Jake;Smile}But now that the most dangerous pirate crew's out of the picture,|more trade ships should be coming this way!|No need for us to do all the heavy lifting anymore.
s;Krista;What are you trying to say?
s;Anna;Jake and I were talking it over, and we wanna join you guys!|You're trying to bring peace back to Yondo, right?|Well, we wanna fight for that cause too.
s;Krista;Hey, I'm all for it! Welcome to the team, you two.
s;Anna;And as thanks for protecting the merch, you guys can have this!
s;Krista;Whoa, thanks! This'll definitely come in handy.

name: Outro
_source: s;BanditFemale3;Thanks for all your help, Princess.
for;GreenAlive;[u for u in game.level.unit_groups.get('Other').units if game.check_dead(u) == True]
s;BanditFemale3;We managed to get everyone back home safe thanks to you.
s;Krista;No problem! I'm glad everyone's okay.
s;Woman3;Everyone that was still on the island, at least{tgm}...
s;BanditFemale3;We managed to get most everyone back home safe and sound.
s;Woman3;Your Highness, you remember what that thug said? About sending us to Edoyama?|Everyone else must be there!
s;Krista;All the more reason we should head there.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}We'll bring 'em back. Don't you worry.
s;BanditFemale3;Speaking of which, take this with you.|Who knows what's waiting for you guys at the capital.
s;Krista;Thank you. We'll retun the favor by bringing back the villagers!
s;Kai;Must be still in the village.
s;Krista;Huh, weird. Kai, you and the others board the ship.|I'll catch up once I find him.
s;Krista;Man, where is he? He wouldn't do things last minute like this.
s;Krista;There he his! But what's he doing with the mayor?
s;Forrest;If I had half a mind, I'd--;bottom;fit
s;Mayor;S-Sir, please be reasonable! It was for the sake of Shizukawa Village!|You understand, don't you?;bottom;fit
s;Forrest;My liege could have died because of your actions.|If she did, I would not hesitate to "rectify" the situation.;bottom;fit
s;Mayor;But, she lives! S-So, please let me go...!;bottom;fit
s;Forrest;... Fine.|However, if I find that you still intend to bring harm to Her Highness...;bottom;fit
s;Forrest;Ah, Your Highness. Is everything alright?
s;Krista;Oh, uh, yeah.|It's just that it's time to board the ship and all that.
s;Forrest;I apologize. I did not mean to delay our departure.|Let's be off, then.

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Alright, you. We just need to get some info outta you,|then we can just pretend none of this happened.
s;Masashi;Why should I listen to you?!|Shouldn't your commander be the one conducting this interrogation?
s;Masashi;What? I was told the Medean princess herself would be leading the charge.
s;Masashi;You must be joking! A noblewoman like you claim to be wouldn't be so{tgm}...
s;Masashi;Uncouth! Unrefined! How dare you call yourself royalty?!|Why, no man with any self-respect would ever consider marrying--
s;Krista;Change of plans, Kai. He's a dead man.
s;Kai;Whoa, whoa, whoa. Let's put the sword down, Princess.|We're here for gathering intel, remember?

s;Krista;Look. We got off on the wrong foot.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}We are still very much on the wrong foot.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}And if you don't want my foot in your ass, you better cooperate. Got it?
s;Krista;So, what's Samegoro trying to accomplish here?|Why's he working together with bandits and pirates?|What's he doing with all those detained citizens?

s;Masashi;I-I don't know, I swear I don't!|All I know is that Samegoro|has been bringing droves of Merinas' people to the capital.|Things have changed ever since that woman Agrona was appointed as a shogun.
s;Kai;Agrona{tgm}...!{tgm} Damn it, I knew it!
s;Kai;What do you know about that woman?|Where did she come from? What's her aim?
s;Masashi;I don't know about her origins, but she's definitely influencing the Emperor.|She's brainwashed him, making him believe in some false god{tgm}...
s;Masashi;I've heard things. Talk of some supposed other Great Beast called "Circ".

s;Masashi;I don't know much beyond that, but Agrona has sown these seeds in his mind.|{c:e;Masashi;CloseEyes}A false god, citizens imprisoned by their own leader, ruffians running the country{tgm}...|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink}{tgm}Merinas has gone to chaos!

s;Kai;So many pieces to the puzzle, but where do they all fit{tgm}...?|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}{tgm}Well, no use on dwelling on it right now. Not yet, anyway.|{c:e;Kai;Smile}Since you so kindly cooperated, we'll let you live. Right, Princess?
s;Krista;Oh. Uh. Yeah. Right.|We'd better get going. We gotta end this once and for all.
s;Masashi;Ah, wait! Take me with you!

s;Masashi;I would like to assist you in bringing the emperor back to his senses.|After all, I failed in stopping you. He will have my head for that.|{c:e;Masashi;Smile}So, I may as well join you all! I'll live, and I can lend you my strength.|A perfect proposition, wouldn't you say?
s;Kai;Let's take him.|He might be able to give us more insight about what's going on in Edoyama.
s;Masashi;Thank you very much! I will not fail you!|My name is Masashi, by the way. Let us do good work together, Your Highness.
s;Masashi;My retainer Hikaru will be joining as well.|We will do our best for you!
s;Agrona;Fort Daijima has fallen, Your Majesty.
s;Samegoro;They will be at our doorstep soon, then{tgm}...|{c:e;Samegoro;NormalBlink}{tgm}We must fortify our defenses right away.|We cannot allow the Medeans to reach us.
s;Tsubaki;They didn't have to do that, did they?|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}From the reports, they were in a position to just head straight to Edoyama.|Why did they have to take the fort by force?
s;Nagisa;Lady Tsubaki{tgm}...|{c:e;Nagisa;CloseEyes}{tgm}I know you wanted a peaceful solution, but I'm not sure if the Medeans are seeking that.
s;Tsubaki;I{tgm}...{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}{tgm} I won't let them hurt Father!|If they wish to confront him, they'll have to go through me first.
s;Nagisa;Lady Tsubaki, no!|I understand, but you can't put your life in danger like this.
s;Tsubaki;I don't know what their reasons are, Nagisa.|All I know is that I can't lose anyone else. Especially not Father.
s;Nagisa;My lady{tgm}...{c:e;Nagisa;CloseEyes}{tgm} Alright.|{c:e;Nagisa;NormalBlink}But stay behind me. It's my duty to protect you, after all.
s;Tsubaki;Of course. I may be scared, but I'll be ready!

name: Outro
_source: s;Krista;Alright, we're in! Let's go, everyone!
s;Kai;No. I can't doubt my deductions.|She's not gonna be in the way. Not her or Nagisa.
s;Kai;I hope I don't run into her here.
s;Kai;Huh? Er, yeah. I'm good, Princess.
s;Krista;I dunno what's gotten you shaken up, but this'll be over soon.|We got this far, so let's see it to the end!
s;Watt;Captain Ryuuji! Everyone's ready and accounted for!

s;Ryuuji;Perfect.|{c:e;Ryuuji;CloseEyes,Smile}Kai and the Medeans held up their end of the bargain,|so now it's time for us to return the favor.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Scale the walls! Get into the throne room!|We'll meet you all up there, crew!
s;Nagisa;Sounds like there's a commotion coming from inside.|{c:e;Nagisa;CloseEyes}Miss Asuka{tgm}...{tgm} Sumire{tgm}...|{tgm}I'm sure you both fought with honor.
s;Nagisa;Last chance to back out, Lady Tsubaki.|I can still stay at the front lines while you remain in your room.
s;Tsubaki;No. I've made my decision and I will stand firm.

name: Outro
_source: s;Agrona;It seems we have failed here too.|I will have to report this to Lady Soromir.
s;Krista;Hey, wait!|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}They keep slipping through our fingertips.
s;Tsubaki;Father, what are you talking about? What about Medea?
s;Krista;Just like with Azalea{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm}What is going on here?
s;Tsubaki;You know that mark? Krista, what is going on?;bottom;fit
s;Krista;Tsubaki, all of Yondo's in danger.|Back in Foliaga, Archbishop Azalea was under a similar spell|and she bore the same mark on her neck.|Agrona and her allies are responsible for this.
s;Tsubaki;But what does it all mean? What do they hope to gain from all this?
s;Krista;I{tgm}...{tgm} I wish I knew.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}I do have one question, though.
s;Krista;Do you know about something called "Circ"?
s;Tsubaki;C-Circ? Why do you know about that?
s;Krista;Heard the name a while back. It's apparently another Great Beast?

s;Tsubaki;Another Great Beast{tgm}...{tgm} That does not seem entirely wrong.|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}I've heard things that Agrona has said to my father.|She said that Circ birthed the Great Beasts,|and he ruled over Yondo alongside his children.
s;Tsubaki;I apologize, Krista. That's all I know.

s;Krista;Well, it's something, at least. This'll help, Tsubaki.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}And I know this is a lot to ask,|but your father's gonna be out of commission for a while.|Merinas is gonna need you to step up to rule in his place until he recovers.

s;Krista;It's really sudden, but there's no way he can rule Merinas in his current condition.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}The country's gonna be even more unstable than it is already.|Freeing prisoners, driving out direct subordinates to Agrona,|punishing all those brigands she's been commanding on the side{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}It's a lot to recover from.

s;Tsubaki;You said the archbishop was under the same spell|that my father was under, correct?|If that's the case, I want to help others not suffer the same fate!|I can have Father's advisors look after Merinas in my absence.
s;Krista;I'm all for it if you are. Welcome to the team, Tsubaki.
s;Tsubaki;I will do just that, Krista.|Please bring peace to Yondo!
s;Krista;You can count on me, Tsubaki.|I won't let anyone else suffer like your father did.
s;;This is the end of Act 2. Thank you for playing!;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=2;no_sound
s;;Please leave feedback on the FEUniverse thread.;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;Please also consider joining the Discord server!;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;Links to both are in the Readme file.;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=2;no_sound

name: BaseConvo_Tea Time
_source: s;OldWoman1;And that will be 500 gold, dear.
s;Alex;Thank you very much, ma'am. Have a good day.
s;Taylor;Hey, Alex! Got some new tea brewing?
