s;Alex;Mm-hmm. I bought some from a woman in the village.|Would you like some?
s;Taylor;Of course! I like the way you brew tea.|You always get it just right.
s;Alex;Thank you, Taylor.|{c:e;Alex;NoSmile}Just give me a moment. The leaves need a little while longer to steep.
s;Alex;And here we are. One fresh cup of Merinese green tea.
s;Taylor;Aw yeah, that hits the spot!|Hell, this is even better than the green tea you usually make.
s;Alex;I'm glad you like it. I may just have to get more when I can.

name: BaseConvo_Too Many Ears
_source: s;Taiga;You've been actin' all weird since we joined up with the Medeans, Cap.|What's up?
s;Ryuuji;No business of yours, Taiga. Or anyone's, really.|Got too many ears around to openly talk about it.
s;Taiga;You're making no sense at all!{br}You tell me about everything.|{c:e;Taiga;CloseEyes,Smile}Like that one time it was blackjack night with the boys and you--
s;Ryuuji;Too many ears around for that too, Taiga.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink}It's gotta do with the past, alright?
s;Taiga;Ohhhh. Got it. So, back when you weren't "Ryuuji", huh?
s;Taiga;What? At least I didn't say that your real name was K--

name: BaseConvo_Exchanging Info
_source: s;Kai;I see{tgm}...{tgm} Yup, just like in Foliaga alright.
s;Ryuuji;Except Samegoro's got pirates and bandits under his belt too.|And he's been handing out a good amount of coin for all those prisoners.
s;Kai;Glad to see you haven't fallen into that.
s;Ryuuji;Just what kinda guy do you take me for?|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink,Smile}I might plunder and kill like a regular ol' pirate now, but I've got standards.
s;Ryuuji;Neither have you.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink,NoSmile}And hey, one last thing about Samegoro's forces.
s;Ryuuji;Keep an eye out for a woman named Agrona. She's bad news.

s;Kai;She was appointed as one of Samegoro's shoguns over a year ago.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}There was always something fishy about her.|I never could figure out what it was exactly. She was way too elusive.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}With what we know, I feel like we're getting close to an answer.
s;Ryuuji;We'll just keep our eyes and ears open, then.
s;Kai;Yeah.|{c:e;Kai;Smile}Thanks, Kenji. I knew I could count on you.

name: GoldEarned
_source: # Find tier of class of player unit
elif;unit2.level - unit.level > 4 or {v:playerClassTier} > {v:enemyClassTier} or unit2.level == unit.level

name: Outro
_source: s;Tsubaki;Kai, it's so good to see you again, truly!
s;Kai;Hold on for a moment{tgm}...{tgm} Kai?! Is that you?
s;Kai;Shoot{tgm}...{tgm} I didn't expect to run into you two.
s;Kai;Guess there's no point in hiding anymore.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}I haven't told you the whole truth.|I did work for the emperor. Not as a mercenary, but as his daughter's retainer.
s;Tsubaki;It's true. Kai, you left all those months ago{tgm}...{tgm} Why?
s;Kai;There were more important things to attend to.
s;Nagisa;You have some nerve showing your face around here, Kai.|You run off to Merin knows where, then you come back with some floozy under your arm?
s;Nagisa;Oh, sure. You say all that, then you come back with some floozy under your arm?
s;Kai;Why does everyone think I'm some skirt-chaser?
s;Kai;Out of all the things I expected you to say{tgm}...
s;Forrest;This "floozy" happens to be the Medean princess.|Any further disrespect towards her will not be taken lightly.
s;Tsubaki;P-Please pardon my retainer's rashness.|She meant no disrespect.
s;Krista;So, I'd love to get introductions out of the way,|but time isn't exactly on our side here.
s;Tsubaki;I agree. Father needs help!|The throne room is this way!

name: Turn1
_source: lvar;ArenaEnemyKlassList;[klass.nid for klass in DB.classes if 'ArenaIgnore' not in klass.tags and klass.tier < 3]
for;LoadItem;[w for w in DB.classes.get(u('{created_unit}').klass).wexp_gain if DB.classes.get(u('{created_unit}').klass).wexp_gain[w].usable == True]

name: Crate Death
_source: s;Krista;No, the crates!|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}We're gonna be stranded here{tgm}...{tgm} Oh, no{tgm}...

name: Crate Death
_source: s;Krista;No, the goods!{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes} I'm sorry, everyone{tgm}...

name: GameOver
_source: s;Sam;Argh, there's too many of them!

name: AumStaff
_source: # Create a choice menu listing the dead units
choice;AmaterasuChoice;Who to revive?;{e:','.join([unit.nid for unit in game.get_all_units_in_party('Krista') if game.check_dead(unit.nid) == True])};;vertical;center;EntryType=type_unit;scroll_bar
# Raise chosen unit's level and class to the average of the currently deployed party
for;PartyLevel;[unit for unit in game.get_player_units_and_travelers() if unit.team == 'player']
lvar;LevelCalc;{e:v('LevelCalc') // len([unit for unit in game.get_player_units_and_travelers() if unit.team == 'player'])}
# Add revived unit to the map

name: BaseConvo_Scouting Mission
_source: s;Masashi;Ah, Edoyama{tgm}...{tgm} It has been too long since I last came here.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Though, there seems to be more of a tense atmosphere than usual{tgm}...
s;Masashi;Well, hello there, ladies.|What might you be doing on this fine afternoon?
s;SoldierPurpleFemale1;Emperor Samegoro deployed us here|to guard against the upcoming assault from the Medeans.

s;SoldierPurpleFemale2;Mm-hm. Apparently they're coming really soon!|He wants the castle protected from all sides.|We even had to put all the civilians under lockdown and everything.|Seems like this is gonna be big!

s;Masashi;He already prepared for their arrival? Did he have that little faith in me?|{c:e;Masashi;HalfCloseEyes}No, he must have taken extra precautions.|Or perhaps Agrona saw the result of the battle|and reported to the emperor right away.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink}Yes, that must be it!;StyleNid=thought_bubble
s;Masashi;Ah, yes I am. There is no need to worry about me, my delicate little flower.|I just remembered I had other matters to attend to.
s;Masashi;Yes, it is certainly a shame|that I cannot spend more time with you lovely ladies for much longer.|{c:e;Masashi;NormalBlink,Smile}Alas, I must depart. Until next time, my loves!

s;Khalid;Let's see{tgm}...{tgm} What can we gather from a bird's-eye view?|{c:e;Khalid;HalfCloseEyes}A good amount of soldiers at the front gate,|and it looks like it's reinforced just as much on the other sides.|Hmm{tgm}...{tgm} There's a moat around the front gate too.|I wonder if we can cross that somehow?|{c:e;Khalid;Smile,NormalBlink}I'd better report this all to Krista.

name: BaseConvo_An Irritating Sort
_source: s;Hikaru;O Great Merin{tgm}...|{tgm}Please give Lord Masashi the wisdom to carry out his reconnaisance mission.
s;Hikaru;O-Oh, you startled me.|You're Miss Yukino, correct?|You were so quiet, I didn't notice you.
s;Hikaru;It's alright. No harm done.|At any rate, did you need me for something?
s;Yukino;Yes. You work under that shogun{tgm}...{tgm} Masashi, was it?
s;Yukino;Oh, lovely.|{c:e;Yukino;NormalBlink}I shall be keeping my distance, then.|{c:e;Yukino;CloseEyes}Men like him are{tgm}...{tgm} irritating. To put it lightly.
s;Hikaru;As someone who knows him personally,|he's not bad once you get to know him.
s;Hikaru;I don't expect you to just take my word for it, Miss Yukino.|I'm just putting it out there.
s;Yukino;I'll believe it when I see it.

name: BaseConvo_Buried Past
_source: s;Ryuuji;They're gonna find out eventually, y'know.
s;Kai;You'd think that, but it's practically impossible at this point.

s;Kai;My past is on a need-to-know basis.|As far as anyone knows, I'm just a regular ol' mercenary.|Who I was before Krista hired me has nothing to do with me anymore.|You of all people would understand.
s;Ryuuji;You almost got caught in the act, though. That's why I'm saying this now.

s;Kai;Just an oversight on my part.|{c:e;Kai;NoSmile,NormalBlink}Besides, our goal now is to take down Samegoro.|The old man's gonna be too far gone to recognize me|if the situation in Foliaga is anything to go by.
s;Kai;Those two have been attached at the hip ever since you left.|And there's no way Tsubaki would get anywhere near the front lines.|There's no need to worry about them.
s;Ryuuji;You just have it all figured out, dontcha?
s;Ryuuji;Still, one loose thread leads to a tattered cloth, Kai.|That's all I gotta say.

name: BaseConvo_A Brighter Future
_source: s;Felicity;The more we discover, the more questions I have, Xiang.|{c:e;Felicity;CloseEyes}Ferrach and Agrona{tgm}...{tgm} Just who are they? What is their aim?
s;Xiang;They may wish to start a war. Another War of Divides.
s;Felicity;Something you foresaw, I take it?
s;Felicity;Then we won't let it come to that.
s;Felicity;That's just one possible future, right?|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink}Then I'll do everything in my power to prevent that.|{c:e;Felicity;Smile}You'll do the same too, right, Xiang?
s;Xiang;Of course.|{c:e;Xiang;CloseEyes}I have chosen this path to bring a brighter future.|{c:e;Xiang;NormalBlink}Krista is our key to peace. We must support her by any means necessary.

name: BaseConvo_Secret Stock
_source: s;Anna;Say, Kai, considering your "connections,"|mind hooking Jake and I up with some trade secrets?

s;Kai;I can't exactly share these things without consequence, Anna.|I may not be working under the emperor anymore,|but if word gets out that his ninjas' techniques reached outsiders' ears,|anyone who knows them will be put at risk too.
s;Kai;But, that doesn't stop me from modifying a few things here and there.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}So, what did you wanna know about?
s;Anna;That poison that you lace your weapons with.|Mind making a variant of it?|{c:e;Anna;NoSmile}I feel like it'll be a useful tool in our arsenal.
s;Kai;That I can do. Just give me some time and I'll see what I can cook up.

s;Kai;Hey, Anna. Here's a recipe for that poison.|The ingredients should be fairly easy to come across or at least be affordable to acquire.|{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}Don't ask how I tested it, by the way.
s;Anna;I wasn't going to, but now I'm concerned.
s;Anna;Well, either way, thanks, Kai.|Jake and I will get this stocked up right away!
alert;Poison Vial now available in Base Shop stock!;PoisonVial

name: BaseConvo_Try to Remember
_source: s;Khalid;Yo, Ervan! How're you holding up?
s;Khalid;Nice! All good in the head?
s;Ervan;Er, I think?{w}{c:e;Ervan;HalfCloseEyes} S-Sorry, I don't{tgm}...
s;Khalid;Hey, don't even worry about it.{c:e;Khalid;Smile} I'm just glad you're okay.|{c:e;Khalid;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}And, y'know. Here.
s;Ervan;About that, what exactly has been going on? What's this about me dying?
s;Khalid;Hoo boy, this is gonna be a lot.{c:e;Khalid;NormalBlink} You're gonna wanna sit back for this one.
s;Ervan;Heh, I'm not going anywhere. Go ahead.
s;Khalid;Alright, so, about a year ago{tgm}...
s;Ervan;I see{tgm}...{c:e;Ervan;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm} That certainly was a lot.

s;Khalid;I don't wanna overwhelm you, but are you sure you don't remember anything?|We checked the base of the cliff after Krista said she saw you fall,|but it's like you just vanished.|So, I was just wondering{tgm}...
s;Ervan;{tgm}.....|{c:e;Ervan;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}I-I'm sorry. My mind is drawing a blank.
s;Khalid;Okay. If something comes back to you, let us know.|Even if it's something small. Any bit of info helps.
s;Khalid;Ervan{tgm}...?{tgm} Look, none of this is your fault.|We're gonna fix this together. Yondo will know peace again.|{c:e;Khalid;Smile}We just gotta take it one step at a time.
s;Khalid;Speaking of which, we're heading out to Oregot in a couple weeks.|Just thought I'd give you a heads up.

name: BaseConvo_Loved and Beloved
_source: s;Krista;Have you had the chance to talk to Ervan?
s;Krista;It's been a couple days since he woke up. I'm surprised.
s;Krista;Yeesh, calm down.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}I'm just concerned about you is all.
s;Judah;You know that's a load of bull--
s;Krista;I know, I know, look.{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes} I actually am worried about you, though.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}So, I think you should see him for your own peace of mind.
s;Judah;Sh-Shut it! You have no idea what I'm going through!
s;Krista;Then tell me!|I know we're not on the best terms.{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes} Never were, to be honest.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}But can we try to put our differences aside? At least just for now?

s;Krista;If there's anyone out there who'll understand, it's me.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}We both loved him, Judah.{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes} So, please.{w}{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes} I think we both need this right now.

s;Judah;{tgm}...{w}{c:e;Judah;CloseEyes}{tgm} I couldn't protect him.|{c:e;Judah;HalfCloseEyes}What good am I if I couldn't do that one thing?|{c:e;Judah;CloseEyes}I failed him. I don't deserve to be in his presence.
s;Krista;I don't think Ervan would see it that way.|You're his retainer, Judah. One of his most trusted people.|He wouldn't hate you for this.
s;Judah;How can you be so confident about that?
s;Krista;Because that's the type of person he is.|He's trusting and sees the best in people.|It wouldn't be any different with you.{w} Especially not you.
s;Judah;*sigh* I hate that you're right.|{c:e;Judah;NormalBlink}I'll go see him. I will need time to mentally prepare myself, though.
s;Krista;There you go.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}Speaking of time, we're heading out to Oregot's capital in a couple weeks.|So, do all the prep you need then.
s;Judah;Please, I can get ready in half that time.|{tgm}{c:e;Judah;NormalBlink,NoSmile}...{tgm} And, hey.
s;Judah;Take your own words to heart.|Ervan still loves you too. We both know that.

name: BaseConvo_Coral Village
_source: s;Shula;Kiraz, I'm sorry about what happened.|{c:e;Shula;CloseEyes}If we got there sooner, you wouldn't have been in as much danger.
s;Kiraz;Please don't worry about it, Miss Shula.{c:e;Kiraz;Smile} Everything turned out okay in the end.|{c:e;Kiraz;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}But, Miss Solmaz{tgm}...{tgm} She{tgm}...
s;Shula;Yeah, I couldn't believe it either.|{c:e;Shula;NormalBlink}I just wish we could've stopped her before she switched sides.
s;Kiraz;This shouldn't be the way to peace and understanding.|There has to be another way.
s;Shula;What are you talking about, Kiraz?
s;Kiraz;It's{tgm}...{tgm} I'm sorry, Miss Shula. I can't say any more.|Not now.

name: BaseConvo_Like Old Times
_source: s;Tsubaki;Oh, this is wonderful!|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink,Smile}All of us are back together again.

s;Ryuuji;Alright, alright. No need to sour the mood, you two.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink,Smile}The little lady's been through a lot for Merin knows how long, yeah?|Least you two can do is PRETEND to like each other.
s;Nagisa;You can't expect us to just forget you two left us! Right, Lady Tsubaki?

s;Tsubaki;H-Hold on for a moment!|{c:e;Tsubaki;HalfCloseEyes}This is a lot to ask for out of all of you, but{tgm}...{c:e;Tsubaki;CloseEyes}{tgm} We{tgm}...{tgm} I just{tgm}...|{c:e;Tsubaki;NormalBlink}{tgm}I just want to go back to how things were before.|{c:e;Tsubaki;HalfCloseEyes}Kai, Kenji, please. It's been too long.|If we could get along like before, at least for a little while{tgm}...{c:e;Tsubaki;CloseEyes}{tgm} I-I'd be really happy, so{tgm}...
s;Ryuuji;I see no problem with it.|{c:e;Ryuuji;NormalBlink,Smile}We're working together under the Medean banner for the time being.|So, we're allies here. Right, Tsubaki?
s;Ryuuji;Good.|Now that we're all on the same page, I declare our first order of business.
s;Ryuuji;Ha! You three have gotten big in five years.|I can't hug you all at once anymore!;bottom;fit
s;Nagisa;D-Damn it, Kenji! This is embarrassing!;bottom;fit

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: s;Hu;Yo, princess! Heard that your army's low on numbers.|Captain Ryuuji said to battle alongside you guys to help even the odds.|Let's go and make some heads spin!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: s;Noh;Hey, looks like your army's lackin' in numbers.|Well, I'm here to help! Let's get 'em!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: s;Aidon;Seems like you're a bit outnumbered here.|I'm steppin' in! You can thank Captain Ryuuji for that.

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: s;Watt;Yo! Need help there? Looks like your army's lookin' pretty weak.|The captain said to step in if yer strugglin', so here I am!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: s;Wye;Cap'n Ryuuji said to help y'guys out if things were gettin' rough.|And now here I am! Let's go!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: s;Nachurali;The captain said to help the front lines if our numbers were thinning.|Let's make quick work of these guys, yeah?

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: s;Tamaruh;You guys havin' trouble? Don't worry, I'm here to help!|Captain Ryuuji's got your back!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: s;Beekos;Yer army's lookin' scant here, eh?|Not to worry, Cap'n Ryuuji said to come in just in case somethin' like this happened.|We got yer back, Yer Highness!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: s;Tuhdei;Your Highness! Runnin' into trouble?|Captain Ryuuji said to join the team if things are looking rough.|Let's do our best!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: s;Gevadarn;Captain Ryuuji said to join up with you all if things looked rough.|Let's crush these guys!

name: Exit
_source: s;Krista;Huh? Where is everyone?|{tgm}{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}...{tgm} Let's just head to the library.;bottom;200;MessageTail=None
s;Krista;(It's locked. Did someone leave the key somewhere?);bottom;200;MessageTail=None;no_talk
s;Krista;(I still need to find the key.);bottom;200;MessageTail=None;no_talk
s;Krista;(I've checked everywhere. Except for my bedroom, but why would it be there?);bottom;200;MessageTail=None;no_talk
s;Krista;(I guess it wouldn't hurt to look.);bottom;200;MessageTail=None;no_talk

name: Interact
_source: s;Krista;(Can't go back to bed yet.);bottom;200;MessageTail=None;no_talk
s;Krista;Huh. It was here all along?;bottom;200;MessageTail=None
s;Krista;(A bunch of textbooks. They're getting pretty dusty...);bottom;200;MessageTail=None;no_talk
s;Krista;Maybe it fell into the pond?;bottom;200;MessageTail=None
s;Krista;Anywhere on the bookshelf{tgm}...?{tgm} Nope. Nothing.;bottom;200;MessageTail=None

name: SpawnJudah
_source: s;Judah;Damn it, what is going on here?!|I must protect the king and queen. None shall pass me!

name: KingBedCutscene
_source: s;Bryant;Where will you go from here?;bottom;200;noir;MessageTail=None

name: Ervan
_source: s;Ervan;Krista. It's so good to see you.
s;Ervan;Krista? Is something wrong?|Come here. I can help.
s;Krista;E-Ervan, you're dead{tgm}...!|{tgm}You're supposed to be dead!
s;Krista;Stop! It's{tgm}...{tgm} It's not you! It can't be!|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}I saw{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}I saw{tgm}...!
s;;<jitter2>Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista Krista</>{no_wait};center;StyleNid=noir;fit
s;;<jitter2>my love my love my love my love my love my love my love my love my love my love my love my love my love my love my love my love</>{no_wait};center;StyleNid=noir;fit
s;;<jitter2>down below down below down below down below down below down below down below down below down below down below down below down below</>{no_wait};center;StyleNid=noir

s;;<jitter2>J{c:wait;200} o{c:wait;200} i{c:wait;200} n{c:wait;200}  m{c:wait;200} e{c:wait;200}  i{c:wait;200} n{c:wait;200}  t{c:wait;200} h{c:wait;200} e{c:wait;200}  a{c:wait;200} b{c:wait;200} y{c:wait;200} s{c:wait;200} s{c:wait;200} ,{c:wait;200}{br}m{c:wait;200} y{c:wait;200}  l{c:wait;200} o{c:wait;200} v{c:wait;200} e{c:wait;200} .{c:wait;200}</>;center;StyleNid=noir;fit

name: GuideTutorial
_source: s;;The <red>Guide</> is accessible in the Preparation menu before combat of each chapter.;;150;hint;NumLines=3;no_sound
s;;It will be highlighted in <green>green</> if a new entry has been added.;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=3;no_sound

name: TradeShulaKiraz
_source: s;Kiraz;Alright, Miss Shula's close by.{c:e;Kiraz;CloseEyes,NoSmile} So, I'll just{tgm}...
s;Kiraz;Yes! Now I can help too.|{c:e;Kiraz;NoSmile}If only I could find a way out of here.

name: RitualSummon
_source: choice;SummonWeapon;Choose a weapon.;{e:[item.uid for item in unit.items if game.get_item(item).weapon or game.get_item(item).weapon_type.value == 'Staff']};;vertical;center;;;type_game_item;backable

name: Ch7aOutro
_source: s;Forrest;I believe so. Let's not stay put for too long, though.|Kai, you've got the map. Lead the way!
s;Kai;No need to tell me twice.{br}To Mossgrove, everyone!
s;Krista;No time! Gotta move! Running from Holy Knights!
s;Jake;I know! That's why I need your help!
s;Jake;Thanks. The name's Jake.|{c:e;Jake;NoSmile}You see, me and my girlfriend Anna have been running into trouble with the Knights.
s;Jake;Point is, we've been able to set up shop all over Yondo back in the day.|It seems like ever since a year ago, everyone's been getting on our case.|And now we gotta sell our stuff in secret.

s;Jake;I don't know what's gotten into everyone,|but all I know is Anna and I want our livelihoods back!|If we can knock some sense into Foliaga's Holy Knights,|I think it would be a good start. So, what do you say?
s;Krista;You know what? Any enemy of the Knights is a friend of ours at this point.|{c:e;Krista;Smile}We'll help you out, Jake.
s;Jake;Thanks a million! I can't tell you how much this means to me.
s;Krista;Sorry, Jake, but we've got our own problems to deal with.|You're gonna have to find someone else.
s;Jake;Oh man{tgm}...{tgm} Alright.|{c:e;Jake;NormalBlink,Smile}Thanks for hearing me out, though.|At least promise me and Anna your patronage in the future!

name: SpawnTorgen
_source: s;Bandit1;Torgen, I'm gonna level wit' ya.|Why bother coming back here?|Those Medean banners we saw could mean anythin'.
s;Bandit2;Yeah, it's been months now.|Your little girlfriend's probably long gone,|and Medeas finally decided to do something about it.
s;Torgen;If she was dead, why would the royal family wait 'til NOW to do something, huh?|She's still out there, and this just proves it.
s;Bandit1;Man, you didn't yell at us fer callin' the princess your girlfriend.|Yer real serious about this.
s;Torgen;Of course I am! Besides, you've been hearing the rumors, right?|How the Council's been doubling the bounties lately?|It's all connected. I can feel it.
s;Bandit2;Hm, yeah, ya got a point.|{c:e;Bandit2;NormalBlink,Smile}Well, boss, if you wanna check things out, we're right behind ya.
s;Bandit1;Besides, even if it ain't her, we can still collect that bounty!

name: SpawnPeter
_source: s;Peter;What is all that racket outside? It's scaring the birds away.
s;Peter;*sigh* Those accursed bandits again.|{c:e;Peter;NormalBlink}I'll go grab my axe.

name: WaterLevel
_source: change_music;enemy_phase;Squall Goes to the Water Aisle

name: PromoReinWarn
_source: s;Anna;Princess, we'd better wrap this up soon.|There's gonna be some tougher enemies on their way|if we don't take care of the rest of the forts.

name: BaseConvo_Reconnaisance
_source: s;Judah;{tgm}.....|{c:e;Judah;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}Why do I have the feeling I'm being watched?|{c:e;Judah;CloseEyes}Whatever.{c:e;Judah;NormalBlink} Bath's done. Time to go.

s;Felicity;Yup, he's clean.{c:e;Felicity;CloseEyes} In more ways than one.|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink}No signs of Circ's influence on him,|but I still should make sure he doesn't do anything to Krista.|{c:e;Felicity;CloseEyes}*sigh* I just wish this recon mission didn't have to involve seeing him naked.|{c:e;Felicity;HalfCloseEyes}Ugh, now I need a bath too.

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;Krista and friends push past the Oregot-Medeas border and march onward.|They hold their heads high, confident in their ability to face any new dangers ahead.;StyleNid=overworld_narration

#The party continues to head northward to the capital of Oregot. They are stopped by Gunnar, the bandit who kidnapped Krista eight years ago. Circ's forces come to back up Gunnar's group and the party has to escape their pursuit.
s;Forrest;Hold on, Your Highness. More bandits up ahead.
s;Forrest;I see him.|{c:e;Forrest;NormalBlink}Stay behind me, Your Highness. I'll--
s;Krista;No.{w} I'll take care of him myself.
s;Gunnar;I don't care if the Council sent ya. This is my turf, so my rules.|You can do whatever you want with the Medeans except for the princess.|She's mine.
s;Sven;I can agree with most of those terms.|My men and I are just here for backup, after all.|{c:e;Sven;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}However, the princess is non-negotiable.{w} She's ours.
s;Gunnar;Look, String Bean, that girl was mine eight years ago, and she's still mine now.
s;Sven;So greedy.|{c:e;Sven;NormalBlink,NoSmile}You can do whatever you want with the girl after we're done with her, Meathead.|She'll be in one piece after all's said and done.
s;Gunnar;And you expect me to keep your word? Hah! Yeah, right.
s;Sven;Smart man. But I am speaking the truth here.|{c:e;Sven;CloseEyes,Smile}Whether you believe me or not is ultimately up to you.

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;Defeating Gunnar's gang, Krista and friends flee deeper into Oregot.|Felicity leads the party to a hidden underground settlement|to keep them away from the enemy's sights.;StyleNid=overworld_narration

#Felicity guides the party to an underground settlement to seek shelter. Circ's forces find them and now the party has to defend the settlement. Suspicion arises in the party as they start to realize that there may be a traitor in their midst
s;Krista;Hey, Felicity, where exactly is this?|I know bandits sometimes have underground hideouts,|but this is way more elaborate.
s;Tora;Hey! Who the hell's out there?!
s;Tora;I dunno who you think you are, but you're not allowed--
s;Tora;Wait, Felicity? The hell are you doing back here?|Did things get worse on the surface?
s;Felicity;There is another reason I brought you here, Your Highness.{w} Follow me.
s;Felicity;This mural depicts The War of Divides.|What truly happened, that is.;bottom;fit
s;Felicity;Tell me, Your Highness, what do you know of The War of Divides?;bottom;fit
s;Krista;Humans and Shifters fought due to rising tensions between the two groups.|It started when the humans captured Shifters and used them as slaves.;bottom;fit
s;Krista;Hm... The Great Beasts except for Medea passed on at some point.|The rest of the timeline is pretty vague.|Records from before the start of the war were lost.;bottom;fit
s;Felicity;I see.{w} Your Highness, look up there.;bottom;fit
s;Felicity;Mercilessly slain by their little brother Medea.;bottom;fit
s;Krista;But that can't be right. Medea had great respect and love for his siblings.|The other Great Beasts just grew old.{w} Didn't they?;bottom;fit
s;Krista;... Felicity, where does Circ fit into all of this?;bottom;fit
s;Felicity;Where do you you think the Great Beasts came from? Who birthed them?;bottom;fit
s;Felicity;They came from the Beast of Cycles.{br}The Beast of Death.{w} The Beast of Life.|The Father Drake Circ.;bottom;fit

s;Krista;"The Father Drake"...{w} None of the history books ever mentioned Circ.|At least, not the most circulated ones.|What was written in that book I lent to Ervan|must have been one of the few surviving records of Circ's existence.;bottom;fit
s;Felicity;That seems to be the case.|It's a miracle it ended up in the Medean Castle's archives to begin with.;bottom;fit
s;Krista;I shouldn't be surprised considering what he did to his siblings. Still...;bottom;fit
s;Felicity;Circ was the first that Medea struck down.|After that, the other Great Beasts retaliated.|And so began The War of Divides.;bottom;fit
s;Krista;I know you wouldn't lie to me, Felicity.{br}We've known each other for years.|At the same time, how would you know all this to begin with?|The only way you could is if--;bottom;fit
s;Felicity;This should prove my credentials enough, wouldn't you say?;bottom;fit
s;Krista;Whoa, wait! All this time, y-you... You were...?!;bottom;fit
s;Felicity;A Shifter, yes.{w} You understand why I had to hide this, don't you?;bottom;fit
s;Krista;Felicity, this all is{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}{tgm}Dear Medea, I don't even know where to begin.

s;Felicity;I will say I'm still loyal to you, Your Highness. I always have been.|{c:e;Felicity;CloseEyes}But that's not important right now.|{c:e;Felicity;HalfCloseEyes}History has been obfuscated to the point|where what's taught to the humans now is a perversion of the truth.|{c:e;Felicity;CloseEyes}All to make Medea himself perceived as the hero of the story.

s;Krista;Medea truly made humans in his image.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Cruel. Underhanded. Selfish.|{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}All this time as a descendant of Medea's bloodline,|I was always taught to live up to his image of modesty and chivalry.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}So, yeah. It is a relief to know none of that is true.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes,Smile}He's an absolute dastard.{w} I think I can handle living up to those standards.
s;Krista;Thanks, Felicity. I needed to hear this.{w}{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,NoSmile} But on a more serious note,|that does give us a better idea of what Circ's Talons are trying to do.
s;Krista;Yeah. They're trying to revive him, aren't they?
s;Felicity;All the signs point to that conclusion.|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink}I had realized it myself a long time ago,|but I'm sure you understand why I couldn't share my thoughts.
s;Krista;There definitely would've been a lot to unpack without all this context.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}But now{tgm}...
s;Felicity;You're questioning if our cause is a just one.

s;Felicity;That is something for you to decide,{br}Your Highness.|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink}Fight for your initial goals and leave the truth buried forever,|or fight for truth and upset the status quo that's been established for a millenia?|{c:e;Felicity;CloseEyes}There is no simple answer, Your Highness.{w}{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink} No matter which path you take,|you must be prepared for the consequences that come with it.
s;CircFollower;Spawn of Medea! Time to surrender!
s;Krista;Dammit, how'd you know we were here?!
s;CircFollower;Heh, that's our little secret.|{c:e;CircFollower;NoSmile}Now, just come quietly and we don't gotta hurt you or your friends.
s;Krista;*huff huff*|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}Dear Medea, how could this happen?|I thought we were hidden from Circ's followers here.
s;Tora;Hey, Snake-Eyes! The hell's going on?!
s;Tora;Yeah, I got that much. Who's the enemy?
s;Krista;Circ's Talons. I don't know how, but they followed us here.
s;Tora;You serious?!|{c:e;Tora;CloseEyes}Dammit, I knew letting you outsiders stay here was a bad idea.
s;Krista;Look, there's no time to be pointing fingers.|We gotta defend the gates and stop these guys!

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come

s;;After their victory in Oregot, Krista and friends head back to Medeas Castle|to plan out their final attack on Circ's Talons.|However, the Talons won't take their defeat sitting down.;StyleNid=overworld_narration
#The party returns to Medeas Castle as they plan out a full-on counterattack against Circ's forces. Before a plan could be fully drafted, Circ's forces invade the castle
s;Bryant;Krista, the situation in Yondo has gone dire.|For that reason, I believe it is time to inherit your birthright.
s;Bryant;Yes. Now, come. To the underground vault.
s;Krista;The blade crafted from the bones of Medea himself{tgm}...|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}{tgm}Father, are you sure about this?|Am I really worthy of this weapon?
s;Bryant;I would not have brought you here if I did not think so.

s;Bryant;Krista, my precious daughter{tgm}...|{c:e;Bryant;NormalBlink}{tgm}You have followed Medea's teachings and walked in his footsteps well.|Your exploits since your time in Foliaga are proof enough.
s;Bryant;You are strong and have a good heart, Krista.|I am not saying this as just your father, but as king of Medeas as well.|Medea's Tooth belongs in your hands.
s;Bryant;Good. Now, perform the rite, just as your ancestors have done.
s;Krista;"O, Divine Medea, hear the pleas of thy flesh and blood."|"Grant me temperance. Grant me patience. Grant me strength."|"And may thy blessing protect me and those I hold dear.";bottom;fit
s;Bryant;And may Medea grant these boons upon you, Krista.
s;Krista;N-No. It's nothing.|I{tgm}...{tgm} I will do my best as Medea's child. I will lead our people to victory.
prep;true;Prepare to Charge;Guide;True;AccessLibrary;Access the guide for tips and tricks.;gba;no_chap_disp

name: Intro
_source: m;A Hint of Things to Come
s;;The Talons' ambush on Medeas Castle failed.|Our heroes regroup and prepare to answer{br}the one question looming over their heads:|Who is the traitor?;StyleNid=overworld_narration
s;Krista;I still can't believe one of us could be a traitor.;bottom

s;Kai;With how close we are to toppling the enemy,|I'm not surprised that they'd try to sabatoge us.|So, we gotta put a stop to it.|In order to narrow down our possibilities of who the traitor could be,|let's figure out when they joined the group.;bottom
choice;TacticsLogic;When did the traitor come in?;When we were in Foliaga.,Right after we left Merinas.,When we were heading to Oregot.
if;v('_last_choice') != 'When we were heading to Oregot.'
s;Krista;No, that would've been too early.|There were no signs of interference around that time.|Things only got intense when{tgm}...{tgm} Yeah, that makes more sense.;bottom;;thought_bubble

s;Krista;They would've have had to been with us when we were heading to Oregot.|We haven't had to deal with Circ's forces directly this much until recently.|I doubt Circ's Talons would want to waste resources|by having Circ's actual followers go after us without any forethought.;bottom

s;Kai;Very true.|While we were in Foliaga and Merinas,|we had to deal with the Holy Knights, pirates, and bandits.|Sure we encountered them in Fuegsol,|but that was only because we intended for that to happen.;bottom

s;Krista;Exactly. Once we crossed the Oregot border,|Circ's followers started showing their faces|like they knew exactly where we were going and when.|Same goes for when we came back to Medeas.|They had the nerve to invade the castle!{w} They wouldn't do that|unless they were confident they could take us down then and there.;bottom
s;Kai;Is the traitor acting out of their own free will?;bottom
s;Krista;What do you--{w}{c:e;Krista;CloseEyes}No, wait. Yeah, I get it.{w} Hm{tgm}...;bottom
s;Krista;Can I really say that for sure? No, I don't think so.|{c:e;Krista;HalfCloseEyes}In fact...;bottom;;thought_bubble

s;Krista;I hate to say this, but yeah.{br}They have to be.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink}We've checked everyone who joined us before we came to Oregot.|None of them were marked.|The enemy can't be controlling them.;bottom
s;Kai;Then that just leaves one question.|Who would benefit from betraying us?|You'd think that humans would fight for humanity.;bottom
s;Kai;And the Shifters allied with us have either already shown their loyalty|or joined us too late to be a logical candidate.;bottom
s;Kai;And the Shifters allied with us have already shown their loyalty.;bottom
s;Kai;So, who's left? And what's their motive here?;bottom
s;Krista;No no no no no no no no no no no no;bottom

choice;TacticsLogic;Who is at fault for bringing Yondo to ruin?;YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU,YOU;BG=menu_bg_dark;Dimensions=8,3;TextAlign=center
# Krista exits the war room and starts running down the hallway.
# Camera pans to the right, revealing Ervan at the end of the hallway. He approaches her.
s;Ervan;Oh, Krista. Is everything alright? You look pale, dear.
s;Ervan;What has you so nervous? It's just me.

s;Ervan;So, I was found out? It was obvious, I suppose.|{c:e;Ervan;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}But actually going for a lethal strike{tgm}...|{c:e;Ervan;CloseEyes,Smile}{tgm}You're always full of surprises, aren't you, love?
s;Ervan;Oh, my dear Krista{tgm}...{tgm} All will be forgiven in due time.|{c:e;Ervan;NormalBlink,NoSmile}But for now, I have a request to fulfill.
# Ervan begins to move off-screen. Forrest, Kai, and Felicity come on screen to prevent Ervan from taking Krista.
s;Forrest;Damn it, no! Let her go!
s;Ervan;I'm afraid I can't do that, Forrest. I'm sure you understand.|The Talons are ready for the final step, and Krista is the key to that.|Farewell.
# Forrest rushes to the other side of the hallway. Kai and Felicity emerge from the war room.
s;Forrest;Ervan has Krista! I have to go!
s;Kai;Ervan was the traitor all along.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}I knew it!{c:e;Kai;HalfCloseEyes} But what were we supposed to do?|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink}We had no hard evidence to say he was.
s;Felicity;More importantly, Forrest is out there trying to rescue Krista on his own.|We have to stop him!
s;Felicity;Kai, come on! What are you waiting for?
s;Kai;Why is Ervan with the enemy? It makes no sense.|At the very least, he'd be on Krista's side of the conflict.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes}Unless{tgm}...
s;Kai;Unless{tgm}...!|{tgm}Damn it, you've got to be kidding me!
s;Felicity;Kai?!{w}{c:e;Felicity;CloseEyes} Ugh, these man, I swear{tgm}...{tgm} Kai!!
change_unit_desc;Krista;Princess of Medeas.{br}Immature, but has a bright future.
s;KristaPast;My room? Was all that a dream?
s;;<red>Move</> with the <red>arrow keys or control stick</>.;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=2;no_sound
s;;<red>Interact</> with the environment with the <red>CONFIRM</> button/key.;StyleNid=hint;NumLines=3;no_sound

name: BaseConvo_Her Guardian
_source: s;Felicity;I wonder if he's still here.
s;Felicity;In the exact same spot for so long{tgm}...
s;Estoc;[INITIATING BOOT SEQUENCE.]{br}[PLEASE HOLD.]|[ALL SYSTEMS ONLINE.]{br}[ESTOC VERSION 1.4.7 ACTIVATED.];TextSpeed=10
s;Estoc;Who goes there?! What year is it?!
s;Felicity;It's just me, Estoc. And it's been a few decades.

name: BaseConvo_What's in a Name
_source: s;Krista;Pretty cool sword you got there, Gregor.
s;Gregor;Oh ho! Krista has good eye for weapons, yes?|Is mighty blade from good friend of Gregor.
s;Krista;Ohhh, I see. Who's this friend of yours?
s;Gregor;Tactician from back home.{w} Very smart. Very astute.|{c:e;Gregor;HalfCloseEyes}Although, name she give to blade is{tgm}...{tgm} not so much.
s;Krista;Well, a great weapon like that probably has a good name.|It can't be that bad!
s;Gregor;Gregor no think name is, how you say, creative.|All swords can do slash, no? This sword no different!
s;Krista;I mean, it's descriptive in that way. You know what the weapon's supposed to do!|It's like calling a lance "Stabby Stab" or an axe "Choppy Chop".
s;Gregor;Ahahaha! I sorry, Krista.|{c:e;Gregor;NormalBlink,Smile}Is just that you and friend is sharing of mind.|She also name lance "Stabby Stab"{br}and axe "Choppy Chop".
s;Krista;Haha, I see. I guess we'd get along well, in that case.|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}Oh, you can use bows, right? How about I get one for you?|{c:e;Krista;Smile}Maybe call it "Shooty Shoot".
s;Gregor;Ah, yes{tgm}...{tgm} "Shooty Shoot".|Perfect name for weapon that does the shooting.

name: BaseConvo_Out of Hiding
_source: for;PartyMembers;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_player_units() if get_item(unit,'OldRock')]
alert;Old Rock changed to Felicity's Stone!;FelicitysStone
for;PartyMembers;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_player_units() if get_item(unit,'WornStone')]
alert;Worn Stone changed to Xiang's Stone!;XiangsStone
for;PartyMembers;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_player_units() if get_item(unit,'PreciousStone')]
alert;Precious Stone changed to Tsurugi's Stone!;TsurugisStone
for;PartyMembers;[unit.nid for unit in game.get_player_units() if get_item(unit,'ShinyStone')]
alert;Shiny Stone changed to Kiraz's Stone!;KirazsStone

name: FightFelicityVanguard
_source: s;Felicity;To think a golem was amongst our enemies{tgm}...|{c:e;Felicity;HalfCloseEyes}{tgm}I shouldn't be surprised, but it feels wrong.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Vanguard;You are that Shifter I was informed of.|A Cat Shifter no less.|I was made to protect you and your people, but now{tgm}...;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None
s;Felicity;I don't want to do this either, but we can't avoid it.|{c:e;Felicity;NormalBlink}We both have a cause to fight for.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightKaiAgrona
_source: s;Agrona;You fight for truth and yet you still side with her.|She has deceived you this whole time.|Why do you continue to fight for a liar?;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

s;Kai;Don't get me wrong.{br}I'm not fighting for her.|I'm fighting for myself and this world I happen to live in.|It's only by coincidence that our goals align.|{c:e;Kai;CloseEyes,Smile}So, I'd appreciate it|if you don't try to convince me to change sides.|{c:e;Kai;NormalBlink,Smile}I'm a mercenary by trade.{br}And she still needs to pay me.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None

name: FightJamalKiraz
_source: s;Kiraz;You have to stop this! It's wrong. It's all wrong!|This isn't a way to bring{br}peace.;StyleNid=boss_convo_right;MessageTail=None
s;Jamal;You dare stand in our way?|I don't care if you're just a child.|If you choose to fight against us, you will be eliminated!;StyleNid=boss_convo_left;MessageTail=None

name: BaseConvo_Vengeance Achieved
_source: s;Chell;Finally{tgm}...{tgm} Finally{tgm}...!|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}{tgm}He's dead. That monster is dead by my hands!|{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes}Mother, Father, I did it. I finally avenged you both.
s;Chell;S-Sam? How long were you standing there?
s;Sam;Long enough.{br}You doing okay?|{c:e;Sam;HalfCloseEyes}I mean, yeah, you probably are in a way. But{tgm}...
s;Chell;I'm more than okay, Sam.|{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes}It's finally over.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}That wretch of a man is dead and rotting.{w} Just as he should be.
s;Sam;There's more guys like him out there, Chell.|Since he's gone, this isn't gonna be a quest for vengeance anymore, right?|So, are you still willing to come back with me to Oregot?
s;Chell;Of course! It's not just about him anymore.|I want to support you, Sam.
s;Sam;Good. That's all I needed to hear.
s;Chell;Y-Your Highness? How long were you standing there?
s;Krista;Just for a little bit.{w} But, hey, are you doing alright?
s;Chell;I'm more than alright, Your Highness.{w}{c:e;Chell;CloseEyes} It's finally over.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}That wretch of a man is dead and rotting.{w} Just as he should be.
s;Krista;So, now that he's dead, what are you gonna do?

s;Chell;I'm not sure.|{c:e;Chell;NormalBlink}Even so, there are more pressing matters, are there not?|This war is a bigger priority,{br}Your Highness.|My personal goals and aspirations can be sorted once this is over.

s;Krista;I was hoping you'd say that.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}Let this victory sink in, Chell. I won't take that away from you.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,NoSmile}Just know that no matter what,|I'll support you in whatever you decide to do from here.

name: TalkKristaRoman
_source: s;Invisible;Sir Roman under service of House Valoria reporting for duty!
s;Invisible;Huh? House Valoria? Wait, I remember you now.|But, uh, can we get up before we do proper introductions?
s;Invisible;Right away, Your Highness! I apologize, Your Highness!
s;Roman;Sir Roman reporting for duty, Your Highness!

s;Krista;At ease, Roman.|{c:e;Krista;NormalBlink,Smile}You don't gotta get all up in those formalities around me.|I've known you since I was a kid.|Way back when I was still being tutored by the Valoria family and all that.
s;Roman;It makes me happy knowing you still remember a lowly knight like me, Your Highness.|{c:e;Roman;NoSmile}Oh, and speaking of the Valoria family, do you happen to know about--
s;Roman;Oh, uh, never mind.{br}Forget I said anything!|It's not like you would know if he--I mean she--I mean, uh, ummm{tgm}...
s;Krista;Roman, what in Medea's name are you going on about?
s;Roman;Uh, n-nothing!{br}Nothing at all!|Anyway, me and my colleague Ellen are here to aid you!
s;Krista;That's great!|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}But I don't remember House Valoria saying anything about sending their knights over.
s;Roman;We came here of our own volition, Your Highness!
s;Krista;Heh, I respect it.|{c:e;Krista;FarWink,Smile}I won't say anything if you won't.
s;Roman;Thank you, Your Highness! We'll do our best out there for you!

name: TalkTrevorRoman
_source: s;Invisible;Lord Trevor! I finally found you!!
s;Invisible;Roman{tgm}...{tgm} P-Please get off me. You're{tgm}...{tgm} crushing me.
s;Trevor;Dear Medea{tgm}...|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}{tgm}Well, good to know you're the same as ever, Roman.
s;Roman;It's good to see you too,{br}Lord Trevor!|Ella and I travelled all the way from the Valoria estate to see you.
s;Trevor;How'd you know I'd even be here in the first place?
s;Roman;Ella's the one who narrowed that down.|{c:e;Roman;CloseEyes,NoSmile}Something about "process of elimination"|and "keeping track of fallen rulers" or something like that.
s;Trevor;Sounds like something she would be on top of.|{c:e;Trevor;NormalBlink}Well, here to join forces with us, then?
s;Roman;Of course! Stay behind me, milord. I'll protect you!

name: TalkKristaElla
_source: s;Ella;Your Highness!|Lady Ella under service of House Valoria reporting for duty!
s;Krista;House Valoria? Oh, I remember you!|{c:e;Krista;Smile}Good to see you again, Ella. It's been a real long time, huh?
s;Ella;Indeed. And as much as I'd like to exchange pleasantries,|we have more important matters at hand.|Do you remember Roman? He and I came to lend you aid.
s;Krista;Awesome!|{c:e;Krista;NoSmile}But wouldn't have House Valoria said something about sending their knights?
s;Ella;We MAY have come without direct orders, Your Highness.
s;Krista;Hah! No worries. I totally get it.|Feel free to stick with us, Ella. Your secret's safe with me.

name: TalkTrevorElla
_source: s;Ella;Ah, mila--milord.{w}{c:e;Ella;CloseEyes} Milord.|{c:e;Ella;HalfCloseEyes}I apologize. I don't think I'll ever get used to that.
s;Trevor;Ella? What are you doing here?

s;Ella;Roman and I came to lend our aid to{br}Princess Krista's cause and to find you.|News of what happened to Archbishop Azalea and Emperor Samegoro has reached Medeas.|So, after some deducing,|we concluded the princess would lead her forces to Oregot next.|And that you would've been{br}travelling with her|since she would most likely be the first person with whom you sought refuge.
s;Trevor;And by "we" you mean YOU realized all that?
s;Ella;Well, I wasn't going to brag about it, but yes.
s;Trevor;Haha, it's good to see you either way, Ella.|{c:e;Trevor;HalfCloseEyes,NoSmile}But, er, you're not going to try to bring me back home, are you?
s;Ella;No. There are more important things to focus on at the moment.
s;Ella;We shall decide what is to be done after this is all over.

name: CheckGrapple
_source: alert;Enemy broke out of the grapple!
